XXdivyav_u:4: 001.001. buddho bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane
XXdivyav_u:6: 001.001. asmāt parāntake vāsavagrāme balaseno nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
XXdivyav_u:8: 001.003. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
XXdivyav_u:9: 001.004. so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīnāyācate ārāmedavatāṃ vanadevatāṃ śṛṅgāṭakadevatāṃ balipratigrāhikāṃ devatām/
XXdivyav_u:11: 001.006. asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante/
XXdivyav_u:16: 001.008. api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrāa jāyante
XXdivyav_u:18: 001.009. katameṣāṃ trayāṇām? mātāpitarau raktau bhavataḥ saṃnipatitau,
XXdivyav_u:19: mātā kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī, gandharavḥ pratyupasthito bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:20: 001.010. eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraśca/
XXdivyav_u:23: gṛhītamokṣamārgāntonmukho na nirvāṇe bahirmukhaḥ saṃsārādanarthikaḥ sarvabhavagativyupapattiparānmukho 'ntimadehadhārī anyatamāt sattvanikāyāccyutvā tasya prajāpatyāḥ kukṣimavakrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:25: 001.014. katame pañca? raktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti, viraktaṃ jānāti/
XXdivyav_u:30: 001.017. saceddārako bhavati, dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati/
XXdivyav_u:31: 001.017. saceddārikā bhavati, vāmaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati/
XXdivyav_u:35: 001.019. yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati, niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:43: 001.022. asmākaṃ cāpyatītakālagatānāmalpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni dattvā puṇyāni kṛtvā dakṣiṇāmādeśayiṣyati--idaṃ
XXdivyav_u:45: 001.024. āpannasattvāṃ ca tāṃ viditvā upariprasādatalagatāmayantritāṃ dhārayati śīte śītopakaraṇairuṣṇa uṣṇopakaraṇairvaidyaprajñaptairāhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair nātimadhurair nātikaṭukair
XXdivyav_u:50: 002.001. sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
XXdivyav_u:52: 002.002. abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇaviśālalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūruttuṅganāso ratnapratyuptikayā karṇikayā āmuktayālaṃkṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:56: 002.005. dharmatā yasya na śakyate mūlyaṃ kartuṃ tasya koṭimūlyaṃ kriyate/
XXdivyav_u:58: 002.007. tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya trīṇi saptakāni
XXdivyav_u:59: ekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:61: 002.009. ayaṃ dārakaḥ koṭimūlyayā ratnapratyuptikayā āmuktayā jātaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:63: 002.009. bhavatu dārakasya śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa iti nāma/
XXdivyav_u:64: 002.010. yasminneva divase śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo jātaḥ, tasminneva divase balasenasya gṛhapaterdvau preṣyadārakau jātau/
XXdivyav_u:65: 002.011. tenaikasya dāraka iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam, aparasya pālaka iti/
XXdivyav_u:67: dvābhyāmaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyām/
XXdivyav_u:68: 002.013. so 'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
XXdivyav_u:70: 002.016. sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttastadā lipyām upanyastaḥ, saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyām/
XXdivyav_u:73: 002.018. tasya pitrā trīṇi vāsagṛhāṇi māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ
XXdivyav_u:75: 002.018. trīṇi udyānāni māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikam/
XXdivyav_u:76: 002.019. trīṇi antaḥpurāṇi pratyupasthāpitāni jyeṣṭhakaṃ madhyamaṃ kanīyasam/
XXdivyav_u:77: 002.020. sa upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate
XXdivyav_u:80: 002.021. sa koṭikarṇastaṃ pitaraṃ paśyati nityaṃ kṛṣikarmānte--udyuktam/
XXdivyav_u:81: 002.022. sa kathayati--tāta, kasyārthe tvaṃ nityameva kṛṣikarmānte
XXdivyav_u:82: udyuktah? sa kathayati--putra, yathā tvamupariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa
XXdivyav_u:83: tūryeṇa krīḍasi ramasi paricārayasi, yadyahamapi evameva krīḍeyaṃ rameyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:90: tathāpi me ratnānāṃ parikṣayo na syāt/
XXdivyav_u:95: yuṣmākamutsahate śroṇena koṭikarṇena sārthavāhena sārdhamaśulkenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavatartum, sa mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyaṃ samudānayatu/
XXdivyav_u:97: 002.032. balaseno nāma gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--<3>kīdṛśena yānena śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo yāsyati? sa saṃlakṣayati--saced hastibhiḥ, hastinaḥ sukumārā durbharāśca, aśvā api sukumārā dubharāśca, gardabhāḥ smṛtimantaḥ sukumārāśca/
XXdivyav_u:99: 003.003. sa pitrā āhūyoktah--putra na tvayā sārthasya purastād gantavyam,
XXdivyav_u:104: 003.005. na ca te sārthavāhe hate sārtho vaktavyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:105: 003.006. dāsakapālakāvapi uktau--putrau, yuvābhyāṃ na kenacit prakāreṇa śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo moktavya
XXdivyav_u:106: 003.008. athāpareṇa samayena śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ kṛtakautukamaṅgalasvastyayano mātuḥ sakāśamupasaṃkramya pādayor nipatya
XXdivyav_u:110: 003.010. mātā sāśrudurdinavadanā kathayati--putra, kadācidahaṃ putrakaṃ punarapi jīvantaṃ
XXdivyav_u:113: 003.012. sa ruṣitaḥ kathayati--amba, ahaṃ kṛtakautūhalamaṅgalasvastyayano mahāsamudraṃ
XXdivyav_u:116: 003.014. sā kathayati--putra, kharaṃ te vākkarma niścāritam/
XXdivyav_u:118: 003.015. apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
XXdivyav_u:120: 003.015. atha śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ kṛtakautūhalamaṅgalasvastyayanaḥ śakaṭairbhārairmoṭaiḥ piṭakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ prabhūtaṃ samudragamanīyaṃ paṇyamāropya mahāsamudraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:122: 003.018. nipuṇataḥ sāmudram yānapātraṃ pratipādya mahāsamudramavatīrṇo dhanahārakaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:124: 003.019. tena tatropaparīkṣyopaparīkṣya ratnānāṃ tad vahanaṃ pūritaṃ
XXdivyav_u:128: 003.021. sau śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'pi sārthavāho dāsakapālakāvādāya sārthamadhyādekānte 'pakramya āyaṃ vyayaṃ ca tulayitumārabdhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:129: 003.023. paścāt tenāsau dāsako 'bhihitah--dāsaka, paśya sāthaḥ kiṃ
XXdivyav_u:136: 003.026. sa sārthaḥ sarātrimeva sthorāṃ lardayitvā saṃprasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:139: 003.027. te kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, kva sārthavāhah? purastād gacchati/
XXdivyav_u:140: 003.028. purastād gatvā pṛcchanti--kva sārthavāhah? pṛṣṭhata āgacchati/
XXdivyav_u:141: 003.028. pṛṣṭhato gatvā pṛcchanti--kva sārthavāhah? madhye gacchati/
XXdivyav_u:148: 003.031. bhavantaḥ, na śobhanaṃ kṛtam yadasmābhiḥ sārthavāhaśchoritaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:152: 004.001. āgacchata, kriyākāraṃ tāvat karmah--tāvanna kenacicchroṇasya koṭikarṇasya mātāpitṛbhyāmārocayitavyam yāvad bhāṇḍaṃ pratiśāmitaṃ
XXdivyav_u:158: 004.005. pṛṣṭhato gatvā pṛcchatah--kva sārthavāhah? purastād gacchatīti/
XXdivyav_u:160: 004.006. paścāt te kathayanti--amba vismṛto 'smābhiḥ sārthavāha iti/
XXdivyav_u:161: 004.007. tābhyāmeka āgatya kathayati--ayaṃ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'bhyāgata iti/
XXdivyav_u:162: 004.008. tasya tāvabhisāraṃ dattvā pratyudgatau na paśyataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:163: 004.008. apara āgatya kathayati--amba, diṣṭyā vardhasva, ayaṃ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'bhyāgata
XXdivyav_u:164: 004.009. tasya tāvabhisāraṃ dattvā pratyudgatau na paśyataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:166: 004.010. tābhyāmudyāneṣu svakasabhādevakuleṣu cchatrāṇi vyajanāni kalaśāni upānahāni cākṣarāṇi abhilikhitāni dattāni sthāpitāni--yadi tāvacchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo jīvati, laghu āgamaya, kṣipramāgamaya/
XXdivyav_u:167: 004.012. atha cyutaḥ kālagataḥ, tasyaiva gatyupapattisthānāt sthānāntaraviśeṣatāyai/
XXdivyav_u:169: 004.014. śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ sārthavāho 'pi sūryāṃśubhiḥ spṛṣṭa ātāpitaḥ
XXdivyav_u:170: prativibuddho yāvat sārthaṃ na paśyati nānyatra gardabhayānameva/
XXdivyav_u:172: 004.016. rātrau ca vātena pravāyatā vālukayā mārgo vyapoḍhaḥ pithitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:173: 004.016. te ca gardabhāḥ smṛtimanto gandhamāghrāyāghrāya śanairmandamandaṃ
XXdivyav_u:175: 004.017. sārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kasmādete śanairmandamandaṃ gacchantīti kṛtvā pratodayaṣṭyā
XXdivyav_u:176: 004.018. te saṃbhrāntā ākulībhūtāḥ smṛtibhraṣṭā unmārgeṇa saṃprasthitāḥ,
XXdivyav_u:178: 004.019. te tṛṣārtā vihvalavadanā jihvāṃ nirnāmayya gacchanti/
XXdivyav_u:180: 004.020. sa saṃlakṣayati--yadi etān notsrakṣyāmi, anayena vyasanamāpatsye/
XXdivyav_u:181: 004.021. ko 'sau nirghṛṇahṛdayastyaktaparalokaśca ya eṣāṃ pratodayaṣṭiṃ kāye nipātayiṣyati? tena ta utsṛṣṭāh--adyāgreṇa acchinnāgrāṇi tṛṇāni bhakṣayata anavamarditāni, pānīyāni pibata anāvilāni, caturdiśaṃ ca śītalā
XXdivyav_u:184: 004.024. yāvat paśyati āyasaṃ nagaramuccaṃ ca pragṛhītaṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:185: 004.025. tatra dvāre puruṣastiṣṭhati kālo raudrāścaṇḍo lohitākṣa
XXdivyav_u:188: 004.026. upasaṃkramya taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛcchati--asti atra bhoḥ puruṣa
XXdivyav_u:193: 004.028. tena sārthavāhena tatra praviśya pānīyaṃ pānīyam iti śabdo niścāritaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:202: 005.002. sa kathayati--ke yūyaṃ bhavantaḥ, kena vā karmaṇā ihopapannāh?
XXdivyav_u:205: 005.003. ahaṃ bhavantaḥ pratyakṣadarśī, kasmānnābhiśraddadhāsye? te gāthāṃ bhāṣante--
XXdivyav_u:206: 005.005. ākrośakā roṣakā vayaṃ matsariṇaḥ kuṭukuñcakā vayam/
XXdivyav_u:207: 005.006. dānaṃ ca na dattamaṇvapi yena vayaṃ pitṛlokamāgatāḥ//1//
XXdivyav_u:209: 005.007. asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ pretanagaraṃ praviṣṭaḥ svastikṣemābhyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:210: nirgacchan? sa saṃprasthito yāvat tenāsau puruṣo dṛṣṭaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:211: 005.008. tenoktah--bhadramukha, aho bata tvayā mamārocitaṃ syāt yathedaṃ
XXdivyav_u:213: 005.009. sa tenoktah--śroṇa gaccha, puṇyamaheśākhyastvam, yena tvaṃ pretanagaraṃ praviśya svastikṣemābhyāṃ nirgataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:215: 005.011. yāvadaparaṃ paśyati āyasaṃ nagaramuccaṃ ca pragṛhītaṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:216: 005.011. tatrāpi dvāre puruṣastiṣṭhati kālaścaṇḍo lohitākṣa udviddhapiṇḍo
XXdivyav_u:219: 005.013. upasaṃkramyaivamāha--bhoḥ puruṣa, asti atra nagare pānīyam? sa tūṣṇīṃ vyavasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:220: 005.014. bhūyastena pṛṣṭah--bhoḥ puruṣa, asti atra nagare pānīyam? sa tūṣṇīṃ vyavasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:221: 005.015. tena tatra praviśya pānīyaṃ pānīyam iti śabdaḥ kṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:226: 005.018. kuto 'ham yuṣmākaṃ pānīyaṃ dadāmīti? te kathayanti--śroṇa,
XXdivyav_u:228: 005.019. kuto 'tra pānīyam? adyāsmābhirdvādaśabhirvarṣaistvatsakāśāt pānīyaṃ pānīyamiti śabdaḥ
XXdivyav_u:229: 005.020. sa cāha--ke yūyaṃ bhavantaḥ, kena vā karmaṇā ihopapannāh? ta
XXdivyav_u:235: 005.024. dānaṃ ca na dattamaṇvapi yena vayaṃ pitṛlokamāgatāḥ//2//
XXdivyav_u:237: 005.025. asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ sa pretanagaraṃ praviśya kvastikṣemābhyāṃ jīvannirgacchan? sa saṃprasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:239: 005.026. sa tenoktah--bhadramukha, aho bata yadi tvayā mamārocitaṃ syād
XXdivyav_u:242: 005.028. asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā pretanagaraṃ praviśya svastikṣemābhyāṃ jīvan nirgacchan? sa saṃprasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:245: 005.030. ekaḥ puruṣo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikah aṅgadakuṇḍalavicitramālyābharaṇānulepanastābhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate
XXdivyav_u:249: 005.032. svāgatam <6>śroṇa, māsi tṛṣito bubhukṣito vā? sa
XXdivyav_u:250: saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ devo 'yaṃ vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā bhaviṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:253: 006.002. sa tasmin vimāne tāvat sthito yāvat
XXdivyav_u:260: 006.006. taistaṃ puruṣamavamūrdhakaṃ pātayitvā tāvat pṛṣṭavaṃśānutpāṭyotpāṭya bhikṣito yāvat
XXdivyav_u:261: 006.007. tataḥ paścāt punarapi tadvimānaṃ prādurbhūtam, tā apsarasaḥ prādurbhūtāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:262: 006.008. sa ca puruṣastābhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
XXdivyav_u:263: 006.008. sa teṣāṃ sakāśamupasaṃkramya kathayati--ke yūyam, kena ca karmaṇā
XXdivyav_u:264: ihopapannāh? te procuh--śroṇa duṣkuhakā jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:266: 006.010. sa cāha--ahaṃ pratyakṣadarśī, kathaṃ nābhiśraddadhāsye? śroṇa,
XXdivyav_u:268: 006.011. urabhrān praghātya praghātya māṃsaṃ vikrīya jīvikāṃ kalpayāmi/
XXdivyav_u:273: 006.014. bhūyo bhūyaḥ sa māṃ vicchandayati--bhadramukha, aniṣṭo 'sya
XXdivyav_u:277: 006.015. sa māṃ pṛcchati--bhadramukha, kiṃ tvametānurabhrān divā
XXdivyav_u:278: praghātayasi āhosvidū rātrau? mayoktah--ārya divā, praghātayāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:279: 006.017. sa kathayati--bhadramukha, rātrau śīlasamādānaṃ kiṃ na gṛhṇāsi/
XXdivyav_u:281: 006.018. yattad rātrau śīlasamādānaṃ gṛhītam, tasya karmaṇo vipākena
XXdivyav_u:283: 006.019. yanmayā divā urabhrāḥ praghātitāḥ, tasya karmaṇo vipākena divā evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:289: 006.023. sa urabhrān praghātya praghātya jīvikāṃ kalpayati/
XXdivyav_u:293: 006.025. bhoḥ puruṣa, tvamevaṃ kathayasi--duṣkuhakā jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā iti/
XXdivyav_u:295: 006.026. śroṇa, yadi na śraddadhāsyati, vaktavyastava pitā kathayati--asti
XXdivyav_u:298: 006.028. āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya,
XXdivyav_u:300: 006.029. apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
XXdivyav_u:303: 006.031. tatra ekā apsarā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā, ekaśca puruṣa abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ
XXdivyav_u:305: 007.001. sa taṃ dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā pratyavabhāṣitumārabdhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:306: 007.001. svāgataṃ śroṇa, mā tṛṣito 'si, mā bubhukṣito 'si vā? sa
XXdivyav_u:307: saṃlakṣayati--nūnamayaṃ devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā bhaviṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:310: 007.003. sa tasmin vimāne tāvat sthito yāvat
XXdivyav_u:317: 007.006. tayā tasya puruṣasya kāyena kāyaṃ saptakṛtvo veṣṭayitvā tāvaduparimastiṣkaṃ bhakṣayantī sthitā, yāvat sa eva
XXdivyav_u:321: 007.009. sa ca puruṣo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikastayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
XXdivyav_u:322: 007.010. sa tamupasaṃkramya pṛcchati--ko bhavān, kena karmaṇā ihopapannah?
XXdivyav_u:323: sa evamāha--śroṇa, duṣkuhakā jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyāḥ, nābhiśraddadhāsyasi/
XXdivyav_u:325: kathayati--yadi evam, ahaṃ vāsavagrāmake brāhmaṇa āsīt pāradārikaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:332: 007.016. sa māṃ pṛcchati--bhadramukha, paradārān kiṃ tvaṃ divā gacchasi,
XXdivyav_u:334: 007.017. sa kathayati--bhadramukha, divā kiṃ na śīlasamādānaṃ gṛhṇāsi?
XXdivyav_u:336: 007.018. yattanmayā āryasya kātyāyanasyāntikād divā śīlasamādānaṃ gṛhītam,
XXdivyav_u:337: tasya karmaṇo vipākena divā evaṃvidhaṃ divyasukhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi/
XXdivyav_u:338: 007.020. yattadrātrau paradārābhigamanaṃ kṛtam, tasya karmaṇo vipākena
XXdivyav_u:348: 007.026. bhoḥ puruṣa, tvamevaṃ kathayasi--duṣkuhakā jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā iti/
XXdivyav_u:349: 007.026. etanme kaḥ śraddadhāsyati? śroṇa yanna śraddadhāsyati,
XXdivyav_u:353: 007.028. āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya/
XXdivyav_u:355: 007.029. apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
XXdivyav_u:358: 007.030. tatraikā strī abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā aṅgadakuṇḍalavicitramālyābharaṇānulepanā/
XXdivyav_u:360: 007.032. sā taṃ dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā pratyavabhāṣitumārabdhā--<8>śroṇa,
XXdivyav_u:362: 008.001. mā tṛṣito 'si mā bubhukṣito 'si vā? sa saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ
XXdivyav_u:363: devīyaṃ vā nāgī vā yakṣī vā bhaviṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:366: 008.003. uktaṃ ca--śroṇa, yadi ete kiṃcinmṛgayanti, mā dāsyasīti uktvā
XXdivyav_u:367: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ karmasvakaṭāṃ pratyakṣīkartukāmā vimānaṃ praviśyāvasthitā/
XXdivyav_u:377: 008.008. kasmāt tvayaiṣāṃ dattam? kiṃ kathayati--ayaṃ me svāmī, ayaṃ me putraḥ, iyaṃ me snuṣā, iyaṃ me dāsī/
XXdivyav_u:378: 008.010. sa āha--ke yūyam, kena vā karmaṇā ihopapannāh? tayoktam--śroṇa,
XXdivyav_u:385: 008.014. cittamabhiprasannaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa mayā prasādajātayā piṇḍakena
XXdivyav_u:392: 008.017. sa ruṣito yāvad brāhmaṇānāṃ na dīyate, jñātīnāṃ vā jñātipūjā na
XXdivyav_u:393: kriyate, tāvattvayā tasmai muṇḍakāya śramaṇakāyāgrapiṇḍakaṃ dattam? so
XXdivyav_u:394: 'marṣajātaḥ kathayati--kasmāt sa muṇḍakaḥ śramaṇako busaplāvīṃ na bhakṣayatīti? tasya karmaṇo vipākenāyaṃ busaplāvīṃ bhakṣayati/
XXdivyav_u:397: 008.021. so 'pi mayoktah--putra, anumodasva, mayāryo mahākātyāyanaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:398: 008.021. so 'pi ruṣito yāvad brāhmaṇānāṃ na dīyate, jñātīnāṃ vā jñātipūjā
XXdivyav_u:399: na kriyate, tāvattvayā tasmai muṇḍakāya śramaṇakāyāgrapiṇḍaṃ dattam? so
XXdivyav_u:400: 'pi amarṣajātaḥ kathayati--kasmāt sa muṇḍakaḥ śramaṇako 'yoguḍaṃ na
XXdivyav_u:402: 008.024. nakṣatrarātryāṃ pratyupasthitāyāṃ mama jñātayaḥ praheṇakāni preṣayanti/
XXdivyav_u:404: 008.025. sā praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvā mama lūhāni upanāmayati/
XXdivyav_u:405: 008.026. ahaṃ teṣāṃ jñātīnāṃ saṃdiśāmi--kiṃ nu yūyaṃ durbhikṣe yathā lūhāni praheṇakāni preṣayata? te mama saṃdiśanti--na vayaṃ lūhāni preṣayāmaḥ, api tu praṇītānyeva praheṇakāni preṣayāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:406: 008.029. mayā snuṣābhihitā--vadhūke, mā tvaṃ praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvāsmakaṃ lūhāni upanāmayasi? sā kathayati--kiṃ svamāṃsaṃ na bhakṣayati yā tvadīyāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayatīti? iyaṃ tasya karmaṇo
XXdivyav_u:408: 008.032. nakṣatrarātryāṃ pratupasthitāyāṃ praṇītāni praheṇakāni dattvā jñātīnāṃ preṣayāmi/
XXdivyav_u:409: 008.033. sā dārikā tāni praṇītāni praheṇakāni mārge 'ntarbhakṣayitvā teṣāṃ lūhāni upanāmayati/
XXdivyav_u:410: 009.001. <9>te mama saṃdiśanti--kiṃ nu tvaṃ durbhikṣe yathā lūhāni asmākaṃ
XXdivyav_u:411: praheṇakāni preṣayasi? ahaṃ teṣāṃ saṃdiśāmi--nāhaṃ lūhāni perṣayāmi, api tu praṇītānyevāhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:412: 009.002. mayā dārikābhihitā--dārike, mā tvaṃ praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvā teṣāṃ lūhāni
XXdivyav_u:413: 009.004. sā kathayati--kiṃ nu pūyaśoṇitaṃ na bhakṣayati, yā tvadīyāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayatīti? tasya karmaṇo vipākeneyaṃ pūyaśoṇitaṃ
XXdivyav_u:415: 009.005. mama buddhirutpannā--tatra pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇīyām yatraitān sarvān svakaṃ svakaṃ karmaphalaṃ paribhuñjānān paśyeyamiti/
XXdivyav_u:416: 009.006. yayā mayāryamahākātyāyanaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādya praṇīte trāyastriṃśe devanikāye upapattavyam, sāhaṃ mithyāpraṇidhānavaśāt pretamaharddhikā saṃvṛttā/
XXdivyav_u:417: 009.008. śroṇa, gamiṣyasi tvaṃ vāsavagrāmakam? tatra mama duhitā veśyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:419: 009.009. sā tvayā vaktavyā--dṛṣṭāste mayā pitā mātā bhrātā bhrāturjāyā dāsī/
XXdivyav_u:424: 009.011. śroṇa, yadi na śraddadhāsyati, vaktavyā--tava paurāṇe paitṛke vāsagṛhe catvāro lohasaṃghāṭāḥ suvarṇasya pūrṇāstiṣṭhanti, madhye ca sauvarṇadaṇḍakamaṇḍaluḥ/
XXdivyav_u:425: 009.013. te kathayanti--tamuddhṛtyātmānaṃ samyaksukhena prīṇaya, āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya, asmākaṃ ca nāṃnā
XXdivyav_u:427: 009.015. apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
XXdivyav_u:429: 009.016. evaṃ tasya paribhramato dvādaśa varṣā atikrāntāḥ//
XXdivyav_u:433: 009.018. tayā teṣāmeva pretānāmājñā dattā--bhavanto gacchata, śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇaṃ suptameva vāsavagrāmake paitṛke udyāne sthāpayitvā āgacchata/
XXdivyav_u:435: 009.020. sa prativibuddho yāvat paśyati ghaṇṭāchatrāṇi vyajanāni, akṣarāṇi
XXdivyav_u:439: 009.022. sa saṃlakṣayati--yadi ahaṃ mātāpitṛbhyāṃ mṛta eva gṛhītaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:440: kasmādbhūyo 'haṃ gṛhaṃ praviśāmi? gacchāmi, ārya mahākātyāyanasyāntikāt pravrajāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:443: 009.025. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamidamavocat--ehi śroṇa, śvāgataṃ
XXdivyav_u:445: 009.026. dṛṣṭaste śroṇa ayaṃ lokaḥ paraśca lokah? sa kathayati--dṛṣṭo
XXdivyav_u:447: 009.027. labheyāhaṃ bhadanta mahākātyāyana svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ
XXdivyav_u:449: 009.028. sa āryeṇoktah--śroṇa, tāṃ tāvat pūrvikāṃ pratijñāṃ paripūraya/
XXdivyav_u:453: 009.031. bhoḥ puruṣa, adya mama piturdvādaśavarṣāṇi kālagatasya/
XXdivyav_u:454: 009.032. asti kaścid dṛṣṭaḥ paralokāt punarāgacchan? bhadramukha, eṣo
XXdivyav_u:457: 009.033. bhadramukha, yadi na śraddadhāsi, sa tava pitā kathayati--asti
XXdivyav_u:460: 010.001. āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya,
XXdivyav_u:462: 010.002. apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādāya gacchet/
XXdivyav_u:464: 010.003. paśyāmi, saced bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati, sarvametat satyam/
XXdivyav_u:472: 010.007. sa kathayati--bhoḥ puruṣa, adya mama piturdvādaśa varṣāṇi kālaṃ gatasya/
XXdivyav_u:473: 010.007. asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ paralokaṃ gatvā punarāgacchan?
XXdivyav_u:476: 010.009. sa cāaha--bhadramukha, sacennābhiśraddadhāsi, tava pitrā agniṣṭomasyādhastāt suvarṇasya kalaśaḥ pūrayitvā sthāpitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:477: 010.010. sa kathayati--tamuddhṛtyātmānaṃ samyaksukhena prīṇaya, āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya, asmākaṃ ca nāṃnā
XXdivyav_u:479: 010.011. apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
XXdivyav_u:481: 010.013. paśyāmi, saced bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati, sarvametat satyam/
XXdivyav_u:486: 010.014. upasaṃkramya kathayati--bhagini, dṛṣṭāste mayā mātā pitā bhrātā bhrāturjāyā dāsī/
XXdivyav_u:489: 010.016. sā kathayati--bhoḥ puruṣa, mama mātāpitrordvādaśa varṣāṇi
XXdivyav_u:491: 010.017. asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ paralokaṃ gatvā punarāgacchan? sa
XXdivyav_u:494: 010.018. sa kathayati--bhagini, sacennābhiśraddadhāsi, tava paurāṇe paitṛke vāsagṛhe catasro lohasaṃghāṭāḥ suvarṇapūrṇāstiṣṭhanti, madhye ca sauvarṇadaṇḍakamaṇḍaluḥ/
XXdivyav_u:495: 010.020. te kathayanti--tamuddhṛtyātmānaṃ samyaksukhena prīṇaya, āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya, asmākaṃ ca nāṃnā
XXdivyav_u:497: 010.022. apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
XXdivyav_u:499: 010.023. paśyāmi, saced bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati, sarvametat satyam/
XXdivyav_u:503: 010.024. śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--sarvo 'yaṃ lokaḥ suvarṇasya śraddadhāti, na tu kaścinmama śraddhayā gacchatīti/
XXdivyav_u:507: 010.026. syādāryaḥ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa eva te bhaginījanaḥ saṃjānate(?)/
XXdivyav_u:523: 011.001. tau kathayatah--putra āvāṃ tvadīyena śokena rudantāvandhībhūtau/
XXdivyav_u:532: 011.006. sa taṃ dhanajātaṃ dīnānāthakṛpaṇebhyo dattvā daridrānadaridrān
XXdivyav_u:534: 011.007. upasaṃkramyāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte
XXdivyav_u:536: 011.008. ekānte sthitaḥ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa āyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanamidamavocat--labheyāhamāryamahākātyāyana svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām, yāvaccareyāhaṃ bhagavato 'ntike brahmacaryam/
XXdivyav_u:542: 011.012. dharmatā khalu yathā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dvau saṃnipātau bhavataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:544: 011.014. tatra ye āṣāḍhyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyāṃ saṃnipatanti, te tāṃstānuddeśayogamanasikārānudgṛhya paryavāpya tāsu grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu varṣāmupagacchanti/
XXdivyav_u:546: yathādhigatamārocayanti, uttare ca paripṛcchanti sūtrasya vinayasya mātṛkāyāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:548: 011.017. atha ye āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya sārdhaṃvihāryantevāsikā bhikṣavas tāṃstānuddeśayogamanasikāraviśeṣān gṛhya paryavāpya tāsu tāsu
XXdivyav_u:550: māsānāmatyayāt kṛtacīvarā niṣṭhitacīvarāḥ samādāya pātracīvaram yenāyuṣmān
XXdivyav_u:552: 011.021. upasaṃkramyāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:553: 011.021. ekānte niṣadya yathādhigatamārocayanti, uttare ca paripṛcchanti/
XXdivyav_u:558: 011.023. arhan saṃvṛttas traidhātukavītarāgo yāvad abhivādyaśca saṃvṛttaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:559: 011.025. athāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya sārdhaṃvihāryantevāsikā āyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanam yāvattāvat
XXdivyav_u:563: 011.027. draṣṭavyā eva paryupāsitavyā eva hi tathāgatā arhantaḥ
XXdivyav_u:565: 011.027. tena khalu punaḥ samayena śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt saṃnipatitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:566: 011.029. athāyuṣmāñ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa utthāyāsanād ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yenāyuṣmān
XXdivyav_u:570: 011.032. gacchāmi upādhyāya, rūpakāyenāpi taṃ bhagavantaṃ drakṣyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:572: 012.001. durlabhadarśanā hi vatsa tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhās
XXdivyav_u:574: 012.002. asmākaṃ ca vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandasva,
XXdivyav_u:576: 012.003. pañca praśnāṃśca pṛccha--asmāt parāntakeṣu bhadanta janapadeṣu
XXdivyav_u:579: 012.004. tatrāsmābhiḥ kathaṃ pratipattavyam? kharā bhūmī gokaṇṭakā dhānāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:582: 012.006. tadanyeṣu janapadeṣu idamevamrūpamāstaraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇaṃ tadyathā erako merako jandurako mandurakaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:586: 012.008. bhikṣurbhikṣoścīvarakāni preṣayati itaścyutāni tatrāsamprāptāni kasyaitāni naiḥsargikāni/
XXdivyav_u:587: 012.009. adhivāsayati āyuṣmāñchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya tūṣṇībhāvena/
XXdivyav_u:588: 012.010. athāyuṣmāñchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇas tasyā eva rātreratyayāt pūrvāhṇe
XXdivyav_u:591: 012.012. athāyuṣmāñchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisāmayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:593: 012.014. tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma--gaccha ānanda tathāgatasya śroṇasya ca koṭikarṇasyaikavihāre mañcaṃ prajñāpaya/
XXdivyav_u:594: 012.015. evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmānānandastathāgatasya śroṇasya ca koṭikarṇasya yāvat prajñāpya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:595: 012.016. upasaṃkramya bhagavantamidamavocat--prajñapto bhadanta tathāgatasya śroṇasya koṭikarṇasya vihārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ, yāvadvihāraṃ praviśya niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:597: 012.019. athāyuṣmānapi śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo bahirvihārasya pādau prakṣālya
XXdivyav_u:598: vihāraṃ praviśya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya yāvat pratimukhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:600: 012.021. tāṃ khalu rātriṃ bhagavān āyuṣmāṃśca śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa āryeṇa tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsitavān/
XXdivyav_u:601: 012.022. atha bhagavān rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ
XXdivyav_u:602: koṭikarṇamāmantrayate sma--pratibhātu te śroṇa dharmo yo mayā svayamabhijñāyābhisambudhyākhyātaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:603: 012.023. athāyuṣmāñ śroṇo bhagavatā kṛtāvakāśah asmāt parāntikayā
XXdivyav_u:604: guptikayā udānāt pārāyaṇāt satyadṛṣṭaḥ śailagāthā munigāthā arthavargīyāṇi ca sūtrāṇi vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṃ karoti/
XXdivyav_u:605: 012.025. atha bhagavāñchroṇasya koṭikarṇasya kathāparyavasānaṃ viditvā āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamidamavocat--sādhu sādhu śroṇa, madhuraste dharmo bhāṣitaḥ praṇītaśca, yo mayā svayamabhijñāyābhisambudhyākhyātaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:606: 012.028. athāyuṣmataḥ śroṇasya koṭikarṇasyaitadabhavat--ayaṃ me kālo bhagavata upādhyāyasya vacasārocayitumiti viditvotthāyāsanād yāvad bhagavantaṃ praṇamyedamavocat--asmāt parāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vāsavagrāmake
XXdivyav_u:608: 012.031. sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchati yāvat
XXdivyav_u:611: 012.032. atha bhagavāñcchroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamidamavocat<13>--akālaṃ te śroṇa praśnavyākaraṇāya/
XXdivyav_u:612: 013.001. saṃghamelakas tatra kālo bhaviṣyati praśnasya vyākaraṇāya/
XXdivyav_u:613: 013.002. atha bhagavān kālyamevotthāya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:614: 013.003. athāyuṣmāñcchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'sthāt/
XXdivyav_u:615: 013.004. ekāntasthito bhagavantamidamavocat--asmāt parāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vāsavagrāmake bhadantamahākāyāyanaḥ prativasati, yo me upādhyāyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:616: 013.005. sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchati yāvat
XXdivyav_u:618: 013.006. pañca ca praśnāti vistareṇoccārayitavyāni yathāpūrvamuktāni yāvat
XXdivyav_u:622: snātaḥ, ekapalāśike upānahe dhārayitavye na dvipuṭāṃ na tripuṭām/
XXdivyav_u:623: 013.009. sā cet kṣayadharmiṇī bhavati, tāṃ tyaktvā punar navā grahītavyā/
XXdivyav_u:624: 013.010. bhikṣurbhikṣoścīvarakāni preṣayati itaścyutāni tatrāsamprāptāni na kasyacinnaiḥsargikāṇi/
XXdivyav_u:625: 013.011. āyuṣmān upālī buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati--yaduktaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā pratyantimeṣu janapadeṣu vinayadharapañcamenopasampadam, tatra katamo 'ntaḥ katamaḥ pratyantah? pūrveṇopāli puṇḍavardhanaṃ nāma nagaram,
XXdivyav_u:626: tasya pūrveṇa puṇḍakakṣo nāma parvataḥ, tataḥ pareṇa pratyantaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:627: 013.013. dakṣiṇena śarāvatī nāma nagarī, tasyāḥ pareṇa sarāvatī nāma nadī,
XXdivyav_u:629: 013.015. paścimena sthūṇopasthūṇakau brāmaṇagrāmakau, so 'ntaḥ, tataḥ pareṇa pratyantaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:630: 013.015. uttareṇa uśīragiriḥ so 'ntaḥ, tataḥ pareṇa pratyantaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:631: 013.017. kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā śroṇena koṭikarṇena karma kṛtamiti
XXdivyav_u:635: 013.019. tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ dvau jāyāpatikau/
XXdivyav_u:638: 013.020. yadā kāśyapaḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā
XXdivyav_u:639: nirupadhiśeṣu nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ, tasya rājñā kṛkinā
XXdivyav_u:641: 013.022. tena tatra khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskaraṇāya ye pūrvanagaradvāre karapratyāyā uttiṣṭhante, te tasmin stūpe 'nupradattāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:642: 013.023. yadā kṛkī rājā kālagataḥ, tasya putraḥ sujāto nāṃnā sa rājye
XXdivyav_u:645: 013.025. so 'mātyānāmantrayate--kiṃkāraṇamasmākaṃ bhavadbhiḥ stokakarapratyāyā upanāmitāh? kimasmākaṃ vijite karapratyāyā nottiṣṭhante?
XXdivyav_u:647: 013.028. yadi devo 'nujānīyāt, te vayaṃ tān karapratyāyān samucchindāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:648: 013.028. sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, yanmama pitrā kṛtam, devakṛtaṃ na tu
XXdivyav_u:650: 013.029. te saṃlakṣayanti--yadi devo 'nujānīte, vayaṃ tathā kariṣyāmo
XXdivyav_u:655: 013.032. tau jāyāpatī vṛddhībhūtau tatraiva stūpe parikarma kurvāṇau
XXdivyav_u:660: 014.001. sa dṛṣṭvā pṛcchati--amba tāta kasyaiṣa stūpa iti/
XXdivyav_u:663: 014.003. na tena rājñāsmin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskārakaraṇāya kiṃcit
XXdivyav_u:665: 014.004. ye pūrvanagaradvāre karapratyāyāste 'smin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskaraṇāya niryātitāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:667: 014.005. tasya putraḥ sujāto nāma, sa rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:672: 014.008. amba tāta anayā karṇikayāsmin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskāraṃ
XXdivyav_u:676: 014.009. taistāṃ vikrīya tasmin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭitapratisaṃskāraḥ kṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:678: 014.010. athāpareṇa samayena sārthavāhaḥ paṇyaṃ visarjayitvā āgataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:681: 014.012. sa prasādajātaḥ pṛcchati--amba tāta yuṣmābhiḥ kiṃciduddhārikṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:684: 014.014. tena prasādajātena yattatrāvaśiṣṭam aparaṃ ca dattvā mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ ca kṛtam--anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam/
XXdivyav_u:687: 014.016. kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau sārthavāhaḥ, eṣa evāsau śroṇaḥ
XXdivyav_u:689: 014.017. yadanena kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya stūpe kārāṃ kṛtvā
XXdivyav_u:690: praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam, tasya karmaṇo vipākenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule
XXdivyav_u:693: 014.019. ahamanena kāśyapena samyaksambuddhena sārdhaṃ samajavaḥ samabalaḥ
XXdivyav_u:694: samadhuraḥ samasāmānyaprāptaḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:695: 014.020. iti bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānāṃ dharmāṇāmekāntaśuklo vipākaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ/
XXdivyav_u:696: 014.022. tasmāttarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXdivyav_u:699: 014.024. bhikṣava ūcuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā śroṇena koṭikarṇena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena dṛṣṭa eva dharme apāyā dṛṣṭāh?
XXdivyav_u:700: bhagavānāha--yadanena māturantike kharavākkarma niścāritam, tasya karmaṇo vipākena dṛṣṭa eva dharme apāyā dṛṣṭā iti//
XXdivyav_u:707: 015.001. tena khalu samayena sūrpārake nagare nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
XXdivyav_u:709: 015.004. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
XXdivyav_u:710: 015.004. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī
XXdivyav_u:712: 015.005. sā aṣṭānāṃ navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
XXdivyav_u:714: 015.006. tasya trīṇi saptakāni ekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya
XXdivyav_u:715: jātamahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti/
XXdivyav_u:716: 015.007. jñātaya ūcuh--ayaṃ dārako bhavasya gṛhapateḥ putraḥ,
XXdivyav_u:718: 015.008. bhūyo 'pyasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:722: 015.010. yāvadapareṇa samayena bhavo gṛhapatir glānaṃ saṃvṛttaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:729: 015.013. na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yadahaṃ svāminamadhyupekṣeyamiti/
XXdivyav_u:730: 015.014. sā vaidyasakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--ārya jānīṣe tvaṃ bhavaṃ
XXdivyav_u:731: gṛhapatim? jāne, kiṃ tasya? tasyaivaṃvidhaṃ glānyaṃ samupajātam/
XXdivyav_u:734: 015.016. sa kathayati--dārike tvameva kathayasi--sa patnyā putraiścāpyupekṣita iti/
XXdivyav_u:745: 015.021. yat kiṃcidahaṃ jīvitaḥ, sarvaṃ tava prabhāvāt/
XXdivyav_u:747: 015.022. sā kathayati--svāmin, yadi me parituṣṭo 'si, bhavatu me tvayā
XXdivyav_u:749: 015.023. sa kathayati--āryaputra, dūramapi paramapi gatvā dāsyevāham, yadi tu āryaputreṇa sārdhaṃ samāgamo bhavati, evamadāsī bhavāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:750: 015.026. tenāvaśyaṃ nirbandhaṃ jñātvā abhihitā--yadā saṃvṛttā ṛtumatī tadā
XXdivyav_u:752: 015.026. sā apareṇa samayena kalyā saṃvṛttā ṛtumatī/
XXdivyav_u:754: 015.027. tato bhavena gṛhapatinā tayā sārdhaṃ paricāritam/
XXdivyav_u:756: 015.028. yameva divasamāpannasattvā saṃvṛttā tameva divasamupādāya bhavasya gṛhapateḥ sarvārthāḥ sarvakarmāntāśca paripūrṇāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:757: 015.029. sā tvaṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
XXdivyav_u:760: 015.031. yasminneva divase <16>dārako jātaḥ, tasminneva divase bhavasya
XXdivyav_u:762: 016.002. tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātamahaṃ kṛtvā pūrvavat
XXdivyav_u:766: 016.004. yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ, tadā lipyāmupanyastaḥ saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:768: 016.006. aṣṭāsu parīkṣāsūddhaṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:769: 016.007. tato bhavena gṛhapatinā bhavilādīnāṃ putrāṇām yathānupūrvyā
XXdivyav_u:771: 016.008. te patnībhiḥ sārdhamatīva saṃraktā nivṛttā maṇḍanaparamā
XXdivyav_u:773: 016.009. tato bhavo gṛhapatiḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:774: 016.009. sa putrairdṛṣṭaḥ puṣṭaśca--tāta, kasmāttvaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthita
XXdivyav_u:775: 016.010. sa kathayati--putrakāḥ, na tāvanmayā niveśaḥ kṛto yāvatsuvarṇalakṣaḥ samudānīta iti/
XXdivyav_u:776: 016.011. te yūyaṃ nirastavyāpārāḥ patnīṣvatyarthaṃ saṃraktā maṇḍanaparamā
XXdivyav_u:779: 016.012. kathaṃ na cintāparo bhaviṣyāmīti? bhavilena ratnakarṇikā pinaddhā/
XXdivyav_u:780: 016.013. sa tāmavatāryadārukarṇikāṃ pinahya pratijñāmārūḍhah--na tāvat ratnakarṇikāṃ pinahyāmi yāvat suvarṇalakṣaḥ samupārjita iti/
XXdivyav_u:783: 016.015. teṣām yāstāḥ saṃjñā bhavilo bhavatrāto bhavanandīti tā
XXdivyav_u:795: 016.020. pūrṇenāpi tatraiva dharmeṇa nyāyena vyavahāritāḥ sātirekāḥ
XXdivyav_u:797: 016.020. pūrṇo 'pi pituḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--tāta, mamāpi kalyatāmāvārīsamutthitaṃ
XXdivyav_u:799: 016.022. kiṃ tava kalyate? sa kathayati--tāta kalyatām/
XXdivyav_u:801: 016.023. kalitam yāvannyāyopārjitasya suvarṇasya mūlyaṃ varjayitvā sātiriktā lakṣāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:815: 016.029. sa kathayati--putrakāḥ, dṛṣṭo vah? tāta dṛṣṭaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:821: 017.003. durnyasto bhidyate mantraḥ prītirbhidyate lobhataḥ//2// iti//
XXdivyav_u:824: 017.004. sa tenoktah--putra, na kadācit tvayā pūrṇo moktavyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:830: 017.008. tair nīlapītalohitāvadātairvastraiḥ śibikāmalaṃkṛtya mahatā saṃskāreṇa śmaśānaṃ nītvā
XXdivyav_u:831: 017.009. tataste śokavinodanaṃ kṛtvā kathayanti--yadā asmākaṃ pitā jīvati,
XXdivyav_u:835: 017.011. yannu vayaṃ paṇyamādāya deśāntaraṃ gacchāma iti/
XXdivyav_u:837: 017.012. te kathayanti--tvamatraivāvāryāṃ vyāpāraṃ kuru, vayameva gacchāma iti/
XXdivyav_u:845: 017.016. yadā te upasthāya prakrāntā bhavanti, tadā tāsāṃ divasaparivyayaṃ
XXdivyav_u:849: 017.018. tāḥ kathayanti--evaṃ hi teṣāṃ bhavati, yeṣāṃ dāsīputrāḥ kuleṣvaiśvacaryaṃ vaśe
XXdivyav_u:850: 017.019. bhavilapatnyā dārikā abhihitā--tvayā kālaṃ jñātvā gantavyamiti/
XXdivyav_u:851: 017.019. sā kālaṃ jñātvā gacchati, śīghraṃ labhate/
XXdivyav_u:858: 017.022. yadā tasyā dārikā gatā bhavati, tadā labhyate/
XXdivyav_u:860: 017.023. tāḥ saṃjātāmarṣāḥ kathayanti--evaṃ hi teṣāṃ bhavati yeṣāṃ dāsīputrāḥ kulesvaiścaryaṃ vaśe vartayantīti/
XXdivyav_u:861: 017.024. yāvadapareṇa samayena bhavilo bhavatrāto bhavanandī ca sahitāḥ samagrāḥ saṃmodamānā mahāsamudrāt saṃsiddhayānapātrā āgatāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:862: 017.026. bhavilena patnī pṛṣṭā--bhadre, śobhanaṃ pūrṇena pratipālitā
XXdivyav_u:863: tvamiti? sā kathayati--yathā bhrātrā putreṇa veti/
XXdivyav_u:864: 017.027. te anye 'pi svāmibhyāṃ pṛṣṭe kathayatah--evaṃ hi teṣāṃ bhavati,
XXdivyav_u:870: 017.030. anyābhyāṃ dṛṣṭvā svaputrāḥ preṣitā yāvat kāśikavastrāvārī
XXdivyav_u:885: 018.004. tābhistaṃ dṛṣṭvā svāminau tathā tathā bhagnau yathā gṛhavibhāgaṃ kartumārabdhau/
XXdivyav_u:886: 018.005. tau parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kurutah--sarvathā vinaṣṭā vayam, gṛhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:891: 018.007. ekasya gṛhagataṃ kṣetragataṃ ca, ekasyāvārīgataṃ deśāntaragataṃ ca, ekasya pūrṇakaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:892: 018.008. yadi jyeṣṭhataro gṛhagataṃ kṣetragataṃ ca grahīṣyati, śaknumo vayamāvārīgatena deśāntaragatena cātmānaṃ saṃdhārayitum/
XXdivyav_u:893: 018.010. athāvārīgataṃ deśāntaragataṃ ca grahīṣyati, tathāpi vayaṃ śknumo
XXdivyav_u:894: gṛhagatena kṣetragatena cātmānaṃ saṃdhārayitum, pūrṇakasya ca māryādābandhaṃ kartumiti/
XXdivyav_u:895: 018.011. tāvevaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kṛtvā bhavilasya sakāśaṃ gatau/
XXdivyav_u:897: 018.012. sa kathayati--suparīkṣitaṃ kartavyam, gṛhabhedikāḥ striyo bhavantīti/
XXdivyav_u:901: 018.015. ekasya gṛhagataṃ kṣetragataṃ ca, ekasyāvārīgataṃ deśāntaragataṃ ca, ekasya pūrṇakaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:904: 018.016. kastasya pratyaṃśaṃ dadyāt? api tu sa evāsmābhirbhājitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:906: 018.017. sa saṃlakṣayati--ahaṃ pitrā abhihitah--sarvasvamapi te parityajya pūrṇo grahītavya
XXdivyav_u:907: 018.018. gṛhṇāmi pūrṇamiti viditvā kathayati--evaṃ bhavatu mama pūrṇaketi/
XXdivyav_u:908: 018.019. yasya gṛhagataṃ kṣetragataṃ ca, sa tvaramāṇo gṛhaṃ gatvā
XXdivyav_u:913: 018.021. yasyāvārīgataṃ deśāntaragataṃ ca, so 'pi tvaramāṇa āvārīṃ gatvā
XXdivyav_u:918: 018.023. yāvat bhavilapatnī pūrṇakena sārdhaṃ jñātigṛhaṃ saṃprasthitā/
XXdivyav_u:923: dārakāṇāṃ pūrvabhikṣikāpi nāsti? pūrṇaḥ kathayati--kimahaṃ jāne yuṣmākaṃ gṛhe īdṛśīyamavasthā
XXdivyav_u:924: 018.027. yadi mayā jñātamabhaviṣyat, mayā anekāḥ suvarṇalakṣāḥ saṃhāritā
XXdivyav_u:929: 018.029. anyatamaśca puruṣaḥ samudravelāpreritānāṃ kāṣṭhānāṃ bhāramādāya śītenābhidruto vepamāna āgacchati/
XXdivyav_u:930: 018.030. sa tena dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaśca--bhoḥ puruṣa, kasmādevaṃ vepase? sa
XXdivyav_u:932: 018.031. mayā cāyaṃ bhāraka utkṣipto bhavati, mama cedṛśī samavasthā/
XXdivyav_u:936: 019.001. sa tenābhihitah--bho puruṣa, kiyatā mūlyena dīyate? pañcabhiḥ
XXdivyav_u:938: 019.002. tena taṃ kāṣṭhabhāraṃ gṛhītvā tadgośīrṣacandanamapanīya vīthīṃ
XXdivyav_u:942: 019.004. uktaṃ ca--enaṃ kāṣṭhabhārakamamuṣmin gṛhe bhavilapatnī tiṣṭhati tatra naya, vaktavyā pūrṇena preṣiteti/
XXdivyav_u:945: kiṃ prajñayāpi paribhraṣṭah? pakvamānayeti pācanaṃ preṣitam/
XXdivyav_u:953: 019.010. te pūrṇasya sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayanti--tavāsti gośīrṣacandanam? sa
XXdivyav_u:955: 019.011. te ūcuh--kiyatā mūlyena dīyate? sa āha--kārṣāpaṇasahasreṇa/
XXdivyav_u:956: 019.012. taiḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasreṇa gṛhītvā rājñaḥ pralepo dattaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:958: 019.013. rājā saṃlakṣayati--kīdṛśo 'sau yasya gṛhe gośīrṣacandanaṃ nāsti/
XXdivyav_u:961: 019.014. sa dūtena gatvā uktah--pūrṇa, devastvāṃ śabdāpayatīti/
XXdivyav_u:962: 019.015. sa vicārayitumārabdhah--kimarthaṃ māṃ rājā śabdāpayati? sa
XXdivyav_u:966: 019.017. sa gośīrṣacandanasya tisro gaṇḍikā vastreṇa pidhāyaikaṃ pāṇinā gṛhītvā rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ
XXdivyav_u:978: 019.022. pūrṇaḥ kathayati--yadi me devaḥ parituṣṭo devasya vijate 'paribhūto vaseyamiti/
XXdivyav_u:979: 019.023. rājñā amātyānāmājñā dattā--bhavantaḥ, adyāgreṇa kumārāṇāmājñā deyā na tvevaṃ pūrṇasyeti/
XXdivyav_u:980: 019.024. yāvanmahāsamudrāt pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni saṃsiddhayānapātrāṇi sūrpārakaṃ nagaramanuprāptāni/
XXdivyav_u:981: 019.025. vaṇiggrāmeṇa kriyākāraḥ kṛtah--na kenacidasmākaṃ samastānāṃ nirgatyaikākinā vaṇijāṃ
XXdivyav_u:984: 019.027. anye kathayanti--kiṃ tasya kṛpaṇasyāsti yaḥ śabdāyata iti/
XXdivyav_u:986: 019.028. tena śrutaṃ mahāsamudrāt pañca vaṇikchatāni saṃsiddhayānapātrāṇi
XXdivyav_u:989: 019.030. pṛcchati--bhavataḥ, kimidaṃ dravyamiti? te kathayanti--idaṃ cedaṃ
XXdivyav_u:991: 019.031. kiṃ mūlyam? te kathayanti--sārthavāha, dūramapi paramapi gatvā
XXdivyav_u:1003: 020.003. tairgatvā pṛṣṭāh--kiṃ dravyam? idaṃ cedaṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:1009: 020.005. te kathayanti--yattenāvadraṅge dattaṃ tad yūyaṃ mūlye 'pi na
XXdivyav_u:1017: 020.008. yātenāvadraṅge dattaṃ tadyūyaṃ mūlye 'pi na dāsyatha/
XXdivyav_u:1023: 020.011. kasmātte gṛhītam? sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, yadā yuṣmābhiḥ kriyākāraḥ kṛtastadā kimahaṃ na śabdito mama bhrātā vā? yuṣmābhireva kriyākāraḥ kṛto yūyameva pālayata/
XXdivyav_u:1024: 020.013. tato vaṇiggrāmeṇa saṃjātāmarṣeṇa ṣaṣṭeḥ kārṣāpaṇānāmarthāyātape dhāritaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1029: 020.015. kathayati rājā--bhavantaḥ, kasyārthe yuṣmābhiḥ pūrṇa ātape
XXdivyav_u:1030: vidhāritah? te kathayanti--deva vaṇiggrāmeṇa kriyākāraḥ kṛto na kenacidekākinā paṇyaṃ grahītavyamiti/
XXdivyav_u:1033: kṛtastadā kimahamebhiḥ śabdito mama bhrātā vā? te kathayanti--deva neti/
XXdivyav_u:1037: 020.020. tena vaṇiggrāma āhūyoktah--bhavantaḥ, mamāmukena dravyeṇa prayojanam/
XXdivyav_u:1044: 020.023. te vaṇiggrāmāḥ sarva eva saṃbhūya tasya niveśanaṃ gatvā dvāri
XXdivyav_u:1052: 020.027. pañcadaśa lakṣāṇi teṣāṃ vaṇijyaṃ dattamavaśiṣṭaṃ svagṛhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:1059: 020.030. yo yuṣmākamutsahate pūrṇena sārthavāhena sārdhamaśulkenāgulmenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavatartuṃ sa mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyaṃ samudānayatviti/
XXdivyav_u:1067: 021.002. pūrṇaḥ ṣaṭkṛtvo mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ saṃsiddhayānapātraśca pratyāgata iti/
XXdivyav_u:1068: 021.003. śrāvasteyā vaṇijaḥ paṇyamādāya sūrpārakaṃ nagaraṃ gatāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1069: 021.004. te mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya yena pūrṇaḥ sārthavāhastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1071: 021.005. sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, asti kaścidyuṣmābhirdṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā ṣaṭkṛtvo mahāsamudrātsaṃsiddhayānapātrāgataḥ saptamaṃ vāramavataran? te
XXdivyav_u:1076: 021.009. te rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye udānāt pārāyaṇāt satyadṛśaḥ
XXdivyav_u:1077: sthaviragāthāḥ śailagāthā munigāthā arthavargīyāṇi ca sūtrāṇi vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:1081: 021.012. sa buddha ityaśrutapūrvaṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāni āhṛṣṭāni/
XXdivyav_u:1084: śākyakulātkeśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ
XXdivyav_u:1087: 021.016. kutra bhavantaḥ sa bhagavānetarhi viharati? sārthavāha, śrāvstyāṃ jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
XXdivyav_u:1088: 021.017. sa taṃ hṛdi kṛtvā taiḥ sārdhaṃ mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ saṃsiddhayānapātraśca pratyāgataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1091: 021.018. sa tenoktah--bhrātaḥ, kathaya katarasya dhaninaḥ sārthavāhasya vā tavārthāya duhitaraṃ
XXdivyav_u:1094: 021.020. sa kathayati--yadāsmākaṃ gṛhe vārtā nāsti, tadā na pravrajitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1096: 021.021. pūrṇaḥ kathayati--bhrātaḥ, tadānīṃ na śobhate, idānīṃ tu yuktam/
XXdivyav_u:1101: 021.023. nyāyopārjitaṃ te prabhūtaṃ dhanamasti, eṣāṃ tu tava
XXdivyav_u:1103: 021.024. yadyete kathayanti ekadhye vasāmeti, na vastavyam/
XXdivyav_u:1108: 021.026. tena gatvā anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapterārocitam--gṛhapate, pūrṇaḥ sārthavāha udyāne tiṣṭhati gṛhapatiṃ draṣṭukāma iti/
XXdivyav_u:1109: 021.028. anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ jalayānena khinna idānīṃ sthalayānenāgataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1115: 021.031. sa tena mahatā satkāreṇa praveśita udvartitaḥ snāpito bhojitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1117: kimāgamanaprayojanam? apūrveṇa gṛhapate icchāmi svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ
XXdivyav_u:1118: 022.002. tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ pūrvaṃ kāyamabhyunnamayya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasāryodānamudānayati--aho
XXdivyav_u:1121: 022.003. yatredānīmīdṛśāḥ pradhānapuruṣā vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargamapahāya sphītāni ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi ākāṅkṣanti svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvamiti/
XXdivyav_u:1124: 022.006. tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣupariṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ
XXdivyav_u:1128: 022.009. nāsti tathāgatasyaivaṃvidhaḥ prābhṛto yathā vaineyaprābhṛta iti/
XXdivyav_u:1132: bhadanta pūrṇaḥ sārthavāha ākāṅkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
XXdivyav_u:1135: 022.014. tato bhagavān pūrṇaṃ sārthavāhamāmantrayate--ehi bhikṣo cara brahmacaryamiti/
XXdivyav_u:1136: 022.014. sa bhagavato vācāvasāne muṇḍaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ saṃghāṭiprāvṛtaḥ
XXdivyav_u:1138: 022.017. ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaśca saṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1139: 022.019. sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva tasthau evaṃ sthito
XXdivyav_u:1142: 022.022. ekānte sthita āyuṣmān pūrṇo bhagavantamidamavocat--sādhu me bhagavāṃstathā saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ deśayatu yathāhaṃ bhagavato 'ntikāt
XXdivyav_u:1143: saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ śrutvaiko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā vihareyam/
XXdivyav_u:1144: 022.024. yadarthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇi avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi
XXdivyav_u:1145: ācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajanti, tadanuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭadharme svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya pravrajayeyam--kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:1146: 022.027. evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇamidamavocat--sādhu pūrṇa, sādhu khalu tvaṃ pūrṇa yastvamevaṃ vadasi--sādhu me bhagavāṃstathā saṃkṣiptena
XXdivyav_u:1148: 022.029. tena hi pūrṇa śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye//
XXdivyav_u:1149: 022.031. santi pūrṇa cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇīṣṭakāni kāntāni priyāṇi
XXdivyav_u:1151: 022.032. tāni cedbhikṣurdṛṣṭvābhinandati abhivadāti adhyavasyati adhyavasāya <23>tiṣṭhati, tāni abhinandato 'bhivadato 'dhyavasato
XXdivyav_u:1157: 023.003. santi pūrṇa śrotravijñeyāḥ śabdāḥ, ghrāṇavijñeyā gandhāḥ,
XXdivyav_u:1158: jihvāvijñeyā rasāḥ, kāyavijñeyāni spraṣṭavyāni, manovijñeyā dharmā iṣṭāḥ
XXdivyav_u:1161: 023.006. santi tu pūrṇa cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi iṣṭāni kāntāni priyāṇi manāpāni pūrvavad yavat śuklapakṣeṇāntike nirvāṇasyeti ucyate/
XXdivyav_u:1162: 023.008. anena tvaṃ pūrṇa mayā saṃkṣiptenāvavādena coditaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1163: 023.008. kutrecchasi vastuṃ kutrecchasi vāsaṃ kalpayitum? anenāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā saṃkṣiptenāvavādena codita icchāmi śroṇāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vastuṃ śroṇāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vāsaṃ kalpayitum/
XXdivyav_u:1164: 023.010. caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntikā manuṣyā rabhasāḥ karkaśā ākrośakā roṣakāḥ paribhāṣakāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1165: 023.011. sacet tvāṃ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā saṃmukhaṃ pāpikayā asatyayā paruṣayā vācā ākrokṣyanti roṣayiṣyanti paribhāṣiṣyante, tasya te kathaṃ bhaviṣyati? sacenmāṃ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ saṃmukhaṃ pāpikayā asātyayā paruṣayā vācā ākrokṣyanti roṣayiṣyanti paribhāṣiṣyante,
XXdivyav_u:1166: tasya mamaivaṃ bhaviṣyati--bhadrakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ,
XXdivyav_u:1167: snigdhakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ, ye māṃ saṃmukhaṃ pāpikayā asatyayā paruṣayā vācā ākrośanti roṣayanti paribhāṣante/
XXdivyav_u:1168: 023.017. no tu pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā praharantīti/
XXdivyav_u:1169: 023.017. caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pūrvavat yāvat paribhāṣakāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1170: 023.018. sacet tvāṃ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā
XXdivyav_u:1171: prahariṣyanti, tasya te kathaṃ bhaviṣyati? sacenmāṃ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā prahariṣyanti, tasya mamaivaṃ bhaviṣyati--bhadrakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ, snehakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ, ye māṃ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā praharanti, no tu daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā praharantīti/
XXdivyav_u:1172: 023.022. caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pūrvavad yāvat paribhāṣakāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1173: 023.023. sacet tvāṃ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā
XXdivyav_u:1174: prahariṣyanti, tasya te kathaṃ bhaviṣyati? sacenmāṃ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā prahariṣyanti, tasya mamaivaṃ bhaviṣyati--bhadrakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ, snehakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ, ye māṃ daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā praharanti, no tu sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayanti/
XXdivyav_u:1175: 023.027. caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā yāvat paribhāṣakāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1176: 023.027. sacet tvāṃ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayiṣyanti, tasya te kathaṃ bhaviṣyati? sacenmāṃ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitād vyaparoyiṣyanti, tasya me evaṃ bhaviṣyati--santi bhagavataḥ śrāvakā ye anena pūtikāyenārdīyamānā jehrīyante, vijugupsamānāḥ śastramapi ādhārayanti, viṣamapi bhikṣayanti,
XXdivyav_u:1177: rajjvā baddhā api mriyante, prapātādapi prapatantyapi/
XXdivyav_u:1181: 024.002. sādhu sādhu pūrṇa, śakyastvaṃ pūrṇa anena kṣāntisaurabhyena samanvāgataḥ śroṇāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vastuṃ śroṇāparāntakeṣu vāsaṃ
XXdivyav_u:1183: 024.003. gaccha tvaṃ pūrṇa, mukto mocaya, tīrṇastāraya, āśvasta āśvasaya,
XXdivyav_u:1185: 024.005. athāyuṣmān pūrṇo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1186: 024.006. athāyuṣmān pūrṇastasyā eva rātreratyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya
XXdivyav_u:1188: 024.007. śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātraḥ pratikrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1189: 024.008. yathāparibhuktaśayanāsanaṃ pratisamayya samādāya pātracīvaram yena śroṇāparāntakā janapadāstena cārikāṃ carañ śroṇāparāntakāñ
XXdivyav_u:1191: 024.010. athāyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śroṇāparāntakaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
XXdivyav_u:1194: 024.011. sa saṃlakṣayati--amaṅgalo 'yaṃ muṇḍakaḥ śramaṇako mayā dṛṣṭa iti viditvā ā karṇād dhanuḥ pūrayitvā yenāyuṣmān pūrṇastena pradhāvitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1196: 024.013. dṛṣṭvā cettarāsaṅgaṃ vivartya kathayati--bhadramukha, asya duṣpūrasyārthe praviśāmi, atra prahareti/
XXdivyav_u:1198: 024.015. yasyārthe gahane caranti vihagā gacchanti bandhaṃ mṛgāḥ saṃgrāme śaraśaktatomaradharā naśyantyajasraṃ narāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1199: 024.017. dīnā durdinacāriṇaśca kṛpaṇā matsyā grasantyāyasam asyārthe
XXdivyav_u:1208: 024.023. tasyaiva ca trimāsasyātyayāt tisro vidyāḥ kāyena sākṣātkṛtāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1210: 024.024. traidhātukavītarāgo yāvat sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo
XXdivyav_u:1212: 024.025. yāvadapareṇa samayena dārukarṇibhrātrorbhogāstanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gatāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1219: 024.028. tau kathayatah--śrīrvā bhavatu kālakarṇī vā, āgaccha ekadhye prativasāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1222: 024.030. tau kathayatah--tena dāsīputreṇa mahāsamudramavatīryāvatīrya bhogāḥ samudānītā yena tvaṃ bhuñjāno vikatthase/
XXdivyav_u:1228: 025.001. karṇadhāraḥ kathayati--bhavantaḥ, yattat śrūyate gośīrṣacandanavanamiti, idaṃ
XXdivyav_u:1230: 025.002. tena khalu samayena gośīrṣacandanavanaṃ maheśvarasya yakṣasya
XXdivyav_u:1235: 025.004. adrākṣīdapriyākhyo yo yakṣo gośīrṣacandanavane pañcamātrāṇi kuṭhāraśatāni vahataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1236: 025.005. dṛṣṭvā ca yena maheśvaro yakṣaḥ, tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1237: 025.006. upasaṃkramya maheśvaram yakṣamidamavocat--yat khalu grāmaṇīrjānīyā gośīrṣacandanavane pañcamātrāṇi kuṭhāraśatāni vahanti/
XXdivyav_u:1238: 025.007. yatte kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tatkuruṣveti/
XXdivyav_u:1239: 025.007. atha maheśvaro yakṣo yakṣāṇāṃ samitimasamitiṃ kṛtvā saṃjātāmarṣo mahāntaṃ kālikāvātabhayaṃ saṃjanya yena gośīrṣacandanavanaṃ tena
XXdivyav_u:1241: 025.009. karṇadhāreṇārocitam--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jāmbudvīpakā vaṇijah--yattat śrūyate mahākālikāvātabhayamiti, idaṃ tat/
XXdivyav_u:1242: 025.010. kiṃ manyadhvamiti? tataste vaṇijo bhītāstrastāḥ saṃvignā āhṛṣṭaromakūpā devatāyācanaṃ
XXdivyav_u:1244: 025.014. vyasanamatibhayaṃ vayaṃ prapannā vigatabhayā hi bhavantu no 'dya
XXdivyav_u:1250: 025.021. kimarthamalpotsukastiṣṭhasīti? sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, ahaṃ bhrātrā abhihitah--mahāsamudro 'lpāsvādo bahvādīnavaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1259: 025.026. atha yā devatā āyuṣmatī pūrṇe 'bhiprasannā, sā yenāyuṣmān pūrṇastenopasaṃkrāntā/
XXdivyav_u:1260: 025.027. upasaṃkramya āyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇamidamavocat--ārya, bhrātā te kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasambādhaprāptaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:1262: 025.029. tata āyuṣmān pūrṇastadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte śroṇāparāntake 'ntarhito mahāsamudre vahanasīmāyāṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā
XXdivyav_u:1265: 025.031. atha maheśvaro yakṣaḥ saṃlakṣayati--pūrvam yat kiṃcidvahanaṃ kālikāvātena spṛśyate, tattūlapicuvata kṣipyate viśīryate ca/
XXdivyav_u:1266: 025.032. idānīṃ ko yogo yena kālikāvātah <26>sumerupratyāhata iva
XXdivyav_u:1267: pratinivṛttah? sa itaścāmutaśca pratyavekṣitumārabdho yāvat paśyati āyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ vahanasīmāyāṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvāvasthitam/
XXdivyav_u:1268: 026.002. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ kathayati--ārya pūrṇa, kiṃ viheṭhayasīti? āyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ kathayati--jarādharmo
XXdivyav_u:1269: 026.003. kiṃ māmeva viheṭhayasi? yadi mayedṛśā guṇagaṇā nādhigatāḥ syurbhrātā me tvayā nāmāvaśeṣaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt/
XXdivyav_u:1270: 026.004. maheśvaro yakṣaḥ kathayati--ārya idaṃ gośīrṣacandanavanaṃ rājñaścakaravartino 'rthāya dhāryate/
XXdivyav_u:1271: 026.005. kiṃ manyase grāmaṇīḥ kiṃ varaṃ rājā cakravartī uta tathagato
XXdivyav_u:1272: 'rhan samyaksambuddha? kim ārya bhagavāṃl loka utpannah? utpannaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1274: 026.007. tataste vaṇijo gatapratyāgataprāṇā āyuṣmati pūrṇe cittamabhiprasādya tadvahanaṃ gośīrṣacandanasya pūrayitvā saṃprasthitāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1276: 026.010. tata āyuṣmān pūrṇo bhrātuḥ kathayati--yasya nāṃnā vahanaṃ saṃsiddhayānapātramāgacchati, tattasya gamyaṃ bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:1278: 026.011. ahamanena gośīrṣacandanena bhagavato 'rthāya candanamālaṃ prāsādaṃ kārayāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:1279: 026.012. tena teṣāṃ vaṇijāṃ ratnaiḥ saṃvibhāgaḥ kṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1280: 026.013. tata āyuṣmān pūrṇo gośīrṣacandanena prāsādaṃ māpayitumārabdhaḥ/

XXdivyav_u:1566: sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhātahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya/
XXdivyav_u:1568: 032.024. āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavataḥ pātragrāhakaḥ pātraṃ niryātayati/
XXdivyav_u:1574: 032.027. maudgalyāyanastato vismayāvarjitamatiḥ kathayati--kiṃ nāmeyaṃ bhagavann ṛddhih? manojavā
XXdivyav_u:1575: 032.028. na mayā bhadanta vijñātamevaṃ gambhīramevaṃ gambhīrā buddhadharmā
XXdivyav_u:1577: 032.029. yadi vijñātamabhaviṣyat, tilaśo 'pi me saṃcūrṇitaśarīreṇānuttarāyāḥ samyaksambodheścittaṃ
XXdivyav_u:1579: 032.031. tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā pūrṇena karma kṛtam yenāḍhye
XXdivyav_u:1580: mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ, kiṃ karma kṛtam yena <33>dāsyāḥ kukṣau
XXdivyav_u:1582: bhagavānāha--pūrṇena bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni
XXdivyav_u:1585: 033.003. ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na
XXdivyav_u:1586: vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni
XXdivyav_u:1588: 033.008. sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//19//
XXdivyav_u:1589: 033.009. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'sminneva bhadrakalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksambuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:1604: 033.017. yadā asya paryavasthānaṃ vigataṃ tadā tasya sakāśamupasaṃkramya
XXdivyav_u:1605: kathayati--jānīṣe tvaṃ ko 'hamiti? sa kathayati--jāne tvaṃ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śāsane pravrajito 'hamapīti/
XXdivyav_u:1606: 033.018. sa kathayati--yadyapyevaṃ tathāpi tu yanmayā pravrajya caraṇīyaṃ tatkṛtamahaṃ
XXdivyav_u:1611: 033.021. yattena naraka upapadya dāsīputreṇa bhavitavyam, tannarake
XXdivyav_u:1613: 033.022. pañca tu janmaśatāni dāsyāḥ kukṣau upapannaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1614: 033.022. yāvadetarhyapi carame bhave dāsyā eva kukṣau upapannaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1615: 033.023. yat saṃghasyopasthānaṃ kṛtam, tenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule
XXdivyav_u:1617: 033.024. yattatra paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ ca kṛtam, tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:1618: 033.025. iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:1620: 033.027. tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi
XXdivyav_u:1628: 034.002. yadā rājñā bhāgadhena ajātaśatruṇā vaidehīputreṇa naukramo
XXdivyav_u:1634: 034.005. tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--rājagṛhāt śrāvastīṃ gantum yo yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣava utsahate rājño māgadhasyājātaśatrorvaidehīputrasya
XXdivyav_u:1635: nausaṃkrameṇa nadīgaṅgāmuttartum, sa tena taratu, yo vā bhikṣavo
XXdivyav_u:1637: 034.007. ahamapi āyuṣmatā ānandena bhikṣuṇā sārdhaṃ nāgānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:1641: 034.010. bhagavānapi āyuṣmatā ānandena sārdhaṃ nāgānāṃ phaṇasaṃkrameṇottīrṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1643: 034.012. ye tarantyarṇavaṃ saraḥ setuṃ kṛtvā visṛjya palvalāni/
XXdivyav_u:1644: 034.013. kolaṃ hi janāḥ prabandhitā uttīrṇā medhāvino janāḥ//1//
XXdivyav_u:1648: 034.017. chittveha mūlaṃ tṛṣṇāyāḥ kasya paryeṣaṇāṃ caret//3// iti//
XXdivyav_u:1652: yūya ūrdhvaṃ vyāmasahasraṃ tiryak ṣoḍaśapravedho nānāratnavicitro vitaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:1653: taṃ draṣṭum? etasya bhagavan kālaḥ, etasya sugatasamayaḥ, yo 'yaṃ bhagavān
XXdivyav_u:1663: 034.025. tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--ārohapariṇāhaṃ nimittaṃ bhikṣavo yūpasya gṛhṇīta,
XXdivyav_u:1665: 034.027. bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--paśya bhadanta bhikṣavo yūpaṃ paśyanti/
XXdivyav_u:1667: 034.028. kiṃ tāvat vītararāgatvādāhosvit paryupāsitapūrvatvāt? tadyadi tāvad vītarāgatvāt, santyanye 'pi vītarāgāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1671: 035.001. <35>bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo rājābhūta praṇādo nāma śakrasya devendrasya vayasyakaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1672: 035.001. so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--anekadhanasamudito
XXdivyav_u:1674: 035.003. tataḥ śakreṇa dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaśca--mārṣa, kasmāt tvaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparastiṣṭhasīti? sa kathayati--kauśila, anekadhanasamudito
XXdivyav_u:1678: 035.006. yadi kaścit cyavanadharmā devaputro bhaviṣyati, tatte putratve samādāpayiṣyāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:1679: 035.007. dharmatā khalu cyavanadharmaṇo devaputrasya pañca pūrvanimittāni
XXdivyav_u:1680: prādurbhavanti--akliṣṭāni vāsāṃsi saṃkliśyanti, amlānāni mālyāni mlāyante,
XXdivyav_u:1681: daurgandhaṃ mukhānniścarati, ubhābhyāṃ kakṣābhyāṃ svedaḥ pragharati, sve cāsane dhṛtiṃ na
XXdivyav_u:1687: 035.012. mā adharmeṇa rājyaṃ kṛtvā narakaparāyaṇo bhaviṣyāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:1693: 035.014. yasminneva divase pratisaṃdhirgṛhītā, tasmin divase mahājanakāyena praṇādo muktaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1694: 035.015. sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
XXdivyav_u:1697: 035.017. tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya
XXdivyav_u:1698: 035.018. jñātaya ūcuh--yasminneva divase 'yaṃ dārako mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāntaḥ, tasminneva divase mahājanakāyena nādo muktaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1699: 035.019. yasminneva divase jātastasminneva divase mahājanakāyena nādo
XXdivyav_u:1701: 035.020. tasmāt bhavatu dārakasya mahāpraṇāda iti nāma/
XXdivyav_u:1704: dvābhyāṃsaṃdhātrībhyāṃ dvāghyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyām/
XXdivyav_u:1705: 035.023. so 'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarṇpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1708: 035.025. saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:1712: 035.027. sa yāni tāni rāajñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhnābhiṣiktānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:1714: śilpasthānakarmasthānāni, tadyathā--hastiśikṣāyāmaśvapṛṣṭhe rathe śare dhanuṣi prayāṇe niryāṇe 'ṅkuśagrahe pāśagrahe tomaragrahe yaṣṭibandhe
XXdivyav_u:1715: padabandhe śikhābandhe dūravedhe marmavedhe 'kṣuṇṇavedhe dṛḍhaprahāritāyāṃ pañcasu sthāneṣu kṛtāvī saṃvṛttaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:1716: 035.032. dharmatā khalu na tāvat putrasya nāma prajñāyate yāvat tāto
XXdivyav_u:1720: 036.001. sa yāvattāvad dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā adharmeṇa kārayituṃ
XXdivyav_u:1722: 036.002. tataḥ śakreṇa devendreṇoktah--mārṣa, mayā tvaṃ praṇādasya rājñaḥ
XXdivyav_u:1724: 036.003. mā adharmeṇa rājyaṃ kāraya, mā narakaparāyaṇo bhaviṣyasīti/
XXdivyav_u:1725: 036.004. sa yāvattāvad dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā punarapi adharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1726: 036.004. dvirapi śakreṇoktah--mārṣa, mayā tvaṃ praṇādasya rājñaḥ putratve samādāpitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1727: 036.005. mā adharmeṇa rājyaṃ kāraya, mā narakaparāyaṇo bhaviṣyasīti/
XXdivyav_u:1728: 036.006. sa kathayati--kauśika, vayaṃ rājānaḥ pramattā iti ratibahulāḥ kṣaṇād vismarāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1729: 036.007. kiṃcittvamasmākaṃ cihnaṃ sthāpaya, yaṃ dṛṣṭvā dānāni dāsyāmaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:1731: 036.008. na ca śakyate vinā nimittena puṇyaṃ kartum/
XXdivyav_u:1732: 036.008. tataḥ śakreṇa devendreṇa viśvakarmaṇo devaputrasyājñā dattā--gaccha tvaṃ viśvakarman rājño mahāpraṇādasya niveśane/
XXdivyav_u:1734: 036.010. ūrdhvaṃ vyāmasahasreṇa tiryak ṣoḍaśapravedhaṃ nānāratnavicitraṃ sarvasauvarṇamiti/
XXdivyav_u:1735: 036.011. tato viśvakarmaṇā devaputreṇa mahāpraṇādasya rājño niveśane divyo maṇḍalavāṭo nirmito
XXdivyav_u:1738: 036.013. tasya mātulo 'śoko nāma yūpasya paricārako vyavasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1739: 036.014. tato yūpadarśanodyuktaḥ sarva eva jambudvīpanivāsī janakāya
XXdivyav_u:1740: āgatya bhuktvā yūpaṃ paśyati, svakarmānuṣṭhānaṃ na karoti/
XXdivyav_u:1744: 036.016. mahāpraṇādo rājā pṛcchati--bhavantaḥ, kasmāt stokāḥ karapratyāyā
XXdivyav_u:1745: upanītāh? deva, jambudvīpanivāsī janakāya āgatya bhuktvā yūpaṃ paśyati,
XXdivyav_u:1760: 036.024. tato rājñā mahāpraṇādena dānāni dattvā puṇyāni kṛtvā sa yūpo
XXdivyav_u:1762: 036.025. kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau māpraṇādasyāśoko nāma mātulaḥ, eṣa evāsau bhaddālī
XXdivyav_u:1764: 036.027. kutra bhadanta asau yūpo vilayaṃ gamiṣyati? bhaviṣyanti bhikṣavo 'nāgate 'dhvani aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣo manuṣyāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1765: 036.028. aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ śaṅkho nāma rājā bhaviṣyati
XXdivyav_u:1766: samyamanī cakravartī caturantavijetā dhārmiko dharmarājā saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1770: 036.031. pūrṇaṃ cāsya bhaviṣyati sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
XXdivyav_u:1774: 037.001. śaṅkhasya rājño brahmāyur nāma brāhmaṇaḥ purohito bhaviṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:1776: 037.002. sā maitreyāṃśena sphuritvā putraṃ janayiṣyati maitreyaṃ nāma/
XXdivyav_u:1783: 037.008. enaṃ ca yūpamādāya śaṅkhasya rājña upanāmayiṣyanti/
XXdivyav_u:1787: 037.010. tataste māṇavakāstam yūpaṃ khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ chittvā bhājayiṣyanti/
XXdivyav_u:1788: 037.011. tato maitreyo māṇavakastasya yūpasyānityatāṃ dṛṣṭvā tenaiva
XXdivyav_u:1790: 037.011. yasminneva divase vanaṃ saṃśrayiṣyati, tasminneva divase maitreyāṃśena sphuritvā anuttaraṃ jñānamadhigamiṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:1791: 037.013. tasya maitreyaḥ samyaksambuddha iti saṃjñā bhaviṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:1797: 037.015. yadapyasya strīratnaṃ viśākhā nāma, sāpi aśītistrīsahasraparivārā maitreyaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:1798: 037.017. tato maitreyaḥ samyaksambuddho 'śītibhikṣukoṭiparivāro yena gurupādakaḥ parvatastenopasaṃkramiṣyati, yatra kāśyapasya bhikṣorasthasaṃghāto 'vikopitastiṣṭhati/
XXdivyav_u:1801: 037.019. yato maitreyaḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ kāśyapasya bhikṣoravikopitamasthisaṃghātaṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇinā gṛhītvā vāme pāṇau pratiṣṭhāpya evaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati--yo 'sau bhikṣavo varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma śāstā loka utpannastasyāyaṃ śrāvakaḥ kāśyapo nāṃnā alpecchānāṃ saṃtuṣṭānāṃ dhūtaguṇavādināmagro,
XXdivyav_u:1808: 037.025. yaṃ ca saṃvegamāpatsyante, tatrāsau yūpo vilayaṃ gamiṣyati//
XXdivyav_u:1809: 037.027. ko bhadanta hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo dvayo ratnayoryugapalloke
XXdivyav_u:1812: 037.029. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani madhyadeśe vāsavo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:1816: 037.031. uttarāpathe dhanasaṃmato nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:1820: 038.001. yāvadapareṇa samayena vāsavasya rājñaḥ putro jāto
XXdivyav_u:1822: 038.002. tasya vistareṇa jātimahaṃ kṛtvā ratnaśikhīti nāmadheyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:1830: 038.005. so 'mātyānāmantrayate--bhavataḥ, kasyacidanyasyāpi rājño rājyamevamṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:1833: 038.008. atīva śasyasampattirbhavati yathā asmākamiti? madhyadeśād vaṇijaḥ paṇyamādāyottarāpathaṃ
XXdivyav_u:1834: 038.009. te kathayanti--asti deva madhyadeśe vāsavo nāma rājā iti/
XXdivyav_u:1839: 038.011. tato dhanasaṃmato rājā caturaṅgaṃ balakāyaṃ saṃnāhya
XXdivyav_u:1840: hastikāyamaśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ madhyadeśamāgatya gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe kūle 'vasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1842: saṃnāhya hastikāyamaśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ madhyadeśamāgatya gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe kūle 'vasthita iti/
XXdivyav_u:1843: 038.014. śrutvā ca punaḥ so 'pi caturaṅgaṃ balakāyaṃ saṃnāhya
XXdivyav_u:1844: hastikāyamaśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ patikāyaṃ gaṅgāyā uttare kūle 'vasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1845: 038.016. atha ratnaśikhī samyaksambuddhastayorvinayakālaṃ jñātvā nadyā gaṅgāyāstīre rātriṃ
XXdivyav_u:1847: 038.017. dharmatā khalu yadā buddhā bhagavanto laukikaṃ cittamutpādayanti,
XXdivyav_u:1848: tasmin samaye śakrabrahmādayo devā bhagavataścetasā cittamājānanti/
XXdivyav_u:1849: 038.019. atha śakrabrahmādayo devā yena ratnaśikhī samyaksambuddhastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1850: 038.020. upasaṃkramya ratnaśikhinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1853: 038.021. dṛṣṭvā ca punaramātyān pṛcchati--kimayaṃ bhavanto vāsavasya rājño
XXdivyav_u:1854: vijite mahānudārāvabhāsah? te kathayanti--deva, vāsavasya rājño vijite
XXdivyav_u:1855: mahānudārāvabhāsah? te kathayanti--deva, vāsavasya rājño vijite ratnaśikhī nāma samyaksambuddhah
XXdivyav_u:1860: 038.025. dhanasaṃmato rājā kathayati--bhavantaḥ, yasya vijite īdṛśaṃ
XXdivyav_u:1862: darśanāyopasaṃkrāmanti, tasyāhaṃ kīdṛśamanarthaṃ kariṣyāmi? tena tasya dūto 'nupreṣitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1865: 038.027. puṇyamaheśākhyastvam, yasya vijite dvipādakaṃ puṇyakṣetraṃ ratnaśikhī samyaksambuddho
XXdivyav_u:1867: 038.029. kiṃ tu kaṇṭhāśleṣaṃ te datvā gamiṣyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:1871: 038.031. upasaṃkramya ratnaśikhinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:1874: saṃdiṣṭam--priyavayasaya āgaccha, na te 'haṃ kiṃcit kariṣyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:1877: 039.002. tatra mayā kathaṃ pratipattavyam? ratnaśikhī samyaksambuddhaḥ kathayati--gaccha mahārāja, śobhanaṃ bhaviṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:1878: 039.004. bhagavan, kiṃ mayā tasya pādayor nipatitavyam? mahārāja,
XXdivyav_u:1881: 039.005. atha vāsavo rājā ratnaśikhinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt

XXdivyav_u:2178: 047.029. indreṇa brāhmaṇena yaṣṭyā mahaḥ prajñapita iti indramaha indramaha iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā//
XXdivyav_u:2183: 047.032. athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaih <48>samalaṃkṛtamaśītyā cānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamamiva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam/
XXdivyav_u:2187: 048.003. tat ko 'sau upāyaḥ syāt yena me karmaparihāṇir na syānnāpi
XXdivyav_u:2197: vandito bhaveyam, evamanena dvābhyāṃ samyaksambuddhābhyāṃ vandanā kṛtā bhavet/
XXdivyav_u:2202: 048.012. evamayaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo dvābhyāṃ samyaksambuddhābhyāṃ paribhukto bhaviṣyati, yacca kāśyapena samyaksambuddhena, yaccaitarhi bhagavatā iti/
XXdivyav_u:2204: 048.014. niṣadya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--icchatha kālaḥ, etasya sugata samayaḥ, yaṃ bhagavān bhikṣūṇāṃ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasyāvikopitaṃ śarīrasaṃghātamupadarśayet/
XXdivyav_u:2207: 048.017. dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavanto laukikaṃ
XXdivyav_u:2208: cittamutpādayanti, tasmin samaye kuntapipīlikā api prāṇino bhagavataścetasā cittamājānanti/
XXdivyav_u:2209: 048.019. nāgāḥ saṃlakṣayanti--kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavatā laukikacittamutpāditamiti? paśyanti--kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghātamavikopitaṃ draṣṭukāma iti/
XXdivyav_u:2216: 048.023. rājñā prasenajitā śrutaṃ bhagavatā śrāvakāṇāṃ darśanāyāvikopitaṃ
XXdivyav_u:2218: 048.024. śrutvā ca punaḥ kutūhalajātaḥ sahāntaḥpureṇa kumārairamātyairbhaṭabalāgrair naigamajānapadaiśca draṣṭuṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2220: purāṇasthapitaḥ, viśākhā mṛgāramātā, anekāni ca prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi
XXdivyav_u:2221: kutūhalajātāni draṣṭuṃ saṃprasthitāni pūrvakaiśca kuśalamūlaiḥ saṃcodyamānāni/
XXdivyav_u:2223: 048.027. taiḥ śrutam--anatarhito 'sau bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghāturavikopita
XXdivyav_u:2227: 048.030. evaṃ ca cetasā cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--asmānme padāvihārāt kiyat puṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti/
XXdivyav_u:2229: tasya copāsakasya cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
XXdivyav_u:2231: 049.003. yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ padāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān//1//
XXdivyav_u:2232: 049.005. anyatamena upāsakena tasmin pradeśe mṛttikāpiṇḍo dattaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2233: 049.005. evaṃ ca cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--padāvihārasya tāvadiyat puṇyamākhyātaṃ bhagavatā anyatra/
XXdivyav_u:2234: 049.006. mṛttikāpiṇḍasya kiyat puṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃstasyāpi cetasā cittamājñāya
XXdivyav_u:2235: 049.008. śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇaniṣkā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:2239: 049.012. aparaistatra muktapuṣpāṇyavakṣiptāni, evaṃ ca cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--padāvihārasya mṛttikāpiṇḍasya ceyat puṇyamuktaṃ
XXdivyav_u:2240: bhagavatā, asmākaṃ tu muktapuṣpāṇāṃ kiyat puṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
XXdivyav_u:2241: 049.016. śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇaniṣkā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:2245: 049.021. asmākaṃ mālāvihārasya kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
XXdivyav_u:2246: 049.023. śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇavāhā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:2247: 049.025. yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto mālāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān//4//
XXdivyav_u:2250: 049.028. asmākaṃ pradīpadānasya kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
XXdivyav_u:2252: 050.003. yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ pradīpadānaṃ prakaroti vidvān//5//
XXdivyav_u:2254: 050.005. evaṃ cetasā cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--pradīpasya bhagavatā iyat puṇyamuktam/
XXdivyav_u:2255: 050.006. asmākaṃ gandhābhiṣekasya kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
XXdivyav_u:2256: 050.008. śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇarāśayo jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:2257: 050.010. yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto gandhābhiṣekaṃ prakaroti vidvān//6//
XXdivyav_u:2259: 050.012. evaṃ ca ... cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
XXdivyav_u:2266: 050.019. tato bhagavatā tasya mahājanakāyasya tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā
XXdivyav_u:2267: kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasrairmahān viśeṣo 'dhigataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2271: kaiścitsrotāapattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam, kaiścit sakṛdāgamiphalam, kaiścit sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ
XXdivyav_u:2284: 051.002. atha bhagavān kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carañ
XXdivyav_u:2287: 051.003. aśrauṣīdanāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatih--bhagavān kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2290: 051.005. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2291: 051.006. ekāntaniṣaṇṇamanāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
XXdivyav_u:2292: 051.007. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya
XXdivyav_u:2294: 051.008. anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatih utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhuktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena iti/
XXdivyav_u:2297: bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrānto yena svaniveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2298: 051.013. upasaṃkramya dauvārikaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--na tāvadbhoḥ puruṣa tīrthyānāṃ praveśo dātavyo yāvad buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhuktaṃ
XXdivyav_u:2303: 051.016. anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīyaṃ kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati--samayo bhadanta,
XXdivyav_u:2304: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
XXdivyav_u:2305: 051.018. atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena anāthapiṇḍadasya
XXdivyav_u:2308: 051.020. atha anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ
XXdivyav_u:2310: 051.022. anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya//
XXdivyav_u:2319: 051.029. ato dauvārikena uktah--ārya tiṣṭha, mā pravekṣyasi/
XXdivyav_u:2320: 051.030. kasyārthāya? anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā ājñā dattā--mā tāvat tīrthyānāṃ praveśaṃ dāsyasi, yāvadbuddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhuktam/
XXdivyav_u:2322: 051.031. athāyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ saṃlakṣayati--tasya me lābhāḥ sulabdhāḥ,
XXdivyav_u:2323: yanmāṃ śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ śramaṇaśākyaputrīya<52> iti na jānante/
XXdivyav_u:2324: 052.001. gacchāmi, kṛpaṇajanasyānugrahaṃ karomīti viditvā udyānaṃ gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2325: 052.001. sa saṃlakṣayati--adya mayā kasyānugrahaḥ kartavya iti/
XXdivyav_u:2326: 052.002. yāvadanyatamā nagarāvalambikā kuṣṭhābhidrutā sarujārtā pakvagātrā bhikṣāmaṭati/
XXdivyav_u:2329: 052.004. tayā āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo dṛṣṭaḥ kāyaprāsādikaścittaprāsādikaḥ śāntena īryāpathena/
XXdivyav_u:2330: 052.005. sā saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ mayā evaṃvidhe dakṣiṇīye kārā kṛtā, yena me iyamevamrūpā samavasthā/
XXdivyav_u:2331: 052.005. yadi āryo mahākāśyapo mamāntikādanukampāmupādāya ācāmaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt, ahamasmai
XXdivyav_u:2332: 052.007. tata āyuṣmatā mahākāśyapena tasyāścetasā cittamājñāya pātramupanāmitam--yadi te bhagini parityaktam, dīyatāmasmin pātra iti/
XXdivyav_u:2337: 052.009. saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ cāpyāryeṇa mama cittānurakṣayā na cchoritaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:2339: 052.010. athāyuṣmatā mahākāśyapena tasyāścetasā cittamājñāya tasyā eva
XXdivyav_u:2341: 052.012. sa saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ cāpi āryeṇa mama cittānurakṣayā paribhuktam,
XXdivyav_u:2345: 052.014. tasyā atīva audbilyamutpannam--mamāryeṇa mahākāśyapena piṇḍapātaḥ pratigṛhīta
XXdivyav_u:2346: 052.015. tata āyuṣmatī mahākāśyape cittamabhiprasādya kālaṃ gatā tuṣite devanikāye upapannā/
XXdivyav_u:2347: 052.016. sā śakreṇa devendreṇa dṛṣṭā ācāmaṃ pratipādayantī
XXdivyav_u:2350: 052.018. sa narakān vyavalokayitumārabdho na paśyati, tiryak ca pretaṃ ca manuṣyāṃścāturmahārājikān devāṃstrāyastriṃśān yāvanna paśyati/
XXdivyav_u:2351: 052.019. tathā hyadhastāddevānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate no tūpariṣṭāt/
XXdivyav_u:2359: 052.027. atha śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhavat--ime ca tāvanmanuṣyāḥ puṇyāpuṇyānāmapratyakṣadarśino dānāni dadati, puṇyāni kurvanti/
XXdivyav_u:2360: 052.028. ahaṃ pratyakṣadarśanena puṇyānāṃ svapuṇyaphale vyavasthitaḥ kasmāt dānāni na dadāmi, puṇyāni vā na karomi? ayamāryo mahākāśyapo dīnānāthakṛpaṇavanīpakānukampī/
XXdivyav_u:2363: 052.031. avacīravicīrakaṃ kākābhilīnakaṃ nātiparamarūpaṃ kuvindaṃ cātmānamabhinimārya udūḍhaśiraskaḥ saṇaśāṭikānivāsitaḥ sphaṭitapāṇipādo vastraṃ vāyitumārabdhah<53>/
XXdivyav_u:2364: 053.001. śacī api devakanyā kuvindanaryā veśadhāriṇī tasarikāṃ
XXdivyav_u:2366: 053.001. pārśve cāsyā divyā sudhā sajjīkṛtā tiṣṭhati/
XXdivyav_u:2369: 053.003. duḥkhitako 'yamiti kṛtvā dvāre sthitena pātraṃ prasāditam/
XXdivyav_u:2373: 053.007. suviruddhamiti kṛtvā jāto me hṛdi saṃśayaḥ//3// iti//
XXdivyav_u:2378: 053.009. sa kathayati--kauśika, kiṃ duḥkhitajanasyāntarāyaṃ karoṣi, yasya te bhagavatā dīrgharātrānugato vicikitsākathaṃkathāśalyaḥ samūla ārūḍho yathāpi tattathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena/
XXdivyav_u:2379: 053.011. ārya mahākāśyapa kiṃ duḥkhitajanasyāntarāyaṃ karomi? ime tāvat manuṣyāḥ puṇyānāmapratyakṣadarśino dānāni dadati puṇyāni kurvanti/
XXdivyav_u:2380: 053.012. ahaṃ pratyakṣadarśī eva puṇyānāṃ kathaṃ dānāni na dadāmi? nanu coktaṃ bhagavatā--
XXdivyav_u:2383: 053.016. tataḥ prabhṛti āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ samanvāhṛtya kulāni
XXdivyav_u:2385: 053.017. atha śakro devendra ākāśasthaścāyuṣmato mahākāśyapasya piṇḍapātaṃ
XXdivyav_u:2391: 053.021. sāmantakena śabdo visṛtah--amukayā nagarāvalambikayā āryo mahākāśyapa ācāmena pratipāditaḥ, sā ca tuṣite devanikāye upapannā iti/
XXdivyav_u:2392: 053.022. rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena śrutam--amukayā nagarāvalambikayā āryo mahākāśyapa ācāmena
XXdivyav_u:2395: 053.024. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2396: 053.025. ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā
XXdivyav_u:2398: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
XXdivyav_u:2399: 053.027. atha rājā prasenajit kauśala utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ
XXdivyav_u:2402: 053.030. atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2403: 053.031. atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastāmeva rātriṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīyaṃ kālyamevotthāya āsanāni <54>prajñāpya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati--samayo bhadanta, sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
XXdivyav_u:2404: 054.002. atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya bhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2406: 054.004. atha rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:2407: bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
XXdivyav_u:2409: cittamabhiprasādayaṃstiṣṭhati--ayaṃ rājā pratyakṣadarśīm eva puṇyānāṃ sve puṇyaphale pratiṣṭhāpito 'tṛpta eva puṇyairdānāni dadāti, puṇyāni karoti/
XXdivyav_u:2410: 054.008. atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo 'nekaparyāyeṇa buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastāt niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya/
XXdivyav_u:2411: 054.011. tato bhagavatā abhihitah--mahārāja, kasya nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśāmi?
XXdivyav_u:2412: kiṃ tava, āhosvidyena tavāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasūtamiti? rājā
XXdivyav_u:2414: 054.013. ko 'nyo mamāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyatīti viditvā kathayati--bhagavan yena mamāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasūtaṃ tasya
XXdivyav_u:2416: 054.014. tato bhagavatā kroḍamallakasya nāṃnā dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā/
XXdivyav_u:2418: 054.015. tato 'nyadivase rājā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--mama bhagavān piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte, kroḍamallakasya nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśati iti/
XXdivyav_u:2420: 054.017. te kathayanti--kimarthaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthita iti? rājā kathayati--bhavantaḥ, kathaṃ na cintāparastiṣṭhāmi,
XXdivyav_u:2421: yatredānīṃ sa bhagavān mama piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte, kroḍamallakasya nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmāmādiśatīti? tatraiko vṛddho 'mātyaḥ kathayati--alpotsuko bhavatu/
XXdivyav_u:2422: 054.020. vayaṃ tathā kariṣyāmo yathā śvo bhagavān devasyaiva nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatīti/
XXdivyav_u:2423: 054.021. taiḥ pauruṣeyāṇāmājñā dattā yataḥ śvo bhavadbhiḥ praṇīta āhāraḥ sajjīkartavyaḥ prabhūtaścaiva samudānayitavyo yathopārdhaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pātre
XXdivyav_u:2425: 054.023. amātyairaparasmin divase prabhūta āhāraḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ praṇītaśca/
XXdivyav_u:2428: 054.024. upārdhaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pātre patati, upārdhaṃ bhūmau/
XXdivyav_u:2429: 054.025. tataḥ kroḍamallakāḥ pradhāvitāh--bhūmau nipatitaṃ gṛhṇīma iti/
XXdivyav_u:2433: 054.027. kimarthaṃ na dīyate? kimanenāparibhogaṃ choritena iti/
XXdivyav_u:2434: 054.027. tasya kroḍamallakasya cittavikṣepo jātah--na śakyaṃ tena tathā
XXdivyav_u:2436: 054.028. tato rājā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣuasaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā na mama nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatīti viditvā dakṣiṇāmaśrutvaiva praviṣṭaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2437: 054.030. tato bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya nāṃnā dakṣiṇā
XXdivyav_u:2441: 055.001. <55>athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--bahuśo bahuśo bhadanta bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya niveśane bhuktvā nāṃnā
XXdivyav_u:2445: kauśalasyālavaṇikāṃ kulmāṣapiṇḍakāmārabhya karmaplotiṃ śrotum? etasya bhagavan kālaḥ, etasya sugata samayaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2446: 055.005. ayaṃ bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasyālavaṇikāṃ kulmāṣapiṇḍakāmārabhya karmaplotiṃ varṇayet, bhagavataḥ śrutvā bhikṣavo
XXdivyav_u:2451: 055.008. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
XXdivyav_u:2452: 055.008. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2464: 055.013. tena tasya dārakasya mātā abhihitā--ayaṃ tava putraḥ kṣetraṃ
XXdivyav_u:2465: rakṣatu, ahamasya sukhaṃ bhuktena yogodvahanaṃ kariṣyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:2468: 055.015. sa tasya sukhaṃ bhaktakena yogodvahanaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2470: 055.016. tasya dārakasya mātā saṃlakṣayati--adya gṛhapatipatnī suhṛtsambandhibāndhavāḥ saha śramaṇabrāhmaṇabhojanena vyagrā bhaviṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:2471: 055.017. gacchāmi sānukālaṃ tasya dārakasya bhaktaṃ nayāmi iti/
XXdivyav_u:2472: 055.018. sā sānukālaṃ gatvā gṛhapatipatnyā etamarthaṃ niveśayati/
XXdivyav_u:2473: 055.018. sā ruṣitā kathayati--na tāvacchramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dadāmi jñātīnāṃ
XXdivyav_u:2474: vā, tāvat preṣyamanuṣyāya dadāmi? adya tāvat tiṣṭhatu, śvo dviguṇaṃ dāsyāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:2475: 055.020. tatastasya dārakasya mātā saṃlakṣayati--mā me putro bubhukṣitakaḥ
XXdivyav_u:2480: 055.022. sa kathayati--amba, asti kiṃcinmṛṣṭaṃ mṛṣṭam? sā
XXdivyav_u:2487: 055.026. asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prantaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
XXdivyav_u:2491: 055.028. sa saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūte dakṣiṇīye kārā na
XXdivyav_u:2498: 055.032. tatastena tīvreṇa prasādena sā alavaṇikā kulmāṣapiṇḍakā tasmai pratyekabuddhāya pratipāditā//
XXdivyav_u:2499: 056.001. <56>kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau daridrapuruṣaḥ, eṣa evāsau rājā prasenajit kauśalastena kālena tena samayena/
