XXdivyav_u:2501: tena karmaṇā ṣaṭkṛtvo deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:2502: kāritavān, ṣaṭkṛtvo 'syāmeva śrāvastyāṃ rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhnābhiṣiktaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:2503: tenaiva ca karmaṇā avaśeṣeṇa etarhi rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhnābhiṣiktaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2506: 056.007. paśyasi phalaṃ hi rūkṣikāyā alavaṇikāyā kulmāṣapiṇḍakāyāḥ// iti/
XXdivyav_u:2507: 056.008. sāmantakena śabdo visṛtah--bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajito 'lavaṇikāṃ kulmāṣapiṇḍakāmārabhya karmaplotirvyākṛtā iti/
XXdivyav_u:2510: 056.010. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2511: 056.010. ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā
XXdivyav_u:2513: 056.012. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya
XXdivyav_u:2515: 056.012. atha rājā prasenajit kauśala utthāyāsanādekāṃsamutterāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavāṃs traimāsīṃ
XXdivyav_u:2517: 056.015. adhivāsayati bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya tūṣṇībhāvena/
XXdivyav_u:2518: 056.015. tato rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena buddhamukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya
XXdivyav_u:2521: 056.017. tailasya ca kumbhakoṭiṃ samudānīya dīpamālā abhyudyato dātum/
XXdivyav_u:2522: 056.018. tatra bhakte pūjāyāṃ ca mahān kolāhalo jātaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2525: 056.019. śrutvā ca punaḥ pṛcchati--bhavantaḥ, kimeṣa uccaśabdo mahāśabda
XXdivyav_u:2528: bhikṣuasṃghastraimāsyaṃ bhojitaḥ, ekaikaśca bhikṣuḥ śatasahasreṇa vastreṇa
XXdivyav_u:2529: ācchāditaḥ, tailasya kumbhakoṭiṃ ca samudānīya dīpamālā abhyudyato
XXdivyav_u:2531: 056.022. tatastasyā nagarāvalambikāyā etadabhavat--ayaṃ tāvadrājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ puṇyairatṛpto 'dyāpi dānāni dadāti, puṇyāni karoti/
XXdivyav_u:2532: 056.024. yannvahamapi kutaścit samudānīya bhagavataḥ pradīpaṃ dadyāmiti/
XXdivyav_u:2533: 056.024. tayā khaṇḍamallake tailasya stokam yācayitvā pradīpaṃ prajvālya bhagavataścaṅkrame
XXdivyav_u:2534: 056.025. pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam--anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yathāyaṃ bhagavāñ śākyamunirvarṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma śāstā loka
XXdivyav_u:2535: utpannaḥ, evamahamapi varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunireva śāstā bhaveyam/
XXdivyav_u:2537: bhikṣurupasthāyakaḥ, śuddhodanaḥ pitā, mātā mahāmāyā, rāhulabhadraḥ kumāraḥ putraḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2538: 056.029. yathāyaṃ bhagavān dhātuvibhāgaṃ kṛtvā parinirvāsyati, evamahamapi dhātuvibhāgaṃ kṛtvā
XXdivyav_u:2541: 056.031. dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatām--na tāvadupasthāyakāḥ pratisamlīyante na yāvadbuddhā bhagavantaḥ pratisamlīnā iti/
XXdivyav_u:2542: 056.032. athāyuṣmānānandaḥ saṃlakṣayati--asthānamanavakāśo yadbuddhā bhagavanta āloke śayyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:2545: 057.001. tataścīvarakarṇikena, tato vyajanena, tathāpi na śaknoti
XXdivyav_u:2552: tataścīvarakarṇikena, tato vyajanena, tathāpi na śaknomīti/
XXdivyav_u:2554: 057.006. yadi vairambhakā api vāyavo vāyeyuḥ, te 'pi na śaknuyur nirvāpayituṃ prāgeva hastagataścīvarakarṇiko vyajanaṃ vā/
XXdivyav_u:2555: 057.007. tathā hi--ayaṃ pradīpastayā dārikayā mahatā cittābhisaṃskāreṇa
XXdivyav_u:2557: 057.008. api tu ānanda bhaviṣyatyasau dārikā varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2559: bhikṣurupāsakaḥ, śuddhodanaḥ pitā, mahāmāyā mātā, kapilavastu nagaram,
XXdivyav_u:2567: 058.002. buddho bhavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme
XXdivyav_u:2568: satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrairdhanibhiḥ paurairbrāhmaṇairgṛhapatibhiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhairdevair nāgairyakṣairasurairgaruḍaiḥ kinnarairmahoragairiti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavāṃl lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2569: 058.005. tatra khalu varṣāvāsaṃ bhagavānupagto jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
XXdivyav_u:2570: 058.006. atha tadaiva pravāraṇāyāṃ pratyupasthitāyāṃ saṃbahulāḥ śrtāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2571: 058.007. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānto niṣaṇṇāh
XXdivyav_u:2572: 058.008. ekāntaniṣaṇṇān saṃbahulāñ śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
XXdivyav_u:2573: 058.010. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya
XXdivyav_u:2576: 058.011. śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakāntāḥ,
XXdivyav_u:2578: 058.012. upasaṃkramyāyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte
XXdivyav_u:2580: 058.013. saṃbahulāñ śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇija āyuṣmānānando dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
XXdivyav_u:2581: 058.015. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya
XXdivyav_u:2583: 058.016. atha te vaṇija utthāyāsanebhyah ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā
XXdivyav_u:2585: kiṃcitte āryānanda śrutaṃ varṣoṣito bhagavān katameṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyatīti, yadvayaṃ tadyātrikaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ samudānīmahe ? dharmatā caiṣā ṣaṇmahānagaranivāsino vaṇijo yasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavanto gantukāmā
XXdivyav_u:2587: 058.020. sa kathayati -- buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ kiṃ na pṛcchatha ? durāsadā hi buddhā bhagavanto
XXdivyav_u:2589: 058.021. mamāpi bhavanto durāsadā hi buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2591: 058.022. yadi bhadantānandasyāpi durāsadā buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ,
XXdivyav_u:2592: kathaṃ bhadantānando jānīte 'mukāṃ diśaṃ bhagavān gamiṣyatīti ? nimittena vā bhavantaḥ parikathayā
XXdivyav_u:2593: 058.024. kathaṃ nimittena ? yāṃ diśaṃ bhagavān gantukāmastato 'bhimukho
XXdivyav_u:2595: 058.025. kathaṃ parikathayā ? teṣāṃ janapadānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣate, evaṃ
XXdivyav_u:2597: 058.026. kutomukho bhadantānanda bhagavān niṣīdati, katameṣāṃ ca janapadānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣate ? magadhābhimukho bhavanto bhagavān niṣīdati,
XXdivyav_u:2600: 058.028. katame 'ṣṭādaśa ? nāgnibhyaṃ nodakabhyaṃ na siṃhabhyaṃ na vyāghrabhyaṃ na dvīpitarakṣuparacakrabhyaṃ na caurabhayaṃ na
XXdivyav_u:2602: 058.030. kālena ca kālaṃ divyāni rūpāṇi dṛśyante, divyāḥ śabdāḥ śrūyante,
XXdivyav_u:2603: udārāś cāvabhāsāḥ prajñnyāyante, ātmavyākaraṇāni ca śrūyante,
XXdivyav_u:2606: 059.001. <059>atha saṃbahulāḥ śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijah āyuṣmatah ānandasya bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya āyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vanditvā
XXdivyav_u:2608: 059.003. dhartā khalu buddhā bhagavanto jīvanto dhriyanto yāpayanto mahākaruṇayā saṃcodyamānāḥ parānugrahapravṛttāḥ kālena kālamaraṇyacārikāṃ
XXdivyav_u:2609: caranti, nadīcārikāṃ parvatacārikāṃ śmaśānacārikāṃ janapada cārikāṃ caranti/
XXdivyav_u:2610: 059.005. asmiṃstvarthe buddho bhagavān magadheṣu janapadacārikāṃ cartukāmastadeva pravāraṇāṃ pravārayitvā āyuṣmantamānadāmāmantrayate sma -- gaccha ānanda, bhikṣūṇāmārocaya itaḥ saptame divase tathāgato magadheṣu
XXdivyav_u:2612: 059.007. yo yuṣmākam utsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ janapadacārikāṃ cartum,
XXdivyav_u:2614: 059.008. evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati -- bhagavānāyuṣyanta itaḥ saptame divase magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:2615: 059.009. yo yuṣmākamutsahate bhagavatā sārdhaṃ magadheṣu janapadeṣu
XXdivyav_u:2617: 059.011. atha bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ saṃbahulaiśca śrāvastīnivāsibhirvaṇigbrāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiḥ sārdhaṃ magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:2618: 059.013. atha saṃbahulāśca śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2619: 059.013. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantamidamavocan -- adhivāsayatvasmākaṃ bhagavān yāvacca śrāvastī yāvacca rājagṛham, atrāntarā cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:2621: 059.016. adhivāsayati bhagavān saṃbahulānāṃ śrāvastīnivāsināṃ vaṇijāṃ tūṣṇībhāvena/
XXdivyav_u:2622: 059.017. atha saṃbahulāḥ śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntāḥ//
XXdivyav_u:2623: 059.019. atha saṃprasthite buddhe bhagavati antarā ca śrāvastīmantarā ca rājagṛham, atrāntarānmahāṭavyāṃ caurasahasraṃ prativasati/
XXdivyav_u:2626: 059.021. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ parasparaṃ kathayanti -- gaccatu bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2628: 059.022. ityanuvicintya sarve javena prasṛtā yena sārthaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2629: 059.022. bhagavatā abhihitah -- kimetadbhavantaḥ samārabdham ? caurāḥ kathayanti -- vayaṃ smo bhadanta caurā aṭavīcarāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2630: 059.023. nāsamākaṃ kṛṣir na vāṇijyā na gaurakṣyam/
XXdivyav_u:2635: 059.025. api tu sakalasya sārthasya parigaṇayya suvarṇaṃ gṛhṇīdhvam/
XXdivyav_u:2637: 059.026. asmin sārthe ye upāsakā viṇijastaiḥ kṛtsnasya sārthasya mūlyaṃ gaṇayya caurāṇāṃ niveditam iyanti śatāni sahasrāṇi ceti/
XXdivyav_u:2638: 059.028. tatasteṣāṃ caurāṇāṃ sārthaniṣkrayārthaṃ bhagavatā nidhānaṃ darśitam/
XXdivyav_u:2643: 059.031. punarapi bhagavān sārthaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃgha puraskṛto rājagṛhāt
XXdivyav_u:2646: 060.001. <60>evaṃ dvitricatuṣpanñcaṣaḍvārāṃśca cairasahasrasakāśādāgamanagamanena sārthaḥ paritrāto mūlyaṃ cānupradattam/
XXdivyav_u:2647: 060.002. saptaṃ tu cāraṃ bhagavān sārtharahito bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ
XXdivyav_u:2651: 060.003. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ parasparaṃ saṃlapanti -- bhagavān gacchatu,
XXdivyav_u:2653: 060.004. tatkasya hetoh ? eṣo hi bhagavān suvarṇapradaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2655: 060.005. bhagavatā cābhihitāh -- vatsāḥ, mama ete śrāvakāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2656: 060.006. caurāḥ kathayanti -- jānāsyeva bhagavān -- vayaṃ caurā aṭavīcarāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2657: 060.007. nāsmākaṃ kṛṣir na vaṇijyā na gaurakṣyam/
XXdivyav_u:2659: 060.008. tato bhagavatā caurāṇāṃ mahānidhānaṃ darśitam, evaṃ coktāh --
XXdivyav_u:2663: 060.010. atha bhagavāṃstaccaurasahasram yāvadāptaṃ dhanena saṃtarpayitvā tato 'nupūrveṇa
XXdivyav_u:2664: 060.011. tatasteṣāṃ caurāṇāṃ buddhirutpannā -- yā kācidasmākaṃ śrīsaubhāgyasampat, sarvāsau buddhaṃ bhagavantamāgamya/
XXdivyav_u:2665: 060.012. yannu vayaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghamasmin pradeśe bhojayema
XXdivyav_u:2667: 060.012. atrāntare nāsti kiṃcidbuddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāmekarakṣāṇāmekavīrāṇāmadvayavādināṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ trividhadamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupritiṣṭhitānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṣu
XXdivyav_u:2668: saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ caturvaiśāradyaviśāradānāmudārārṣabhasamyaksiṃhanādanādināṃ panñcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ panñcaskandha vimocakānāṃ panñcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍāyatanabhedakānāṃ saṃghātavihāriṇāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇayaśasāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānāṃ saptasamādhipariṣkāradāyakānāmāryāṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāmāryamārgapudgalanāyakānāṃ navānupūrvasamāpattikuśalānāṃ navasamyojanavisamyojanakānāṃ daśadikparipūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣtānāṃ trīrātrestrirdivasasya ṣaṭkṛtvo rātriṃdivasena buddhacakṣuṣā lokam vyavalokayantikasyānavaropitāni kuśalamūlānyavaropayāmi, kasyāvaropitāni
XXdivyav_u:2669: vivardhayāmi, kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ, kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ, kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:2670: kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasambādhaprāptaḥ, kaṃ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasambādhāt parimocayāmi, ko 'pāyaniṃnaḥ, ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ, ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ,
XXdivyav_u:2671: kamahamapāyād vyutthāpya svarge mokṣaphale ca pratiṣṭhāpayāmi, kasya kāmapaṅkanimagnasya hastoddhāramanuprayacchāmi, kasya buddhotpādavibhūṣitaṃ lokaṃ saphalīkaromi,
XXdivyav_u:2675: 060.029. yathā hi mātā priyamekaputrakaṃ hyavekṣate rakṣati cāsya jīvitam/
XXdivyav_u:2676: 060.031. tathaiva vaineyajanaṃ tathagato hyavekṣate rakṣati cāsya
XXdivyav_u:2678: 061.003. vaineyavatsān bhavaduḥkhanaṣṭān vatsān praṇaṣṭaniva vatsalā gauḥ//3//
XXdivyav_u:2679: 061.005. tato bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ caurāṇāṃ vaineyakālamapekṣya rājagṛhādanupūrveṇa bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣugaṇapuraskṛto dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāraścandanaścandanaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra āśvasta āśvastaparivāraḥ pūrvavat yāvanmahākaruṇayā
XXdivyav_u:2686: adhivāsayatu asmākaṃ bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena/
XXdivyav_u:2690: 061.013. atha taccaurasahasraṃ tāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ
XXdivyav_u:2691: khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñnapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya, bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati -- samayo
XXdivyav_u:2692: bhadanta, sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyase/
XXdivyav_u:2693: 061.015. atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena tasya caurasahasrasya bhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2694: 061.017. atha taccaurasahasraṃ buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṃghasya candanodakena pādau prakṣālayāmāsa/
XXdivyav_u:2695: 061.018. atha bhagavān prakṣālitapāṇipādaḥ purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñnapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2696: 061.019. niṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena
XXdivyav_u:2697: khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcatarāṇyāsanāni gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya/
XXdivyav_u:2698: 061.019. atha bhagavatā teṣāmāśayānuśayaṃ viditvā dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñnātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā tena caurasahasreṇa tasminnevāsane niṣaṇṇena viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñnānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:2699: 061.024. dṛṣṭasatyāśca kathayanti -- idamasmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā kṛtaṃ na rājñnā na devatābhir na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair neṣṭair na svajanabandhuvargeṇa yadasmābhirbhagavantaṃ
XXdivyav_u:2704: 061.027. labhema vayaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
XXdivyav_u:2706: 061.028. tato bhagavatā brahmeṇa svareṇābhihitāh -- eta vatsāḥ, carata
XXdivyav_u:2708: 061.029. vācāvasāne bhagavato muṇḍāḥ saṃvṛttastraidhātukavītarāgāḥ samaloṣṭakānñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñnāpratisaṃvitprāptā
XXdivyav_u:2710: 061.031. sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyāśca saṃvṛttāḥ//
XXdivyav_u:2712: bhagavantaṃ papracchuh -- paśya bhadanta bhagavatā idaṃ caurasahasraṃ saptavāraṃ dhanena saṃtarpayitvā atyantaniṣṭhe 'nuttare yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitam/
XXdivyav_u:2713: 062.003. bhagavānāha -- na bhikṣava etarhi, yathā atīte 'pyadhvani mayā asyaiva caurasahasrasya sakāśādanekabhāṇḍasahasraḥ sārtho niṣkrītaḥ, na ca śakitāḥ saṃtarpayitum/
XXdivyav_u:2715: śakrabrahmādyairapi duradhigamāṃ badaradvīpayātrāṃ varṣaśatena sādhayitvā etadeva caurasahasramārabhya kṛtsno jāmbudvīpaḥ suvarṇarajatavaiḍūryasphaṭikādyai ratnaviśeṣairmanorathepsitaiścopakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ saṃtarpayitvā daśabhiḥ
XXdivyav_u:2717: 062.007. tacchruṇuta -- bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminneva jambudvīpe vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati sma ṛddhaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca
XXdivyav_u:2720: 062.010. tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ priyaseno nāma sārthavāhaḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
XXdivyav_u:2722: 062.012. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍate ramate paricārayati/
XXdivyav_u:2726: 062.015. katame panñca? raktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti, kālaṃ jānāti ṛtuṃ jānāti,
XXdivyav_u:2727: garbhamavakrāntaṃ jānāti, yasyāḥ sakāśādgarbho 'vakrāmati taṃ jānāti,
XXdivyav_u:2729: 062.017. saceddārako bhavati, dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati/
XXdivyav_u:2731: 062.018. sā āttamanāḥ svāmina ārocayati -- diṣṭyā āryaputra vardhasva,
XXdivyav_u:2733: 062.019. yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati, niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:2740: 062.022. asmākaṃ cāpyatītakālagatānāmuddiśya dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā
XXdivyav_u:2743: 062.024. āpannasattvāṃ caināṃ viditvā upariprāsādatalagatāmayantritāṃ dhārayati -- uṣṇa uṣṇopakaraṇaiḥ
XXdivyav_u:2744: śītopakaraṇairvaidyaprajñnaptairāhārair nātiśītair nātyuṣṇair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair nātimadhurair nātikaṭukair nātikaṣāyaistiktāmlalavaṇamadhurakaṭukakaṣāyavivarjitairāhāraiḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2748: 062.028. sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
XXdivyav_u:2751: 062.031. tasya jñnātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatirātriṃdivasāni tasya jātasya jāto mahaṃ kṛtvā
XXdivyav_u:2752: nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti -- kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma? ayaṃ dārakaḥ priyasenasya <63>sarthavāhasya
XXdivyav_u:2755: kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāmaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām/
XXdivyav_u:2756: 063.003. so 'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhurunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena
XXdivyav_u:2763: saravakalābhijñnaḥ sarvaśilpajñnaḥ sarvabhūtarutajñnaḥ sarvagatigatijñnah uddhaṭṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ paramatīkṣṇaniśitabuddhiḥ saṃvṛtto 'gnikalpa iva jñnānena/
XXdivyav_u:2764: 063.009. sa yāni tāni rājñnāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhnābhiṣiktānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:2765: janapadaiśvaryasthāmavīryamanuprāptānāṃ mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalamabhinirjityādhyāvasatāṃ pṛthagbhavanti śilpasthānakarmasthānāni, tadyathā hastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe tsarudhanuḥṣu upayāne niryāṇe 'ṅkuśagrahe tomaragrahe chedye bhedye
XXdivyav_u:2769: 063.013. dharmatā caiṣā -- na tāvat putrasya nāma nirgacchati yāvat pitā
XXdivyav_u:2776: 063.018. kālagate priyasene sārthavāhe brahmadattena kāśirājñnā supriyo
XXdivyav_u:2782: 063.021. atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati -- alpaṃ ca deyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:2785: 063.022. yannvahaṃ sāmudram yānapātraṃ samudānīya mahāsamudramavatareyaṃ dhanahārikaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2786: 063.023. tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ sāmudrayānapātraṃ samudānīya pañcamātrairvaṇikśataiḥ sārdhaṃ mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2787: 063.024. tato 'nupūrveṇa ratnadvīpaṃ gatvā ratnasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā svastikṣemābhyāṃ mahāsamudrāduttīrya sthalajairvahitrairbhāṇḍamāropya vārāṇasyabhimukhaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2791: samārabdham? caurāḥ kathayanti -- sārthavāha, tvamekaḥ svastikṣemābhyāṃ gaccha, avaśiṣṭaṃ sārthaṃ bhuṣiṣyāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2792: 063.028. sārthavāhaḥ kathayati mamaiṣa bhavantaḥ sārthaḥ saṃniśritaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2794: evamuktāścaurāḥ kathayanti -- vayaṃ smaḥ sārthavāhacaurā aṭavīcarāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2795: 063.030. nāsmākaṃ kṛṣir na vāṇijyā na gaurakṣyam/
XXdivyav_u:2797: 063.031. teṣāṃ supriyaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- sārthasya mūlyaṃ bhavanto
XXdivyav_u:2800: 063.032. tataste vaṇijaḥ parasparaṃ mūlyaṃ gaṇayitvā caurāṇāṃ
XXdivyav_u:2802: 064.001. tataḥ supriyeṇa sārthavāhena bhāṇḍaniṣkrayārthe svaṃ dravyamanupradattam/
XXdivyav_u:2804: 064.002. evaṃ dvistriścatuḥpanñcaṣaḍvārāṃs tasyaiva caurasahasrasya sakāśāt supriyeṇa sārthavāhena sārthaḥ paritrāto mūlyaṃ cānupradattam/
XXdivyav_u:2805: 064.003. yāvat saptaṃ tu vāraṃ supriyaḥ sārthavāho mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2811: 064.006. caurāḥ kathayanti -- jānāsyeva mahāsārthavāha vayaṃ caurā
XXdivyav_u:2813: 064.007. nāsmākaṃ kṛṣir na vāṇijyaṃ na gaurakṣyam/
XXdivyav_u:2815: 064.008. tataḥ supriyeṇa sārthavāhena pūrvikāṃ pratijñnāmanusmṛtya dṛḍhapratijñnena tasya caurasahasrasya bhāṇḍamanupradattam/
XXdivyav_u:2816: 064.009. supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati -- ime caurā labdhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:2818: 064.010. mayā ca mahatī pratijñnā kṛtā sarvasattvā dhanena mayā saṃtarpayitavyā iti/
XXdivyav_u:2819: 064.011. so 'hamimaṃ caurasahasraṃ na śaknomi dhanena saṃtarpayitum/
XXdivyav_u:2820: 064.011. kathaṃ punaḥ sarvasattvān dhanena saṃtarpayiṣyāmīti cintāparo
XXdivyav_u:2822: 064.013. atha tasya mahātmana udārapuṇyamaheśākhyasyodāracetasopapannasya sarvasattvamanorathaparipūrakasya lokahitārthamabhyudgatasya anyatarā maheśākhyā devatā upasaṃkramya samāśvāsayati -- mā tvaṃ sārthavāha
XXdivyav_u:2825: 064.015. asti khalu mahāsārthavāha asminneva jambudvīpe badaradvīpo nāma mahāpattano 'manuṣyāvacarito
XXdivyav_u:2826: 064.016. santi tasmin badaradvīpe pradhānāni ratnāni sarvasattvavicitramanorathaparipūrakāṇi/
XXdivyav_u:2827: 064.017. yadi mahāsārthavāho badaradvīpayātrāṃ sādhayet, evamimāṃ mahatīṃ pratijñnāṃ pratinistareta/
XXdivyav_u:2828: 064.018. iyaṃ hi mahāpratijñnā śakrabrahmādīnāmapi dustarā, prageva
XXdivyav_u:2831: 064.019. na ca śakitā supriyeṇa mahāsārthavāhena sā devatā praṣṭum --
XXdivyav_u:2832: katarasyāṃ diśi badaradvīipaḥ kathaṃ vā tatra gamyata iti/
XXdivyav_u:2834: aho bata me sā devatā punarapi darśayet, diśaṃ copāyaṃ ca vyapadiśed badaradvīpamahāpattanasya gamanāyeti cintāparo middhamavakrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2835: 064.023. atha sā devatā tasya mahātmana udārapuṇyamaheśākhyasya
XXdivyav_u:2836: dṛḍhodārapratijñnasyodāravīryaparākramanāmanikṣiptotsāhatāṃ viditvā upasaṃkramya evamāha -- mā tvaṃ sārthavāha khedamāpadyasva/
XXdivyav_u:2837: 064.025. asti khalu mahāsārthavāha paścime digbhāge panñcāntaradvīpaśatāni
XXdivyav_u:2838: samatikramya sapta mahāparvatāḥ, uccaiśca pragṛhītāśca sapta ca
XXdivyav_u:2841: antaroddānamanulomapratilomadvayamāvartaḥ śaṅkhanābhaḥ śaṅkhanābhī ca nīlodastārakākṣaśca parvatau nīlagrīva eva ca vairambhā tāmrāṭavī vemṇugulmaḥ sapta parvatāḥ sakaṇṭakāḥ kṣāranadī triśaṅkuh ayaskilamaṣṭādaśavakro nadīślakṣṇa eva ca dhūmanetramudakaṃ saptaśīviṣaparvatā nadī bhavati paścimā/
XXdivyav_u:2843: 064.030. anulomapratilome mahāsamudre manuṣyānavacarite anulomapratilomā vāyavo vānti/
XXdivyav_u:2845: maheśākhyadevatāparigṛhītaḥ, sa mahatā puṇyabalena vīryabalena cittabalena mahāntaṃ plavamāsthāya
XXdivyav_u:2846: 065.001. sa yanmāsena gacchati, tadekena divasena pratyāhriyate/
XXdivyav_u:2850: 065.003. anulomapratilomaṃ mahāsamudraṃ samatikramya anulomapratilomo nāma parvataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2852: nāma vāyavo vānti, yaiḥ puruṣastimirīkṛtanetro naṣṭasaṃjñnaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate/
XXdivyav_u:2853: 065.005. sa vīryabalenātmānaṃ saṃdhārya tasmādeva mahāparvatādamoghāṃ nāmauṣadhīṃ samanviṣya gṛhītvā netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya anulomapratilomaṃ nāma mahāparvatamabhiniṣkramitavyam/
XXdivyav_u:2856: 065.008. sacedevaṃ vidhiṃ vā nānutiṣṭhati auṣadhīṃ vā na labhate, labdhvā vā na gṛhṇāti, sa ṣaṇmāsān muhyati, unmādamapi prāpnoti, ucchritya vā kālaṃ karoti/
XXdivyav_u:2857: 065.010. anulomapratilomaṃ mahāparvataṃ samatikramya āvarto nāma mahāsamudraḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2858: 065.011. tatra vairambhakā vāyavo vānti yaistadudakaṃ bhrāmyate/
XXdivyav_u:2859: 065.011. tatra yo 'sau puruṣo bhavatyudārapuṇyavipākamaheśākhyo devatāparigṛhītaḥ, sa mahatā puṇyabalena vīryabalena cittabalena kāyabalena mahāntaṃ plavamāsthāya āvartaṃ mahāsamudramavarati/
XXdivyav_u:2863: 065.015. evaṃ dvitīye tṛtīye caturthe panñcame ṣaṣṭhe āvarte saptakṛtvo bhrāmayitvā nirudhyate, yojanaṃ gatvā unmajjate/
XXdivyav_u:2867: 065.018. tatra śaṅkho nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati raudraḥ paraprāṇaharo mahābalo mahākāyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2868: 065.019. tasyopariṣṭādyojanamātre śaṅkhanābhī nāmauṣadhī divā dhūmāyate rātrau prajvalati/
XXdivyav_u:2870: 065.020. sa khalu nāgo divā svapiti rātrau carati/
XXdivyav_u:2871: 065.020. tatra tena puruṣeṇa divā sukhasuptasya nāgasya ātmānaṃ samanurakṣatā nāgaśarīramaviheṭhayatā auṣadhibalena mantrabalena puṇyabalena śaṅkhanābhī auṣadhī grahītavyā/
XXdivyav_u:2872: 065.022. gṛhītvā netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya āvartaḥ parvato 'dhiroḍhavyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2873: 065.023. sacedetāṃ vidhimanutiṣṭhati, svastikṣemeṇātikrāmati āvartaṃ parvatamaviheṭhitaḥ śaṅkhanābhena rākṣasena/
XXdivyav_u:2874: 065.024. sacedetāṃ vidhiṃ nānutiṣṭhati, auṣadhīṃ vā na labhate, labdhāṃ vā na gṛhṇāti, tamenaṃ śaṅkhanābho rākṣasaḥ panñcatvamāpādayati/
XXdivyav_u:2877: 065.026. nīlode mahāsamudre tārākṣo nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati raktanetraḥ pradīptaśiroruho vikṛtacaraṇadaśananayanaḥ parvatāyatakukṣiḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2878: 065.027. sacet svapiti, vivṛtānyasya netrāṇi bhavanti, tadyathā acirodito bhāskaraḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2879: 065.028. audārikāścāsya āśvāsapraśvāsā gurugurukāḥ pravartante yathā meghasya garjato 'śanyāṃ ca sphūrjatyāṃ śabdaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2881: 065.030. tatra tena puruṣeṇa tasmādeva samudrakūlānmahāmakarināmauṣadhīṃ samanviṣya gṛhya netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya mahānataṃ plavamāsthāya suptaṃ tārākṣaṃ dakarākṣasaṃ viditvā pūrvabuddhabhāṣitāmeraṇḍāṃ nāma mahāvidyāmuccārayatā <66>mantrapadāṃ
XXdivyav_u:2883: 066.001. sacedetāṃ vidhiṃ nānutiṣṭhati, auṣadhīṃ vā na labhate, labdhāṃ vā na gṛhṇāti, tamenaṃ tārākṣo dakarākṣasa ojaṃ vā ghaṭṭayati, cittaṃ vā kṣipati, sarveṇa vā sarvaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayati/
XXdivyav_u:2884: 066.003. nīlodaṃ mahāsamudraṃ samatikramya nīlodo nāma mahāparvataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2885: 066.003. tatra nīlagrīvo nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati panñcaśataparivāra
XXdivyav_u:2889: 066.005. apīdānīmanimiṣaṃ paśyato netrāṇi vyābādhayate, mūrcchāṃ ca saṃjanayati/
XXdivyav_u:2892: 066.007. sa khalu nāgo dṛṣṭiviṣo 'pi śvāsaviṣo 'pi sparśaviṣo 'pi
XXdivyav_u:2895: 066.008. yaḥ khalu tena dhūmena mṛgo vā pakṣī vā spṛśyate, sa
XXdivyav_u:2897: 066.009. tatra tena puruṣeṇa śiraḥsnātenopoṣitena maitrāyatā karuṇāyatā
XXdivyav_u:2898: avyāpannena cittenātmānaṃ samanurakṣatā nāgaśarīramaviheṭhayatā auṣadhī grahītavyā/
XXdivyav_u:2899: 066.010. netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya anena vidhinā jānatānuṣṭhitena nīlodaḥ parvato 'bhiroḍhavyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2900: 066.011. timiraṃ na bhaviṣyati, mūrcchā ca na bhaviṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:2902: 066.012. sacedetāṃ vidhiṃ nānutiṣṭhati, auṣadhīṃ vā na labhate, labdhāṃ vā na gṛhṇāti, tamenaṃ nīlagrīvo rākṣasaḥ panñcatvamāpādayiṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:2903: 066.014. nīlodaṃ parvataṃ samatikramya vairambho nāma mahāsamudraḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2904: 066.014. vairambhe mahāsamudre vairambhā nāma vāyavo vānti yaistadudakaṃ
XXdivyav_u:2906: 066.016. tamutsṛjya uttareṇa vairambhasya mahāsamudrasya mahatī tāmrāṭavī
XXdivyav_u:2909: 066.018. tatra tāmrākṣo nāma ajagaraḥ prativasati raudraḥ paraprāṇaharaḥ paramadurgandhaḥ
XXdivyav_u:2911: 066.019. yadā svapiti, tadā asya yojanaṃ sāmantakena lālāsya spharitvā/
XXdivyav_u:2912: 066.020. tiṣṭhati, yadā jāgarti, alpāsya lālā bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:2918: 066.022. tāṃ gṛhītvā netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya suptaṃ tāmrākṣamajagaraṃ viditvā auṣadhībalena mantrabalena vā ajagarabhavanasamīpena gantavyam/
XXdivyav_u:2919: 066.024. sacedetāṃ vidhimanutiṣṭhati, svastikṣemābhyāmatikramya aviheṭhitastāmrākṣeṇājagareṇa tataḥ paścānmūlaphalāni bhakṣayatā gantavyam/
XXdivyav_u:2922: 066.026. tatra tena puruṣeṇa tāmrapaṭṭaiḥ pādau baddhvā tān parvatān vīryabalena laṅghayitvā sapta kṣāranadyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2924: 066.027. tataḥ śālmalīphalakaiḥ plavaṃ baddhvā abhiruhyātikramitavyā aspṛśatā pānīyam/
XXdivyav_u:2926: 066.028. sapta kṣāranadīḥ samatikramya triśaṅkur nāma parvataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2927: 066.029. triśaṅkau parvate triśaṅkavo nāma kaṇṭakāstīkṣṇāḥ sutīkṣṇāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2928: 066.030. tatastena puruṣeṇa tāmrapaṭṭairvetrapāśaiḥ pādau baddhvā atikaramitavyam/
XXdivyav_u:2931: 066.031. tatra tena puruṣeṇa śālmalīphalakaiḥ plavaṃ baddhvā
XXdivyav_u:2934: 067.001. yathā triśaṅkuḥ parvataḥ, evaṃ triśaṅkukā nāma nadī/
XXdivyav_u:2938: 067.003. asya na kiṃcit nistaraṇamanyatra vṛkṣāgrād vṛkṣamadhiruhya
XXdivyav_u:2940: 067.004. aṣṭādaśavakraṃ parvatamatikramya aṣṭādaśavakrikā nāma nādī grāhamakarākulā saṃvṛtā
XXdivyav_u:2947: 067.007. ślakṣṇaṃ parvatamatikramya ślakṣṇā nāma nadī grāhamakarākulā/
XXdivyav_u:2951: 067.009. ślakṣṇāṃ nadīmatikramya dhūmanetro nāma parvato dhūmāyate
XXdivyav_u:2953: 067.010. yena khalu tena dhūmena mṛgā vā pakṣiṇo vā spṛśyante,
XXdivyav_u:2957: 067.012. guhāṃ samanviṣya tenātra guhādvāramauṣadhibalena mantrabalena ca
XXdivyav_u:2959: 067.012. sā ca khalu guhā āśīviṣaparipūrṇā tiṣṭhati/
XXdivyav_u:2960: 067.013. te khalu āśīviṣā dṛṣṭiviṣā api, sparśaviṣā api/
XXdivyav_u:2964: 067.015. tasyāṃ guhāyāṃ saṃjīvanī nāmauṣadhī jyotīrasaśca maṇirdīpaprabhāsaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:2965: 067.016. tāmauṣadhīṃ gṛhītvā saśīrṣapādaṃ samālabhya tāṃ cauṣadhīṃ gṛhītvā guhā praveṣṭavyā/
XXdivyav_u:2966: 067.016. auṣadhībalena mantrabalena auṣadhīprabhāvāccāśīviṣāḥ kāye na kramiṣyanti/
XXdivyav_u:2974: 067.021. tataḥ śālmalīphalakaiḥ plavaṃ baddhvā māṃsapeśyā ātmānamācchādya
XXdivyav_u:2976: 067.022. tatastā āśīviṣā māṃsagandhena pārāt pāraṃ gamiṣyanti/
XXdivyav_u:2979: 067.023. so 'dhiroḍhavyas tatra drakṣyasi mahāntaṃ sauvarṇabhūmiṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ puṣpaphalacchāyāvṛkṣopaśobhitam/
XXdivyav_u:2980: 067.024. rohitakāñ janapadān ṛddhāṃśca kṣemāṃśca subhikṣāṃśca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṃśca/
XXdivyav_u:2981: 067.025. rohitakaṃ ca mahānagaraṃ dvādaśayojanāyāmaṃ saptayojanavistṛtaṃ saptaprākāraparikṣiptaṃ dvāṣaṣṭidvāropaśobhitaṃ bhavanaśatasahasravirājitaṃ
XXdivyav_u:2983: 067.027. vīṇā vallikā mahatī sughoṣakaiḥ śrotrābhirāmaiśca gītadhvanibhiranuparataprayogaṃ nānāpaṇyasaṃvṛddhaṃ nityapramuditajanaughasaṃkulaṃ tridaśendropendrasadṛśodyānasabhāpuṣkariṇīsampannaṃ kādambahaṃsakāraṇḍavacakravākopaśobhitataḍāgaṃ rohitakaṃ mahārājādhyuṣitaṃ
XXdivyav_u:2985: 067.030. yatra maghaḥ sārthavāhaḥ prativasati abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ
XXdivyav_u:2986: prāsādikaḥ paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī dvīpāntaradvīpagamanavidhijñno mahāsamudrayānapātrayāyī<68>/
XXdivyav_u:2989: 068.002. yathoktaṃ ca vidhimanuṣṭhāsyasi, na ca khedamāpatsyase/
XXdivyav_u:2990: 068.002. evaṃ mahāsārthavāha paramaduṣkarakāraka imāṃ sumerumalayamandarasadṛśīṃ dṛḍhāṃ pratijñnāṃ
XXdivyav_u:2991: 068.003. iyaṃ ca mahāpratijñnā śakrabrahmādīnāmapi duṣkarā, prāgeva
XXdivyav_u:2994: 068.005. atha supriyaḥ sārthavāhaḥ suptapratibuddho devatāvacanaṃ śrutvā
XXdivyav_u:2997: 068.007. yadi tāvat sādhitā, duṣkarakārikā iyaṃ devatā/
XXdivyav_u:3001: 068.009. athavā yadyapyahaṃ lokahitārthe pratipadyeyam, saphalo me pariśramaḥ syāt/
XXdivyav_u:3007: 068.012. kasmādahaṃ na sādhayiṣyāmītyanuvicintya supriyo mahāsārthavāho dṛḍhapratijñno dṛḍhavīryaparākramo 'nikṣiptotsāha
XXdivyav_u:3009: 068.014. lokahitārthamabhyudgato yathopadiṣṭoddeśasmṛtiparigṛhīto dṛḍhapratijñnāṃ samanusmṛtya mahatā vīryabalena ekākī advitīyavyavasāyo
XXdivyav_u:3011: 068.016. sapta mahāparvatān, sapta mahānadyo vistareṇa sarvāṇi saṃkaṭāni yathoktena vidhinā mūlakandaphalāhāro guṇavati phalake baddhvā
XXdivyav_u:3013: 068.018. udyāne sthitvā anyatamaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate -- kaścidbhoḥ puruṣa asmin rohitake mahānagare magho nāma sārthavāhaḥ prarivasati? sa evamāha -- asti bhoḥ puruṣa/
XXdivyav_u:3016: 068.020. atha supriyasya mahāsārthavāhasyaitadabhavat -- mā haiva magho
XXdivyav_u:3018: 068.021. ko me vyapadeśaṃ kariṣyati tasya badaradvīpamahāpattanasya
XXdivyav_u:3019: gamanāyeti viditvā tvaritatvaritam yena maghasya sārthavāhasya niveśanaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3021: 068.023. sa dvāre nivāryate, na labhate praveśaṃ mahāsārthavāhadarśanāya/
XXdivyav_u:3022: 068.024. dharmatā khalu kuśalā bodhisattvāsteṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu/
XXdivyav_u:3025: maghaḥ sārthavāhaḥ ṣaḍbhirmāsaiḥ kālaṃ kariṣyatīti viditvā supriyo mahāsārtahvāho 'dhītya vaidyamatāni svayameva mūlagaṇḍapatrapuṣpaphalabhaiṣajyānyānulomikāni vyapadiśati sma
XXdivyav_u:3031: 068.030. tato maghasya sārthavāhasya kṣemaṇīyataraṃ cābhūdyāpanīyataraṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:3033: 068.031. atha magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ pratilabdhasaṃjñnaḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhamidamavocat -- kuto bhavāñ jñnānavijñnānasampanno 'bhirūpo
XXdivyav_u:3034: darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paṇḍito vyakto <69>medhāvī paṭupracāraḥ sarvaśāstrajñnaḥ sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ sarvakalābhijñnaḥ sarvabhūtarutajñna iṅgitajñna? kiṃ jātyā bhavān? kiṃgotrah? kena vā kāraṇena
XXdivyav_u:3038: 069.004. atha supriyo mahāsārthavāho maghāya sārthavāhāya jātikulagotrāgamanaprayojanaṃ vistareṇārocayati sma, paraṃ cainaṃ vijñnāpayati -- sārvāhānubhāvādahaṃ badaradvīpamahāpattanaṃ paśyeyam/
XXdivyav_u:3041: 069.007. atha magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ supriyasya mahāsārthavāhasyāśrutapūrvāṃ parahitārthamabhyudyatāṃ dṛḍhapratijñnāṃ śrutvā paramavismayajāto 'nimiṣadṛṣṭiḥ suciraṃ nirīkṣya supriyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3043: 069.009. āścaryamamānuṣaparākramaṃ te paśyāmi, yo nāma bhavāñ
XXdivyav_u:3046: 069.011. devaṃ tadbhavantaṃ paśyāmi devānyatamaṃ vā manuṣyaveṣadhāriṇam/
XXdivyav_u:3048: 069.012. api tu ahaṃ mahāvyādhinā grasto mumūrṣuḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3051: 'bhyudyatasyātmaparityāgamapi na kuryāt? tena hi vatsa kṣipraṃ maṅgalapotaṃ samudānaya, saṃvaraṃ cāropaya, yadāvayoryātrāyanaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3053: 069.014. evaṃ sārthavāheti supriyo mahāsārthavāho maghāya mahāsārthavāhāya
XXdivyav_u:3054: pratiśrutya maṅgalapotaṃ samudānīya saṃvaraṃ cāropya yena magho
XXdivyav_u:3056: 069.016. upasaṃkramya maghaṃ sārthavāhamidamavocat -- deva samudānīto maṅgalapotaḥ, saṃvaraṃ cāropitam, yasyedānīṃ mahāsārthavāhaḥ kālaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3058: 069.017. atha magho mahāsārthavāho vadaradvīpamahāpattanagamanakṛtabuddhiḥ svajanabandhuvargaputradāramitrāmātyajñnātisālohitaiḥ sabhṛtyavargeṇa ca rohitakarājñnā ca nivāryamāṇo 'pi guṇavati phalake baddhvā āśu supriyasārthavāhasahāyo maṅgalapotamabhiruhya mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3059: 069.020. atha magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ supriyasya mahāsārthavāhasya kathayati
XXdivyav_u:3060: -- ahaṃ bāḍhaglāno na śakyāmi sthiyo gantum/
XXdivyav_u:3062: 069.022. api tu asmin mahāsamudre yāvadevaṃvidhāni nimittāni bhavanti udakasya varṇasaṃsthānāni ca mama nivedayitavyāni/
XXdivyav_u:3063: 069.023. yathā anekāni yojanaśatāni gatvā adrākṣīt supriyo mahāsārthavāha ekapāṇḍaraṃ pānīyam/
XXdivyav_u:3064: 069.024. dṛṣṭvā punarmaghāya sārthavahāyārocayati -- yatkhalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāḥ, ekapāṇḍaraṃ pānīyaṃ paśyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:3065: 069.025. evamukte maghaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- naitanmahāsārthavāha ekapāṇḍaraṃ pānīyam/
XXdivyav_u:3066: 069.026. api tu paśyasi tvaṃ dakṣiṇakena mahatsudhāparvatam yadidaṃ tasyaitadanubhāvena pānīyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3067: 069.027. yatraikaviṃśatidhātugotrāṇi, yaṃ paktvā suvarṇarūpyavaiḍūryānyabhinirvartante, yadeke jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā
XXdivyav_u:3070: 069.029. punarapi gacchan paśyati supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ śastravarṇaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3072: 069.030. dṛṣṭvā ca punarmaghāya sārthavāhāyārocayati -- yat khalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāh -- śastravarṇaṃ pānīyaṃ dṛśyate/
XXdivyav_u:3076: 070.001. <70>atrāpyanekāni dhātugotrāṇi, yaṃ paktvā suvarṇarūpyavaidūryasphaṭikānyabhinirvartante, yadeke jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā
XXdivyav_u:3079: 070.003. evaṃ lohaparvatāstāmraparvatā rūpyaparvatāḥ suvarṇaparvatāḥ sphaṭikaparvatā vaidūryaparvatāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3082: 070.005. dṛṣṭvā ca punarmaghāya sārthavāhāyārocayati -- yatkhalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāh -- nīlapītalohitāvadātaṃ pānīyaṃ dṛśyate, antarjale ca dīpārciṣo dīpyamānāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3083: 070.007. evemukte magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- naitanmahāsārthavāha nīlapītalohitāvadātaṃ pānīyam, nāpyete dīpā iva dīpyante/
XXdivyav_u:3086: 070.009. ye 'pyete dīpā iva dīpyante, ete 'ntargatā auṣadhyo dīpyante/
XXdivyav_u:3087: 070.010. atrāpyanekāni dhātugotrāṇi, yaṃ paktvā suvarṇarūpyavaidūryasphaṭikānyabhinirvartante, yatraike jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā ratnānyādāya pratinivartante/
XXdivyav_u:3089: 070.012. api tu mahāsārthavāha iyantyevāhaṃ badaradvīpamahāpattanasya daśa
XXdivyav_u:3090: nimittāni jāne gamanaṃ prati, ataḥ pareṇa na jāne/
XXdivyav_u:3091: 070.013. evamukte supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- kadā badaradvīpamahāpattanasya gamanāyānto bhaviṣyati? evamukte maghaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- mayāpi supriya badaradvīpamahāpattanaṃ kārtsyena na dṛṣṭam/
XXdivyav_u:3092: 070.015. api tu mayā śrutaṃ paurāṇānāṃ mahāsārthavāhānāmantikājjīrṇānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:3093: vṛddhānāṃ mahallakānām -- ito jalamapahāya paścimāṃ diśaṃ sthalena gamyate/
XXdivyav_u:3095: 070.017. tataḥ supriyāya mahāsārthavāhāya kathayati -- maraṇāntikā me vedanāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3096: 070.018. etattvaṃ maṅgalapotaṃ tīramupanīya vetrapāśaṃ baddhvā maccharīre
XXdivyav_u:3098: 070.019. tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhastaṃ maṅgalapotaṃ tīramupanīya vetrapāśaṃ badhnāti/
XXdivyav_u:3100: 070.021. atha supriyo mahāsārthavāho maghaṃ sārthavāhaṃ kālagataṃ viditvā sthale utthāpya śarīre śarīrapūjaṃ kṛtvā cintayati -- maṅgalapotamāruhya
XXdivyav_u:3102: 070.022. sa ca poto vāyunā vetrapāśaṃ chittvā apahṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3103: 070.023. tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhaścatūratnamayasya parvatasya dakṣiṇena pārśvenāṭavyāṃ sthalena saṃprasthito mūlaphalāni bhakṣayamāṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3106: 070.025. tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāho madhunā pādau pralipyābhirūḍhaśca,
XXdivyav_u:3107: avatīrṇaśca, anekāni yojanāni gatvā mūlaphalāhāro gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3108: 070.027. sa tatra paśyati mahāntaṃ parvatamuccaṃ ca pragṛhītaṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:3109: 070.027. niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣamāṇo na labhate, na cāsya kaścinniḥsaraṇavyapadeṣṭā/
XXdivyav_u:3111: 070.028. tatra ca parvate nīlādo nāma yakṣaḥ prativasati/
XXdivyav_u:3114: 070.030. idamanucintya supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhamidamavocat -- ito mahāsārthavāha pūrveṇa yojanaṃ gatvā trīṇi
XXdivyav_u:3117: 070.032. atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ suptaprabuddho vetraśiṭām <71>baddhvā tāni parvataśṛṅgāṇyatikrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3118: 071.001. bhūyaḥ saṃprasthito 'drākṣīt supriyo mahāsāthavāhaḥ sphaṭikaparvataṃ ślakṣṇaṃ nirālambamagamyaṃ manuṣyamātrasya/
XXdivyav_u:3119: 071.002. na cāsyopāyaṃ paśyati taṃ parvatamabhirohaṇāyeti viditvā
XXdivyav_u:3121: 071.003. tasmiṃśca parvate candraprabho nāma yakṣaḥ prativasati/
XXdivyav_u:3122: 071.004. sa cintāparaṃ sārthavāhaṃ viditvā lokahitārthamabhyudyataṃ mahāyānasamprasthitaṃ prasannacittaṃ copetyāśvāsayati -- na khalu mahāsārthavahena viṣādaḥ karaṇīya iti/
XXdivyav_u:3127: 071.007. tayā gṛhītayā nāsya kāye śastraṃ kramiṣyati, amanuṣyāścāvatāraṃ na lapsyante, balaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca saṃjanayati, ālokaṃ ca karoti/
XXdivyav_u:3131: 071.010. tatra te na śocitavyaṃ na kranditavyaṃ na paridevitavyam/
XXdivyav_u:3132: 071.011. atha candraprabho yakṣaḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ samanuśāsya
XXdivyav_u:3134: 071.012. atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhaścandraprabheṇa mahāyakṣeṇa samāśvāsya ādeśitamārgo yathoktena vidhinā sphaṭikaparvatamatikrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3140: 071.016. dṛṣṭvā ca punarudyānaṃ gatvā cintayati -- yadyapyahaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3142: 071.017. kadā badaradvīpasya mahāpattanasyāgamanāyādhvā bhaviṣyatīti viditvā śayitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3143: 071.017. atha sā pūrvadevatā supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ durmanasaṃ viditvā rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaya uṣasaṃkramya samāśvāsya utkarṣayati -- sādhu sādhu mahāsārthavāha, nistīrṇāni te mahāsamudraparvatanadīkāntārāṇi
XXdivyav_u:3150: 071.022. tataścatasraḥ kinnarakanyā nirgamiṣyanti abhirūpā darśanīyāḥ prasādikāścāturyamādhuryasampannāḥ sārvāṅgapratyaṅgopetāḥ paramarūpābhijātāḥ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā hasitaramitaparicāritanṛttagītavāditrakalāsvabhijñnāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3156: 071.027. imāni ca te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi śayanagṛhāṇyārāmaramaṇīyāni, prabhūtāni ca jāmbudvīpakāni ratnāni,
XXdivyav_u:3159: 071.030. tvaṃ cāsmābhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍasva ramasva paricārayasva/
XXdivyav_u:3160: 071.031. tatra te tāsu mātṛsaṃjñnā upasthāpayitavyā, bhaginīsaṃjñnā duhitṛsaṃjñnā upasthāpayitavyā/
XXdivyav_u:3161: 071.032. daśākuśalāḥ karmapathā vigarhitavyāḥ, daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ
XXdivyav_u:3166: 072.002. yadyapi te subhāṣitasyārghamaṇiṃ prayaccheyuḥ, tatastvayā nipuṇaṃ praṣṭavyāh -- asya ratnasya bhaginyaḥ ko 'nubhāva iti/
XXdivyav_u:3170: 072.005. yāvaccaturthakinnaranagaraprāptasya te dvātriṃśat kinnarakanyā nirgamiṣyanti tāsāṃ pūrvikānāmantikādabhirūpatarāśca darśanīyatarāśca prāsādikatarāścāpsarasah -- pratispardhinyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3174: 072.009. atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ pramuditamanāḥ sukhapratibuddhaḥ kālyamevo 'tthāya sauvarṇaṃ kinnaranagaramanuprāptaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3176: 072.010. tataḥ supriyeṇa mahāsārthavāhena trikoṭite dvāre catasraḥ
XXdivyav_u:3177: kinnarakanyā nirgatā abhirūpā darśanīyāḥ prāsādikāścāturyamādhuryasampannāḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetāḥ paramarūpābhijātā hasitaramitaparicāritanṛttagītavāditrakalāsvabhijñnāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3180: 072.013. asmākamasvāminīnāṃ svāmī bhava, apatīnāṃ patiralayanānāṃ layano
XXdivyav_u:3182: 072.015. imāni ca te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi śayanagṛhāṇyārāmaramaṇīyāni vanaramaṇīyāni puṣkariṇīramaṇīyāni ca/
XXdivyav_u:3183: 072.016. jāmbudvīpakāni ratnāni, tadyathāmaṇayo muktā vaidūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālarajatajātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā
XXdivyav_u:3185: 072.018. tvaṃ cāsmābhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍasva ramasva paricārayasva/
XXdivyav_u:3186: 072.018. atha supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ sūpasthitasmṛtiṃ tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ
XXdivyav_u:3187: sarvāṅgairanuparigṛhya sauvarṇaṃ kinnaranagaraṃ praveśya prāsādamabhiropya prajñnapta evāsane
XXdivyav_u:3188: 072.020. niṣaṇṇaḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāho daśākuśalān karmapathān vigarhati, daśa kuśalān karmapathān saṃvarṇayati, subahvapi pralobhyamāno na śakyate skhalayitum/
XXdivyav_u:3189: 072.022. tuṣṭāśca tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ kathayanti -- āścaryam yatredānīṃ daharaśca bhavān
XXdivyav_u:3190: 072.023. na ca kāmeṣu sajjase vā badhyase vā/
XXdivyav_u:3193: 072.024. tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhastasya ratnasya prabhāvānveṣī kathayati -- asya ratnasya bhaginyaḥ ko 'nubhāva iti/
XXdivyav_u:3194: 072.025. tāḥ kathayanti -- yatkhalu sārthavāha jānīyāh -- tadeva poṣadhe panñcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnāta upoṣadhoṣita idaṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre āropya yojanasahasraṃ sāmantakena yo yenārthī bhavati hiraṇyena vā suvarṇena vā annena vā vastreṇa vā pānena vā alaṃkāraviśeṣeṇa vā dvipādena vā catuṣpādena vā yānena vā vāhanena vā dhanena vā dhānyena vā, sa
XXdivyav_u:3199: 072.030. atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kathayā
XXdivyav_u:3200: saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛbhaginīduhitṛvat pratisaṃmodya sauvarṇāt kinnaranagarāt
XXdivyav_u:3202: 073.001. tatrāpi supriyeṇa sārthavāhena trikoṭite dvāre'ṣṭau kinnarakanyā
XXdivyav_u:3208: 073.004. tatrāpi supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kthayā
XXdivyav_u:3209: saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛbhaginīduhitṛvat pratisaṃmodya rūpyamayāt kinnaranagarāt pratiniṣkrānto yāvat tṛtīyaṃ vaiḍūryamayaṃ kinnaranagaramanuprāptaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3210: 073.007. tatrāpi supriyeṇa sārthavāhena trikoṭite dvāre ṣoḍaśa
XXdivyav_u:3212: 073.008. tā api dharmadeśanāvarjitāstata eva viśiṣṭataraṃ saubhāsinikaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3214: 073.009. tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhastasya ratnasya prabhāvānveṣī kathayati -- asya ratnasya bhaginyaḥ ko'nubhāva iti? kinnarakanyāḥ kathayanti -- pūrvavat/
XXdivyav_u:3215: 073.011. supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛbhaginīduhitṛvat pratisaṃmodya tṛtīyāt kinnaranagarāt pratiniṣkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3218: 073.015. tataḥ supriyeṇa sārthavāhena trirākoṭite dvāre dvātriṃśat
XXdivyav_u:3222: 073.018. asamākamasvāmikānāṃ svāmī bhava, apatīnāṃ patiralayanānāṃ layano
XXdivyav_u:3224: 073.020. imāni ca te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi śayanagṛhāṇyārāmaramaṇīyāni vanaramaṇīyāni
XXdivyav_u:3225: 073.021. prabhūtāni ca jāmbudvīpakāni ratnāni, tadyathā -- maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālarajataṃ jātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā
XXdivyav_u:3229: 073.023. tatrāpi supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ sūpasthitasmṛtistāḥ kinnarakanyā vividhairdharmapadavyanñjanaiḥ
XXdivyav_u:3230: 073.025. tuṣṭāśca tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ sarvāṅgairanuparigṛhya catūratnamayaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3232: 073.026. niṣaṇṇaḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāho daśākuśalān karmapathān vigarhati, daśa kuśalān karmapathān saṃvarṇayati, subahvapi pralobhyamāno na śakyate skhalayitum/
XXdivyav_u:3233: 073.028. tuṣṭāśca tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ kathayanti -- āścaryam yatredānīṃ daharaśca bhavān
XXdivyav_u:3234: 073.029. na ca kāmeṣu sajjase vā badhyase vā/
XXdivyav_u:3236: 073.030. tā api dharmadeśanāvarjitāḥ saubhāsinikaṃ jāmbudvīpapradhānamanarghyeyamūlyamanantaguṇaprabhāvaṃ badaradvīpamāpattane sarvasvabhūtaṃ ratnamanuprayacchanti/
XXdivyav_u:3237: 073.031. evaṃ ca kathayanti -- idamasmākaṃ mahāsārthavāha maṇiratnaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3238: badareṇa bhrātrā kinnararājñnā anupradattam, asmin badaradvīpamahāpattane <74>cihnabhūtamālakṣyabhūtaṃ maṇḍanabhūtaṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:3239: 074.001. tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- asya ratnasya ko
XXdivyav_u:3240: 'nubhāva iti? tāḥ kathayanti -- yatkhalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāh -- idaṃ maṇiratnaṃ tadeva poṣadhoṣito dhvajāgre baddhvā āropya kṛtsne jambudvīpe
XXdivyav_u:3242: stīmanuṣyāḥ, yuṣmākam yo yenarthī upakaraṇaviśeṣeṇa hiraṇyena vā subarṇena vā ratnena vā annena vā pānena vā vastreṇa vā bhojanena vā
XXdivyav_u:3243: alaṃkāraviśeṣeṇa vā dvipadena vā catuṣpadena vā vāhanena vā yānena vā dhanena vā dhānyena vā sa cittamutpādayatu, vacanaṃ ca niścārayatu/
XXdivyav_u:3246: 074.008. ayaṃ tu prativiśeṣah -- yāni cāsya lokasya bhavanti mahābhayāni,
XXdivyav_u:3247: tadyathā -- rājato vā cairato vā agnito vā udako vā manuṣyato vā amiṣyato vā siṃhato vā vyāghrato vā dvīpatarakṣuto vā yakṣyarākṣasapretapiśācakumbhāṇḍapūtanakaṭapūtanato vā, ītayopadravo vā,
XXdivyav_u:3248: upasargo vā, anāvṛṣṭirvā durbhikṣabhayāni vā, asminnucchrite ratnaviśeṣe ima īrayopadravā na bhaviṣyanti/
XXdivyav_u:3249: 074.012. iryuktvā tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ saṃrādhayāmāsuh --- sādhu sādhu mahāsārthavāha, nistīrṇāni
XXdivyav_u:3257: 074.015. api tu yena tvaṃ pathenāgataḥ, amanuṣyāstāvat, pralayaṃ gaccheyuḥ prāgeva manuṣyāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3258: 074.016. anyadeva vayaṃ sanmārgaṃ vyapadekṣyāmaḥ kṣipraṃ vārāṇasīgamanāya/
XXdivyav_u:3259: 074.017. tacchṛṇu, manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣyāmah -- itaḥ paścime digbhāge sapta pratānatikramya mahāparvata uccaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3260: 074.018. tasmin parvate lohitākṣo nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati raudraḥ
XXdivyav_u:3262: 074.019. sa ca parvato 'manuṣyavacaritaḥ kṛṣṇamandhakāraṃ savisphuliṅgaṃ vāyuṃ mokṣayati/
XXdivyav_u:3263: 074.020. tatra te etadeva ratnaṃ dhvajāgre 'varopayitvā gantavyam/
XXdivyav_u:3267: 074.022. sa tava gandhamāghrāya sapta rātriṃdivasānyaśaniṃ pātayiṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:3271: 074.023. tatra drakṣyasi samaṃ bhūmipradeśamakṛṣṭoptaṃ ca taṇḍulaphalaśālimakaṇakamatuṣaṃ śuciṃ niṣphuṭigandhikaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3273: 074.025. yastamaṣṭamyāṃ panñcadaśyāṃ vā bālāho'śvarājaḥ paribhujya sukhī arogo balavān prīṇitendriyaḥ pūrvakāyamabhyunnamayyodānamudānayati -- kaḥ
XXdivyav_u:3274: pāragāmī, kaḥ pāragāmī, kaṃ pāraṃ nayāmi, svastikṣemābhyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:3275: jambudvīpamanuprāpayāmi, sa tvayopasaṃkramya idaṃ syādvacanīyam -- ahaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3276: pāragāmī, māṃ pāraṃ naya, māṃ svastikṣemābhyāṃ vārāṇasīmanuprāpaya/
XXdivyav_u:3277: 074.028. atha sa supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛduhitṛvat pratisamodya yathoddiṣṭena mārgeṇa yathoktena vidhinā anupūrveṇa taṃ
XXdivyav_u:3279: 074.030. sa ca bālāho'śvarājaścarannevamāha -- kaḥ pāragāmī, kaḥ pāragāmī,
XXdivyav_u:3280: kaṃ pāraṃ nayāmi, svastikṣemābhyāṃ jambudvīpamanuprāpayāmi? tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāno yena bālāho 'śvarājastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3281: 075.001. <74>upasaṃkramya ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bālāho 'śvarājastenānñjaliṃ praṇamya bālāhamaśvarājamidavocat -- ahaṃ pāragāmī, ahaṃ pāragāmī, naya mām/
XXdivyav_u:3284: na te mahāsārthavāha mama pṛṣṭhādhirūḍhena diśo nāvalokayitavyāḥ,
XXdivyav_u:3287: 075.005. atha supriyo mahāsārthavāho bālāhasyāśvarājasya pṛṣṭhamadhiruhya yathānuśiṣṭo 'lpaiśca kṣaṇalavamuhūrtairvārāṇasīmanuprāptaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3303: 075.012. athāciraprakrānte bālāhe 'śvarājani supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ svagṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3305: supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ pūrṇena varṣaśatena saṃsiddhayātraḥ pūrṇamanorathaḥ svagṛhamanuprāpta
XXdivyav_u:3308: 075.016. aśrauṣīt tat pūrvakaṃ caurasahasramanyaśca jano dhanārthī --
XXdivyav_u:3309: supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ saṃsiddhayātraḥ paripūrṇamanoratha āgata iti/
XXdivyav_u:3312: 075.018. evamukte mahāsārthavāhastān sarvān maitreṇa cakṣuṣā vyavalokya
XXdivyav_u:3314: 075.019. yo yenārthī upakaraṇaviśeṣeṇa bhavati, sa tasyārthe cittamutpādayatu, vācaṃ ca
XXdivyav_u:3316: 075.020. atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhastadeva poṣadhe panñcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnāta upoṣadhoṣito yattatprathamalabdhaṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre āropya
XXdivyav_u:3317: vācaṃ ca niścārayati, yojanasahasrasāmantakena yathepsitāni sattvānāmupakaraṇānyutpadyante, sahābhidhānacca yo yenārthī tasya tadvarṣaṃ bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:3319: 075.024. taccaurasahasraṃ supriyeṇa mahāsārthavāhena daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:3320: 075.025. atrāntarāt kālagate brahmadatte kāśirājani paurāmātyaiḥ supriyo
XXdivyav_u:3322: 075.026. mahābhiṣiktena supriyeṇa mahārājñnā dvitīyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre
XXdivyav_u:3323: āropya pūrvavidhinā dvīyojanasahasrasāmantakena yathepsitāni sattvānāmupakaraṇānyutpadyantāmiti sahābhidhānācca yo yenārthī tasya
XXdivyav_u:3325: 075.028. tṛtīyena maṇiratnena yathoktena vidhinā dhvajāgrocchritena yathepsitopakaraṇaviśeṣavarṣaṇāni
XXdivyav_u:3329: tadeva poṣadhe panñcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnātenopoṣadhoṣitena kṛtsne jambudvīpe ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā upakaraṇotpannābhilāṣiṇāṃ strīmanuṣyāṇāṃ jambudvīpanivāsinām yanmaṇiratnaṃ badaradvīpamahāpattanasarvasvabhūtam yathepsitam <76>sarvopakaraṇavarṣiṇaṃ dhvajāgre āropayāmāsa/
XXdivyav_u:3330: 076.001. samanantaraṃ dhvajāgrāvaropite tasmiñ jambudvīpapradhānamaṇiratne kṛtsno jambudvīpanivāsī mahājanakāyo yathepsitairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ saṃtarpitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3331: 076.003. upakaraṇasaṃtarpitaśca jambudvīpanivāsī janakāyaḥ supriyeṇa rājñnā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3332: 076.004. tato jyeṣṭhaṃ kumāraṃ rājyaiśvaryādhipatye partiṣṭhāpya rājarṣibrahmacaryaṃ caritvā caturo brahmān vihārān bhāvayitvā kāmeṣu kāmacchandaṃ prahāya tadbahulavihārī brahmalokasabhāgatāyāṃ copapanno
XXdivyav_u:3334: 076.007. bhagavanāha -- kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau supriyo nāma mahāsārthavāhaḥ, ahameva tena kālena tena samayena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:3337: 076.009. yā sā pūrvadevatā, kāśyapaḥ samyaksambuddho bodhisattvabhūtaḥ sa tena kālena tena
XXdivyav_u:3338: 076.010. yaścāsau magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ, eṣa eva śāriputro bhukṣuḥ sa tena
XXdivyav_u:3340: 076.011. yaścāsau nīlādo nāma mahāyakṣaḥ, eṣa evānando bhikṣustena kālena tena samayena/
XXdivyav_u:3341: 076.012. yaścāsau candraprabho yakṣaḥ, eṣa evāniruddho bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena/
XXdivyav_u:3342: 076.012. yaścāsau lohitākṣo nāma mahāyakṣaḥ, sa eṣa eva devadattastena kalena tena samayena/
XXdivyav_u:3343: 076.013. yaścāsau agnimukho nāma nāgaḥ, eṣa eva māraḥ pāpīyān sa tena
XXdivyav_u:3345: 076.014. yaścāsau bālāho 'śvarājaḥ, maitreyo boddhisattvastena kālena tena
XXdivyav_u:3347: 076.015. tadā tāvanmayā bhikṣavo dṛḍhapratijñnena pratijñnāpūraṇārthaṃ saptavārāṃścaurasahasrāt sārthaḥ paritrātaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3349: 076.017. kṛtvā cānekairduṣkaraśatasahasrairbadaradvīpamahāpattanasya yātrāṃ sādhayitvā caurasahasrapramukhaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jambudvīpaṃ dhanena
XXdivyav_u:3352: jñnānamadhigamya maitrāyatā karuṇayā saptakṛtvaścaurasahasrasakāśāt sārthaḥ paritrātaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3353: 076.020. aparituṣṭaṃ ca caurasahasraṃ viditvā yāvadāptaṃ dhanena
XXdivyav_u:3363: 077.002. tena khalu samayena bhadraṃkare nagare ṣaḍ janā mahāpuṇyāḥ prativasanti--meṇḍhako gṛhapatir meṇḍhakapatnī meṇḍhakaputro meṇḍhakasnuṣā meṇḍhakadāso meṇḍhakadāsī/
XXdivyav_u:3364: 077.004. kathaṃ meṇḍhako gṛhapatirjñāto mahāpuṇyah? sa yadi riktakāni
XXdivyav_u:3367: 077.005. kathaṃ meṇḍhakapatnī? sā ekasyārthāya sthālikāṃ sādhayati, śatāni sahasrāṇi ca bhuñjate/
XXdivyav_u:3369: 077.006. kathaṃ meṇḍhakaputrah? tasya pañcaśatiko nakulako kaṭyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:3371: 077.007. sa yadi śataṃ sahasraṃ vā parityajati, tadā pūrṇa eva tiṣṭhati,
XXdivyav_u:3374: 077.008. kathaṃ meṇḍhakasnuṣā? sā ekasyārthāya gandhaṃ saṃpādayati,
XXdivyav_u:3377: 077.010. kathaṃ meṇḍhakadāsah? sa yadaikaṃ halasīraṃ kṛṣati, tadā sapta sīrāḥ kṛṣṭā bhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:3379: 077.010. kathaṃ meṇḍhakadāsī mahāpuṇyā? sā yadaikaṃ vastu rakṣati,
XXdivyav_u:3381: 077.011. yadā ekamātraṃ pratijāgarti, tadā sapta mātrāḥ saṃpadyante/
XXdivyav_u:3383: 077.013. dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:3384: saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ pañcāṅgavipratihīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānāmaṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrvasamāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātrestrirdivasasya ṣaṭkṛtvo rātriṃdivasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate--ko hīyate, ko vardhate, kaḥ
XXdivyav_u:3385: kṛcchraprāptaḥ, kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ, kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ, kaḥ
XXdivyav_u:3395: 077.029. vaineyavatsān bhavadurganaṣṭān 077.030. vatsān praṇaṣṭāniva vatsalā gauḥ//2//
XXdivyav_u:3403: 078.002. yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ bhadraṃkareṣu janapadeṣu
XXdivyav_u:3404: cārikāṃ cartum, sa cīvarakāṇi pratigṛhṇātu iti/
XXdivyav_u:3408: 078.005. yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ bhadraṃkareṣu janapadeṣu
XXdivyav_u:3409: cārikāṃ caritum, sa cīvarakāṇi pratigṛhṇātu iti/
XXdivyav_u:3410: 078.006. evamāyuṣmanniti te bhiṣava āyuṣmata ānandasya pratiśrutya
XXdivyav_u:3412: 078.008. atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra āśvasta āśvastaparivāro vinīto vinītaparivāro
XXdivyav_u:3414: prāsādikaparivāraḥ, vṛṣabha iva gogaṇaparivṛtaḥ, siṃha iva daṃṣṭragaṇaparivāraḥ, haṃsarāja iva haṃsagaṇaparivṛtaḥ, suparṇa iva pakṣigaṇaparivṛtaḥ, vipra iva śiṣyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ, suvaidya
XXdivyav_u:3419: sūrya iva raśmisahasraparivṛtaḥ, dhṛtarāṣṭra iva gandharvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:3420: virūḍhaka iva kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto virūpākṣa iva nāgagaṇaparivṛtaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:3421: dhanada iva yakṣagaṇaparivṛtaḥ, vemacittirivāsuragaṇaparivṛtaḥ, śakra iva tridaśagaṇaparivṛtaḥ, brahmeva brahmakāyikaparivṛtah,
XXdivyav_u:3422: stimita iva jalanidhiḥ, sajala iva jalanidhiḥ, vimada iva gajapatiḥ,
XXdivyav_u:3425: 078.019. evamanekaguṇagaṇasamanvāgato buddho bhagavāñ janapadacārikayā bhadraṃkaraṃ nagaraṃ
XXdivyav_u:3427: nirbhartsitā ānanditā devamanuṣyāḥ, toṣitāni sajjanahṛdayāni, tadā bhagnaprabhāvāstīrthyāḥ pratyantān saṃśritāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3437: 078.026. kasyārthāya? dṛṣṭā asmābhiryuṣmākaṃ saṃpattiḥ, yāvadvipattiṃ na paśyāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3439: 078.028. bhavantaḥ, śramaṇo gautamaḥ kṣurāśaniṃ pātayannanekā aputrikā apatikāśca kurvannāgacchati/
XXdivyav_u:3440: 078.029. āryāḥ, yadyevam, yasminneva kāle sthātavyaṃ tasminneva kāle 'smākaṃ parityāgas
XXdivyav_u:3442: 078.030. te kathayanti--kiṃ vayaṃ na tiṣṭhāmah? na yūyamasmākaṃ śroṣyatha/
XXdivyav_u:3451: 079.001. tatastairbhadraṃkaranagarasāmantakena sarvo janakāya udvāsya bhadraṃkaraṃ nagaraṃ pravāsitaḥ, śādvalāni kṛṣṭāni, sthaṇḍilāni pātitāni,
XXdivyav_u:3453: 079.003. tataḥ śakro devendraḥ saṃlakṣayati--na mama pratirūpam yadahaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3455: 079.004. yena nāma bhagavatā tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairanekair duṣkaraśatasahasraiḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryānuttarajñānamadhigatam, sa nāma bhagavān sarvalokaprativiśiṣṭaḥ sarvavādavijayī śūnye janapade cārikaṃ cariṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:3462: 079.009. cāturmahārājikā devā uktāh--yūyaṃ bhadraṃkarāṇāṃ janapadānāṃ vāsayateti/
XXdivyav_u:3471: 079.014. te gatāḥ paśyantyatiśayena janapadān ṛddhān sphītān/
XXdivyav_u:3472: 079.014. tata āgatya kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, na kadācidasmābhirevamrūpā janapadā ṛddhāḥ sphītā dṛṣṭapūrvā iti/
XXdivyav_u:3473: 079.015. tīrthyāḥ kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, vo yastāvadacetanān bhāvānanvāvartayati, sa yuṣmānnānvāvartayiṣyatīti? kuta etat? sarvathā avalokitā bhavantaḥ, apaścimaṃ vo darśanam, gacchāma iti/
XXdivyav_u:3474: 079.017. te kathayanti--āryāḥ, tiṣṭhata, kim yuṣmākaṃ śramaṇo gautamaḥ
XXdivyav_u:3475: karoti? so 'pi pravrajitaḥ, yūyamapi pravrajitā bhikṣācarāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3477: kathayanti--samayena tiṣṭhāmo yadi yūyaṃ kriyākāraṃ kuruta--na
XXdivyav_u:3479: 079.020. ya upasaṃkrāmati, sa ṣaṣṭikārṣāpaṇo daṇḍya iti/
XXdivyav_u:3484: 079.023. ten khalu samayena kapilavastuno brāhmaṇadārikā bhadraṃkare
XXdivyav_u:3487: 079.024. sā saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ bhagavāñ śākyakulanandanaḥ śākyakulādrājyamapahāya pravrajitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3490: 079.026. tato bhagavatā tasyāścetasā cittamājñāya sopānaṃ nirmitam/
XXdivyav_u:3491: 079.027. tato hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditā pradīpamādāya sopānenāvatīrya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntā/
XXdivyav_u:3492: 079.027. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ purastāt pradīpaṃ sthāpayitvā pādau
XXdivyav_u:3494: 079.028. tato bhagavatā tasyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī catruāryasatyasamprativedhikī pūrvavadyāvaccharaṇagatāmabhiprasannāmiti/
XXdivyav_u:3495: 079.030. atha bhagavāṃstāṃ dārikāmidamavocat--ehi tvaṃ dārike yena
XXdivyav_u:3497: evaṃ ca vada--gṛhapate, tvāmuddiśyāhamihāgataḥ, tvaṃ ca dvāraṃ baddhvā
XXdivyav_u:3500: yadi kathayati--gaṇena kriyākāraḥ kṛta iti, vaktavyah--tava putrasya pañcaśatiko nakulakaḥ kaṭyāṃ baddhastiṣṭhati/
XXdivyav_u:3501: 080.002. sa yadi śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā vyayīkaroti, pūryata eva, na
XXdivyav_u:3503: 080.003. na śaknoṣi ṣaṣṭikārṣāpaṇaṃ dattvā āgantumiti? evaṃ bhadanteti sā
XXdivyav_u:3505: 080.004. yathāparijñātaiva kenacideva meṇḍakasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gatā/
XXdivyav_u:3510: 080.007. yuktametadevamatitheḥ pratipattum yathā tvaṃ pratipanna iti? sa
XXdivyav_u:3511: kathayati--dārike, gaṇena kriyākāraḥ kṛtah--na kenacicchramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ darśanāya upasaṃkramitavyam/
XXdivyav_u:3512: 080.008. ya upasaṃkrāmati, sa gaṇena ṣaṣṭikārṣāpaṇo daṇḍya iti/
XXdivyav_u:3513: 080.009. gṛhapate, bhagavān kathayati--tava putrasya pañcaśatiko nakulakaḥ
XXdivyav_u:3515: 080.010. sa yadi śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā vyayīkaroti, pūryata eva, na
XXdivyav_u:3517: 080.011. na śaknoṣi tvaṃ ṣaṣṭikārṣāpaṇaṃ datvā āgantumiti? sa
XXdivyav_u:3521: 080.012. sa ṣaṣṭikārṣāpaṇān dvāre sthāpayitvā brāhmaṇadārikopadiṣṭena sopānenāvatīrya yena
XXdivyav_u:3522: 080.013. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavataḥ
XXdivyav_u:3524: 080.014. tato bhagavatā meṇḍhakasya gṛhapaterāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ
XXdivyav_u:3525: ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā meṇḍhakena gṛhapatinā yāvacchrotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:3528: bhagavānāha--gṛhapate, tvāmāgamya bhūyasā sarva eva janakāyo lābhīte/
XXdivyav_u:3529: 080.018. tato meṇḍhako gṛhapatirbhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato
XXdivyav_u:3531: 080.019. svagṛhaṃ gatvā nagaramadhye kārṣāpaṇānāṃ rāśiṃ vyavasthāpya
XXdivyav_u:3533: 080.021. yo draṣṭumicchati jinaṃ jitarāgadoṣaṃ nirbandhamapratisamaṃ karuṇāvadātam/
XXdivyav_u:3534: 080.023. so 'niścareṇa hṛdayena suniścitena kṣipraṃ prayātu dhanamasya mayā pradeyam//3//
XXdivyav_u:3537: 080.026. te kathayanti--yadyevam, gaṇenaivaṃ kriyākāraḥ kṛto gaṇa eva udghāṭayatu/
XXdivyav_u:3539: 080.027. tataḥ parasparaṃ saṃghaṭṭanena na śaknuvanti nirgantumiti
XXdivyav_u:3544: 080.030. te gatvā bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purato niṣaṇṇāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3546: 080.031. atha baghavāṃstāṃ parṣadamabhyavagāhya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣadyānekasattvasaṃtānakuśalamūlasamāropikāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān, yām <81>śrutvā kaiścicchrotāpattiphalaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3553: 081.004. tato meṇḍhakena gṛhapatinā śilpina āhūya uktāh--bhagavato
XXdivyav_u:3557: 081.007. tato bhagavān meṇḍhakaṃ gṛhapatiṃ saparivāraṃ satyeṣu
XXdivyav_u:3558: pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ karvaṭanivāsinaṃ janakāyam yathābhavyatayā vinīya prakrāntaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:3564: 082.002. bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta meṇḍhakena meṇḍhakapatnyā meṇḍhakaputreṇa meṇḍhakasnuṣayā meṇḍhakadāsena meṇḍhakadāsyā karma kṛtam yena ṣaḍabhijñātā mahāpuṇyāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ, bhagavato 'ntike satyāni dṛṣṭāni,
XXdivyav_u:3565: bhagavāṃścaibhirārāgito na virāgita iti? bhagavānāha--ebhireva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyambhāvīni/
XXdivyav_u:3567: 082.007. ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau,
XXdivyav_u:3568: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
XXdivyav_u:3570: 082.011. sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//1//
XXdivyav_u:3571: 082.012. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamarataskarogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsampannamakhilamakaṇṭakam/
XXdivyav_u:3573: 082.015. tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ naimittikairdvādaśavarṣikā anāvṛṣṭirvyākṛtā/
XXdivyav_u:3574: 082.016. trividhaṃ durbhikṣaṃ bhaviṣyati--cañcu śvetāsthi śalākāvṛtti ca/
XXdivyav_u:3575: 082.016. tatra cañcu ucyate--samudgake tasmin manuṣyā bījāni prakṣipya anāgate sattvāpekṣayā
XXdivyav_u:3576: 082.017. mṛtā nāma anena te bījakāyaṃ kariṣyantīti/
XXdivyav_u:3578: 082.018. śvetāsthi nāma durbhikṣam--tasmin kāle manuṣyā asthīnyupasaṃhṛtya
XXdivyav_u:3579: tāvat kvāthayanti, yāvat tānyasthīni śvetāni saṃvṛttānīti/
XXdivyav_u:3582: 082.020. śalākāvṛttir nāma--tasmin kāle manuṣyāḥ khalu bilebhyo dhānyaguḍakāni śalākayā ākṛṣya bahudakasthālyāṃ kvāthayitvā pibanti/
XXdivyav_u:3584: 082.022. tato rājñā brahmadattena vārāṇasyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--śṛṇvantu bhavanto vārāṇasīnivāsinaḥ paurāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3587: 082.024. yeṣāṃ vo dvādaśavarṣikaṃ bhaktamasti, taiḥ sthātavyam/
XXdivyav_u:3590: 082.026. tasminśca samaye vārāṇasyāmanyatamo gṛhapatirāḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaparivāraḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3591: 082.027. tena koṣṭhāgārika āhūya uktah--bhoḥ puruṣa, bhaviṣyati me saparivārāṇāṃ me saparivārāṇāṃ dvādaśa varṣāṇi bhaktamiti? sa
XXdivyav_u:3598: 082.030. tatastena gṛhapatinā kośakoṣṭhāgarāṇi śodhayitvā dhānyaprastha upasaṃhṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3600: 082.031. asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
XXdivyav_u:3603: 083.001. sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya vārāṇasīṃ piṇḍāya
XXdivyav_u:3606: 083.002. sa ca pratyekabuddho 'nupūrveṇa piṇḍapātamaṭaṃs tasya gṛhapatir
XXdivyav_u:3609: 083.004. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ saṃlakṣayati--etadapyahaṃ parityajya niyataṃ prāṇairviyokṣye/
XXdivyav_u:3611: 083.005. tena bhāryā abhihitā--bhadre, yo mama pratyaṃśastamahamasmai
XXdivyav_u:3613: 083.006. sa saṃlakṣayati--mama svāmī na paribhuṅkte, kathamahaṃ paribhokṣya iti/
XXdivyav_u:3615: 083.007. evaṃ putreṇa snuṣayā dāsena dāsyā ca vicārya svasvapratyaṃśāḥ parityaktāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3616: 083.008. tatastaiḥ sarvaiḥ saṃbhūya pratyekabuddhaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3617: 083.009. kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanā, na vācikī/
XXdivyav_u:3618: 083.009. sa vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarāja upari vihāyasamudgamya
XXdivyav_u:3621: 083.011. te mūlanikṛttā iva drumāḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3623: 083.012. gṛhapatiḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ, anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yadi riktakāni kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi sahadarśanānme pūrṇāni syuh--evaṃvidhānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ lābhī syām, prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāramārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyamiti/
XXdivyav_u:3624: 083.014. patnī praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhā--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ, anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yadyekasyārthāya
XXdivyav_u:3625: sthālīṃ paceyam, sā śatenāpi paribhujyeta, sahasreṇāpi, na parikṣayaṃ gacchet, yāvanmayā prayogo 'pratipraśrabdhaḥ, ityevaṃvidhānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ
XXdivyav_u:3626: lābhinī syām, prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāramārāgayeyaṃ mā
XXdivyav_u:3628: 083.018. putraḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ, anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena pañcaśatiko nakulakaḥ
XXdivyav_u:3629: kaṭyāmuparibaddhastiṣṭhet, yadi ca śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā tato vyayaṃ kuryāt, pūrṇa eva tiṣṭhet, mā parikṣayaṃ gacchet--evaṃvidhānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ lābhī syām, prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāramārāgayeyaṃ mā
XXdivyav_u:3631: 083.022. snuṣā praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhā--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ, anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yadyekasya gandham
XXdivyav_u:3632: yojayeyam, śataṃ vā gandhaṃ ghrāsyati, taṃ na ca parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuryāvanmayā apratipraśrabdham--evaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ labhinī syām,
XXdivyav_u:3634: 083.025. dāsaḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ, anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yadyekahalasīraṃ
XXdivyav_u:3635: kṛṣeyam, sapta sīrāḥ kṛṣṭāḥ syuh--evaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ ca lābhī syām,
XXdivyav_u:3637: 083.028. dāsī praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhā--evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ, anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yadyekāṃ mātramārabheyam, sapta mātrāḥ saṃpadyeran--evaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ ca labhinī syām, prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāramārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyamiti/
XXdivyav_u:3639: 083.031. sa ca mahātmā pratyekabuddhasteṣāmanukampayā ṛddhyā upari
XXdivyav_u:3643: 084.001. tasya ṛddhyā gacchato rājño brahmadattasyopari cchāyā nipatitā/
XXdivyav_u:3653: 084.006. tato dāsyā dhānyānāmekāṃ mātrāmārabdhā parikarmayitum, sapta mātrāḥ saṃpannāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3656: 084.008. tathaiva putrasya snuṣāyā dāsasya praṇidhiḥ siddhā/
XXdivyav_u:3657: 084.009. tato gṛhapatinā ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritaṃ vārāṇasyām--yo bhavanto
XXdivyav_u:3661: 084.010. kathayati--kimeṣa bhavanta uccaśabdo mahāśabda iti? amātyaiḥ
XXdivyav_u:3663: 084.012. rājā tamāhūya kathayati--yadā eva lokaḥ kālagataḥ, tadā tvayā kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇyuddhāṭitānīti/
XXdivyav_u:3664: 084.013. deva, kasya kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇyuddhāṭitāni? api tu adyaiva me bījamuptamadyaiva phaladāyakamiti/
XXdivyav_u:3665: 084.014. rājā pṛcchati--yathā katham? sa etat prakaraṇaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3667: 084.015. rājā kathayati--gṛhapate, tvayā asau mahātmā piṇḍakena
XXdivyav_u:3672: 084.019. kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau gṛhapatirgṛhapatipatnī gṛhapatiputro gṛhapatisnuṣā gṛhapatidāso gṛhapatidāsī, ayameva meṇḍhako gṛḥpatir meṇḍhakapatnī meṇḍhakaputro meṇḍhakasnuṣā meṇḍhakadāso meṇḍhakadāsī ca/
XXdivyav_u:3673: 084.021. yadebhiḥ pratyekabuddhe kārān kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam, tasya karmaṇo vipākena ṣaḍ mahāpuṇyā jātāḥ, mamāntike dṛṣṭasatyāni/
XXdivyav_u:3674: 084.022. ahaṃ caibhiḥ pratyekabuddhakoṭiśatasahasrebhyaḥ prativiśiṣṭaḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3675: 084.023. iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:3677: 084.025. tasmāttarhi evaṃ śikṣitavyam, yadekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣveva karmasvābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3685: 085.002. ekasmin samaye bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrairdhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhairdevair nāgairasurairyakṣairgauḍaiḥ kinnarairmahoragairiti
XXdivyav_u:3686: devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavāñ jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho vaiśālyāṃ viharati sma markaṭasahasradatīre
XXdivyav_u:3688: 085.006. tena khalu samayena vaiśālikā licchavaya idamevamrūpaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3689: kriyākāramakārṣuh--pañcadaśyāṃ bhavantaḥ pakṣasya aṣṭamyāaṃ caturdaśyāṃ ca prāṇino hantavyā yatkāraṇameyurmanuṣyā māṃsamanveṣanta iti/
XXdivyav_u:3690: 085.008. tena khalu samayena anyatamo goghātako mahāntaṃ vṛṣabhamādāya nagarānniṣkramati praghātayitum/
XXdivyav_u:3691: 085.009. tamenaṃ mahājanakāyaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho māṃsārthī
XXdivyav_u:3692: kathayati--śīghramenaṃ vṛṣaṃ ghātaya, vayaṃ māṃsenārthina iti/
XXdivyav_u:3693: 085.010. sa kathayati--evaṃ kariṣyāmi, kiṃ tu muhūrtamudīkṣadhvamiti/
XXdivyav_u:3694: 085.011. tato vṛṣa īdṛśamanāryaṃ vaco duruktaṃ śrutvā bhītastrastaḥ saṃvignah āhṛṣṭaromakūpa itaścāmutaśca saṃbhrānto nirīkṣate, cintayati
XXdivyav_u:3697: 085.014. bhagavāṃśca pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāviśat/
XXdivyav_u:3698: 085.015. athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtamaśītyānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamamiva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakamam/
XXdivyav_u:3703: 085.019. atha sa vṛṣo bhagavatyavekṣāvān pratibaddhacittah eṣo me śaraṇamiti sahasaiva tāni dṛḍhāni varatrakāṇi bandhanāni cchittvā pradhāvan yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3704: 085.021. upasaṃkramyobhābhyāṃ jānubhyāṃ bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya pādau
XXdivyav_u:3706: 085.022. sa cāsya raudrakarmā goghātakaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddha eva śastravyagrahastaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3708: tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa anena govṛṣabheṇa sārdhaṃ sātmyam/
XXdivyav_u:3711: 085.024. tatkasya hetoh? mayā eṣa bahunā mūlyena krītaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3715: 085.026. atha bhagavāmllaukikacittamutpādayati--aho bata śakro devendrastrīṇi kārṣāpaṇasahasrāṇyādāyāgacchediti/
XXdivyav_u:3718: 085.029. atha bhagavāñ śakraṃ devendramidamavocat--anuprayaccha kauśika asya goghātakasya triguṇaṃ mūlyam/
XXdivyav_u:3721: 085.030. atha goghātakaḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasrayaṃ vṛṣamūlyaṃ gṛhītvā hṛṣṭastuṣṭaḥ pramudito bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā taṃ govṛṣaṃ bandhanānmuktvā prakrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3722: 085.032. śakro devendro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā
XXdivyav_u:3724: 086.001. <86>atha govṛṣo gatapratyāgataprāṇo bhūyasyā mātrayā bhagavatyabhiprasanno bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho bhagavato mukhaṃ vyavalokayamāno 'sthāt/
XXdivyav_u:3726: 086.003. dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3729: 086.006. yā adhastādgacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanamavīcimarbudaṃ nirarbudamaṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3730: huhuvamutpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaparyantān narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu śītībhūtvā nipatanti, ye śītanarakāsteṣūṣṇībhūtvā nipatanti/
XXdivyav_u:3732: 086.009. teṣāmevaṃ bhavati--kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ,
XXdivyav_u:3735: 086.010. teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhavati--na hyeva vayaṃ bhavanta
XXdivyav_u:3737: 086.011. api tvayamapūrvadarśanaḥ sattvaḥ, asyānubhāvenāsmākaṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā
XXdivyav_u:3738: 086.012. te nirmite cittamabhiprasādya tannarakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā
XXdivyav_u:3739: devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhir gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:3740: 086.013. yā upariṣṭādgacchanti, tāścāturmahārājakāyikān devāṃstrāyastriṃśān yāmāṃstuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ
XXdivyav_u:3741: parīttābhānapramāṇābhānābhāsvarān parīttaśubhānapramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnānanabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalānabṛhānatapān sudṛśān sudarśanānakaniṣṭhaparyantān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3748: 086.022. atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantameva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti/
XXdivyav_u:3749: 086.023. tadyadi bhagavānatītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante/
XXdivyav_u:3762: 086.031. atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata
XXdivyav_u:3770: 087.008. tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra
XXdivyav_u:3775: 087.014. yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti dhīrā staṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te
XXdivyav_u:3778: 087.016. nāhetvapratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
XXdivyav_u:3779: 087.017. dṛṣṭaste ānanda ayaṃ govṛṣah? dṛṣṭo bhadanta/
XXdivyav_u:3780: 087.017. eṣa ānanda govṛṣastathāgatasyāntike prasannacittaḥ saptame divase
XXdivyav_u:3793: 087.023. tadanayā saṃtatyā navanavatikalpasahasrāṇi vinipātaṃ na gamiṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:3794: 087.024. tataḥ kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu divyaṃ sukhamanubhūya paścime bhave paścime nikete samucchraye paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe manuṣyatvaṃ pratilabhya rājā bhaviṣyati aśokavarṇo nāma cakravartī caturarṇavāntavijetā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3798: 087.028. pūrṇaṃ cāsya bhaviṣyati sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇā parasainyapramardakānām/
XXdivyav_u:3800: 087.031. so 'pareṇa samayena dānāni datvā cakravartirājyamapahāya keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ...ṣamyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajya pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ sākṣātkariṣyati, aśokavarṇo nāma pratyekabuddho bhaviṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:3802: bhadanta anena govṛṣeṇa karma kṛtam yena tiryagyonāvupapannaḥ, kiṃ karma kṛtam yena divyamānuṣasukhamanubhūya <88>pratyekāṃ bodhimadhigamiṣyati?
XXdivyav_u:3803: bhagavānāha--anenaiva ānanda govṛṣeṇa karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni
XXdivyav_u:3805: 088.003. ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na hyānanda karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau,
XXdivyav_u:3806: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāśubhāni ca/
XXdivyav_u:3808: 088.007. sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//7//
XXdivyav_u:3809: 088.008. bhūtapūrvamānanda atīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksambuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān/
XXdivyav_u:3813: 088.011. sarve ca vītarāgā vigatadveṣā vigatamohā yāvat pañcamātrāṇi dhūrtakaśatāni tena tenāhiṇḍyamānāni taṃ pradeśamanuprāptāni/
XXdivyav_u:3816: 088.013. yadyeṣāṃ jīvitopacchedaṃ na kariṣyāmaḥ, na bhūya etasmin pradeśe svasthairvihartavyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3823: 088.017. sa kathayati--aghātayitvā etān kutaḥ kṣema iti? taiste
XXdivyav_u:3827: 088.019. yadbhūyasā tu narakeṣu tiryagyonau upapannāśca santo nityaṃ śastreṇa praghātitāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3828: 088.020. tatra yo 'sau caurasteṣāṃ samādāpakaḥ, sa evāyaṃ govṛṣaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3829: 088.020. tasya karmaṇo vipākena iyantaṃ kālaṃ na kadācit sugatau upapannaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3830: 088.021. yatpunaridānīṃ mamāntike cittaṃ prasāditam, tasya karmaṇo vipākena divyaṃ mānuṣaṃ sukhamanubhūya pratyekāṃ bodhimadhigamiṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:3831: 088.023. evaṃ hi ānanda tathāgatānāṃ cittaprasādo 'pyacintyavipākaḥ, kiṃ punaḥ praṇidhānam/
XXdivyav_u:3832: 088.024. tasmāttarhi ānanda evaṃ śikṣitavyam yatstokastokaṃ muhūrtamuhūrtamantato 'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātramapi tathāgatamākārataḥ samanusmariṣyāmītyevaṃ te ānanda śikṣitavyam//
XXdivyav_u:3833: 088.026. athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyānandyānumodya bhikṣūṇāṃ purastādgāthā
XXdivyav_u:3836: 088.029. āpanno hi paraṃ kṛcchraṃ govṛṣo yena mocitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3837: 088.030. vyākṛtaśca bhave divye pratyekaśca jino hyasau//9// iti//
XXdivyav_u:3843: 089.002. sa bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrairdhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhairdevair nāgairyakṣairasurairgaruḍaiḥ kinnarairmahoragairiti
XXdivyav_u:3844: devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bagavāñ jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho divyānāṃ mānuṣyāṇāṃ ca bhagavānanupalipto viharati
XXdivyav_u:3846: 089.007. tena khalu samayena rājagṛhe nagare ṣaṭ pūrṇādyāḥ śāstāro 'sarvajñāḥ sarvajñamāninaḥ prativasanti sma/
XXdivyav_u:3848: vairaṭṭīputraḥ, ajitaḥ keśakambalaḥ, kakudaḥ kātyāyanaḥ, nirgrantho
XXdivyav_u:3850: 089.009. atha ṣaṇṇāṃ pūrṇādīnāṃ tīrthyānāṃ kutūhalaśālāyāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:3851: saṃnipatitānām ayam evaṃrūpo 'bhūd antarākathāsamudāhāraḥ -- yatkhalu bhavanto jānīran--yadā śramaṇo gautamo loke 'nutpannaḥ, tadā vayaṃ satkṛtāścābhūvan gurukṛtāśca mānitāśca pūjitāśca rājñāṃ rājamātrāṇāṃ
XXdivyav_u:3852: brāhmaṇānāṃ gṛhapatīnāṃ naigamānāṃ jānapadānāṃ śreṣṭhināṃ sārthavāhānām/
XXdivyav_u:3854: 089.014. yadā tu śramaṇo gautamo loke utpannaḥ, tadā śramaṇo gautamaḥ
XXdivyav_u:3855: satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājñāṃ rājamātrāṇāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ gṛhapatīnāṃ janapadānāṃ dhanināṃ śreṣṭhināṃ sārthavāhānām/
XXdivyav_u:3858: 089.017. asmākaṃ ca lābhasatkāraḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ samucchinnaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3861: 089.018. arhati jñāvādī jñānavādinā sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
XXdivyav_u:3862: 089.019. yadyekaṃ śramaṇo gautamo 'nuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati, vayaṃ dve/
XXdivyav_u:3866: 089.021. ṣoḍaśa śramaṇo gautamaḥ, vayaṃ dvātriṃśaditi yāvacchramaṇo
XXdivyav_u:3867: gautama uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati, vayaṃ taddviguṇaṃ tattriguṇaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3868: 089.023. upārdhaṃ mārgaṃ śramaṇo gautama āgacchatu, vayamapyupārdhaṃ mārgaṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3869: 089.024. tatrāsmākaṃ bhavatu śramaṇena gautamena sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
XXdivyav_u:3870: 089.024. atha mārasya pāpīyasa etadabhavat--asakṛdasakṛnmayā śramaṇasya gautamasya prākrāntam, na ca kadācidavatāro labdhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3872: 089.026. iti viditvā pūraṇavadātmānamabhinirmāya upari vihāyasamabhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kṛtvā maskariṇaṃ gośālīputramāmantrayate--yatkhalu maskariñ jānīyāh--ahaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3873: riddhimāñ jñānavādī, śramaṇo gautamo riddhimāñ jñānavādītyātmānaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3875: 089.029. arhati jñānavādī jñānavādinā sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
XXdivyav_u:3876: 089.030. yadyekaṃ śramaṇo gautama uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3881: 089.032. ṣoḍaśa śramaṇo gautamaḥ, ahaṃ dvātriṃśaditi yāvacchramaṇo
XXdivyav_u:3882: <90>gautama uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati, vayaṃ taddviguṇamuttaraṃ manuṣyadharmaṃ riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3883: 090.002. upārdhaṃ mārgaṃ śramaṇo gautama āgacchatu, ahamapyupārdhaṃ mārgaṃ gamiṣyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:3884: 090.003. tatrāsmākaṃ bhavatu śramaṇena gautamena sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
XXdivyav_u:3885: 090.004. atha mārasya pāpīyasa etadabhavat--asakṛdasakṛnmayā śramaṇasya gautamasya parākrāntam, na ca kadācidavatāro labdhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:3887: 090.005. iti viditvā maskarivadātmānamabhinirmāya upari vihāyasamabhyudgamya jvalanatapanavidyotanavarṣaṇaprātihāryāṇi kṛtvā saṃjayinaṃ vairaṭṭīputramāmantrayate--yatkhalu saṃjayiñ jānīyāh--ahaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3888: riddhimāñ jñānavādī, śramaṇo gautamo riddhimāñ jñānavādītyātmānaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3890: 090.008. arhati jñānavādī jñānavādinā sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
XXdivyav_u:3891: 090.009. yadyekaṃ śramaṇo gautama uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ
XXdivyav_u:3896: 090.011. ṣoḍaśa śramaṇo gautamaḥ, ahaṃ dvātriṃśaditi yāvacchramaṇo gautama uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati, ahaṃ taddviguṇamuttaraṃ manuṣyadharmaprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:3897: 090.013. upārdhaṃ mārgaṃ śramaṇo gautama āgacchatu, ahamapyupārdhaṃ mārgaṃ gamiṣyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:3898: 090.014. tatra me bhavatu śramaṇena gautamena sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme
XXdivyav_u:3902: 090.016. pūraṇādyāḥ ṣaṭ śāstāraḥ sarvajñajñānino yena rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisārastenopasaṃkrāman/

XXdivyav_u:4120: 095.010. kālasya jñātibhirabhihitam--etamāryāḥ kālaṃ rājakumāraṃ satyābhiyācanayā yathāpaurāṇaṃ
XXdivyav_u:4125: 095.014. imāmavasthāṃ mama lokanātho na vetti saṃbādhagatasya kasmāt/
XXdivyav_u:4128: 095.018. tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma--gaccha tvamānanda saṃghāṭimādāya anyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇena yena kālo rājabhrātā tenopasaṃkrāma/
XXdivyav_u:4129: 095.020. upasaṃkramya kālasya rājakumārasya hastapādān yathāsthāne sthāpayitvā evaṃ vada--ye kecit sattvā apadā vā dvipadā vā bahupadā vā arūpiṇo vā rūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñino vā

XXdivyav_u:4132: 095.025. anena satyena satyavākyena tava śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṃ syāt/
XXdivyav_u:4133: 095.025. evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya saṃghāṭīmādāyānyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇena yena rājabhrātā
XXdivyav_u:4135: 095.027. upasaṃkramya kālasya rājakumārasya hastapādān yathāsthāne sthāpayitvā evamāha--ye kecit sattvā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuṣpadā vā bahupadā vā yāvannaivasaṃjñino nāsaṃjñinaḥ, tathāgato 'rhan
XXdivyav_u:4137: 095.029. ye keciddharmāḥ saṃkṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā, virāgo dharmasteṣāmagra ākhyātaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4138: 095.030. ye kecit saṃghā vā gaṇā vā pūgā vā parṣado vā,
XXdivyav_u:4140: 095.031. anena satyena satyavākyena tava śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṃ bhavatu/
XXdivyav_u:4141: 095.032. sahābhidhānāt kālasya rājakumārasya śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṃ saṃvṛttam, <96>yathāpi tatra buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena/

XXdivyav_u:4146: 096.003. yatrāsya śarīraṃ gaṇḍagaṇḍaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya gaṇḍaka ārāmika iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
XXdivyav_u:4147: 096.004. atha rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sa pravāritaḥ/
