XXdivyav_u:4483: 104.008. hārārdhahārabhūṣitagātrā apsareva nandanavanacāriṇī mañcānmañcaṃ pīṭhātpīṭhamanavatarantī adharimāṃ bhūmim/
XXdivyav_u:4484: 104.010. na cāsyāḥ kiṃcidamanojñaśabdaśravaṇam yāvadeva garbhasya paripākāya/
XXdivyav_u:4485: 104.010. sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
XXdivyav_u:4486: 104.011. dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prādādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā/
XXdivyav_u:4487: 104.012. tasyāstrīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātimahaṃ kṛtvā varṇasaṃsthānaviśeṣānurūpaṃ nāmadheyaṃ vyapasthāpitam/
XXdivyav_u:4488: 104.013. sā dhātryaṅkagatā unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā saripimaṇḍenānyaiśca
XXdivyav_u:4490: 104.015. yadā mahatī saṃvṛttā, tadā rūpiṇī yauvanānurūpayā
XXdivyav_u:4491: ācāravihāraceṣṭayā devakanyeva tadgṛhamavabhāsamānā sugṛtsambandhibāndhavānāmantarjanasya ca prītimutpādayati/
XXdivyav_u:4492: 104.016. tasyāstādṛśīṃ vibhūtiṃ śrutvā nānādeśanivāsrājaputrā amātyaputrā gṛhapatiputrā dhaninaḥ śreṣṭhiputrāḥ sārthavāhaputrāśca bhāryārtham yācanakān preṣayanti/
XXdivyav_u:4493: 104.018. yathā yathā cāsau prāthyate, tathā tathā bodho gṛhapatiḥ sutarāṃ prītimutpādayati/
XXdivyav_u:4494: 104.019. saṃlakṣayati--mayā eṣā na kasyacidrūpeṇa deyā, na śilpena,
XXdivyav_u:4495: nāpyādhipatyena, kiṃ tu yo mama kulaśīlena vā dhanena vā sadṛśo bhavati,
XXdivyav_u:4498: 104.021. anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā śrutam yathā śiśumāragirau bodho
XXdivyav_u:4499: gṛhapatistasya duhitā evaṃ rūpayauvanasamuditā, sā nānādeśanivāsināṃ rājāmātyagṛhapatidhanināṃ śreṣṭhisārthavāhaputrāṇāmarthāya prārthyata iti/
XXdivyav_u:4500: 104.023. śrutvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat--ahamapi tāvat tāṃ putrasyārthāya
XXdivyav_u:4502: 104.024. kadācid bodho gṛhapatirdadyāditi viditvā tasyā yācanakāḥ
XXdivyav_u:4504: 104.024. bodhena gṛhapatinā anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateḥ samudācāradhanasampadaṃ ca vicārya
XXdivyav_u:4505: 104.025. anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā mahatā śrīsamudayena putrasya pariṇītā/
XXdivyav_u:4506: 104.026. yāvat punarapi bodhasya gṛhapateḥ patnyā sārdhaṃ krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
XXdivyav_u:4507: 104.027. yameva divasamāpannasattvā saṃvṛttā, tameva divasaṃ bodhasya
XXdivyav_u:4509: 104.028. tena naimittikā āhūya pṛṣṭāh--bhavantaḥ, paśyata kasya prabhāvānmamānarthaśatāni
XXdivyav_u:4510: 104.029. naimittikā vicāryaikamatenāhuh--gṛhapate, ya eṣa tava patnyāḥ
XXdivyav_u:4513: 104.031. iti śrutvā bodho gṛhapatiḥ paraṃ viṣādamāpannaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4518: 105.001. yathā yathāsau garbho vṛddhiṃ gacchati, tathā tathā bodhasya
XXdivyav_u:4520: 105.002. sa saṃlakṣayati--ka etāni śṛṇoti? udyānaṃ gatvā tiṣṭhāmīti
XXdivyav_u:4521: viditvā tena pauruṣeyā uktāh--yadi me kaścinmahānanartha utpadyate, sa śrāvayitavyo nānya ityuktvā udyānaṃ gatvā avasthito yāvadasyāsau patnī
XXdivyav_u:4524: 105.005. anyatamaḥ puruṣastvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ bodhasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ
XXdivyav_u:4527: 105.006. sa saṃlakṣayati--yathāyaṃ tvaritatvaritamāgacchati, nūnaṃ mahānanarthaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4528: 105.007. iti viditvā sasambhramaḥ pṛcchati--bhoḥ puruṣa, kiṃ
XXdivyav_u:4529: tvaritvaritamāgacchasīti? sa kathayati--gṛhapte, diṣṭyā vardhase, putraste jāta iti/
XXdivyav_u:4530: 105.008. sa kathayati--bhoḥ puruṣa, yadyapi me putro 'narhaśatānyutpādya
XXdivyav_u:4532: 105.009. tadanantarameva dvitīyapuruṣastathaiva tvaritatvaritamaśruparyākulekṣaṇo bodhasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4533: 105.010. so 'pi tenānarthatayā sasambhrameṇa pṛṣṭah--bhoḥ puruṣa, kiṃ
XXdivyav_u:4534: tvaritatvaritamāgacchasīti? sa bāṣpoparudhyamānagadgadakaṇṭhaḥ karuṇādīnavilambitākṣaraṃ kathayati--gṛhapate, gṛhe 'gnirutthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4539: 105.014. atha tasya jñātayo lokadharmānuvṛttyā avajñāpūrvakena nāmadheyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:4542: 105.015. apare kathayanti--yena bodhasya gṛhapateḥ kukṣigatenaivānekadhanasamuditaṃ gṛhaṃ nidhanamupanītam, tasya kīdṛśaṃ kulasadṛśaṃ nāma vyavasthāpyate? api tu ayaṃ pitrā jātamātraḥ svāgatavādena samudācaritaḥ, tasmādasya svāgata iti nāma bhavatu iti/
XXdivyav_u:4544: 105.018. yathā yathā svāgato vṛddhimupayāti, tathā tathā bodhasya
XXdivyav_u:4551: paṇyamapaṇyījātam, kecit tatraivānayena vyasanamāpannāḥ, keṣāṃcit kāntāramadhyagatānāṃ caurairdravyamapahṛtam,
XXdivyav_u:4552: keṣāṃcinnagarasamīpamanuprāptānāṃ śaulkikaśaulkikairdravyaṃ vicārayadbhiḥ sāro gṛhītaḥ, keṣāṃcit pattanamanuprāptānāṃ rājñā viniyuktairdoṣamutpādya
XXdivyav_u:4554: 105.026. kecidbodhasya gṛhapateḥ prāṇaviyogaṃ śrutvā tatraiva avasthitāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4555: 105.027. jñātīnāmapi kecit kālagatāḥ, kecinniṣpalāyitāḥ, kecit tatraivāvasthitāḥ svāgatasya vācamapi na prayacchanti/
XXdivyav_u:4557: kecinniṣpalāyitāḥ, kecidanyāśrayeṇa tatraivāvasthitāḥ santaḥ svāgatasya nāmāpi na gṛhṇanti/
XXdivyav_u:4558: 105.030. kiṃ tu bodhasyaikā purāṇavṛddhā dāsī kṛtajñatayā
XXdivyav_u:4564: 106.001. tajjijñāsyāmi tāvat kasyāpuṇyenāyamupaplavaḥ, kiṃ svāgatasya āhosvinmameti/
XXdivyav_u:4565: 106.002. tayā svāgatasya nāṃnā sthālyāṃ taṇḍulān prakṣipya bhaktārtham yojitā vinaṣṭāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4566: 106.003. tata ātmano nāṃnā tathaiva yojitāḥ, śobhanaṃ bhaktaṃ saṃpannam/
XXdivyav_u:4571: 106.006. kṛtaḥ sthāsyāmīti? atra prāptakālaṃ sarvathā yāvat prāṇaviyogo na
XXdivyav_u:4573: 106.007. iti viditvā yattatra kiṃcit sāramasti, tamādāya niṣpalāyitā/
XXdivyav_u:4574: 106.008. tasmiñ śūnye gṛhe śvānaḥ praviśya kalahaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4576: 106.009. sa śvānakalahaṃ śrutvā saṃlakṣayati--bodhasya gṛhapatergṛhe śvānaḥ kaliṃ kurvanti/
XXdivyav_u:4578: 106.010. sa tatra praviṣṭo yāvat paśyati śūnyam/
XXdivyav_u:4580: 106.012. tataḥ svāgato bhojanavelāṃ jñātvā lekhaśālāyāḥ svagṛhamāgato
XXdivyav_u:4588: 106.015. sa teṣāṃ sakāśaṃ gato yāvattatra kaliḥ prādurbhūtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4589: 106.016. te kalahaṃ kṛtvā vyupaśāntāḥ parasparaṃ kathayanti--bhavantaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:4590: pūrvamasmākamanyonyaṃ dṛṣṭvā sneho bhavati, idānīṃ tu dveṣaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4594: 106.019. apare kathayanti--nāyaṃ svāgatāḥ, kiṃ tu durāgataḥ,
XXdivyav_u:4597: 106.021. tasmādapi niṣkāsito yāvat kroḍamallānāṃ madhye praviṣṭaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4598: 106.021. te yatra yatra bhaikṣārthikāḥ praviśanti, tatra nirbhartsyante niṣkāsyante ca/
XXdivyav_u:4601: 106.023. te 'nyonyaṃ pṛcchanti--bhavantaḥ, vayaṃ pūrve yatra yatra gacchāmastataḥ pūrṇahastāḥ pūrṇamallakā āgacchāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4602: 106.024. idānīṃ ko yogo yena vayaṃ riktahastakā riktamallakā nairāśyamāpannā ihāgatā iti? tatraike kathayanti--nūnaṃ ko 'pi mandabhāgyo
XXdivyav_u:4603: 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakā ihāgatā iti/
XXdivyav_u:4607: 106.028. tatra yeṣāṃ madhye svāgataste tathaiva nirbhartsitā niṣkāsitāśca nairāśyamāpannā riktahastā riktamallāśca yathānilayamāgatāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4609: 106.030. ye te riktahastakā riktapātrā āgatāste bhūyo dvidhā bhūtvā praviṣṭāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4610: 106.030. tatra teṣāmapi yeṣāṃ madhye svāgataste tathaiva riktahastā
XXdivyav_u:4612: 106.031. te bhūyo dvidhā bhūtā evam yāvat svāgatakroḍamallakau praviṣṭau riktahastau riktamallakau
XXdivyav_u:4614: 107.001. tataste kroḍamallakāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saṃkalpaṃ kartumārabdhāh--bhavantaḥ, ayaṃ mandabhāgyo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭho yena
XXdivyav_u:4617: 107.003. sa taiḥ prabhūtān prahārān dattvā śirasi ca mallakaṃ bhaṅktvā
XXdivyav_u:4619: 107.004. atrāntare yāvacchrāvasteyo vaṇijo bodhasya gṛhapatervayasyaḥ paṇyamādāya śiśumāragirimanuprāptaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4620: 107.005. tena svāgato mallakena hastagatena pīṭhīṃ gato mukhabimbakena pratyabhijñāta uktaśca--putra tvaṃ bodhagṛhapateḥ putra iti? sa
XXdivyav_u:4621: kathayati--tāta, ahaṃ tasya putro durāgata iti/
XXdivyav_u:4622: 107.006. sa muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīṃ sthitvā aśruparyākulekṣaṇaḥ kathayati--putra,
XXdivyav_u:4623: tau tava mātāpitarau kālagatau? te jñātayah? sa āha--teṣāmapi kecit kālagatāḥ kecidihaiva tiṣṭhanto vācamapi na prayacchanti/
XXdivyav_u:4628: 107.011. ye vaṇikpauruṣeyāḥ paṇyaṃ gṛhītvā dhanārthino deśāntaraṃ
XXdivyav_u:4629: mahāsamudraṃ cāvatīrṇāḥ, tatrāpi keṣāṃcit paṇyamapaṇyībhūtam, kecit tatraivānayena vyasanamāpannāḥ, keṣāṃcit kāntāramadhyagatānāṃ taskairadravyamapahṛtam, keṣāṃcinnagarasamīpamanuprāptānāṃ śaulkikaśaulkikairdravyaṃ vicārayadbhiḥ sāro gṛhītaḥ, keṣāṃcit pattanamanuprāptānāṃ rājño viniyuktairdoṣamutpādya sarvasvamapahṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:4631: 107.015. sa dīrghamuṣṇaṃ ca niśvasya kathayati--putra śrāvastīṃ kiṃ na
XXdivyav_u:4632: gacchasi? tāta, kiṃ tatragatasya bhaviṣyati? putra, tatrānāthapiṇḍado
XXdivyav_u:4633: gṛhapatiḥ, tasya putreṇa tava bhaginī pariṇītā/
XXdivyav_u:4636: 107.018. tena tasya dvau kārṣāpaṇau dattau, uktaśca--putra, ābhyāṃ tāvadātmānaṃ saṃdhāraya, yāvadahaṃ paṇyaṃ visarjayāmi/
XXdivyav_u:4638: 107.019. tena tau kārṣāpaṇau khustavastrānte baddhvā sthāpitau,
XXdivyav_u:4642: 107.021. yāvadasau vaṇik paṇyaṃ visarjayitvā pratipaṇyamādāya svāgataṃ
XXdivyav_u:4645: 107.023. yāvat te sārthakāḥ kaliṃ kartumārabdhāḥ, balīvardā
XXdivyav_u:4650: 107.024. te taṃ khaṭucapeṭādibhistāḍayitvā ardhacandrakāreṇa grīvāyāṃ gṛhītvā niṣkāsitumārabdhāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4653: 107.026. sārthavāhastaṃ kolāhalaśabdaṃ śrutvā nirīkṣitumārabdhaḥ, yāvat paśyati taṃ niṣkāsyamānam/
XXdivyav_u:4654: 107.027. sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, mā enaṃ niṣkāsayata, mamaiṣa vayasyaputro bhavatīti/
XXdivyav_u:4655: 107.028. te kathayanti--sārthavāha, yamāgamya bodhasya gṛhapateranekadhanasamuditaṃ sasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavaṃ gṛhaṃ vinaṣṭam,
XXdivyav_u:4656: kathaṃ tena sārdhaṃ gacchāmah? sarvathā tvaṃ sārthasya svāmī/
XXdivyav_u:4657: 107.029. yadyeṣa gacchati, vayaṃ na gacchāma iti/
XXdivyav_u:4660: 107.031. tvaṃ paścādvāsoddhātikayā gaccha, ahaṃ tavārthe āhāraṃ
XXdivyav_u:4666: 108.001. sa sārthavāhastasyāhāraṃ patrapuṭake baddhvā kiṃcidbhūmau pāṃśunā
XXdivyav_u:4670: 108.003. yaṃ vṛkṣaśākhāsu, sa pakṣibhiḥ śākhāmṛgaiśca bhakṣyate/
XXdivyav_u:4676: 108.006. yāvat tasya bhaginyāḥ santikā preṣyadārikā udakārthinī
XXdivyav_u:4679: 108.007. sā ciraṃ nirīkṣya hīnadīnavadanā kathayati--dāraka, tvaṃ bodhasya gṛhapateḥ śuśumāragirīyakasya putra iti? sa kathayati--evaṃ māṃ bhaginījanaḥ saṃjānīta iti/
XXdivyav_u:4680: 108.009. sā aśruparyākulekṣaṇā bāṣpoparudhyamānakaṇṭhā urasi prahāraṃ dattvā karuṇādīnavilambitākṣaraṃ
XXdivyav_u:4682: 108.011. te jñātayah? sa kathayati--teṣāmapi kecit kālagatāḥ,
XXdivyav_u:4683: kecinniṣpalāyitāḥ, kecit tatraiva tiṣṭhanto vācamapi na prayacchanti/
XXdivyav_u:4688: kiṃcidanyapauruṣeyā gṛhītvā dhanārthino deśāntaraṃ mahāsamudraṃ cāvatīrṇāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4690: kecit tatraivānayena vyasanamāpannāḥ, keṣāṃcit kāntāramadhyagatānāṃ taskarairdravyamapahṛtam, keṣāṃcinnagarasamīpamanuprāptānāṃ śaulkikaśaulkikairdravyaṃ vicārayadbhiḥ sāro gṛhītaḥ, keṣāṃcit pattanamanuprāptānāṃ rājaniyuktairdoṣamutpādya sarvasvamapahṛtam,
XXdivyav_u:4692: 108.019. sā dīrghamuṣṇaṃ ca niśvasya kathayati--ihaiva tiṣṭha yāvatte bhaginyāḥ kathayāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:4694: 108.020. kīdṛśena paṇyeneti? sā kathayati--kuto 'sya paṇyam? daṇḍamasya haste mallakaśceti/
XXdivyav_u:4696: 108.021. kārṣāpaṇāṃśca dattvā uktā ca--sa vaktavyo yadi te bhāgineyo vā bhāgineyikā vā upasaṃkrāmati, tasyaiva kārṣāpaṇān dadyāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4698: 108.023. sā vastrāṇyādāya kārṣāpaṇāṃśca tasya sakāśaṃ gatā
XXdivyav_u:4699: kathayati--imāni te vastrāṇi kārṣāpaṇāśca bhaginyā preṣitāni, kathayati
XXdivyav_u:4700: ca--yadi te bhāgineyo vā bhāgineyikā vā upasaṃkrāmati, tasyaitatkārṣāpaṇān
XXdivyav_u:4710: 108.029. sa ca mārgapariśramakhinnena kṣudhārtena na śakyate kartum/
XXdivyav_u:4714: 108.032. te yadi suptaṃ puruṣaṃ paśyanti, pādena ghaṭṭayanti/
XXdivyav_u:4715: 108.032. sa yadi prativibudhyate<109>, tamevaṃ vadanti--bhoḥ puruṣa, na tvayā śrutam yathā śrāvastyāmudyānamoṣakāḥ puruṣāḥ
XXdivyav_u:4716: pratidinamanvāhiṇḍyante? te yadi suptaṃ puruṣaṃ paśyanti,
XXdivyav_u:4721: 109.003. sa vigatamadyamadaḥ pratibuddho yāvat paśyati tānyevānantakāni(?)
XXdivyav_u:4725: 109.005. tasyāsau dārikā punaḥ preṣitā--dārike gaccha, cirayatyasau, paśya kimarthaṃ nāgacchatīti/
XXdivyav_u:4726: 109.006. sā gatā yāvat paśyati muṣitakaṃ tenaiva veṣeṇāvasthitam/
XXdivyav_u:4727: 109.007. sā tvaritatvaritaṃ gatā tasyāḥ kathayati--ārye, muṣitastenaiva veṣeṇa tiṣṭhatīti/
XXdivyav_u:4728: 109.008. sā saṃlakṣayati--yamāgamya bodhasya gṛhapateranekadhanasamuditaṃ sasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavaṃ gṛhaṃ vinaṣṭam, yadi tamiha praveśayāmi,
XXdivyav_u:4734: 109.011. te yatra yatra bhaikṣārthinaḥ praviśanti, tatra tatra nirbhatsyante ca niṣkāsyante
XXdivyav_u:4737: 109.013. te 'nyonyaṃ pṛcchanti--bhavantaḥ, vayaṃ pūrvam yatra yatra gacchāmastataḥ pūrṇahastāḥ pūrṇamallakā gacchāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4738: 109.014. idānīṃ ko yogo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakā nairāśyamāpannā ihāgatā iti? tatraike kathayanti--nūnaṃ ko 'pi mandabhāgyo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakā ihāgatā iti/
XXdivyav_u:4741: 109.017. tatra yeṣāṃ madhye svāgataḥ, te tathaiva nirbhartsitā
XXdivyav_u:4744: 109.019. ye riktahastā riktamallakā āgatāḥ, te bhūyo dvidhā bhūtvā
XXdivyav_u:4746: 109.020. teṣāmapi yeṣāṃ madhye svāgataḥ, te tathaiva riktahastā
XXdivyav_u:4748: 109.020. te bhūyo dvidhā bhūtā evam yāvat svāgato 'nyaśca kroḍamallakaḥ
XXdivyav_u:4750: 109.021. tau riktahastau riktamallakau āgatau, te tvanye pūrṇahastāḥ
XXdivyav_u:4752: 109.022. te kroḍamallakāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saṃjalpaṃ kartumārabdhāh--bhavantaḥ, ayaṃ mandabhāgyasattvo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakāścāgatāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4754: 109.024. sa taiḥ prabhūtān prahārān dattvā śirasi ca mallakaṃ bhaṅktvā
XXdivyav_u:4758: 109.026. tena dauvārikāṇāmājñā dattā--na tāvat kasyacit kroḍamallakasya
XXdivyav_u:4761: 109.027. kroḍamallakā ye tasya gṛhaṃ pratiśaraṇabhūtāste sarve
XXdivyav_u:4764: 109.029. kathayanti--bhoḥ puruṣa, asmākameva nāṃnā ayaṃ gṛhapatiḥ prajñāyate anāthapiṇḍado
XXdivyav_u:4765: 109.030. tat kimidamiti kṛtvā asmān vidhārayasīti? sa
XXdivyav_u:4766: kathayati--gṛhapatinā ājñādattā--na tāvat kasyacit kroḍamallakasya praveśo dātavyo yāvadbuddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhuktam/
XXdivyav_u:4769: 110.001. taṃ paśyata mā atrāryā durāgata āgato bhavediti/
XXdivyav_u:4770: 110.001. te samanveṣṭitumārabdhā yāvat paśyantyekasmin pradeśe nilīyāvasthitam/
XXdivyav_u:4771: 110.002. tatastaiḥ kolāhalaśabdaḥ kṛtah--ayaṃ bhavantaḥ sa durāgato
XXdivyav_u:4773: 110.003. sa taiḥ prabhūtān prahārān datvā niṣkāsitastīvreṇa ca paryavasthānena śirasi mallakena prahāro dattaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4779: 110.006. yāvadbhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yenānāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4781: rajasāvacūrṇitagātraṃ kṛśamalpasthānaṃ malinajīrṇavāsonivasitaṃ śirasā bhagnena rudhireṇa pragharatā anyaiśca vraṇaiścākīrṇaiḥ,
XXdivyav_u:4785: 110.011. tṛpyata sarvabhavopapattyupakaraṇebhyaḥ, yatra nāma caramabhavikasya sattvasyeyamavasthā/
XXdivyav_u:4793: 110.016. anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastena saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ
XXdivyav_u:4798: 110.020. āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pātraṃ gṛhītumārabdho yāvat paśyati
XXdivyav_u:4803: 110.022. sa kathayati--na mayā bhadanta bhagavataḥ kadācidājñā
XXdivyav_u:4805: 110.023. kiṃ kṛtam? svāgatasya pātraśeṣaṃ na sthāpitamiti/
XXdivyav_u:4806: 110.024. bhagavānāha--na tvayā ānanda mamājñā pratismṛtā, api tu svāgatasyaiva tāni karmāṇi labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayānyoghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyabhāvīni yena tava vismṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:4816: 110.029. bhagavan svāgata ityuktvā anekaiḥ prativacanaṃ dattam/
XXdivyav_u:4818: 110.030. bhagavānāha--gaccha ānanda, gatvā kathaya--yo bodhasya gṛhapateḥ śuśumāragirīyasya putraḥ svāgataḥ, sa āgacchatu iti/
XXdivyav_u:4819: 110.031. āyuṣmatā ānandena gatvoccaiḥ śabdairuktah--yo bodhasya gṛhapateḥ śuśumāragirīyakasya putraḥ svāgataḥ, sa āgacchatu iti/
XXdivyav_u:4824: 111.003. teṣāṃ sarvajña nātho 'si ye hi tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4825: 111.004. teṣāṃ svāgatamāryāṇām ye ca te śāsane ratāḥ//2//
XXdivyav_u:4827: 111.006. śocyaḥ kaṣṭāṃ daśāṃ prāptaḥ śokaśalyasamarpitaḥ//3// iti/
XXdivyav_u:4832: 111.009. sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati--yadyapyahaṃ bhagavatā trailokyaguruṇā daivāt samanvāhṛtaḥ, tadapi stokaḥ pātraśeṣaḥ sthāpitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4834: 111.011. bhagavāṃstasya cetasā cittamājñāya kathayati--vatsa, yadi tvaṃ sumerumātraiḥ piṇḍaiḥ samudrasadṛśena kuṣkiṇā paribhokṣyase,
XXdivyav_u:4835: tathāpyavyayaṃ tanna parikṣayaṃ gamiṣyati, yāvattṛptaḥ paribhuṅkṣva yathāsukhamiti/
XXdivyav_u:4836: 111.013. tena tāvad bhuktam yāvat tṛpta iti/
XXdivyav_u:4839: 111.014. vatsa, yadyevamapaścimaṃ kavalaṃ gṛhāṇa, antardhāsyatyeṣa pātra iti/
XXdivyav_u:4842: 111.016. caramabhavikaḥ sa sattvo bhagavantaṃ pṛṣṭataḥ pṛṣṭataḥ
XXdivyav_u:4844: 111.017. yāvadbhagavān vihāraṃ gatvā purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4845: 111.017. so 'pi bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4848: 111.019. iti viditvā svāgatamāmantrayate--vatsa sbāgata, santi te kārṣāpaṇāh? na santi
XXdivyav_u:4850: 111.020. vastrāntaṃ nirīkṣitumārabdho yāvat paśyati dvau kārṣāpaṇau/
XXdivyav_u:4861: 111.025. nīlotpalairasti kāryaṃ me tathānyair nāpi paṅkajaiḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4865: 111.028. ehyehi yadi dūto 'si tasya śāntātmano muneḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4879: 112.003. sa vṛddhānte sthitvā tāni puṣpāṇi dṛṣṭvā sutarāṃ
XXdivyav_u:4882: 112.005. tatastaṃ bhagavānāha--vatsa, kiṃ na pravrajasīti? sa
XXdivyav_u:4885: 112.006. tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idameva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:4889: 112.011. so 'rhattvaṃ prāpto vimuktisukhapratisaṃvedī tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
XXdivyav_u:4893: 112.015. āgato 'smi purā nātha śrutvā vākyaṃ tavottamam//7//
XXdivyav_u:4896: 112.018. ratnāni pratilebhe hi svargaṃ mokṣaṃ ca kāṅkṣatām/
XXdivyav_u:4897: 112.019. śreṣṭhā kalyāṇamitrāṇāṃ sadā sevā hitaiṣiṇām//9// iti/
XXdivyav_u:4898: 112.020. yadā āyuṣmān svāgataḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitaḥ, tadā sāmantakena śabdo visṛtah--śramaṇena gautamenāsau durāgataḥ kroḍamallakaḥ
XXdivyav_u:4901: 112.021. te 'vadhyāyanti kṣipanti vivādayanti--śramaṇo bhavanto gautama evamāha--sāmantaprāsādikaṃ me śāsanamiti/
XXdivyav_u:4902: 112.023. atra kiṃ sāmantaprāsādikamityasya yatredānīṃ durāgataprabhṛtayo 'pi kroḍamallakāḥ pravrajantīti? atrāntare nāsti kiṃcidbuddhānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:4904: 112.024. bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--sumeruprakhyo mahāśrāvake mahājanakāyaḥ prasādaṃ pravedayate/
XXdivyav_u:4910: 112.027. yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ bhargeṣu cārikāṃ cartum,
XXdivyav_u:4915: 112.029. yo yuṣmākamutsahate bhagavatā sārdhaṃ bhargeṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ
XXdivyav_u:4917: 112.031. atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra āśvasta āśvastaparivāro vinīto vinītaparivāro
XXdivyav_u:4919: <113>prasādikaparivāro vṛṣabha iva gogaṇaparivṛto gaja iva kalabhaparivṛtaḥ siṃha iva daṃṣṭṛgaṇaparivṛto haṃsarāja iva
XXdivyav_u:4920: haṃsagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suparṇīva pakṣigaṇaparivṛto vipra iva śiṣyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suvaidya ivāturagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śūra iva yodhagaṇaparivṛto deśika ivādhvagagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sārthavāha iva vaṇiggaṇaparivṛtaḥ śreṣṭhīva pauragaṇaparivṛtaḥ koṭṭarāja iva mantrigaṇaparivṛtaścakravartīva putrasahasraparivṛtaścandra iva
XXdivyav_u:4921: nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ sūrya iva raśmisahasraparivṛto dhṛtarāṣṭra iva gandharvagaṇaparivṛto virūḍhaka iva kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto virūpakṣa iva nāgagaṇaparivṛto dhanada iva yakṣagaṇaparivṛto vemacitrīvāsuragaṇaparivṛtaḥ śakra iva tridaśagaṇaparivṛto brahmeva brahmakāyikagaṇaparivṛtaḥ stimati iva jalanidhiḥ sajala iva jaladharo vimada iva gajapariḥ sudāntendriyairasaṃkṣobhiteryāpathapracāro dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛto
XXdivyav_u:4922: 'śītyānuvyañjanairvirājitagātro vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtamūrtiḥ sūryasahasrātirekaprabho jaṅgama iva ratnaparvataḥ samantato bhadrako daśabhirbalaiścaturbhir vaiśāradyaistribhirāveṇikaiḥ
XXdivyav_u:4923: smṛtyupasthānairmahākaruṇayā ca samanvāgata ājñātakauṇḍinyabāṣpamahānāmāniruddhaśāriputramaudgalyāyanakāśyapānandaraivataprabhṛtibhirmahāśrāvakaiḥ parivṛto 'nyena ca mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena yena
XXdivyav_u:4927: 113.014. aśrauṣuḥ śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayah--bhagavān bhargeṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carañ śuśumāragirimanuprāptaḥ śuśumāragirau viharati bhīṣaṇikāvane mṛgadāva iti/
XXdivyav_u:4928: 113.016. śrutvā ca punaḥ saṃghāt saṃghaṃ pūgātpūgaṃ saṃgamya śuśumāragirer niṣkramya yena
XXdivyav_u:4929: 113.017. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4930: 113.018. śuśumāragirīyakān brāhamaṇagṛhapatīn dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
XXdivyav_u:4931: 113.019. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣya
XXdivyav_u:4933: utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocan--adhivāsayatvasmākaṃ bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena/
XXdivyav_u:4937: bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato
XXdivyav_u:4939: 113.025. atha śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayastāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyamevotthāya āsanakāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayanti--samayo
XXdivyav_u:4940: bhadanta, sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
XXdivyav_u:4941: 113.028. atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena śuśumāragirīyakānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ bhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4944: buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastena saṃtarpayanti
XXdivyav_u:4946: svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya/
XXdivyav_u:4947: 114.002. atha bhagavāñ śuśumāragirīyakān brāhmaṇagṛhapatīn dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
XXdivyav_u:4948: 114.004. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya
XXdivyav_u:4951: bhagavantamidamavocat--bhagavatā bhadanta nānādeśeṣu nānādhiṣṭhāneṣu te te duṣṭanāgā duṣṭayakṣāśca
XXdivyav_u:4952: 114.006. ayaṃ bhadanta aśvatīrthiko nāgo 'smākamavairāṇāṃ vairī asapatnānāṃ sapatno 'drugdhānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:4958: 114.010. atha bhagavāñ śuśumāragirīyakānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsya utthāyāsanāt
XXdivyav_u:4959: 114.011. atha bhagavān vihāraṃ gatvā purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta
XXdivyav_u:4962: bhikṣūṇāmevamārocaya, śalākāṃ cāraya--yo yuṣmākamutsahate aśvatīrthikaṃ nāgaṃ vinetum, sa śalākāṃ gṛhṇātu iti/
XXdivyav_u:4963: 114.014. evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣusaṃghasyārocayitvā buddhapramukhe bhikṣusaṃghe śalākāṃ cārayitumārabdhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4965: 114.015. sthavirā bhikṣavaḥ samanvāhartuṃ saṃvṛttāh--kimarthaṃ bhagavatā śalākā na gṛhītā iti? paśyantyāyuṣmataḥ svāgatasya guṇodbhāvanāṃ
XXdivyav_u:4968: 114.017. āyuṣmān svāgataḥ samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttah--kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavatā śalākā na gṛhītā sthavirasthaviraiśca bhikṣubhiriti? paśyati mama guṇodbhāvanāṃ kartukāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4970: 114.019. tenārdhāsanaṃ muktvā gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya śalākā gṛhītā/
XXdivyav_u:4972: 114.021. pṛcchati buddho bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandam--katareṇānanda bhikṣuṇā śalākā gṛhīteti? sa kathayati--svāgatena bhadanteti/
XXdivyav_u:4975: 114.023. evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yenāyuṣmān svāgatastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4979: 114.026. api tu yādṛśo 'śvatīrthiko nāgaḥ, īdṛśānāṃ nāgānāmikṣuveṇunaḍavadyadi pūrṇo jambudvīpaḥ syāt, tathāpi me te romāpi neñjayituṃ samarthāḥ syuḥ, prāgevāśvatīrthiko nāgaḥ kāyendriyasyoparodhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:4982: 114.029. athāyuṣmān svāgatastasyā eva rātreratyayātpūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śuśumāragiriṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
XXdivyav_u:4983: 114.030. śuśumāragiriṃ piṇḍāya caritvā yenāśvatīrthikasya nāgasya bhavanaṃ
XXdivyav_u:4986: 114.031. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kimanene śramaṇakena mama mṛtipravṛttir yena me bhavanamāgacchatīti? punaḥ
XXdivyav_u:4988: 115.001. athāyuṣmān svāgatastasya hradaṃ gatvā pātracīvaramekāntamupasaṃkṣipya pādau prakṣālya hastau nirmādya pānīyaṃ parisrāvya jīrṇaparṇakāni samudānīya niṣadya bhaktakṛtyaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:4993: 115.004. tena pātraṃ pakṣālya tatpātrodakaṃ tasmin hrade prakṣiptam/
XXdivyav_u:4996: bhuñjāno 'pyupekṣitaḥ, anena mama bhavane ucchiṣṭodakaṃ choritam/
XXdivyav_u:5004: 115.010. tadapi divyāni puṣpāṇi māndārakāṇi bhūtvā kāye nipatitumārabdham/
XXdivyav_u:5012: 115.015. iti tatrāśvatīrthikasya nāgasya krodhasyānubhāvenāyuṣmataḥ svāgatasya ṛddhyanubhāvena mahānavabhāsaḥ prādurbhūto yaṃ dṛṣṭvā śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ saṃbhrāntāh itaścāmutaśca nirīkṣitumārabdhāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5017: 115.019. tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāmabhīkṣṇaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpadyamānānām yaduta
XXdivyav_u:5022: 115.022. aśvatīrthako nāgo yām yāṃ diśaṃ gacchati, tāṃ tāṃ diśamādīptāṃ
XXdivyav_u:5025: sarvamaśāntaṃ paśyati nānyatrāyuṣmata eva svāgatasya samīpaṃ śāntaṃ
XXdivyav_u:5030: 115.026. kiṃ māṃ viheṭhayasīti? sa kathayati--jarādharmā nāhaṃ tvāṃ viheṭhayāmi, api tu tvameva māṃ viheṭhayasi/
XXdivyav_u:5031: 115.027. yadi mayā evaṃvidhā guṇagaṇā nādhigatā abhaviṣyan, adyāhaṃ tvayā nāmāvaśeṣaḥ kṛto
XXdivyav_u:5032: 115.028. sa kathayati--bhadanta svāgata, ājñāpayatu, kiṃ mayā karaṇīyam?
XXdivyav_u:5034: 115.030. sa kathayati--bhadanta svāgata, śobhanam, evaṃ karomīti/
XXdivyav_u:5037: 115.031. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5043: 116.002. sa tvametarhi hataprahataniviṣṭaḥ paraprāṇaharaḥ paraprāṇoparodhena jīvikāṃ kalpayasi/
XXdivyav_u:5044: 116.003. itaścyutasya te kā gatirbhaviṣyati, kā upapattiḥ, ko
XXdivyav_u:5046: 116.004. sa kathayati--bhagavan, ājñāpaya, kiṃ mayā karaṇīyamiti/
XXdivyav_u:5049: 116.006. sa kathayati--eṣo 'haṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi, śikṣāpadāni ca gṛhṇāmi, adyāgreṇa ca śuśumāragirīyakānāṃ ca
XXdivyav_u:5051: 116.008. atha śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ prabhūtamabhisāraṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5052: 116.009. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5055: bhagavānāha--na mayā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo 'śvatīrthako nāgo vinītaḥ, api tu svāgatena bhikṣuṇā/
XXdivyav_u:5056: 116.012. katamena bhadanta? ihanivāsinaiva bodhasya gṛhapateḥ putreṇa/
XXdivyav_u:5062: utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocan--adhivāsayatvasmākaṃ bhagavān bhadantasvāgatamāgamya bhaktaṃ saptāhena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti/
XXdivyav_u:5066: bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt
XXdivyav_u:5067: 116.020. śuśumāragirau anyatamo brāhmaṇa ahituṇḍiko bodhasya gṛhapatervayasyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5069: 116.021. sa rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena hastimadhyasyopari viśvāsikaḥ
XXdivyav_u:5072: 116.022. tena śrutam yathā svāgatena bhikṣuṇā bodhasya gṛhapateḥ putreṇāśvatīrthiko nāgo vinīta
XXdivyav_u:5074: 116.024. upasaṃkramyāyuṣmataḥ svāgatasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte
XXdivyav_u:5076: 116.025. sa brāhmaṇa āyuṣmantaṃ svāgatamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me āryasvāgata śvo 'ntargṛhe
XXdivyav_u:5077: 116.026. āyuṣmāan svāgataḥ kathayati--brāhmaṇa, māmāgamya śuśumāragirīyakairbrāhmaṇagṛhapatibhirbuddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhaktena
XXdivyav_u:5080: 116.028. brāhmaṇaḥ kathayati--ārya, yadi sāmprataṃ nādhivāsayasi, yadā śrāvastīgato bhavasi, tadā mama gṛhe tatprathamataḥ piṇḍapātaḥ paribhoktavya iti/
XXdivyav_u:5083: 116.030. atha bhagavān yathābhiramyaṃ śuśumāragirau vihṛtya yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5087: janapadacārikām<117> carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ, ihaiva viharatyasmākamevārāma iti/
XXdivyav_u:5088: 117.001. śrutvā ca punaḥ śrāvastyā niṣkramya yena
XXdivyav_u:5090: 117.002. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5091: 117.003. ekāntaniṣaṇṇamanāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
XXdivyav_u:5092: 117.004. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya
XXdivyav_u:5094: 117.005. anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirutthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti/
XXdivyav_u:5096: 117.008. athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirbhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā
XXdivyav_u:5098: 117.010. aśrauṣīt sa brāhmaṇo bhagavān bhargeṣu janapadacārikāṃ
XXdivyav_u:5103: 117.013. atha sa brāhmaṇa āyuṣmantaḥ svāgatasya tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ
XXdivyav_u:5105: 117.014. athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati--samayo bhadanta,
XXdivyav_u:5106: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
XXdivyav_u:5107: 117.017. atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yenānāthapiṇḍadasya niveśanaṃ
XXdivyav_u:5109: 117.018. tenāpi brāhmaṇenāyuṣmataḥ svāgatasya praṇīta āhāraḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5110: 117.019. āyuṣmānapi svāgataḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya yena tasya brāhmaṇasya niveśanaṃ
XXdivyav_u:5112: 117.021. ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān svāgatastena brāhmaṇena praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5113: 117.021. sa brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--āryeṇa svāgatena praṇīta āhāraḥ
XXdivyav_u:5115: 117.023. iti viditvā āyuṣmantaṃ svāgatamidamavocat--ārya, praṇītaste āhāraḥ paribhuktaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5123: 117.026. tato dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ śrāvastīvīthīṃ kiliñjacchannām/
XXdivyav_u:5124: 117.027. sa tāmatikrānta ātapena spṛṣṭo madyakṣiptaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nipatitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5126: 117.028. bhagavatā suparṇikā kuṭir nirmitā--maitaṃ kaścid dṛṣṭvā śāsane
XXdivyav_u:5128: 117.029. anāthapiṇḍadaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena svahastena saṃtarpayati
XXdivyav_u:5130: 117.030. anekaparyāyeṇa svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya/
XXdivyav_u:5131: 117.032. atha bhagavānanāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ dharmyayā kathayā <118>saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5133: 118.002. atha bhagavāṃstān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--ayaṃ sa bhikṣavaḥ svāgato bhikṣuryenāśvatrīrthiko nāgastāvaccaṇḍo vinītaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5134: 118.003. kimidānīmeṣa śakto durbhuktasyāpi viṣamapanetum? no bhadanta iti/
XXdivyav_u:5136: 118.004. tasmānna bhikṣuṇā madyaṃ pātavyaṃ dātavyaṃ vā/
XXdivyav_u:5140: 118.006. tato bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ svāgatamādāya vihāraṃ gatvā purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5141: 118.007. niṣadya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--māṃ bho bhikṣavaḥ śāstāramuddiśya
XXdivyav_u:5143: 118.009. bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā svāgatena karma kṛtam yenāḍhye kule mahādhane mahābhoge jātah? kiṃ karma kṛtam yena kroḍamallako jātaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:5144: durāgata iti ca saṃjñā saṃvṛttā? kiṃ karma kṛtam yena bhagavataḥ śāsane
XXdivyav_u:5145: pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam, tejodhātuṃ samāpadyamānānāṃ cāgratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭah? bhagavānāha--svāgatenaiva bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni
XXdivyav_u:5148: 118.015. ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau,
XXdivyav_u:5149: api tu upātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni
XXdivyav_u:5151: 118.019. sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//10//
XXdivyav_u:5156: 118.022. asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
XXdivyav_u:5165: 118.027. tena gṛhapatinā bhūyasā paryavasthitena sa mahātmāa svayameva grīvāyāṃ gṛhītvā niṣkāsitaḥ, uktaśca--kroḍamallakānāṃ madhye prativaseti/
XXdivyav_u:5172: 118.031. sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya
XXdivyav_u:5176: evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye 'pakāraḥ kṛtaḥ, mā asya karmaṇo bhāgī syām/
XXdivyav_u:5177: 119.002. yattūpakāraḥ kṛtaḥ, anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam, evaṃvidhānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ lābhī syām,
XXdivyav_u:5179: 119.005. bhagavānāha--kiṃ kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau gṛhapatireva,
XXdivyav_u:5180: asau svāgato bhikṣustena kālena tena samayena/
XXdivyav_u:5181: 119.006. yadanena pratyekabuddhe kārāḥ kṛtāḥ, tenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge
XXdivyav_u:5183: 119.007. yadapakāraḥ kṛtaḥ, tena pañcajanmaśatāni kroḍamallako jātaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5185: 119.008. yatpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtam, tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:5188: 119.010. bhūyo 'pi kāśyape bhagavati samyaksambuddhe pravrajito babhūva/
XXdivyav_u:5189: 119.011. yasya bhikṣorantike pravrajitaḥ, sa bhagavatā kāśyapena
XXdivyav_u:5191: 119.012. tatrānena yāvadāyurbrahmacaryaṃ cāritam, na ca kaścidguṇagaṇo
XXdivyav_u:5193: 119.013. sa maraṇasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā bhagavati kāśyape samyaksambuddhe 'nuttare dakṣiṇīye yādavāyurbrahmacaryaṃ caritam,
XXdivyav_u:5194: na ca kaścidguṇaguṇo 'dhigataḥ, anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksambuddhenottaro māṇavo vyākṛtah--bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddha iti,
XXdivyav_u:5196: 119.017. yathā mām upādhyāyo bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksambuddhenābhīkṣṇaṃ
XXdivyav_u:5197: tejodhātuṃ samāpadyamānānāmagro nirdiṣṭaḥ, evaṃ māmapi sa bhagavāñ śākyamuniḥ śākyādhirājo 'bhīkṣṇaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpadyamānānāmagraṃ nirdiśediti/
XXdivyav_u:5200: 119.020. iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:5202: 119.022. tasmāttarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmaṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXdivyav_u:5210: 120.002. dharmatā khalu cyavanadharmaṇo devaputraysa pañca pūrvanimittāni
XXdivyav_u:5211: prādurbhavanti--akliṣṭāni vāsāṃsi kliśyanti, amlānāni mālyāni mlāyanti,
XXdivyav_u:5212: daurgandhaṃ kāyena niṣkrāmati, ubhābhyāṃ kakṣābhyāṃ svedaḥ prādurbhavanti,
XXdivyav_u:5213: cyavanadharmā devaputraḥ sva āsane dhṛtiṃ na labhate/
XXdivyav_u:5215: saṃparivartyaivaṃ cāha--hā mandākinī, hā puṣkariṇī, hā vāpī, hā
XXdivyav_u:5216: caitraratha, hā pāruṣyaka, hā nandanavana, hā miśrakāvana, hā pāriyātraka,
XXdivyav_u:5217: hā puṇḍukambalaśilā, hā devasabhā, hā sudarśana, iti karuṇakaruṇaṃ paridevate sma/
XXdivyav_u:5221: 120.009. upasaṃkramya taṃ devaputramidamavocat--hā kasmāt tvaṃ mārṣa
XXdivyav_u:5223: mandākinī, hā puṣkiriṇī, hā vāpī, hā caitraratha, hā pāruṣyaka, hā
XXdivyav_u:5224: nandanavana, hā miśrakāvana, hā pāriyātraka, hā pāṇḍukambalaśilā, hā
XXdivyav_u:5225: devasabhā, hā sudarśana iti karuṇakaruṇaṃ paridevase? evamukte devaputraḥ śakraṃ devānāmindramidamavocat--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika divyaṃ sukhamanubhūya
XXdivyav_u:5226: itaḥ saptame divase rājagṛhe nagare sūkaryāḥ kukṣau upapatsyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:5227: 120.014. tatra mayā bahūni varṣāṇyuccāraprasrāvaḥ paribhoktavya iti/
XXdivyav_u:5228: 120.014. atha śakro devānāmindraḥ kāruṇyatayā taṃ devaputramidamavocat--ehi tvaṃ mārṣa, buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccha
XXdivyav_u:5229: dvipadānāmagryam, dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccha virāgāṇāmagryam, saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccha gaṇānāmagryamiti/
XXdivyav_u:5231: maraṇabhayabhītaśca śakraṃ devānāmindramidamavocat--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dvipadānāmagryam, dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi
XXdivyav_u:5233: 120.019. atha sa devaputrastriśaraṇaparigṛhīto bhūtvā cyutaḥ kālagatastuṣite devanikāye
XXdivyav_u:5234: 120.021. dharmatā khalu adhastāddevānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate nordhvam/
XXdivyav_u:5236: devaputraḥ sūkarikāyāḥ kukṣau upapanno na veti/
XXdivyav_u:5244: 120.025. atha śakro devānāmindraḥ kutūhalajāto yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5245: 120.026. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5247: bhadanta adrākṣamanyatamaṃ devaputraṃ cyavanadharmāṇaṃ pṛthivyāmāvartamānaṃ karuṇakaruṇaṃ ca paridevamānam--hā mandākini, hā
XXdivyav_u:5248: puṣkiriṇi, hā vāpi, hā caitraratha, hā pāruṣyaka, hā nandanavana, hā
XXdivyav_u:5249: miśrakāvana, hā pāriyātraka, hā pāṇḍukambalāśilā, hā devasabhā, hā sudarśana iti/
XXdivyav_u:5250: 120.029. tamenamevaṃ vadāmi--kasmāt tvaṃ mārṣa atyarthaṃ śocasi paridevase krandasi urasi tāḍayasi saṃmohāpadyasa iti? sa evamāha--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika divyaṃ sukhamapahāya itaḥ saptame divase rājagṛhe nagare sūkarikāyāḥ
XXdivyav_u:5254: 121.001. tamenamevaṃ vadāmi--ehi tvaṃ mārṣa buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccha dvipadānāmagryam, dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccha virāgāṇāmagryam, saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccha gaṇānāmagryamiti/
XXdivyav_u:5255: 121.003. sa evamāha--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi
XXdivyav_u:5256: dvipadānāmagryam, dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi virāgāṇāmagryam, saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi gaṇānāmagryam/
XXdivyav_u:5258: 121.005. kutrāsau bhadanta devaputra upapannah? bhagavānāha--tuṣitā nāma kauśika devāḥ sarvakāmasamṛddhayaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5260: 121.006. atha śakro devānāmindra āttamānāstasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāṃ gāthāṃ
XXdivyav_u:5262: 121.008. ye buddhaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
XXdivyav_u:5264: 121.010. ye dharmaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
XXdivyav_u:5266: 121.012. ye saṃghaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
XXdivyav_u:5270: 121.016. ye buddhaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
XXdivyav_u:5272: 121.018. ye dharmaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
XXdivyav_u:5274: 121.020. ye saṃghaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
XXdivyav_u:5276: 121.022. atha śakro devānāmindro bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya prāñjalikṛtasampuṭo bhagavantaṃ namasyamānastatraivāntarhitaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:5283: 122.002. dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jīvatāṃ dhriyamāṇānām
XXdivyav_u:5285: 122.002. yadā buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratisamlīnā bhavanti, tadā bhikṣavaḥ keśanakhastūpe pujāṃ kṛtvā kecit puṇḍāya praviśanti,
XXdivyav_u:5287: 122.005. tena khalu samayena buddho bhagavāṃs tathāgatamākārataḥ
XXdivyav_u:5289: samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārithaḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavāniti/
XXdivyav_u:5290: 122.009. atha bhagavān sāyāhṇe pratisamlayanādvyutthāya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5291: 122.010. adrākṣīdbhagavāṃstaṃ bhikṣuṃ keśanakhastūpe sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya cittamabhiprasādayantam/
XXdivyav_u:5292: 122.011. dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--paśyata yūyaṃ bhikṣava etaṃ bhikṣuṃ keśanakhastūpe sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya cittamabhiprasādayantam? evaṃ bhadanta/
XXdivyav_u:5294: yāvat kāñcanacakramityatrāntarā yāvatyo vālukāstāvantyanena bhikṣuṇā cakravartirājyasahasrāṇi
XXdivyav_u:5295: 122.014. atha teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāmetadabhavat--puruṣamātrāyām yāvadgartāyāṃ na śakyate vālukā gaṇayitum, kṛtaḥ punaraśītiyojanasahasrāṇi yāvat
XXdivyav_u:5298: 122.016. atha te bhikṣavo na bhūyaḥ keśanakhastūpe kārāṃ kartumārabdhāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5299: 122.017. atha bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ cetasā cittamājñāya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--anavarāgro bhikṣavaḥ saṃsāro 'vidyānīvaraṇānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:5300: sattvānāṃ tuṣṇāsamyojanānāṃ tṛṣṇārgalabaddhānāṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ saṃdhāvatāṃ saṃsaratām/
XXdivyav_u:5302: 122.020. āyuṣmānupālī buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papraccha--yaduktaṃ bhagavatā asya bhikṣoriyatpuṇyaskandha iti, kutra bhadanta iyatpuṇyaskandhastanutvaṃ
XXdivyav_u:5303: parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gamiṣyati? nāhamupālinn ito bahiḥ samanupaśyāmyeva kṣatiṃ copahatiṃ ca yathā sabrahmacārī sabrahmacāriṇo 'ntike/
XXdivyav_u:5304: 122.023. tatropālinn imāni mahānti kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ
XXdivyav_u:5306: 122.023. tasmāttarhi te upālinn evaṃ śikṣitavyam, yaddagdhasthūṇāyā api cittaṃ na pradūṣayiṣyāmaḥ, prāgeva savijñānake kāye//
XXdivyav_u:5314: 123.002. tena khalu samayena anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhaptinā dvau śukaśāvakau
XXdivyav_u:5316: 123.003. tena niveśanaṃ nītvā ālāpitau poṣitau saṃvardhitau mānuṣālāpaṃ ca śikṣāpitau/

XXdivyav_u:5548: 129.006. etarhi bhikṣavo dharmā dṛṣṭadharmahitāya saṃvartante dṛṣṭadharmasukhāya, saṃparāyahitāya saṃparāyasukhāya, ye bhikṣubhirudgṛhya paryavāpay tathā tathā dhārayitavyā grāhayitavyā vācayitavyā
XXdivyav_u:5549: yathaitadbrahmacaryaṃ cirasthitikaṃ syādbahujanyaṃ pṛthubhūtam yāvaddevamanuṣyebhyaḥ samyaksamprakāśitam/
XXdivyav_u:5550: 129.009. yaduta catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra
XXdivyav_u:5551: ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāni, āryāṣṭāṅgo
XXdivyav_u:5553: 129.011. ime te bhikṣavo dharmā dṛṣṭadharmahitāya saṃvartante
XXdivyav_u:5554: dṛṣṭadharmasukhāya, saṃparāyahitāya saṃparāyasukhāya, bhikṣubhirudgṛhya paryavāpya tathā tathā dhārayitavyā grāhayitavyā vācayitavyā yathaitadbrahmacaryaṃ cirasthitikaṃ syādbahujanyaṃ pṛthubhūtam yāvaddevamanuṣyebhyaḥ samyaksamprakāśitam/
XXdivyav_u:5557: 129.014. bhagavān vaiśālīvanamabhisaran dakṣiṇena sarvakāyena nāgāvalokitena vyavalokayati/
XXdivyav_u:5558: 129.015. athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--nāhetvapratyayaṃ bhadanta tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhā dakṣiṇena nāgāvalokitamavalokayanti/
XXdivyav_u:5559: 129.017. ko bhadanta hetuḥ, kaḥ pratyayo nāgāvalokitasya? evametadānanda,
XXdivyav_u:5561: 129.018. nāhetvapratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhā dakṣiṇena sarvakāyena nāgāvalokitena
XXdivyav_u:5569: 129.024. yadā ha bhagavatā vāg bhāṣitā idamapaścimakaṃ vaiśālyā darśanam,
XXdivyav_u:5573: 129.027. tā api devatā(?) vaiśālyāṃ śabdo niścāritah--bhagavān
XXdivyav_u:5574: parinirvāṇāya gacchati, na bhūyo bhagavān vaiśālīmāgamiṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:5575: 129.029. devatānāṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā anekāni vaiśālikāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi
XXdivyav_u:5577: 129.030. bhagavatā teṣāmāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā evaṃvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yathā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ
XXdivyav_u:5586: 130.002. yadbhūyasā sā parṣadbuddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
XXdivyav_u:5589: 130.004. bhagavatā parinirvāṇāya prasthitenānekāni devatāśatasahasrāṇi satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni/
XXdivyav_u:5600: 130.010. atra ānanda kimāścaryaṃ mayā etarhi sarvajñena
XXdivyav_u:5603: jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsadharmeṇa yanmayā maraṇāntikayā vedanayā spṛṣṭena evaṃvidhā parikarmakathā kṛtā, yadanekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi gṛhāśramamapahāya, ṛṣayaḥ pravrajitvā catvāro
XXdivyav_u:5604: brahmavihārān bhāvayitvā kalpavṛndaṃ prahāya tadbahulavihāriṇo brahmalokasabhāgatāyāmupapannāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5607: 130.017. upoṣadhasya rājño mūrdhni piṭṭako jāto mṛduḥ sumṛduḥ, tadyathā tūlapicurvā karpāsapicurvā/
XXdivyav_u:5610: 130.019. kumāro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5614: 130.020. mūrdhato jāto mūrdhāta iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
XXdivyav_u:5615: 130.021. māṃ dhaya māṃ dhaya māndhāta iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
XXdivyav_u:5617: 130.022. māndhātasya kumārasya kumārakrīḍāyāṃ krīḍataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5626: 130.026. tairamātyaiḥ punaḥ saṃdeśo visarjitah--pitā te kāladharmaṇā samyuktaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5628: 130.027. tato 'sau saṃlakṣayati--yadi mama pitā kālagataḥ, kiṃ bhūyo 'haṃ
XXdivyav_u:5631: 130.028. sa kathayati--yadi mama dharmeṇa rājyaṃ prāpsyate, ihaiva rājyābhiṣeka āgacchatu/
XXdivyav_u:5632: 130.029. tataste amātyaiḥ kathayanti--ratnaśilayā deva prayojanaṃ bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:5633: 130.030. tasya ca divaukaso nāma yakṣaḥ purojavaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5635: 130.031. yadā ratnaśilā ānītā, tataste amātyā bhūyaḥ kathayanti--deva
XXdivyav_u:5640: 131.001. sa kathayati--yadi mama dharmeṇa rājyaṃ prāpsyate,
XXdivyav_u:5646: 131.004. sa kathayati--mama manuṣyāḥ paṭṭaṃ bandhiṣyanti? yadi dharmeṇa rājyaṃ prāpsyate, amanuṣyāḥ paṭṭaṃ bandhantu/
XXdivyav_u:5649: hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnameva saptamam/
XXdivyav_u:5650: 131.007. pūrṇaṃ cāsya sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarupiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
XXdivyav_u:5653: 131.009. tatra vanakhaṇḍe prabhūtāḥ pakṣiṇo mṛgāśca prativasanti/
XXdivyav_u:5655: 131.010. te ca pakṣiṇo 'vatīryamāṇā avatīryamāṇāḥ śabdaṃ kurvanti/
XXdivyav_u:5659: 131.011. yadā teṣām ṛṣikopena pakṣāṇi śīrṇāni, tataste pādoddhārakeṇa prasthitāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5660: 131.012. sa ca rājā janapadānanusaṃsārya paśyati pādoddhārakeṇa gacchataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5661: 131.013. yataste 'mātyāḥ pṛṣṭāh--kasmāt pādoddhārakeṇa gacchanti? paścāt te 'mātyāḥ kathayanti--deva, śabdakaṇṭakāni dhyānānīti eteṣām ṛṣikopena pakṣāṇi śīrṇāni/
XXdivyav_u:5662: 131.014. tato rājñā abhihitam--evaṃvidhā api ṛṣayo bhavanti, yeṣāṃ sattvānāmantike nāstyanukampā? tato rājñā amātyāḥ saṃdiṣṭāh--gacchantu
XXdivyav_u:5663: bhavantaḥ, ṛṣīṇāmevaṃ vadantu--tatra gacchata yatrāhaṃ na vasayā(sā?)mīti/
XXdivyav_u:5671: 131.020. cintayitvā tulayitvopaparīkṣya pṛthak pṛthagutkāḥ śilpasthānakarmasthānāni māpayitum/
XXdivyav_u:5672: 131.021. cintakā ime tulakā upaparīkṣakā iti mantrajā mantrajā iti saṃjñā/
XXdivyav_u:5674: 131.022. yataḥ sa rājā paśyati janapadānanusaṃsāryākṛṣyān karmāntān
XXdivyav_u:5676: 131.023. yato rājñā abhihitam--kimete manuṣyāḥ kurvanti? tatastairamātyai rājā abhihitah--ete deva manuṣyāḥ śāsyādīni kṛṣanti, tato oṣadhayo bhaviṣyanti/
XXdivyav_u:5677: 131.025. yataśca sa rājā kathayati--mama rājye manuṣyāḥ kṛṣiṣyanti?
XXdivyav_u:5683: 131.028. yataste manuṣyāḥ karpāsavātānārabdhā māpayitum, bhūyo 'pi ca rājñā mūrdhātena janapadānanusaṃsārya tena pṛṣṭāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5688: 131.031. tato rājñā tenoktam--mama rājye manuṣyāḥ karpāsavātān
XXdivyav_u:5693: 132.001. kasyaitāni puṇyāni? te kathayanti--devasya cāsmākaṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:5697: 132.004. tato rājñā abhihitam--mama rājye manuṣyāḥ kartiṣyanti? sūtrameva devo varṣatu/
XXdivyav_u:5698: 132.004. sahacittotpādādeva rājño māndhātasya sūtrameva devo vṛṣṭaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5699: 132.005. sa ca rājā kathayati--kasyaitāni puṇyāni? yataste
XXdivyav_u:5704: 132.008. yato rājā saṃlakṣayati--mama rājye manuṣyā vastrāṇi vāpayiṣyante?
XXdivyav_u:5706: 132.009. sahacittotpādādeva rājño māndhātasya vastrāṇyeva devo vṛṣṭaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5707: 132.009. sa rājā kathayati--kasyaitāni puṇyāni? te kathayanti--devasya
XXdivyav_u:5709: 132.010. yataḥ sa rājā saṃlakṣayati--manuṣyā mama puṇyānāṃ prabhāvaṃ na
XXdivyav_u:5712: 132.011. asti me jambudvīpa ṛddhaśca sphītaśca kṣemaśca subhikṣaśca
XXdivyav_u:5714: 132.012. santi me sapta ratnāni, tadyathā cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam/
XXdivyav_u:5715: 132.014. pūrṇaṃ ca me sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
XXdivyav_u:5716: 132.015. aho bata me 'ntaḥpure saptāhaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ patet, ekakārṣāpaṇo
XXdivyav_u:5718: 132.015. sahacittotpādādeva rājño māndhātasyāntaḥpure saptāhaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ vṛṣṭam/
XXdivyav_u:5719: 132.016. ekakārṣāpaṇo 'pi bahir na nipatito yathāpi tanmaharddhikasya sattvasya mahānubhāvasya kṛtapuṇyasya kṛtakuśalasya svakaṃ puṇyaphalaṃ
XXdivyav_u:5721: 132.018. yataḥ sa rājā kathayati--kasyaitāni puṇyāni? te
XXdivyav_u:5723: 132.019. yato rājā sa rājā kathayati--kṣuṇṇā bhavanto yadi yuṣmābhiḥ
XXdivyav_u:5726: 132.020. api tu yo yuṣmākaṃ ratnairarthī, sa yāvadīpsitāni ratnāni
XXdivyav_u:5728: 132.022. tasya tatra mūrdhātasya rājño mahārājyaṃ kārayataḥ ṣaṭ
XXdivyav_u:5731: 132.023. sa rājñā mūrdhātenoktah--asti kiṃcidanyadvīpe nājñāpitam yadvayamājñāpayema? yataḥ paścāddivaukasenābhihitah--asti deva pūrvavideho nāma dvīpaḥ, ṛddhaśca sphītaśca kṣemaśca subhikṣaśca
XXdivyav_u:5734: 132.025. atha rājño mūrdhātasyaitadabhavat--asti me jambudvīpa ṛddhaśca
XXdivyav_u:5736: 132.027. asti me sapta ratnāni tadyathā cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam/
XXdivyav_u:5737: 132.028. pūrṇaṃ ca me sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
XXdivyav_u:5739: 132.029. śrūyate atha khalu pūrvavideho nāma dvīpaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5747: 133.001. bhūyaḥ sa rājā divaukasam yakṣamāmantrayati--asti divaukasaṃ kiṃcidanyadvīpe nājñāpitam? divaukasa āha--asti deva aparagodānīyaṃ nāma
XXdivyav_u:5748: dvīpam ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:5751: 133.004. atha rājño mūrdhātasyaitadabhavat--asti me jambudīpa ṛddhaśca
XXdivyav_u:5754: 133.005. pūrṇaṃ ca me sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
XXdivyav_u:5755: 133.006. vṛṣṭaṃ me saptāhamantaḥpure hiraṇyavarṣam yathāpi tanmaharddhikasya sattvasya mahānubhāvasya kṛtakuśalasya svapuṇyaphalaṃ pratyanubhavataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5756: 133.008. śrūyate aparagodānīyaṃ nāma dvīpam ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:5763: 133.012. yataḥ sa rājā māndhātā divaukasam yakṣaṃ pṛcchati--asti
XXdivyav_u:5766: 133.014. kiṃ cāpi te manuṣyā amamā aparigrahāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5767: 133.014. yannu devo gatvā svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāset/
XXdivyav_u:5768: 133.015. atha rājño māndhātasyaitadabhavat--asti me jambudvīpam ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:5770: 133.016. pūrṇaṃ ca me sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
XXdivyav_u:5774: 133.018. yannvahaṃ tatrāpi gatvā svaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāseyam/
XXdivyav_u:5781: 133.022. ete deva uttarakauravāṇāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ kalpadūṣyavṛkṣāḥ, yata uttarakauravā manuṣyāḥ kalpadūṣyāṇi prāvṛṇvanti/
XXdivyav_u:5783: 133.024. śrutvā ca punā rājā māndhātā amātyānāmantrayate--paśyatha yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaścitropacitrān vṛkṣānāpīḍakajātān? evaṃ deva/
XXdivyav_u:5784: 133.026. ete grāmaṇya uttarakauravāṇāṃ mānuṣyāṇāṃ kalpadūṣyavṛkṣā yata
XXdivyav_u:5789: taṇḍulaphalaśālim yata uttarakauravakā manuṣyā akṛṣṭoptaṃ taṇḍulaphalaśāliṃ paribhuñjanti/
XXdivyav_u:5793: 133.032. samanuśāsti rājā māndhātā uttarakurau dvīpe svakam
XXdivyav_u:5794: 134.001. tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5797: 134.002. śrūyante devāstrāyastriṃśā dīrghāyuṣo varṇavantaḥ sukhabahulā ucceṣu vimāneṣu
XXdivyav_u:5799: 134.004. atha rājño mūrdhātasyaitadabhavat--asti me jambudvīpam, ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:5801: 134.006. pūrṇaṃ ca me sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
XXdivyav_u:5805: 134.008. śrūyante devāstrāyaṃstriśā dīrghāyuṣo varṇavantaḥ sukhabahulā ucceṣu vimāneṣu
XXdivyav_u:5810: 134.012. atha rājā nimiṃdhare parvate pratyaṣṭhāt kāñcanamaye/
XXdivyav_u:5811: 134.012. tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5812: 134.013. nimiṃdharāt parvatāt vinatake parvate pratyaṣṭhāt kāñcanamaye/
XXdivyav_u:5813: 134.013. tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5815: 134.015. tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5816: 134.015. aśvakarṇagirerapi parvatāt sudarśane parvate pratyaṣṭhāt kāñcanamaye/
XXdivyav_u:5817: 134.016. tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5818: 134.017. sudarśanāt parvatāt khadirake parvate pratyaṣṭhāt kāñcanamaye/
XXdivyav_u:5819: 134.017. tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5821: 134.018. tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5823: 134.020. tasya tatra svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5836: kathayati--kenaitadviṣkambhitaṃ bhaṭabalāgram? tenoktam--ṛṣibhirdeva taṃ bhaṭabalāgraṃ viṣkambhitam/
XXdivyav_u:5837: 134.028. paścād rājñā abhihitam--kimeṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ sarvaṃ priyamiti?
XXdivyav_u:5839: 134.029. tato rājñā abhihitam--ṛṣīṇāṃ jaṭāḥ śīryantām, mama ca bhaṭabalāgraṃ vihāyasā gacchatu/
XXdivyav_u:5840: 134.030. teṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ jaṭāḥ śīrṇāḥ, rājñaśca mūrdhātasya bhaṭabalāgraṃ
XXdivyav_u:5842: 134.031. sumeruḥ parvatarājā aśītiyojanasahasrāṇyadhastāt kāñcanamayyāṃ bhūmau pratiṣṭhito
XXdivyav_u:5843: ūrdhvamadhaśca ṣaṣṭiyojanaśatasahasraṃ pārśvaṃ pārśvamaṣītiyojanasahasarāṇi tadbhavati samantaparikṣepeṇa viṃśatyadhikāni trīṇi yojanaśatasahasrāṇi/
XXdivyav_u:5845: 135.003. tasya mūrdhni devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma nagaram/
XXdivyav_u:5847: nāgāḥ, karoṭapāṇayo devāḥ, mālādhārā devāḥ, sadāmattā devāḥ, catvāraśca
XXdivyav_u:5853: 135.007. rājā kathayati--tiryañco mama yudhyanti? tena hyudakaniśritā eva
XXdivyav_u:5857: 135.009. yato nāgaistaiḥ karoṭapāṇibhirdevaiḥ sārdhaṃ miśribhāvaṃ gatvā
XXdivyav_u:5862: 135.012. rājā mūdhātaḥ kathayati--ete 'pyeva me karoṭapāṇayo devāḥ
XXdivyav_u:5865: 135.013. paścāt teṣāṃ nāgaiḥ sārdhaṃ dhāvatāṃ mālādhārā devāḥ saṃprāptāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5872: 135.016. rājā kathayati--mālādhārā devāḥ purojavā me bhavantu/
XXdivyav_u:5873: 135.017. yato mālādhārā devāstair nāgairdevaiśca sārdhaṃ mūrdhātasyāgrataḥ
XXdivyav_u:5876: 135.018. sadāmattairdevaiḥ pṛṣṭāh--kiṃ bhavanto dhāvatah? tair nāgaiḥ karoṭapāṇyādibhiśca devairabhihitāh--eṣa manuṣyarājā āgacchati/
XXdivyav_u:5877: 135.019. yato bhūyaḥ sadāmattairdevaiḥ karoṭapāṇyādibhiśca devair nāgaiḥ
XXdivyav_u:5882: 135.022. rājñā abhihitam--sadāmattā eva me devāḥ purojavā bhavantu/
XXdivyav_u:5883: 135.022. yataḥ sadāmattā devāstaiḥ sārdhaṃ devair nāgaiścāgrataḥ
XXdivyav_u:5886: 135.024. tairuktam--kimetadbhavanto dhāvatah? yato nāgādibhirdevairagrato 'nuyāyibhirabhihitāh--eṣa manuṣyarājā āgacchati/
XXdivyav_u:5899: nīlanīlā vanarājirmegharājirivonnatā? eṣā deva devānāṃ pārijātako nāma kovidāro yatra devāstrāyastriṃśāścaturo vārṣikān māsān divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtās trīḍanti ramante paricārayanti/
XXdivyav_u:5900: 135.032. devo 'pyatra gatvā divyaih <136>pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtas trīḍatu ramatāṃ paricārayatu/
XXdivyav_u:5901: 136.001. śrutvā ca punā rājā mūrdhāto 'mātyānāmantrayate--paśyatha yūyaṃ nīlanīlāṃ vanarājiṃ megharājimivonnatām? evaṃ deva/
XXdivyav_u:5902: 136.003. eṣa devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ pārijātakaḥ kovidāro yatra
XXdivyav_u:5903: devāstrāyastriṃśāścaturo vārṣikān māsān divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti/
XXdivyav_u:5904: 136.005. yūyamapi grāmaṇyo 'tra gatvā divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtāḥ krīḍata ramata paricārayata/
XXdivyav_u:5908: śvetaśvetamabhrakūṭamivonnatam? eṣā deva devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sudharmā nāma devasabhā, yatra devāstrāyastriṃśāścatvāraśca mahārājānaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃnipatitā devānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ cārthaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca cintayanti tulayanti
XXdivyav_u:5911: 136.010. śrutvā ca punaramātyānāmantrayate--paśyatha yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ śvetaśvetamabhrakūṭamivonnatam? evaṃ deva/
XXdivyav_u:5912: 136.011. eṣā trāyastriṃśānāṃ sudharmā nāma devasabhā yatra
XXdivyav_u:5913: devāstrāyastriṃśāścatvāraśca mahārājānaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃnipatitā devānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ cārthaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca cintayanti tulayanti upaparīkṣyanti/
XXdivyav_u:5915: 136.014. devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma nagaramardhatṛtīyāni yojanasahasrāṇyāyāmena ardhatṛtīyāni yojanasahasrāṇi vistareṇa samantataḥ parikṣepeṇa daśayojanasahasrāṇi saptabhiḥ kāñcanamayaiḥ prākāraiḥ parikṣiptam/
XXdivyav_u:5917: 136.016. teṣu prākāreṣu caturvidhāḥ ṣo(kho)ḍakā māpitāḥ suvarṇamayā rūpyamayā vaiḍūryamayā
XXdivyav_u:5919: 136.018. sudarśananagare 'bhyantare bhūmibhāgo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaścitraḥ sucitra ekaikacitradhātuśatena mṛduḥ sumṛdus tadyathā
XXdivyav_u:5922: 136.020. prakṣipte pāde avanamatyutkṣipte pāde unnamati divyairmandāravaiḥ
XXdivyav_u:5926: 136.022. dvāre dvāre pañcaśatāni nīlavāsasām yakṣāṇāṃ sthāpitāni
XXdivyav_u:5927: saṃnaddhāni santi citrakalāpāni yāvadeva devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmārakṣaṇārthamatyarthaṃ śobhanārtham/
XXdivyav_u:5928: 136.024. sudarśanasya nagarasya vīthyah ardhatṛtīyāni yojanasahasrāṇyāyāmena vistareṇa dvādaśa yojanānyabhirūpā darśanīyāḥ
XXdivyav_u:5935: 136.028. tāḥ puṣkiriṇyaḥ pūrṇāḥ śītalena vāriṇā kṣaudrakalpenāmbunā
XXdivyav_u:5937: 136.030. sāmantake vividhāḥ puṣpavṛkṣāḥ phalavṛkṣāḥ sujātāḥ susaṃsthitā
XXdivyav_u:5938: āpīḍakajātāḥ, tadyathā dakṣeṇa mālākāreṇa vā mālākārāntevāsinā vā mālā vā agrasthitāvataṃsakāni vā suracitāni/
XXdivyav_u:5940: 137.001. sudarśane nagare caturvidhāḥ kalpadūṣyavṛkṣā nīlāḥ pītā lohitā
XXdivyav_u:5945: 137.003. yādṛśamākāṅkṣati devo vā devakanyā vā, sahacittotpādāddhaste
XXdivyav_u:5947: 137.004. caturvidhā ābharaṇavṛkṣā hastopagāḥ pādopagā guhyāḥ prakāśitāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5948: 137.005. yādṛśamākāṅkṣati devo vā devakanyā vā, sahacittotpādād haste prādurbhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:5950: 137.006. yādṛśamākāṅkṣati devo vā devakanyā vā, sahacittotpādād haste prādurbhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:5951: 137.007. caturvidhāpi ca sudhā, nīlā pītā lohitā avadātā/
XXdivyav_u:5952: 137.008. yādṛśamākāṅkṣati devo vā devakanyā vā, sahacittotpādād dhaste prādurbhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:5954: 137.009. gṛhāḥ kūṭāgārā harmyāḥ prāsādā svāsanakā avalokanakā
XXdivyav_u:5958: 137.010. yatra trāyastriṃśāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti, svakaṃ puṇyaphalaṃ pratyanubhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:5959: 137.011. devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sudharmā devasabhā trīṇi yojanaśatānyāyāmena trīṇi yojanaśatāni vistareṇa samantaparikṣepeṇa navayojanaśatāni abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sphaṭikamayī, ardhapañcamāni yojanāni tasmānnagarīto 'bhyudgatā/
XXdivyav_u:5960: 137.014. tatra devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmāsanāni prajñaptāni, yatra pṛthak dvātriṃśatīnāmupendrāṇāmāsanāni, trayastriṃśatimaṃ śakrasya devānāmindrasya/
XXdivyav_u:5961: 137.015. teṣāmeva devānāṃ sarvānte mūrdhātasya rājña āsanaṃ prajñaptam/
XXdivyav_u:5964: 137.017. tatra ye puṇyamaheśākhyāḥ sattvā anupūrveṇa praviṣṭāh avaśiṣṭā bahiḥ sthitāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5967: 137.019. atha rājño mūrdhātasyaitadabhavat--aho bata me śakro devānāmindro
XXdivyav_u:5972: 137.021. na khalu rājño mūrdhātasya śakrasya devānāmindrasyaikāsane
XXdivyav_u:5973: niṣaṇṇayoḥ kaścidviśeṣo vā, abhiprāyo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā, yaduta ārohapariṇāhau varṇapuṣkalatā svaraguptyā svaragupteḥ, nānyatra śakrasya devānāmindrasyānimiṣatena/
XXdivyav_u:5974: 137.024. rājño mūrdhātasya deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu tiṣṭhataḥ ṣaṭtriṃśāścakrāścyutāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5975: 137.024. tatra ca teṣāṃ devānāṃ devāsurasaṃgrāmaṃ bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:5976: 137.025. tatra yadyasurāḥ parājayante, paścādasurapuryāṃ dvārāṇi badhnanti/
XXdivyav_u:5981: saṃbhramajātā devāh? trāyastriṃśairuktam--etairasurairasmākaṃ pañca rakṣā bhagnāḥ, yato 'smābhirdvārāṇi baddhāni/
XXdivyav_u:5982: 137.029. yato mūrdhātena rājñā uktam--ātmapuruṣāḥ, ānayantu bhavanto dhanuḥ/
XXdivyav_u:5987: 137.031. taṃ śrutvā asurā kathayanti--kasyaiṣa guṇaśabdah? taiḥ
XXdivyav_u:5992: 138.001. dharmatā ca punareṣāṃ devāsurāṇām yudhyatāṃ rathā vaihāyasena
XXdivyav_u:5994: 138.002. teṣāmanyonyaṃ na kasyacidadhiko vā hīno vā/
XXdivyav_u:5999: 138.004. paścāt te saṃlakṣayanti--puṇyavipākamaheśākhyo 'yaṃ sattvo yasyāsmākamuparivaihāyasaṃ ratho gacchati/
XXdivyav_u:6000: 138.005. jitā bhagnāḥ parājitāḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtā āsurīṃ purīṃ praviṣṭāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6003: 138.007. sa rājā saṃlakṣayati--ahameva devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sakāśādabhyadhikaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6005: asti me sapta ratnāni, asti me sahasraṃ putrāṇām, vṛṣṭaṃ me 'ntaḥpure
XXdivyav_u:6006: saptāhaṃ hiraṇyavarṣam, samanuśiṣṭaṃ me pūrvahideham, samanuśiṣṭaṃ me 'paragodānīyaṃ dvīpam, samanuśiṣṭaṃ me uttarakuruṣu svakaṃ bhaṭabalāgram,
XXdivyav_u:6009: 138.012. aho batāhaṃ śakraṃ devānāmindramasmāt sthānāccyāvayitvā svayameva
XXdivyav_u:6010: devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayeyam/
XXdivyav_u:6011: 138.013. sahacittotpādādrājā mūrdhātastasmāt ṛddhitaḥ paribhraṣṭo jambudvīpeṣu pratyaṣṭhāt/
XXdivyav_u:6014: 138.014. atha rājño mūrdhātasyāmātyagaṇamahāmātyā rājyakartāro mantrasahajīvino yena rājā
XXdivyav_u:6015: 138.016. upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ mūrdhātamidamavocan--bhaviṣyanti khalu devasyātyayāt paścimā janapadāh? paripṛṣṭavantah--rājñā mūrdhātena maraṇasamaye kiṃ vyākṛtam? saced vo grāmṇyo mamātyayāt kaścidupasaṃkramyaivaṃ pṛcchet--kiṃ bhavanto rājñā mūrdhātena maraṇasamaye
XXdivyav_u:6016: vyākṛtam, teṣāmidaṃ syādvacanīyām--rājā bhavanto mūrdhāto ratnaiḥ
XXdivyav_u:6018: 138.019. catasṛbhiśca mānuṣikābhī ṛddhibhiścaturṣu dvīpeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayitvā
XXdivyav_u:6026: 138.028. yaḥ prekṣati duḥkhamitonidānaṃ kāmeṣu jātu sa kathaṃ ramate/
XXdivyav_u:6027: 138.030. loke hi śalyamupādhiṃ viditvā tasyaiva dhīro vinayāya śikṣet//7//
XXdivyav_u:6028: 139.001. <139>yadā ca punastena janakāyena śrutaṃ rājā mūrdhāto glāno maraṇāvasthita iti, tataste 'mātyā janapadāścānekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi rājānaṃ mūrdhātamupasaṃkramya darśanāya/
XXdivyav_u:6029: 139.002. yatastena rājñā tasya janasya tāvadevaṃvidhā dharmadeśanā
XXdivyav_u:6030: kṛtā--kāmeṣvādīnavakathā gṛhāśramapadasyādīnavo bhāṣitaḥ, tathā kāmo jugupsito yathā anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi ṛṣīṇāmantike pravrajya
XXdivyav_u:6031: gṛhāśramapadānyapahāya vanaṃ saṃśritāḥ, ṛṣibhiḥ pravrajitvā catvāri
XXdivyav_u:6032: brahmavihārān bhāvayitvā kāmeṣu kāmacchandaṃ prahāya tadbahulavihāriṇo
XXdivyav_u:6034: 139.006. yāvacca jambudvīpe yāvacca pūrvavidehe dvīpe yāvaccāparagodānīye
XXdivyav_u:6035: dvīpe yāvaccottarakuruṣu yāvacca saptasu kāñcanamayeṣu parvateṣu yāvacca
XXdivyav_u:6037: 139.009. śakrasya bhikṣavo devānāmindrasyāyuṣaḥ prāmāṇam yanmanuṣyāṇāṃ varṣamekaṃ devānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:6038: 139.011ṭena rātriṃdivasena triṃśadrātrakena māsena dvādaśamāsena saṃvatsareṇa divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmāyuṣaḥ pramāṇam/
XXdivyav_u:6039: 139.012. tadbhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā tisro varṣalakṣāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca
XXdivyav_u:6042: evaṃvidhaṃ cittamutpāditam--aho bata me śakro devānāmindro
XXdivyav_u:6043: 'rdhāsanenopanimantrayate, kāśyapo bhikṣustena kālena tena samayena śakro
XXdivyav_u:6045: 139.016. yasmin khalvānanda samaye rājño mūrdhātasyaivaṃvidhaṃ cittamutpannam--yannvahaṃ śakraṃ devānāmindramasmāt sthānāccyāvayitvā
XXdivyav_u:6046: svayameva devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayeyam,
XXdivyav_u:6047: kāśyapaḥ samyaksambuddhastena kālena tena samayena śakro devānāmindro
XXdivyav_u:6049: 139.019. maheśākhye sattve cittaṃ pradūṣitam, tasmādṛddheḥ paribhraṣṭo jambudvīpe pratyaṣṭhāt, kharamābādhaṃ spṛṣṭavān, prāgāḍhāṃ vedanāṃ maraṇāntikīm/
XXdivyav_u:6050: 139.020. yo 'sau rājā mūrdhātaḥ, ahamevānanda tena kālena tena samayena/
XXdivyav_u:6051: 139.021. tatra tāvanmayā ānanda sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohena aparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsadharmeṇa maraṇakālasamaye tāvadevaṃvidhā parikathā kṛtā yadanekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi gṛhāśramamapahāya ṛṣibhyaḥ pravrajitvā kāmeṣu kāmacchandaṃ vyapahāya tadbahulavihāriṇo brahmalokamupapāditāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6053: saṃprasthitena tāvadevaṃvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yadanekāni devatā śatasahasrāṇi satyeṣu
XXdivyav_u:6057: 139.028. anekāni vaiśālikāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi yeṣāṃ kecitsrotāpattiphale vyavasthāpitāḥ, kecit sakṛdāgāmiphale, kecidanāgāmiphale, kaiścit
XXdivyav_u:6062: bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kāni bhadanta karmāṇi kṛtāni rājñā mūrdhātena yeṣāṃ
XXdivyav_u:6063: karmaṇāṃ vipākena sahacittotpādādeva saptāhamantaḥpure hiraṇyavarṣaṃ vṛṣṭam? bhagavānāha--
XXdivyav_u:6065: 'rhaṃl loke utpanno vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān/
XXdivyav_u:6067: 140.006. tatra viṣaye dharmatā--yā aciroḍhā dārikā bhartari pravahaṇakena
XXdivyav_u:6068: pratipradīyate, sā catūratnamayaiḥ puṣpairavakīrya baddhakā svāmine pradīyate/
XXdivyav_u:6070: 140.008. sa ca śreṣṭhidārakaścatūratnamayāni puṣpāṇi pratigṛhya yānamadhiruhya śvaśuragṛhamanuprasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6075: 140.011. yato 'sau prasādīkṛtacetā yānādavatīrya taṃ bhagavantaṃ taiścatūratnamayaiḥ puṣpairavakiriti/
XXdivyav_u:6076: 140.012. tāni sarvābhibhuvā samyaksambuddhenādhiṣṭhitāni tathā yathā śakaṭacakramātrāṇyabhinirvṛttāni/
XXdivyav_u:6079: 140.015. anena dānena mahadgatena buddho bhaveyaṃ sugataḥ svayambhūḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6080: 140.017. tīrṇaśca tārayeyaṃ mahājanaughān atāritā ye pūrvakairjinendraiḥ//8//
XXdivyav_u:6082: 140.021. praṇidhiśca me tatra kṛtā udārā ākāṅkṣatā vā idamagrabodhim//9//
XXdivyav_u:6083: 140.023. tasyaiva karmaṇo vipākato me prāpta hi me bodhiḥ śivā anuttarā/
XXdivyav_u:6084: 140.025. vṛṣṭaṃ ca saptāhahiraṇyavarṣaṃ mūrdhātasya rājño mahābalasya//10//
XXdivyav_u:6085: 140.027. tasyaiva karmaṇo vipākato me nagaramapi sauvarṇakāñcanaṃ babhūva mahāsudarśanasya ramaṇīyā kuśāvatī nāma purī babhūva//
XXdivyav_u:6086: 140.029. bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kīdṛśaṃ bhadanta rājñā mūrdhātena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena caturṣu dvīpeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kāritam,
XXdivyav_u:6090: 141.002. atha sa vipaśyī samyaksabuddho janapadeṣu caryāṃ caramāṇo
XXdivyav_u:6092: 141.003. atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya
XXdivyav_u:6095: 141.004. bhagavantaṃ vipaśyinamasecanakadarśanarūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā adhikaḥ prasāda utpannaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6096: 141.005. prasādajātena tasya mudgānāṃ muṣṭiṃ gṛhītvā pātre prakṣiptā/
XXdivyav_u:6097: 141.006. tato mudgāścatvāraḥ pātre patitāḥ, ekaḥ kaṇṭakamāhatya bhūmau
XXdivyav_u:6099: 141.006. avaśiṣṭaṃ naivaṃ saṃprāptaṃ pātram, asamprāptā eva bhūmau
XXdivyav_u:6102: 141.009. anena dānena mahadgatena buddho bhaveyaṃ sugataḥ svayambhūḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6103: 141.011. tīrṇaśca tārayeyaṃ mahājanaughān na tāritā ye
XXdivyav_u:6104: 141.013. bhagavānāha--yo 'sau otkariko vaṇik, ahameva tena kālena tena
XXdivyav_u:6106: 141.013. yanmayā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya prasādajātena mudgānāṃ muṣṭiḥ pātre pakṣiptā, tasmāccatvāro mudgāḥ pātre patitā avaśiṣṭā bhūmau
XXdivyav_u:6107: patitāḥ, tasya karmaṇo vipākena caturṣu dvīpeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6109: 141.016. yaścāsau mudgaḥ pātrakaṇṭakamāhatya bhūmau patitaḥ, tasya karmaṇo vipākena trāyastriṃśān
XXdivyav_u:6110: 141.017. sacedbhikṣavaḥ sa mudgaḥ pātre patito 'bhaviṣyanna bhūmau,
XXdivyav_u:6111: sthāanametadvidyate yaddeveṣu ca manuṣyeṣu ca rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6113: 141.018. yo 'sau otkariko vaṇik tena kālena tena samayena, sa eṣa rājā
XXdivyav_u:6115: 141.019. yo mūrdhāto rājā, ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena/
XXdivyav_u:6116: 141.020. yasmādevaṃ buddhe bhagavati mahākāruṇike kārāḥ kṛtā atyarthaṃ mahāphalā bhavanti mahānuśaṃśā mahādyutayo mahāvaistārikā iti,
XXdivyav_u:6118: 141.021. kiṃ karaṇīyam? buddhe dharme saṃghe kārāḥ karaṇīyāḥ samyakpraṇidhānāni ca karaṇīyānīti//
XXdivyav_u:6125: 142.003. ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane
XXdivyav_u:6127: 142.004. tena khalu samayena pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni bhāṇḍaṃ samudānīya anupūrveṇa grāmanigamapallīpattanarājadhānīṣu
XXdivyav_u:6130: 142.006. yato vaṇijastaṃ mahāsamudraṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃbhinnamanaso na prasahante
XXdivyav_u:6132: 142.007. paścāttervaṇigbhiḥ karṇadhāra uktah--uddhoṣaya naḥ puruṣo mahāsamudrasya bhūtaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6133: 142.008. yato varṇadhāra uddhoṣayituṃ pravṛttah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ, santyasmin mahāsamudre evaṃvidhāni ratnāni,
XXdivyav_u:6134: tadyathā--maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilā pravālo rajataṃ jātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvartāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6135: 142.010. ya icchati evamrūpai ratnairātmānaṃ samyaksukhena prīṇayituṃ
XXdivyav_u:6137: mitrāmātyajñātisālohitam, kālena ca kālaṃ dakṣiṇīyebhyaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitumūrdhvagāminīṃ saubhāgyakarīṃ sukhavipākāmāyatyāṃ svargasaṃvartanīm, so 'smin mahāsamudre avataratu dhanahetoḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6138: 142.014. evamukte ca punaḥ sarva eva sattvāḥ saṃpattikāmā vipattipratikūlāstaṃ śrutvā tasmin mahāsamudre vyavasitāḥ samavataritum/
XXdivyav_u:6142: 142.016. yato vaṇijaḥ kathayanti--kasyedānīṃ vakṣyāmo vahanāt pratyavatarasveti/
XXdivyav_u:6145: 142.018. tataḥ sa udghoṣayituṃ pravṛttah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ, santyasmin mahāsamudre imāni evamrūpāṇi mahānti mahābhayāni,
XXdivyav_u:6146: tadyathā timibhayaṃ timiṃgilabhayamūrmibhayaṃ kūrmabhayaṃ sthale utsīdanabhayaṃ jale saṃsīdanabhayamantarjalagatānāṃ parvatānāmāghaṭṭanabhayaṃ kālikāvātabhayam/
XXdivyav_u:6148: 142.021. yena cātmano jīvitaparityāgo vyavāsthito mātāpitarau putradāraṃ
XXdivyav_u:6149: dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitaṃ citraṃ ca jambudvīpaṃ parityaktum, sa mahāsamudramavataratu/
XXdivyav_u:6151: 142.023. taṃ śrutvā tathodghuṣya tu tasmādyānapātrādavatīrṇā bahavaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:6154: 142.025. paścād dvau trayo yāvadanupūrveṇa sarve varatrāśchinnāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6155: 142.025. tāsu cchinnāsu tadvahanaṃ mahākarṇadhārasampreritaṃ gagane mahāvātasamprerito megha iva balavadvāyusampreritaṃ kṣiprameva saṃprasthitam/
XXdivyav_u:6158: ratnadvīpe kācamaṇayo ratnasadṛśāḥ, te bhavadbhirupaparīkṣyopaparīkṣya gṛhītavyāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6160: 142.029. tatraiva ca kroñcakumārikā nāma striyo bhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:6161: 142.029. tāḥ puruṣaṃ labdhvā tathopalāṃstāḍayanti, yathā atraivānayena vyasanamāpadyate/
XXdivyav_u:6163: 142.031. tāni yo bhakṣayati, sa sapta rātriṃdivasān suptastiṣṭhati/
XXdivyav_u:6164: 142.031. asminneva ca ratnadvīpe saptāhāt pareṇa amanuṣyā na sahante,
XXdivyav_u:6165: tāvadvidhān viparītān vāyūnutpādayanti yairvahanamapahriyate yathāpi tadakṛtakāryāṇām/
XXdivyav_u:6168: 143.001. prāpya ca taṃ ratnadvīpaṃ prayatnamāsthāya ratnānveṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā anupūrveṇopaparīkṣya ratnānāṃ tadvahanaṃ pūritaṃ tadyathā yavānāṃ vā yavasasyānāṃ vā mudgānāṃ vā bhāṣāṇāṃ vā/
XXdivyav_u:6169: 143.003. vahanaṃ pūryitvā te 'nukūlaṃ jambudvīpābhimukhena vāyunā saṃprasthitāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6170: 143.004. mahāsamudre ca tribhiḥ skandhaiḥ prāṇinaḥ saṃmiśritāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6175: 143.007. tatra ca mahāsamudre tā matsyajātayaḥ parasparānyonyabhakṣaṇaparāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6180: 143.010. sa yasyāṃ velāyāṃ mukhamāvṛṇoti, tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāsamudrāt
XXdivyav_u:6181: pānīyaṃ mahatā vegenākṣiptaṃ mukhadvāram yato dhāvati/
XXdivyav_u:6184: 143.012. tasyaivaṃ carata ātmabhāvācchira evaṃ lakṣyate dūrata eva,
XXdivyav_u:6186: 143.013. akṣīṇi cāsya durata eva saṃlakṣyante nabhasīvādityau/
XXdivyav_u:6189: ādityadvayasyodayanam? teṣāmevaṃ cintayatāṃ tadvahanaṃ tasya mukhadvāram yato vegenopahartumārabdham/
XXdivyav_u:6190: 143.016. teṣāṃ vahanaṃ vegenāpahriyamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā ādotuadvayotpādanaṃ ca
XXdivyav_u:6191: saṃlakṣya saṃvega utpannah--kiṃ bhavanto yat tacchrūyate saptādityāḥ kalpasaṃvartanyāṃ samudāgamiṣyantīti, tadevedānīṃ proditāḥ syuḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6192: 143.018. yataḥ karṇadhāreṇa teṣāṃ vimarśajātānāmuktam--yat tadbhavantaḥ śrūyate timitimiṃgila iti, timitimiṃgilabhayamidam/
XXdivyav_u:6196: 143.022. paśyatha etau dūrata eva sūryavadavalokyete etau akṣitārakau/
XXdivyav_u:6200: 143.024. tadidānīṃ bhavadbhiḥ kiṃ karaṇīyam? yasya vo yasmin deve bhaktiḥ sa tamāyācatu/
XXdivyav_u:6201: 143.025. yadi tenāpi tāvadāyācanena kāciddevatā asmākamasmānmahābhayādvimoṣkaṇaṃ kuryāt/
XXdivyav_u:6205: 143.028. naiva ca teṣāmāyācatāṃ tasmānmaraṇabhayāt jīvitaparitrāṇaviśeṣaḥ kaścit/
XXdivyav_u:6206: 143.029. tathaiva tadvahanaṃ salilavegāt bhikṣiptaṃ timiṃgilamukhadvāram yato 'pahriyate/
XXdivyav_u:6210: 143.031. kiṃ tu sarva evaikaraveṇa namo buddhāyeti vadāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6211: 143.031. sati maraṇe buddhāvalambanayā smṛtyā kālaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6215: 144.001. bhagavatā ca jetavanasthena sa vādaḥ śruto divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhena atikrāntamānuṣeṇa/
XXdivyav_u:6216: 144.002. śrutvā ca punarbhagavatā sa nādastathā adhiṣṭhito yathā tena timiṃgilena śrutam/
XXdivyav_u:6217: 144.003. tasya taṃ namo buddhāyeti rāvaṃ śrutvā manaso 'marṣa utpanno
XXdivyav_u:6219: 144.004. na mama pratirūpaṃ syāt yadahaṃ buddhasya bhagavato nāmodghoṣaṃ śrutvā āhāramāhareyam/
XXdivyav_u:6220: 144.005. sa cintayituṃ pravṛttah--yadyahamidanīṃ sahasaiva mukhadvāraṃ pidhāsyāmi, salilavegapratyāhatasya vahanasya vināśo bhaviṣyati, eteṣāṃ cānekānāṃ jīvitavināśaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6221: 144.006. yannvahaṃ mṛdunopakrameṇa svairaṃ svairaṃ mukhadvāraṃ saṃpidadhyām/
XXdivyav_u:6222: 144.007. tatastena timiṃgilenātmīyaṃ mukhadvāraṃ mṛdunopakrameṇa svairaṃ svairaṃ pihitam/
XXdivyav_u:6225: 144.009. atha te vaṇijastīramāsādya tadbhāṇḍaṃ śakaṭoṣṭragogardabhādibhiḥ purayitvā anupūrveṇa grāmanigamapallīpattanādiṣu cañcūryamāṇāḥ
XXdivyav_u:6227: 144.010. te tatra gatvā saṃlakṣayanti--dharmataiṣā yasya nāṃnā vahanaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6228: saṃsiddhayānapātramāgacchati, tasyaiva tāni ratnāni gamyāni bhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:6229: 144.012. yannu vayametāni ratnāni buddhasya bhagavato dadyāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6230: 144.012. te tāni ratnāni saṃgṛhya bhagavataḥ sakāśamupagatāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6231: 144.013. anupūrveṇa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavataḥ
XXdivyav_u:6233: timiṃgilagrāheṇa tasmin yānapāre 'pahriyamāṇe jīvitavināśe pratyupasthite bhagavataḥ smaraṇaparāyaṇānāṃ nāmagrahaṇaṃ tasmāt
XXdivyav_u:6234: mahāgrāhamukhādvinirmuktam, tato vayaṃ bhagavan saṃsiddhayānapārāḥ kṣemasvastinā ihāgatāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6235: 144.016. dharmatā caiṣā yasya nāṃnā vahanaṃ saṃsiddhayānapātrā āgacchanti,
XXdivyav_u:6240: kiṃ tathāgatasya bhūyaḥ prākṛtaratnaiḥ karaṇīyam? yadi cecchata asmacchāsane vatsāḥ pravrajitum,
XXdivyav_u:6243: 144.021. yadvayametāni ratnāni tyaktvā bhagavato 'ntike pravrajema iti/
XXdivyav_u:6244: 144.022. paścāt te tāni ratnāni mātāpitṛbhyaḥ putradāradāsīdāsakarmakaramitrāmātyajñātisālohitebhyo yathānyāyataḥ saṃvibhajya pravrajitāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6246: 144.024. yato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kīdṛśāni karmāṇi bhagavan, ebhirvaṇigbhiḥ
XXdivyav_u:6247: kṛtānyupacitāni, yeṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ vipākena bhagavānārāgito na virāgitah?
XXdivyav_u:6249: 144.027. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapaḥ samyaksambuddho loka utpanno
XXdivyav_u:6251: 144.027. tasya ca śāsane eta eva ca pravrajitā abhūvan/
XXdivyav_u:6252: 144.028. tatra pravrajya ca na kaścit tadrūpo guṇagaṇo 'dhigato nānyatra sabrahmacāriṇāmuddiṣṭamadhītaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:6253: 144.029. maraṇakālasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavantah--yadasmābhiḥ kāśyapaṃ samyaksambuddhamāsādyoddiṣṭamadhītaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ ca, na kaścit guṇagaṇo
XXdivyav_u:6254: 'dhigato 'sti, asya karmaṇo vipākena vayam yo 'sau anāgato 'dhvani
XXdivyav_u:6255: kāśyapena samyaksambuddhena śākyamuninarmā samyaksambuddho vyākṛtaḥ, taṃ vayamārāgayemo na
XXdivyav_u:6256: 145.001. <145>bhagavānāha--kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāni tāni pañcabhikṣuśatānyatīte 'dhvanyāsan kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śāsane
XXdivyav_u:6258: 145.002. tadā caiṣāmindriyāṇi paripācitāni, etarhi arhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:6259: 145.003. yaścāsau mahāsamudre timistimiṃgilo nāma matsyo buddhaśabdaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6260: śrutvā anāhāratāyāṃ vyavasthitaḥ, sa svabhāvenaiva tīkṣṇāgnitayā
XXdivyav_u:6266: 145.007. yatra ca vikṣiptaṃ tatrāpi samīpe nāgasyaiva bhavanam/
XXdivyav_u:6268: 145.008. evaṃ kṣiptena pāramparyeṇa tat kalevaraṃ mahāsamudrataṭaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6271: 145.009. taccānekaiḥ kākagṛdhraśvaśṛgālaśvāpadādyaiḥ pakṣibhistatsamucchritaiśca kṛmibhirbhakṣyamāṇamasthikaraṅkajīrṇamāsaṃ śvetaṃ śvetaṃ vyavasthitam/
XXdivyav_u:6272: 145.011. asyāṃ ca śrāvastyāṃ tasya brāhmaṇasya yadā patnī antarvartinī saṃvṛttā, tadeva tasyā garbhotpādādatīva kṣudduḥkhena pīḍyamānayā gṛhasvāmyabhihitah--āryaputra, kṣuddukhenātīva bādhye/
XXdivyav_u:6276: 145.014. sā ca tadannapānaṃ sarvamabhyavahṛtya naiva tṛptimupayāti/
XXdivyav_u:6283: 145.018. kimetadbhavantaḥ syāt--asyāḥ sattvamudare utpannam yasyotpādānnaiva tṛptimupayāti? yataḥ sa brāhmaṇo naimittakānāṃ darśayitvā saṃśayanirṇayanārthaṃ vaidyādīn bhūtatantravidaśca--paśyantu bhavantaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:6284: iyaṃ brāhmaṇī kiṃ mahatā rogeṇābhibhūtā syādatha bhūtagrahāviṣṭā syādanyadvā syādrūpaṃ maraṇaliṅgamanenopasaṃkrameṇa pratyupasthitā syāt/
XXdivyav_u:6289: samutpannā? tayā abhihitam--garbhalambhasamakālameva sa evaṃvidha upakramaḥ kṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6291: kaścidanyastadrūpo rogo nāpi bhūtagrahāveśo bādhākara utpannaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6296: 145.029. tasya dārakasya jātamātrasya sā brāhmaṇī vinītakṣudduḥkhā
XXdivyav_u:6298: 145.029. sa dārako jātamātra eva atyarthaṃ bubhukṣayopapīḍyate/
XXdivyav_u:6299: 145.030. tasya bubhukṣayā pīḍyamānasya mātā stanaṃ dātuṃ pravṛttā/
XXdivyav_u:6300: 145.031. sa ca dārakaḥ stanaṃ pītvāpi sarvaṃ naiva tṛptimupayāti/
XXdivyav_u:6301: 145.031. paścāt tena brāhmaṇena tayā ca brāhmaṇyā
XXdivyav_u:6303: 146.001. <146>sa ca dārakaḥ sarvāsāmapi stanaṃ pītvā naiva
XXdivyav_u:6305: 146.001. paścāt tena brāhmaṇena tayārthe chagalikā kṛtvā/
XXdivyav_u:6306: 146.002. sa dārakastasyā api cchagalikāyāḥ kṣīraṃ pītvā janikāyāśca stanaṃ naiva tṛpyate/
XXdivyav_u:6307: 146.003. tatra kālena kālaṃ bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyaśca piṇḍapātaṃ praviṣya parikathāṃ kurvanti/
XXdivyav_u:6308: 146.004. sa dārakastāṃ parikathāṃ śrutvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ na roditi,
XXdivyav_u:6310: 146.005. pratyavāsṛteṣu bhikṣubhikṣuṇīṣu ca punaḥ pipāsāduḥkhaṃ pratisaṃvedayamāno rohituṃ
XXdivyav_u:6313: 146.007. sa ca dārako 'nupūrveṇa māsārdharmāsādīnāmatyayādbhuñjāno naiva kadācidannapānasya
XXdivyav_u:6314: 146.008. yadā ca viśiṣṭe vasasi sthitaḥ, tadā tasya mātāpitṛbhyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:6317: 146.009. gṛhītvā śrāvastyāṃ bhikṣāṃ paryaṭitvā āhārakṛtyaṃ kuru/
XXdivyav_u:6318: 146.010. yataḥ sa dārako bhaikṣabhājanaṃ gṛhītvā śrāvastyāṃ bhaikṣaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6320: 146.010. paryaṭanneva ca bhuktvā bhuktvā atṛpyamāna eva gṛhamāgacchati/
XXdivyav_u:6321: 146.011. yato 'sau saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ mayā karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena na kadācit vitṛpyamāna āhāramārāgayāmi? sa viṣaṇṇacetāścintayituṃ pravṛttah--kiṃ tāvadagnipraveśaṃ karomi, uta jalapraveśamatha taṭaprapātaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6324: 146.014. tasya tenoktam--kiṃ cintāpara evaṃ tiṣṭhasi? gaccha tvam/
XXdivyav_u:6327: 146.015. tatra ca tvaṃ pravrajitaḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃcayaṃ kariṣyasi/
XXdivyav_u:6328: 146.016. akuśalāśca te dharmā ye 'sminnapi janmani saṃcitā bhaviṣyanti, te
XXdivyav_u:6331: 146.018. atha sa mahātmā upāsakena codito jetavanaṃ gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6332: 146.018. jetavanaṃ gatvā tatra bhikṣūn pāṭhasvādhyāyamanasikārodyuktān dṛṣṭvā atīva prasādajātaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6337: 146.021. yataḥ sa mātāpitṛbhyāṃ sakāśādanujñāṃ mārgituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6341: 146.024. tatra ca bhikṣūṇāṃ kadācit piṇḍapāto bhavati, kadācit nimantraṇaṃ bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:6342: 146.024. sa ca yasmin divase piṇḍapāto bhavati,
XXdivyav_u:6343: tatropādhyāyenocyate--vatsa, kiṃ tṛpto 'si uta na? sa upādhyāyasya kathayati--nāsti tṛptiḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6344: 146.026. yata upādhyāyenāsya saṃlakṣitah--taruṇavayasā pravrajito dīptāgnitayā na tṛptimupayāti/
XXdivyav_u:6345: 146.027. sa ātmīyādapi piṇḍapatāt tasya saṃvibhāgaṃ prārabdhaḥ kartum/
XXdivyav_u:6346: 146.028. punaśca pṛcchati--vatsa, kimidānīṃ tṛpto 'si? atha sa tamupādhyāyaṃ vadati--na tṛpto 'smi/
XXdivyav_u:6347: 146.029. yata upādhyāyastaṃ śrutvā sapremān bhikṣūnanyāṃśca sārdhavihāriṇaḥ prārabdho vaktum/
XXdivyav_u:6351: 146.031. yadā ca nimantraṇaṃ bhavati, tadāpi te tathaiva tasyopasaṃhāraṃ
XXdivyav_u:6353: 146.032. dānapatirapi viditvā yadyadadhikaṃ tattadasmai datvā āgacchati/
XXdivyav_u:6354: 147.001. <147>atha pānakaṃ bhavati tadapi tathaiva yadadhikaṃ bhavati
XXdivyav_u:6356: 147.001. tasya ca yataḥ pravrajitasya na kadācidannapānena kukṣiḥ pūṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6357: 147.002. tena khalu samayena anyatamena gṛhapatinā buddhapramukho
XXdivyav_u:6359: 147.003. bhagavān bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamantargṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya/
XXdivyav_u:6362: 147.005. tena caivamupalabdham yo 'saṃviditameva buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayati sa sahasaiva bhogairabhyudgacchati/
XXdivyav_u:6364: 147.007. sa tasyāhārasya śakaṭaṃ pūrayitvā praṇītapraṇītasya śucinaḥ
XXdivyav_u:6365: sārdhaṃ sarvarūpairmitrasvajanasahāyo buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmīti vihāraṃ
XXdivyav_u:6366: 147.009. sa paśyati tasmiñ jetavane bhikṣava eva na santi/
XXdivyav_u:6368: 147.010. tasya tena gṛhapatinoktam--ārya, kva gatā bhikṣavah? sa
XXdivyav_u:6370: 147.011. sa gṛhapatistacchutvā durmanā vyavasthitah--kaṣṭam, evamasmākaṃ viphalaḥ pariśramo
XXdivyav_u:6371: 147.012. saṃcintya ca tasya dharmaruceḥ kathayati--ārya, bhakṣa tvamapi tāvat/
XXdivyav_u:6372: 147.012. sa kathayati--yadi te mahātman parityaktaṃ bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:6373: 147.013. tatastena gṛhapatinā saṃlakṣayitvā yenāhāreṇaikasya bhikṣoḥ paryāptaṃ bhavati, tāvadannapānaṃ śakaṭaṃ gṛhītvā taṃ dharmaruciṃ pariveṣayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6377: 147.016. tena ucyate--ārya, punarbhokṣyase? sa kathayati--mahātman, yadi te parityaktam/
XXdivyav_u:6378: 147.016. tatastena gṛhapatinā bhūyastasmāt śakaṭādyena bhikṣudvayasyāhāreṇa paryāptaṃ syāt, tāvadannapānaṃ śakaṭaṃ gṛhītvā
