XXdivyav_u:6382: 147.019. tenoktam--ārya, punarbhokṣyase? sa kathayati--mahātman, yadi te parityaktam/
XXdivyav_u:6383: 147.020. yatastasmācchakaṭādannapānaṃ gṛhītvā trayāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ paryāptaṃ syāditi punarbhojayituṃ
XXdivyav_u:6385: 147.021. pṛṣṭah--ārya, punarbhokṣyase? sa kathayati--yadi te parityaktam/
XXdivyav_u:6386: 147.022. yataḥ sa gṛhapatistasmādannapānaṃ gṛhītvā yena caturṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ paryāptaṃ syāditi punarbhojayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6388: 147.023. pṛṣṭah--ārya, punarbhokṣyase? bhūyaḥ sa kathayati--yadi te
XXdivyav_u:6394: 147.026. vistareṇa yāvaddaśānāṃ bhikṣūṇāmannapānena paryāptaṃ syāt, tāvad bhuktvā naiva tṛpyate/
XXdivyav_u:6396: 147.027. yataḥ śrūyate pañcabhir nīlavāsaso yakṣaśatairjetavanamaśūnyamiti teṣāṃ bhaviṣyatyeva
XXdivyav_u:6398: pravṛttah--gacchatha yūyaṃ śīghraṃ gṛhameva, ahamevaiko yadi jīvāmi mriye
XXdivyav_u:6400: 147.029. sa gṛhajanaṃ visarjya maraṇabhayabhītastasmāt śakaṭādannapānaṃ gṛhītvā pariveṣayitumārabdhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6408: 148.002. tasmānnagarāt piṇḍapātanirhārako bhikṣu tasyaiva piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6410: 148.003. tasya dharmarucer na kadācidyato jātasya kuṣkiṃ pūrṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6412: 148.004. tasya ca gṛhapater nagaraṃ praviśato 'bhimukhaṃ bhagavān bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtaḥ saṃprāptaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6413: 148.005. sa gṛhapatirbhagavataḥ kathayati--bhagavan, ahaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamuddiśya pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāṃ tṛptitaḥ śakaṭamannapānasya pūrayitvā jetavanaṃ gato buddhapramyukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:6414: 148.007. na ca me tatra bhikṣavo labdhāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6416: 148.007. tena samākhyātaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamantargṛham upanimantraṇaṃ praviṣṭam/
XXdivyav_u:6418: 148.009. yatastasya mamānupūrveṇa sarvaṃ tadannapānaṃ śakaṭaṃ dattam/
XXdivyav_u:6426: dharmaruceretāvatā āhāreṇa pratidivasam yogodvahanaṃ kariṣyati? yato 'sya
XXdivyav_u:6429: 148.014. yato bhagavānāha--gṛhāṇa madīyaṃ cīvarakarṇikam, paścāt te 'haṃ
XXdivyav_u:6432: paścādbhagavān vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājaḥ sahacittotpādāt ṛddhyā dharmaruciṃ gṛhītvā samudrataṭamanuprāptaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6437: 148.019. kimetat kāṣṭhaṃ syādathāsthiśakalā, atha phalakinī syāt/
XXdivyav_u:6440: 148.020. sa itaścāmutaśca tasyā anupārśvanaṃ tāṃ paryeṣamāṇaḥ
XXdivyav_u:6443: 148.022. tasyaitadabhavat--nāhamasya vyaktiṃ jñāsyāmi kimetaditi, na ca paryantamāsādayiṣye/
XXdivyav_u:6448: 148.025. sa kathayati--bhagavan, evaṃvidho 'sau sattvo yasyedṛśī asthiśakalā? bhagavatoktam--tṛpyasva dharmaruce bhavebhyaḥ, tṛpyasva
XXdivyav_u:6455: 148.028. yato 'sya bhagavatā avavādo dattah--dharmaruce, idaṃ cedaṃ manasikuru/
XXdivyav_u:6456: 148.029. ityuktvā bhagavān vitatapakṣa iva rājahaṃsa ṛddhyā
XXdivyav_u:6458: 148.030. atha dharmarucinā cintayatā manasikāramanutiṣṭhatā uṣmagatānyutpāditāni murdhānaḥ kṣāntayo laukikā agradharmā darśanamārgo
XXdivyav_u:6473: 149.006. sa evaṃ saṃlakṣya duṣkarakārako bata me bhagavān/
XXdivyav_u:6475: samyaksambodhiradhigatā syāt, tanmahaddhi upakṛtaṃ syāt, prāgevānekeṣāṃ
XXdivyav_u:6479: 149.009. tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣuparṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt/
XXdivyav_u:6482: 149.011. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte nyaṣīdat/
XXdivyav_u:6488: 149.015. yato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--bhagavan dharmarucirihaiva śrāvastyāṃ jāto
XXdivyav_u:6489: 'sminneva jetavane pravrajito na kutaścidāgato na kutracidgataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6492: 149.018. kiṃ saṃdhāya bhagavān kathayati? evamukte bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--na bhikṣavaḥ pratyutpannaṃ saṃdhāya kathayāmi/
XXdivyav_u:6496: dhārmikathāṃ śrotum? etasya bhagavan kālaḥ, etasya sugata samayo
XXdivyav_u:6499: 149.023. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani prathame 'saṃkhyeye kṣemaṃkaro nāma tathāgato loka utpanno vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān/
XXdivyav_u:6501: 149.025. tasyāṃ ca kṣemāvatyāṃ kṣemo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati/
XXdivyav_u:6502: 149.026. tasyāṃ ca kṣemāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāmanyatamo vaṇikśreṣṭhī prativasati/
XXdivyav_u:6503: 149.027. tenāsau kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ ṣaṣṭiṃ traimāsān sārdhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6506: 149.028. bhāṇḍaṃ samudānīya tasmācca ratnānyānīya saṃghe pañcavārṣikaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6512: 149.031. asya tasmin mahāsamudre 'vatīrṇasya kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sakalambuddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6515: 150.001. sa ca śreṣṭhī saṃsiddhayānapātreṇa devatāmānuṣyaparigṛhītena tasmānmahāsamudrāt
XXdivyav_u:6516: 150.002. uttīrya ca taṃ bhāṇḍaṃ śakaṭairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiśca cotkṣipya anupūrveṇa
XXdivyav_u:6517: 150.003. sa ca panthānaṃ gacchan prātipathikān pṛcchati--kiṃ bhavanto jānīdhvaṃ kṣemāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ pravṛttih? tairuktam--jānīmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6518: 150.004. sa kathayati--asti kaścit kṣemāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ kṣemaṃkaro nāma samyaksambuddhah? te kathayanti--parinirvṛtaḥ sa bhagavān kṣemaṃkaraḥ
XXdivyav_u:6522: 150.007. tasmācca jalābhiṣekeṇa pratyāgataprāṇo jīvita utthāya bhūyaḥ
XXdivyav_u:6523: pṛcchati--kiṃ bhavanto jānīdhvaṃ śrāvakā api tāvattasya bhagavatastiṣṭhanti? tairuktah--te 'pi vaśino bhikṣavaḥ parinirvṛtāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6524: 150.009. saptāhaparinirvṛtasya ca buddhasya bhagavataḥ kṣemaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya kṣemeṇa rājñā caityamalpeśākhyaṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam/
XXdivyav_u:6525: 150.010. tena ca gatvā śreṣṭhinā janapadāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6526: 150.010. asti bhavantastasya bhagavato buddhasya kiṃcit stūpaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6533: 150.013. yannvahametenaiva suvarṇena tasyaiva bhagavataścaityaṃ maheśākhyataraṃ kārayeyam/
XXdivyav_u:6534: 150.014. evaṃ vicintya kṣemaṃ rājānaṃ vijñāpayati--mahārāja, idaṃ mayā suvarṇaṃ kṣemaṃkaraṃ
XXdivyav_u:6536: 150.015. idānīṃ mahārāja yadi tvamanujānīyāt, ahametenaiva suvarṇenaitat tasya bhagavataścaityaṃ maheśākhyataraṃ kārayeyam/
XXdivyav_u:6538: 150.017. tato brāhmaṇā nagaraṃ prati nivāsinaḥ saṃbhūya sarve tasya mahāśreṣṭhinaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayanti--bho mahāśreṣṭhin, yadā kṣemaṃkaro buddho loke 'nutpanna āsīt, tadā vayaṃ lokasya dakṣiṇīyā āsan/
XXdivyav_u:6540: 150.019. idānīṃ tu tasya parinirvṛtasya vayameva dakṣiṇīyāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6542: 150.020. sa teṣāṃ kathayati--nāham yuṣmākametat suvarṇaṃ dāsyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:6543: 150.021. te kathayanti--yadyasmākaṃ na dāsyasi, na vayaṃ tava kāmakāraṃ
XXdivyav_u:6546: 150.022. teṣāṃ tathā vyutpadyatāṃ na lebhe taccaityam yathepsitaṃ tena suvarṇena kārayitum/
XXdivyav_u:6547: 150.023. atha sa śreṣṭhī rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--mahārāja,
XXdivyav_u:6548: taccaityaṃ na labhe brāhmaṇānāṃ sakāśādyathābhipretaṃ kārayitum/
XXdivyav_u:6550: 150.025. evaṃ ca rājñā svapuruṣa ājñaptah--yadyasya mahāśreṣṭhinaḥ stūpamabhisaṃskurvataḥ kaścidapanayaṃ karoti, sa tvayā mahatā daṇḍena
XXdivyav_u:6552: 150.026. evaṃ deveti sahasrayodhī puruṣo rājñaḥ pratiśrutya nirgataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6553: 150.027. nirgamya ca tān brāhmaṇānevaṃ vadati--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ, ahaṃ rājñāsya mahāśreṣṭhinaḥ svapuruṣo dattah--yadyasya stūpamabhisaṃskurvataḥ kaścidvighātaṃ kuryāt, sa tvayā mahatā daṇḍena śāsayitavya iti/
XXdivyav_u:6554: 150.029. yadi yūyamatra kiṃcid vighnaṃ kariṣyatha, ahaṃ vo mahatā
XXdivyav_u:6556: 150.030. te brāhmaṇāḥ sahasrayodhinaḥ puruṣasyaivaṃ śrutvā bhītāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6557: 150.030. yatastena mahāśreṣṭhinā saṃcintya yathaitat suvarṇaṃ tatraiva
XXdivyav_u:6558: garbhasaṃsthaṃ syāt tathā kartavyamiti tasya stūpasya sarvaireva caturbhiḥ pārśvaiḥ pratikaṇṭhukayā catvāri sopānāni ārabdhāni kārayitum/
XXdivyav_u:6559: 150.032. yāvadanupūrveṇa<151> prathamā meḍhī tato 'nupūrveṇa dvitīyā tatastṛtīyā meḍhī yāvadanupūrveṇāṇḍam/
XXdivyav_u:6560: 151.001. tathāvidhaṃ ca stūpasyāṇḍaṃ kṛtam yatra sā yūpayaṣṭirabhyantare
XXdivyav_u:6568: 151.005. tena ca mahāśreṣṭhinā tasya stūpasya caturbhiḥ pārśvaiścatvāro dvārakoṣṭhakā māpitāḥ, caturbhiḥ pārśvaiścatvāri mahācaityāni kāritāni,
XXdivyav_u:6573: 151.008. tatra ca vividhāni jalajāni mālyāni ropitāni tadyathā utpalaṃ padmaṃ kumudaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ sugandhikaṃ mṛdugandhikam/
XXdivyav_u:6574: 151.010. vividhāni ca puṣkariṇītīreṣu sthalajāni mālyāni ropitāni,
XXdivyav_u:6580: 151.013. ye tasmiṃścaitye gandhairdhūpairmālyaiśca cūrṇaiḥ kārāḥ kurvanti/
XXdivyav_u:6582: 151.014. yadi ca dakṣiṇo vāyurvāti, dakṣiṇena vāyunā sarvapuṣpajātīnāṃ
XXdivyav_u:6584: 151.016. evaṃ paścimena vāyunā, anupūrveṇāpi ca vāyunā/
XXdivyav_u:6585: 151.016. vāyatā vāyatā taccaityāṅgaṇaṃ ca tena vividhena gandhamālyena sphuṭaṃ bhavatyanubhāvitam/
XXdivyav_u:6587: 151.018. sa taṃ stūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvajātakṛtaniṣṭhitaṃ kathayati--asmiṃścaitye kārāṃ kṛtvā kimavāpyate? yato 'sau śreṣṭhī buddhodāharaṇaṃ pravṛttaḥ kartum--evaṃ tribhirasaṃkhyeyairvīryeṇa vyāyamatā anuttarā bodhiravāpyate/
XXdivyav_u:6588: 151.020. sa taṃ śrutvā viṣādamāpanno hīnotsāhatayā kathayati--nāhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6591: sahasrayodhī tasyāpi varṇodāharaṇaṃ śrutvā viṣaṇṇacetāḥ kathayati--etāmapyahaṃ pratyekabodhiṃ na śaktaḥ samudānayitum/
XXdivyav_u:6592: 151.023. tataḥ sa mahāśreṣṭhī śrāvakavarṇodāharaṇaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--asminnapi tāvat praṇidhatsva
XXdivyav_u:6600: 151.028. kiṃ tu loke yadā tvaṃ buddhotpādaśabdaṃ śrutvā smṛtiṃ pratilabhethāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6601: 151.029. sa ca śreṣṭhī taṃ caityaṃ kṛtvā nirīkṣya pādayor nipatya
XXdivyav_u:6603: 151.030. anena dānena mahadgatena buddho bhaveyaṃ sugataḥ svayambhūḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6605: 152.001. <152>bhagavānāha--yo 'sau atīte 'dhvani śreṣṭhī abhūt, ahameva sa tasmin samaye bodhisattvacaryāṃ vartāmi/
XXdivyav_u:6606: 152.002. yo 'sau sahasrayodhī, eṣa eva dharmarucistena kālena tena samayena/
XXdivyav_u:6610: 152.005. dvitīye dīpaṃkaro nāma samyaksambuddho loka utpanno
XXdivyav_u:6611: vidyācaraṇasamyaksambuddhaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān/
XXdivyav_u:6612: 152.006. atha dīpamakaraḥ samyaksambuddho janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran
XXdivyav_u:6614: 152.007. dvīpāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ dvīpo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca
XXdivyav_u:6615: sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:6616: 152.009. tatra dīpena rājñā dīpaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sābhisaṃskāreṇa
XXdivyav_u:6618: 152.010. tasya ca dīpasya rājño vāsavo nāma sāmantarājo 'bhūt/
XXdivyav_u:6619: 152.010. tena tasya dūto 'nupreṣitah--āgaccha, iha mayā dīpaṃkaraḥ
XXdivyav_u:6622: 152.012. tadā ca vāsavena rājñā dvādaśavarṣāṇi yajñamiṣṭvā yajñāvasāne rājñā pañca mahāpradānāni vyavasthāpitāni, tadyathā--sauvarṇakaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6623: daṇḍakamaṇḍalu, sauvarṇā sapātrī, catūratnamayī śayyā, pañca
XXdivyav_u:6625: 152.014. tena khalu samayena anyeṣu janapadeṣu dvau māṇavakau
XXdivyav_u:6629: 152.017. tābhyāṃ ca śrutaṃ vāsavena rājñā pañca mahāpradānāni yajñāvasāne samudānītāni, yo brāhmaṇaḥ svādhyāyasampanno bhaviṣyati sa lapsyatīti/
XXdivyav_u:6631: 152.019. ko 'smākaṃ tatra bahuśrutatamo vā svādhyāyatamo bhaviṣyatīti saṃcintya yena vāsavasya rājño mahānagaraṃ tena saṃprasthitau/
XXdivyav_u:6633: 152.020. yau etau dvau māṇavakau āgacchataḥ sumatiśca matiśca,
XXdivyav_u:6635: 152.021. yadevaṃ dvau māṇakakau āgacchataḥ sumitaśca matiśca, anayordvayoḥ sumateretatpradānaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6636: 152.021.yadevaṃ mahārāja tvayā dvādaśa varṣāṇi yajña iṣṭaḥ, asmāt puṇyaphalānmahattamapadasya sumatermāṇavakasya mahāpradānaṃ dāsyasi/
XXdivyav_u:6637: 152.023. sa rājā saṃlakṣayati--nūnametau mahātmānau yeṣāmāmarthāya devatā
XXdivyav_u:6639: 152.024. yato 'sau rājā paśyati māṇavakau dūrata evāgacchantau agrasanamībhiruhyavasthitau/
XXdivyav_u:6640: 152.025. yato rājā vāsavastyau sumatiṃ māṇavaṃ pṛcchati--bhavān sumati?
XXdivyav_u:6642: 152.028. yato rājā vāsavaḥ sumatiṃ māṇavamagrāsane bhojayitvā pañca pradānāni prayacchati/
XXdivyav_u:6646: 152.030. yataḥ sā kanyā sumatiṃ māṇavaṃ prāsādikamabhirūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā lubdhā snehotpannā, taṃ sumatiṃ māṇavamevamāha--pratigṛhṇa māṃ brāhmaṇa/
XXdivyav_u:6648: 152.032. yataḥ sā kanyā rājñā pradānabuddhyā parityaktā <153>na
XXdivyav_u:6649: punargṛhītā, sumatināpi māṇavenāpratigṛhyamāṇā rājño dīpasya dīpāvatīṃ nagarīṃ gatā/
XXdivyav_u:6650: 153.002. sā tatra gatvā tadātmīyamalaṃkāraṃ śarīrādavatārya mālākārāyānuprayacchati--asyālaṃkārasya mūlyaṃ me pratidivasaṃ devasyārthe nīlotpalāni dadasva/
XXdivyav_u:6651: 153.003. sā tenopakrameṇa tadalaṃkārikaṃ suvarṇaṃ datvā devaśuśraūṣikā
XXdivyav_u:6653: 153.004. sa ca māṇavakaḥ sumatistāni catvāri mahāpradānāni gṛhya upādhyāyasakāśaṃ gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6657: 153.006. sa ca sumatistasyāmeva rātrau daśa svapnānadrākṣīt--mahāsamudraṃ
XXdivyav_u:6658: pibāmi, vaihāyasena gacchāmi, imau candrādityau evaṃmaharddhikau
XXdivyav_u:6659: evaṃmahānubhāvau pāṇinā āmārṣṭi parimārṣṭi, rājño rathe yojayāmi ṛṣīn,
XXdivyav_u:6660: śvetān hastinaḥ, haṃsān, siṃhān, mahāśailaṃ parvatāniti/
XXdivyav_u:6663: kariṣyati? tatra pañcābhijña ṛṣir nātidūre prativasati/
XXdivyav_u:6664: 153.011. atha sumatirmāṇavaḥ saṃśayanirṇayanārtham ṛṣeḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6669: 153.013. tatra dīpena rājñā dīpaṃkaro nāma samyaksambuddhaḥ
XXdivyav_u:6672: 153.015. atha vāsavo rājā tasya dīpasya rājñaḥ pratiśrutya aśītyamātyasahasraparivṛto dīpāvatīṃ
XXdivyav_u:6673: 153.016. tena ca dīpena rājñā saptamāddivasāddīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśaṃ kariṣyāmīti sarvaviṣayādhiṣṭhānāñca sarvapuṣpāṇāṃ saṃgrahaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6674: 153.018. tatra ca yasmin divase rājñā dīpena tasya dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśa ārabdhaḥ kartum,
XXdivyav_u:6677: 153.020. sā ca devopasthāyikā dārikā mālākārasakāśaṃ gatā--prayaccha me
XXdivyav_u:6681: 153.022. sā kathayati--gacchata, punarapi tatra puṣkiriṇyām yadi matpuṇyair nīlotpalapadmamanuddhṛtamāsādyeta/
XXdivyav_u:6682: 153.023. tatra puṣkiriṇyāṃ sumateḥ puṇyānubhāvāt sapta nīlapadmāni
XXdivyav_u:6684: 153.024. yataḥ sa mālākāro gataḥ, sa tāni paśyati/
XXdivyav_u:6691: 153.027. yataḥ sā dārikā kathayati--madīyaiḥ puṇyairetāni prādurbhūtāni,
XXdivyav_u:6693: 153.028. mālākāraḥ kathayati--kathametāni praveśakāni bhaviṣyantyasaṃviditaṃ rājakulasya? dārikā āha--uddharatu bhavān/
XXdivyav_u:6695: 153.030. tena mālākāreṇaivaṃ śrutvā tasyā dārikayāstānyuddhṛtya anupradattāni/
XXdivyav_u:6696: 153.031. sā tāni gṛhītvā udakakumbhe prakṣipya tatkumbhamudakasya
XXdivyav_u:6700: pūjayāmi? sa mālākāragṛhāṇyanvāhiṇḍati sarvapuṣpānveṣaṇaparaḥ, na ca kiṃcidekapuṣpamāsādayati/
XXdivyav_u:6704: 154.003. sā ca dārikā tasmādudyānāt tasya sumatermāṇavasyābhimukhamāgatā/
XXdivyav_u:6710: 154.006. sā dārikā tasya sumateḥ kathayati--tadā necchasi māṃ pratigṛhītum/
XXdivyav_u:6715: 154.009. paścāddārikā kathayati--kiṃ mama kārṣāpaṇaiḥ kṛtyam? evamahaṃ buddhāya dāsye, yadi tvameṣāṃ padmānāṃ pradānaphalena mamāpi jātyāṃ jātyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:6716: patnīmicchasi, asya dānasya pradānakāle yadyevaṃ praṇidhānaṃ karoṣi--jātyāṃ jātyāṃ mama bhāryā syāditi/
XXdivyav_u:6717: 154.011. sumatirāha--vayaṃ dānābhiratāḥ svagarbharūpaparityāgaṃ svamāṃsaparityāgaṃ ca kurmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6718: 154.012. tataḥ sā dārikā sumateḥ kathayati--tvamevaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kuru,
XXdivyav_u:6720: 154.013. evamukte tayā dārikayā tasya sumateḥ pañca padmānyanupradattāni,
XXdivyav_u:6724: 154.016. tatra te 'haṃ bhavet patnī nityaṃ sahadharmacāriṇī//2//
XXdivyav_u:6728: 154.020. sa ca rājā śataśalākaṃ chatraṃ gṛhītvā dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya pratyudgataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6730: 154.021. evameva vāsavo rājā amātyaiḥ saha pratyudgataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6731: 154.021. dīpo rājā bhagavato buddhasya pādayor nipatya
XXdivyav_u:6735: 154.023. sa ca rājā dīpaḥ śataśalākaṃ chatraṃ dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya dhārayati/
XXdivyav_u:6737: 154.024. bhagavatā ṛddhyā tathā adhiṣṭhitam yathā ekaikaḥ
XXdivyav_u:6740: 154.026. tatra bhagavatā sābhisaṃskāra indrakīle pādo vyavasthāpitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6741: 154.027. yadaiva bhagavatā indrakīle pādo vyavathāpitaḥ, tadaiva samanantarakālaṃ pṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitā--calitā pracalitā
XXdivyav_u:6743: 154.028. dharmatā ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatām yadendrakīle sābhisaṃskāreṇa
XXdivyav_u:6746: pratilabhante, badhirāḥ śrotraśravaṇasamarthā bhavanti, mūkāḥ pravyāharaṇasamarthā bhavanti, paṅgavo gamanasamarthā bhavanti, mūḍhā garbhiṇīnāṃ strīṇāṃ garbhā anulomībhavanti, hiḍinigaḍabaddhānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ bandhanāni <155>śithilībhavanti,
XXdivyav_u:6747: janmajanmavairānubaddhāstadanantaraṃ maitracittatāṃ pratilabhante, vatsā dāmāni cchittvā mātṛbhiḥ saṃgacchanti, krośanti, aśvā hreṣante, ṛṣabhā
XXdivyav_u:6748: garjanti, śukasārikākokilajīvaṃjīvakā madhuraṃ nikūjanti, aneritāni vāditrabhāṇḍāni madhuraśabdān
XXdivyav_u:6749: peḍākṛtā alaṃkārā madhuraśabdānniścaranti, unnatāḥ pṛthivīpradeśā avanamanti, avanatāśconnamanti,
XXdivyav_u:6750: antarikṣāddevatā divyānyutpalāni kṣipanti, padmāni kumudāni puṇḍarīkānyagurucūrṇāni
XXdivyav_u:6751: candanacūrṇāni tagaracūrṇāni tamālapatrāṇi divyāni mandāravāṇi puṣpāṇi
XXdivyav_u:6752: kṣipanti, pūrvo digbhāga unnamati paścimo 'vanamati, paścima unnamati pūrvo 'vanamati, dikṣiṇa unnamatyuttaro 'vanamati, uttara unnamati dakṣiṇo
XXdivyav_u:6754: 155.009. tatra ca dīpāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāmanekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi puṣpairdhūpairgandhaiśca kārāṃ kurvanti/
XXdivyav_u:6755: 155.010. te 'pi ca sumatiśca dārikā ca yena dīpaṃkaraḥ
XXdivyav_u:6757: 155.011. te ca tatra mahājanakāyena pūjārthaṃ saṃparivṛtasya bhagavata upaśleṣaṃ na labhante/
XXdivyav_u:6762: 155.014. labdhāvakāśaśca sumatirmāṇavo bhagavantamasecanakadarśanaṃ dṛṣṭvā atīva prasādajātaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6763: 155.015. prasādajātena ca tāni pañca padmāni bhagavataḥ kṣiptāni/
XXdivyav_u:6764: 155.016. tāni ca bhagavatā dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena tathā
XXdivyav_u:6765: adhiṣṭhitāni, yathā śakaṭīcakramātrāṇi vitānaṃ buddhvā vyavasthitāni/
XXdivyav_u:6767: 155.018. tathā dṛṣṭvā tayā dārikayā prasādajātayā dvau padmau bhagavataḥ kṣiptau/
XXdivyav_u:6768: 155.018. tau cāpi bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitau yathā śakaṭīcakramātrau karṇasamīpe vitānaṃ baddhvā vyavasthitau/
XXdivyav_u:6769: 155.019. tatra ca pradeśe tumulena vātavarṣeṇa kardamo jātaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6770: 155.020. paścāt sumatirmāṇavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ sakardamaṃ pṛthivīpradeśamupagataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6771: 155.021. tasmin sakardame pṛthivīpradeśe jātaṃ saṃtīrya bhagavato
XXdivyav_u:6775: 155.024. tatastena dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena samyaksambuddhena tasya sumatermāṇavasya jaṭāsu pādau vyavasthāpitau/
XXdivyav_u:6776: 155.025. tasya ca sumateḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubuddha eva matirmāṇavastiṣṭhati/
XXdivyav_u:6778: anena dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhenāsya sumatermāṇavasya tiraścām yathā padbhyāṃ jaṭā avaṣṭabdhāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6780: vyākṛtah--bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ nṛbhavādvimukto mukto vimurlokahitāya śāstā/
XXdivyav_u:6781: 155.030. śākyātmajaḥ śākyamunīti nāṃnā trilokasāro jagataḥ pradīpaḥ//4//
XXdivyav_u:6782: 156.001. <156>yadā ca sa sumatirmāṇavo dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena vyākṛtaḥ, tatsamakālameva vaihāyasaṃ saptatālānabhyudgataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6783: 156.002. tāścāsya jaṭāḥ śīrṇāḥ, anyāḥ praviśiṣṭatarā jaṭāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6785: 156.003. dṛṣṭvā ca praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam--yadā anenānuttarajñānamadhigataṃ tadāsya vayaṃ śrāvakā
XXdivyav_u:6790: 156.008. śrāvikā te bhaviṣyāmi tasmin kāla upasthite//6//
XXdivyav_u:6791: 156.009. khagasthaṃ māṇavaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasrāṇi śatāni ca/
XXdivyav_u:6795: 156.013. yadā ca sumatirmāṇavo dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena vyākṛtaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:6803: 156.016. tena rājñā teṣāṃ bhṛtyānāmekaiko vālo dattaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6804: 156.017. tairamātyaiḥ svake vijite gatvā caityāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni/
XXdivyav_u:6805: 156.017. yadā sumatirmāṇavo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksambuddhau vyākṛtaḥ, tadā dīpena rājñā vāsavena ca rājñā tairanekaiśca naigamajānapadaiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārito 'nāgataguṇāvekṣatayā/
XXdivyav_u:6807: vyākṛtah--tvayā kutra cittamutpāditam? sa kathayati--kṣato 'haṃ sumate
XXdivyav_u:6809: 156.021. sa kathayati--kathaṃ kṛtvā kṣato 'si? tataḥ sa kathayati--yadā
XXdivyav_u:6810: tava dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena padbhyāṃ jaṭā avaṣṭabdhāḥ, tadā kupitena vāg niścāritā--dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena śrotriyasya jaṭā
XXdivyav_u:6812: 156.023. yatastasya sumatiḥ kathayati--āgacchasva, buddhasya bhagavato 'ntike pravrajāvaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6813: 156.024. tatastau sumatirmatiśca dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya pravacane pravrajitau/
XXdivyav_u:6814: 156.025. sumatinā ca pravrajya trīpi piṭakānyadhītāni, dharmeṇa parṣat saṃgṛhītā/
XXdivyav_u:6815: 156.026. sa ca sumatirmāṇavaścyutaḥ kālagatastuṣite devanikāye upapannaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6817: 156.028. bhagavānāha--yo 'sau vāsavo rājābhūt tena kālena tena samayena,
XXdivyav_u:6819: 156.029. yāni tānyaśītiramātyasahasrāṇi tena kālena tena samayena,
XXdivyav_u:6821: 156.030. yo 'sau dīpāvatīyako janakāyaḥ, yāsau dārikā, eṣaiva sā yaśodharā/
XXdivyav_u:6822: 156.030. yo 'sau sumatiḥ, ahameva tasmin samaye bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:6824: 156.031. yo 'sau matiḥ, eṣa eva sa dharmaruciḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6825: 157.001. <157>etaddvitīye 'saṃkhyeye asya ca dharmarucermama ca darśanam yadahaṃ saṃdhāya kathayāmi--cirasya dharmaruce, sucirassya dharmaruce//
XXdivyav_u:6826: 157.003. tasmādapyārvāk tṛtīye 'saṃkhyeye krakucchando nāma samyaksambuddho loka utpanno vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
XXdivyav_u:6830: 157.006. sa ca kalatrasahāyaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
XXdivyav_u:6831: 157.006. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6837: 157.009. sa ca vaṇiglokenāvṛto dūrataraṃ gato bhāṇḍamādāya/
XXdivyav_u:6839: 157.010. sa ca dārakaḥ kālāntareṇa mahān saṃvṛtto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ
XXdivyav_u:6841: 157.011. tato 'sau mātaraṃ pṛcchati--amba, kimasmākaṃ kulārthāgataṃ karma?
XXdivyav_u:6842: sā kathayati--vatsa, pitā tava āpaṇaṃ vāhayannāsīt/
XXdivyav_u:6844: 157.012. sā ca mātā asya kleśairbādhyamānā cintayituṃ pravṛttā--ka upāyaḥ syāt yadahaṃ kleśān vinodayeyam, na ca me kaścijjānīyāt? tayā
XXdivyav_u:6845: saṃcintyaivamadhyavasitam--evameva putrakāmahetostathā paricarāmi, yathā anenaiva me sārdhaṃ rogavinodakaṃ bhavati, naiva svajanasya śaṅkā
XXdivyav_u:6847: 157.016. tatastayā vṛddhayuvatī āhūya bhojayitvā dvis triḥ paścānnavena
XXdivyav_u:6849: 157.016. tasyāḥ sā vṛddhā kathayati--kena kāryeṇaiva mamānuprasādādinā upakrameṇānupravṛttiṃ karoṣi? sā tasyā vṛddhāyā viśvastā bhūtvā evamāha--amba, śṛṇu vijñāpyam/
XXdivyav_u:6850: 157.018. kleśairatīva bādhye, priyatāṃ mamotpādya manuṣyānveṣaṇaṃ kuru, yo
XXdivyav_u:6852: 157.019. vṛddhā kathayati--neha gṛhe tathāvidho manuṣyaḥ saṃvidyate, nāpi praṇayavān kaścit praviśati, yo janasyāśaṅkanīyo bhavet/
XXdivyav_u:6853: 157.021. katamaḥ sa manuṣyo bhaviṣyati yasyāhaṃ vakṣyāmi? tataḥ sā vaṇikpatnī tasyā vṛddhāyāḥ kathayati--yadyanyo manuṣya evaṃvidhopakramayukto nāsti, eṣa eva me putro bhavati, naiṣa lokasya śaṅkanīyo bhaviṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:6854: 157.023. tasyāstayā vṛddhayā abhihitam--kathaṃ nu putreṇa sārdhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6855: ratikrīḍāṃ gamiṣyasi? yuktaṃ syādanyena manuṣyeṇa sārdhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6857: 157.024. tataḥ sā vaṇikpatnī kathayati--yadyanyo 'bhyantaro manuṣyo na saṃvidyate, bhavatu eṣa eva me putraḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6859: 157.026. tataḥ sā vṛddhayuvatī tasya vaṇijaḥ putrasyaivāgamya
XXdivyav_u:6861: 157.027. kiṃ pratiṣṭhito 'syārthena? tena tasyā abhihitam--kimetat? tataḥ sā vṛddhā kathayati--bhavānevamabhirūpaśca yuvā ca asmin vayasi taruṇayuvatyā sārdhaṃ śobhethāḥ krīḍan raman paricārayan/ kimeva
XXdivyav_u:6863: 157.030. tataḥ sā vṛddhā evaṃ dvirapi trirapi tasya dārakasya kathayati--taruṇayuvatistavārthe
XXdivyav_u:6864: 157.031. sa vaṇigdārako dvirapi trirapyucyamānastasyā vṛddhāyāḥ kathayati--amba, kiṃ tasyāstaruṇayuvatyāḥ saṃnimitte kiṃcidabhihitam?
XXdivyav_u:6865: tatah <158>sā vṛddhā kathayati--uktaṃ tasyā mayā tannimittam/
XXdivyav_u:6867: 158.001. sā ca dārikā hīvyapatrāpyagṛhītā na kiṃcidvakṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:6869: 158.002. na tvayā tasyā vā anveṣaṇe yatnaḥ karaṇīyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6872: 158.004. tenoktam--kutrāvakāśe tava gṛham? tato 'sya tayā vṛddhayā gṛhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6874: 158.005. sā ca vṛddhā tasyā vaṇikpatnyāḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā
XXdivyav_u:6876: 158.006. sā kathayati--kutrāvakāśe saṃgataṃ bhaviṣyati? madīye gṛhe/
XXdivyav_u:6877: 158.007. sa ca dārakaḥ kāryāṇi kṛtvā gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6881: 158.008. sa dārako labdhānujñastasyā vṛddhāyā gṛhaṃ gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6882: 158.009. tasya dārakasya tasmin gṛhe gatasya ratikrīḍākālamāgamayamānasya
XXdivyav_u:6884: 158.010. rūpe kāle sā mātā asya vaṇigdārakasya tasminneva gṛhe ratikrīḍāmanubhavanārthaṃ tatraiva gatā/
XXdivyav_u:6885: 158.011. gatvā ca tasmin gṛhe vikālamavyaktiṃ vibhāvyamāne rūpākṛtau nirgūḍhenopacārakrameṇa ratikrīḍāṃ putreṇa sārdhamanubhavituṃ pravṛttā
XXdivyav_u:6887: 158.013. sā ca parikṣīṇāyāṃ rātrau anubhūtaratikrīḍā satamondhakāre
XXdivyav_u:6889: 158.014. sa cāpi vaṇigdārako ratikrīḍāmanubhūya prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:6892: 158.015. tatra vṛddhāyā gṛhe ratikrīḍāmanubhavaṃśca cirakālamevaṃ vartamānena ratikrīḍākrameṇa tasya dārakasya sā mātā cintayituṃ
XXdivyav_u:6895: krameṇa saṃvedayeyam, yathā ihaiva gṛhe ratikrīḍā bhavet/
XXdivyav_u:6896: 158.019. iti saṃcintya tatraiva vṛddhāgṛhe gatvā ratikrīḍāṃ putreṇa sārdhamanubhūya rajanyāḥ kṣaye satamondhakārakāle tasya dārakasyoparimaṃ prāvaraṇaṃ nivasyātmanīyāṃ ca śirottarapaṭṭikāṃ tyaktvā svagṛhaṃ gatā/
XXdivyav_u:6897: 158.021. sa ca dārakaḥ prabhāakāle tāṃ paṭṭikāṃ śirasi mañcasyāvatiṣṭhantīṃ saṃpaśyati/
XXdivyav_u:6899: saṃlakṣya tyaktvā bhāṇḍāvārīṃ gatvā yugalamanyaṃ prāvṛtya svagṛhaṃ gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6900: 158.023. tatra ca gataḥ saṃpaśyati tamevātmīyaṃ pravaraṇaṃ tasyā mātuḥ śirasi prāvṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:6901: 158.024. dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ mātaraṃ pṛcchati--amba, kuto 'yaṃ śirasi prāvaraṇo 'bhyāgatah? yatastayā abhihitam--adyāpyahaṃ tavāmbā? evaṃ cirakālaṃ tava
XXdivyav_u:6902: mayā sārdhaṃ kāmān paribhuñjato 'dyāpyahaṃ tava saivāmbā? yataḥ sa vaṇigdārakastathāvidhaṃ mātṛvacanamupaśrutya saṃmūḍho vihvalacetā bhūmau nipatitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6904: 158.027. sa jalapariṣekāvasikto dārakaścireṇa kālena pratyāgataprāṇastayā mātrā samāśvāsyate--kimevaṃ khedamupāgatastvam? asmadīyaṃ vacanamupaśrutya dhīramanā bhavasva/
XXdivyav_u:6906: 158.029. sa dārakastasyāḥ kathayati--kathamahaṃ khedaṃ na kariṣyāmi
XXdivyav_u:6907: saṃmohaṃ vā, yena mayā evaṃvidhaṃ pāpakaṃ karma kṛtam? tataḥ sa tayābhihitah--na te manaḥśūkaṃsdminnarthe
XXdivyav_u:6909: 158.031. yenaivaṃ hi yathā pitā gacchati, putro 'pi tenaiva gacchati/
XXdivyav_u:6913: 159.001. yatraiva hi tīrye pitā snāti, putro 'pi tasmin snāti, na ca tīryaṃ putrasya snāyato doṣakārakaṃ bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:6915: 159.002. api ca pratyanteṣu janapadeṣu dharmataivaiṣā yasyāmeva pitā
XXdivyav_u:6923: 159.006. sā vaṇikpatnī tathāvidhaṃ lekhārthaṃ śrutvā vaimanasyajātā
XXdivyav_u:6926: 159.008. idānīṃ mayā evaṃvidhenopakrameṇa putraṃ ca paricaritvā sa
XXdivyav_u:6928: 159.008. ka upāyaḥ syāt yadahaṃ tamihāsamprāptameva jīvitāt
XXdivyav_u:6929: vyaparopayeyam? iti saṃcintya taṃ putramāhūya kathayati--pitrā te lekhyo 'nupreṣitah āgamiṣyatīti/
XXdivyav_u:6932: 159.011. sa kathayati--kathamahaṃ pitaraṃ ghātayiṣye? yadā asau na
XXdivyav_u:6933: prasahate pitṛvadhaṃ kartum, tadā tayā mātrā bhūyo
XXdivyav_u:6935: 159.013. kāmān khalu pratisevato na hi kiṃcit pāpakaṃ karmākaraṇīyamiti vadāmi/
XXdivyav_u:6938: 159.015. ityuktvā viṣamādāya samitāyāṃ miśrayitvā maṇḍilakān paktvā anye
XXdivyav_u:6942: 159.017. gṛhya pitṛsakāśaṃ gatvā ca tasya viśvastasyaikatra bhuñjata etān saviṣān maṇḍilakān prayacchasva, ātmanā ca nirviṣān bhakṣaya/
XXdivyav_u:6943: 159.018. tataḥ sa dārakastena lekhavāhikamanuṣyeṇa sārdhaṃ tān maṇḍilakān gṛhya gataḥ pitṛsakāśam/
XXdivyav_u:6944: 159.019. āgamya pitā asya atīva taṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭvā abhirūpaprāsādikaṃ maheśākhyaṃ prāmodyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6945: 159.020. sahyāsahyaṃ pṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ vaṇijāmākhyāti--ayaṃ bhavanto
XXdivyav_u:6947: 159.021. yadā tena dārakeṇa saṃlakṣitaṃ sarvatra ahamanena pitrā pratisaṃvedita iti, tatastaṃ pitaramāha--tāta, ambayā maṇḍilakāḥ praheṇakamanupreṣitam/
XXdivyav_u:6949: 159.023. paścāttena pitrā sārdhamekaphalāyāṃ bhuñjatā tasya pituḥ saviṣā maṇḍilakā dattāḥ, ātmanā nirviṣāḥ prabhakṣitāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6950: 159.024. yato 'sya pitā tān saviṣān maṇḍilakān bhakṣayitvā bhṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6951: 159.025. tasya ca pituḥ kāladharmaṇā yuktasya ca dārako na kenacit pāpakaṃ karma kurvāṇo 'bhiśaṅkito vā pratisaṃvedito vā/
XXdivyav_u:6953: kiṃcittasya vaṇijo bhaṇḍamāsīddhiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ vā, tattasya dārakasya dattam/
XXdivyav_u:6954: 159.028. sa dārakastaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ paitṛkaṃ gṛhya
XXdivyav_u:6956: 159.029. tasya ca gatasya svagṛhaṃ sā mātā pracchannāsaddharmeṇa taṃ putraṃ paricaramāṇā ratiṃ nādhigacchati, anabhiratarūpā ca taṃ putraṃ
XXdivyav_u:6959: prakāśakrameṇa niḥśaṅkā bhūtvā jāyāpatīti vikhyātadharmāṇaḥ sukhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6962: purāṇadāsīdāsakarmakarāṃstyaktvā yāvadarthajātaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ ca gṛhya anyaviṣayāntaraṃ
XXdivyav_u:6963: 160.002. tatra gatvā janapadeṣu vikhyāpayamānau jāyāpatikamiti ratikrīḍāmanubhavamānau
XXdivyav_u:6964: 160.003. yāvadarhan bhikṣuḥ kenacit kālāntareṇa janapadacārikāṃ caraṃs
XXdivyav_u:6966: 160.004. tena tatra piṇḍapātamanvāhiṇḍatā vīthyāṃ niṣadya ayaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6968: 160.005. dṛṣṭvā cārogyayitvā cābhibhāṣyoktah--mātuste kuśalam? sa ca dārakastamarhantaṃ tathā abhivadamānamupaśrutya saṃbhinnacetāḥ svena duścaritena karmaṇā śaṅkitamanāścintayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6969: 160.007. sa vicintya mātṛsakāśaṃ gatvā saṃvedayati--yatirabhyāgataḥ, yo
XXdivyav_u:6970: 'sau asmadgṛhamupasaṃkrāmati, eṣa sa ihādhiṣṭhāne pratisaṃvedayiṣyati eṣā asya dārakasya
XXdivyav_u:6972: 160.009. kathameṣa śakyaṃ ghātayitum? tatastayoḥ saṃcintya taṃ
XXdivyav_u:6976: 160.011. sa dārako gūḍhaśastro bhūtvā arhantaṃ bhojayituṃ mātrā saha nirjanaṃ gṛhaṃ kṛtvā sa cārhadbhikṣubhuktvā tasmādgṛhādviśrabdhacārakrameṇa pratinirgataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:6979: 160.014. yathā yathā sevyanti, tathā tathā tṛṣṇā vṛddhimupayāti/
XXdivyav_u:6980: 160.015. tasya dārakasya sā mātā taṃ putramasaddharmeṇānuvartamānā
XXdivyav_u:6981: tasminnevādhiṣṭhāne śreṣṭhiputreṇa sārdhaṃ pracchannakāmā asaddharmeṣu saktacittā jātā/
XXdivyav_u:6985: 160.018. sā ca tasmiñ śreṣṭhiputre saṃraktacittā dvirapi trirapyucyamānā na nirvartate/
XXdivyav_u:6986: 160.018. tatastena niṣkoṣamāsiṃ kṛtvā sā mātā jīvitādvyaparopitā/
XXdivyav_u:6993: 160.022. sa yadā nirvāsitastasmādadhiṣṭhānāt tadā cintayituṃ pravṛttah--asti cāsya buddhaśāsane kaścidevānunayah? evaṃ manasi kṛtam--gacchāmi, idānīṃ pravrajāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:6994: 160.024. sa ca vihāraṃ gatvā bhikṣusakāśamupasaṃkramya evaṃ
XXdivyav_u:6996: 160.025. tatastena bhikṣuṇā uktam--mā tāvat pitṛghātako 'si? tena
XXdivyav_u:7000: 160.027. sa bhūyaḥ pṛṣṭah--mā tāvadarhadvadhaste kṛtah? tataḥ sa kathayati--arhannapi ghātitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7001: 160.028. tatastena bhikṣuṇā abhihitah--ekaikena eṣāṃ karmāṇāmācaraṇānna pravrajyārho bhavasi, prāgeva samastānām/
XXdivyav_u:7003: 160.030. tataḥ sa puruṣo 'nyasya bhikṣoḥ sakāśamupasaṃkramya kathayati--ārya pravrajeyam/
XXdivyav_u:7008: 160.032. sa yadā <161>dvirapi trirapi pravrajyāmāyācamāno 'pi bhikṣubhir na pravrājitaḥ, tadā amarṣajātaścintayituṃ pravṛttah--yā api sarvasādhāraṇā pravrajyā, tāmahamapyāyācanna labhāmi/
XXdivyav_u:7010: 161.003. tasmin vihāre 'gniṃ datvā anyatra vihāraṃ gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7014: 161.005. tatrāpi vihāre bahavo bhikṣavaḥ śaikṣāśaikṣāśca dagdhāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7015: 161.006. evaṃ tasyānekān vihārān dahataḥ sarvatra śabdo
XXdivyav_u:7019: 161.008. tatra ca vihāre bodhisattvajātīyo bhikṣuḥ prativasati tṛpitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7020: 161.008. tena śrutaṃ sa evaṃ duṣkarakarmakārī puruṣa ihāgacchatīti/
XXdivyav_u:7021: 161.009. yataḥ sa bhikṣustasya puruṣasyāsamprāptasyaiva tasmin vihāre
XXdivyav_u:7023: 161.010. sa taṃ puruṣaṃ sametya kathayati--bhadramukha, kimetat? yato 'sya
XXdivyav_u:7025: 161.011. tatastena bhikṣuṇām uktam--āgaccha vatsa, ahaṃ te pravrājayāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:7026: 161.012. paścāt tena bhikṣuṇā tasya puruṣasya śiro muṇḍāpayitvā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dattāni/
XXdivyav_u:7027: 161.013. paścāt sa puruṣaḥ kathayati--ārya, śikṣāpadāni me 'nuprayaccha/
XXdivyav_u:7028: 161.013. tatastena bhikṣuṇā uktah--kiṃ te śikṣāpadaiḥ prayojanam? evaṃ sarvakālaṃ vadasva--namo buddhāya, namo dharmāya, namaḥ saṃghāyeti/
XXdivyav_u:7029: 161.015. paścāt sa bhikṣustasya puruṣasya dharmadeśanāmārabdhaḥ kartum--tvamevaṃvidhaścaivaṃvidhaśca pāpakarmakārī sattvo yadi
XXdivyav_u:7033: 161.018. yato bhagavānāha--kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavah? yo 'sau atīte 'dhvani
XXdivyav_u:7034: bhikṣus tripiṭah āsa, ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena/
XXdivyav_u:7035: 161.019. yo 'sau pāpakarmakārī sattvo mātāpitrarhaddhātakaḥ, eṣa eva dharmaruciḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7039: 161.021. yāvacca mayā bhikṣavastribhirasaṃkhyeyaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiranyaiśca duṣkaraśatasahasrairanuttarā
XXdivyav_u:7040: samudānītā, tāvadanena dharmarucinā yadbhūyasā narakatiryakṣu kṣipitam//
XXdivyav_u:7046: 162.002. buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe/
XXdivyav_u:7047: 162.002. rājagṛhe nagare subhadro nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7050: 162.004. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
XXdivyav_u:7051: 162.004. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa kālāntareṇa
XXdivyav_u:7053: 162.005. bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya
XXdivyav_u:7055: 162.006. rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caran yena subhadrasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7058: 162.007. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ patnīmādāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7063: divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyati, mama śāsane pravrajya
XXdivyav_u:7065: 162.011. tena bhagavataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūro dattaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7068: 162.013. sa saṃlakṣayati--yadapyasmākamekaṃ bhikṣakulam, tadapi śramaṇo gautamo 'nvāvartayati/
XXdivyav_u:7069: 162.013. gacchāmi, paśyāmi kiṃ śramaṇena gautamena vyākṛtamiti/
XXdivyav_u:7070: 162.014. sa tatra gatvā kathayati--gṛhapate, śramaṇo gautama āgata āsīt?
XXdivyav_u:7072: 162.015. kiṃ tena vyākṛtam? ārya, mayā tasya patnī darśitā--kiṃ
XXdivyav_u:7074: divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyati, mama śāsane pravrajya
XXdivyav_u:7076: 162.017. sa bhūriko gaṇitre kṛtāvī śvetavarṇāṃ gṛhītvā
XXdivyav_u:7077: gaṇayitumārabdhah--paśyati yathā bhagavatā vyākṛtaṃ tatsarvaṃ tathaiva/
XXdivyav_u:7078: 162.019. sa saṃlakṣayati--yadi anusaṃvarṇyiṣyāmyaham, gṛhapatirbhūyasyā mātrayā śramaṇasya
XXdivyav_u:7079: 162.020. tadatra kiṃcid saṃvarṇayitavyaṃ kiṃcit vivarṇayitavyamiti viditvā
XXdivyav_u:7081: 162.021. subhadro gṛhapatiḥ kathayati--ārya, kiṃ hastausamparivartayasi mukhaṃ ca vibhaṇḍayasīti? sa kathayati--gṛhapate, atra kiṃcit satyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7083: 162.023. ārya, kiṃ satyaṃ kiṃ vā mṛṣā? gṛhapate, yadanenoktaṃ putraṃ janayiṣyatīti, idaṃ satyaṃ kathayati/
XXdivyav_u:7086: 162.024. mandabhāgyaḥ sa sattvo jātamātra evāgninā kulaṃ dhakṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:7089: 162.026. gehapate, asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭo manuṣyabhūto divyamānuṣīṃ
XXdivyav_u:7090: śriyaṃ pratyanubhavan? yatkathayati--mama śāsane pravrajiṣyatīti, idaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7092: 162.027. yadā asya na bhaktaṃ na vastram, tadā niścayena śramaṇasya
XXdivyav_u:7097: 162.029. subhadro viṣādamāpannaḥ kathayati--ārya, atra mayā kathaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7098: pratipattavyamiti? bhūrikaḥ kathayati--gṛhapate, vayaṃ pravrajitāḥ śamānuśikṣāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7101: 162.031. subhadraḥ saṃlakṣayati--sarvathā parityājyo 'sau iti viditvā sa
XXdivyav_u:7113: 163.004. te tvaritatvaritaṃ gatāḥ pṛcchanti--bhavantaḥ, kimiyaṃ gṛhapatipatnī virauti? subhadraḥ
XXdivyav_u:7118: 163.007. sā tenāraṇyaṃ nītvā tathopakrāntā yathā kālagatā/
XXdivyav_u:7119: 163.007. sa tāṃ pracchannaṃ gṛhamānīya suhṛtsambandhibāndhavānāṃ prātiveśakānāṃ ca kathayati--bhavantaḥ, patnī me kālagateti/
XXdivyav_u:7123: 163.010. nirgranthaiḥ śrutam--te hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditāśchatrapatākā ucchrayitvā rājagṛhasya nagarasya rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭake upāhiṇḍamānā
XXdivyav_u:7125: 163.012. śramaṇena gautamena subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnī vyākṛtā--putraṃ
XXdivyav_u:7129: 163.014. yasya tāvadvṛkṣamūlameva nāsti, kutastasya śākhāpatraphalaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atrāntare kiṃcidbuddhānāṃ bhagavatāmajñātamadṛṣṭamaviditamavijñātam/
XXdivyav_u:7130: 163.016. dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttānāmekārakṣāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ caturṣu
XXdivyav_u:7131: saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānām {catur}ṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ caturṣu saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ caturvaiśāradyaviśāradyaviśāradānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:7132: ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāmasaṃhatavihāriṇāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānāmaṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trirdivasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate--ko hīyate, ko vardhate, kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ, kaḥ
XXdivyav_u:7133: saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ, kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ, kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasambādhaprāptaḥ, ko
XXdivyav_u:7142: 163.029. dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7143: prāviṣkurvanti, tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhānniścārya kāścidadhastādgacchanti,
XXdivyav_u:7144: 163.031. yā adhastādgacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanamavīcimarbudaṃ nirarbudamaṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhavamutpalaṃ padma <164>mahāpadmaṃ narakaṃ gatvā ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti/
XXdivyav_u:7146: 164.002. teṣāmevaṃ bhavati--kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ,
XXdivyav_u:7149: 164.003. teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhavati--na hyeva vayaṃ bhavanta
XXdivyav_u:7151: 164.004. api tvayamapūrvadarśanaḥ sattvaḥ, asyānubhāvādasmākaṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā
XXdivyav_u:7152: 164.005. te nirmite cittamabhiprasādya tannarakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā
XXdivyav_u:7153: devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:7154: 164.007. yā upariṣṭāgacchanti, tāścāturmahārājakāyikān devāṃstrāyastriṃśām yāmāṃstuṣitānnirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān
XXdivyav_u:7155: brahmapurohitān mahābrāhmaṇaḥ parīttābhānapramāṇābhānābhāsvarān parīttaśubhānapramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnānanabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalānatapān sudṛśān sudarśanānakaniṣṭhān devān gatvā duḥkhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7162: 164.016. atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantameva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti/
XXdivyav_u:7170: 164.028. tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra
XXdivyav_u:7174: 165.003. yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti nāthāstaṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te
XXdivyav_u:7176: 165.005. nāhetupratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
XXdivyav_u:7177: 165.006. gaccha ānanda, bhikṣūṇāmārocaya--tathāgato bhikṣavaḥ śmaśānacārikāṃ gantukāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7178: 165.007. yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ śmaśānacārikāṃ gantum, sa cīvarakāṇi gṛhṇātu/
XXdivyav_u:7181: 165.009. yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ śmaśānacārikaṃ gantum, sa cīvarakāṇi gṛhṇātu/
XXdivyav_u:7182: 165.010. evamāyuṣmanniti te bhikṣavaḥ sarve saṃśrutya bhagavatsakāśamupagatāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7183: 165.011. atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra āśvasta āśvāstaparivāro vinīto vinītaparivāro
XXdivyav_u:7185: prāsādikaparivāro vṛṣabha iva gogaṇaparivṛto gajarāja iva kalabhagaṇaparivṛtaḥ siṃha iva daṃṣṭagaṇaparivṛto haṃsarāja iva haṃsagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suparṇīva parikṣagaṇaparivṛto vipra iva śiṣyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suvaidya ivāturagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śūra iva yodhagaṇaparivṛto deśika ivādhvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sārthavāha iva vaṇiggaṇaparivṛtaḥ śreṣṭhīva paurajanaparivṛtaḥ koṭṭarāja iva mantrigaṇaparivṛtaścakravartīva putrasahasraparivṛtaścandra iva
XXdivyav_u:7186: nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ sūrya iva raśmisahasraparivṛto dhṛtarāṣṭra iva gandharvagaṇaparivṛto virūḍhaka iva kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto brahmeva brahmakāyikaparivṛtaḥ stimita iva jalanidhiḥ sajala iva jaladharo vimada iva gajapatiḥ sudāntairindrayairasaṃkṣobhiteryāpathapracāro dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛto 'śītyā cānuvyañjanairvirājitagātro vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtamūrtiḥ sūryasahasrātirekaprabho jaṅgama iva ratnaparvataḥ samantato bhadrako
XXdivyav_u:7187: daśabhirbalaiścaturbhirvaiśāradyaistribhirāveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānairmahākaruṇayā ca samanvāgata ājñātakauṇḍinyāśvajidbāṣpamahānāmabhadrikaśāriputramaudgalyāyanakāśyapayaśaḥpūrṇaprabhṛtimahāśrāvakaiḥ parivṛto 'nyena ca mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena anekaiśca prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ śītavanaṃ mahāśmaśānaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7191: 165.028. rājagṛhāt dvau bāladārakau brāhmaṇadārakaḥ kṣatriyadārakaśca bahir nirgatya krīḍataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7194: bhagavatā subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnī vyākṛtā--putraṃ janayiṣyati,
XXdivyav_u:7195: kulamuddyotayiṣyati, divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyati, mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7196: 165.032. sā ca mṛtā kālagatā śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ nirhṛtā--mā haiva bhagavatā bhāṣitaṃ vitathaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7198: 166.001. <166>sacandratāraṃ prapatedihāmbaraṃ mahī saśailā savanā nabho vrajet/
XXdivyav_u:7199: 166.003. mahodadhīnāmudakaṃ kṣayaṃ vrajenmaharṣayaḥ syūr na mṛṣābhidhāyinaḥ//8//iti
XXdivyav_u:7200: 166.005. sa ca brāhmaṇadārakaḥ kathayati--vayasya, yadyevam, gacchāmaḥ śītavanaṃ mahāśmaśānaṃ paśyāmah? vayasya, gacchāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7207: 166.012. yathā hyamī śītavanonmukhotsukāḥ pravānti vātā himapaṅkaśītalāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7208: 166.014. prayānti nūnaṃ bahavo divaukaso nirīkṣituṃ śākyamunervikurvitam//10//iti/
XXdivyav_u:7209: 166.016. rājñā bimbisāreṇa śrutam--bhagavatā subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnī
XXdivyav_u:7210: vyākṛtā--putraṃ janayiṣyati, kulamuddyotayiṣyati, divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyati, mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7212: 166.018. sā ca mṛtā kālagatā śītavanaṃ śmaśānamabhinirhṛtā/
XXdivyav_u:7214: 166.019. śrutvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat--na bhagavān nirarthakaṃ śītavanaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7216: 166.020. nūnaṃ bhagavān subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnīmāgamya mahadvineyakāryaṃ kartukāmo
XXdivyav_u:7220: 166.022. adrākṣīt sa kṣatriyakumārako rājānaṃ māgadhaśreṇyaṃ bimbisāraṃ
XXdivyav_u:7223: 166.024. yathā hi śreṇyo magadhādhipo hyayaṃ viniryayau rājagṛhāt
XXdivyav_u:7225: 166.026. pravartate me hṛdi niścitā matirmahājanasyābhyudayo bhaviṣyati//11//iti/
XXdivyav_u:7229: śramaṇo gautamaḥ smitonmukho mahājanamadhyaṃ praviṣṭaḥ, nūnamayaṃ bodhisattvo na kālagataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7230: 166.030. taiḥ subhadro gṛhapatiruktah--gṛhapate, nanvayaṃ sattvo mandabhāgyo na kālagata
XXdivyav_u:7232: te kathayanti--gṛhapate, vayaṃ śamāttaśikṣāḥ, tvameva jñāsyasīti/
XXdivyav_u:7234: 167.002. tasyāḥ sarvaḥ kāyo dagdhaḥ sthāpayitvā kukṣisāmantakam/
XXdivyav_u:7238: 167.004. taṃ dṛṣṭvā anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi paraṃ vismayamupagatāni/
XXdivyav_u:7243: 167.007. te kathayanti--gṛhapate, yadi prajvalitāmetāṃ citāṃ pravekṣyasi,
XXdivyav_u:7253: 167.015. tato jīvakaṃ kumārabhūtamidamavocat--jīvaka, māsi kṣata upahato
XXdivyav_u:7254: veti? sa kathayati--rājakule 'haṃ bhadanta jāto rājakule vṛddhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7262: 167.019. te kathayanti--gṛhapate, ayaṃ sattvo 'tīva mandabhāgyo yo hi nāma sarvabhakṣeṇāpyagninā na dagdhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7263: 167.020. kiṃ bahunā? yadyevaṃ gṛhaṃ praveśayasi, nīyatām/
XXdivyav_u:7264: 167.020. te gṛhamutsādayad bhaviṣyasi, tvaṃ ca prāṇairviyujyasa iti/
XXdivyav_u:7270: 167.023. tataḥ samantato nirīkṣya kathayati--bhagavan, kiṃ bhavatu asya
XXdivyav_u:7273: 167.025. tato bhagavatā tasya janakāyasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā bahubhiḥ sattvaśatairmahān viśeṣo 'dhigataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7276: kaiściduṣmagatāni kuśalamūlānyutpāditāni, kaiścinmūrdhānaḥ, kaiścit mṛdumadhyāḥ kṣāntayaḥ, kaiścicchrāvakabodhau cittānyutpāditāni, kaiścit
XXdivyav_u:7279: 167.031. yadbhūyasā sā parṣadbuddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
XXdivyav_u:7280: 167.032. jyotiṣko dārako rājñā bimbisāreṇa aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradatto
XXdivyav_u:7283: 168.002. so 'ṣṭhābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena
XXdivyav_u:7286: 168.004. tena śrutam yathā mama bhaginī sattvavatī saṃvṛttā/
XXdivyav_u:7288: divyāmānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyati, mama śāsane pravrajya
XXdivyav_u:7291: 168.007. tena śrutam yathā sā asmākaṃ bhaginī kālagateti/
XXdivyav_u:7292: 168.008. śrutvā ca punaḥ saṃlakṣayati--bhagavatā asau vyākṛtā putraṃ
XXdivyav_u:7296: 168.010. mā haiva tabhagavato bhāṣitaṃ vitathaṃ syāt/
XXdivyav_u:7297: 168.010. tena tiraḥprātiveśyāḥ pṛṣṭāh--śrutaṃ mayā asmākaṃ bhaginī
XXdivyav_u:7299: 168.011. sā bhagavatā vyākṛtā putraṃ janayiṣyati, kulamuddyotayiṣyati,
XXdivyav_u:7300: divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyati, mama śāsane pravrajya
XXdivyav_u:7304: 168.014. mā haiva bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ vitathaṃ syāditi/
XXdivyav_u:7306: 168.015. sacandratāraṃ prapatedihāmbaraṃ mahī saśailā savanā nabho vrajet/
XXdivyav_u:7307: 168.017. mahodadhīnāmudakaṃ kṣayaṃ vrajenmaharṣayaḥ syūr na mṛṣābhidhāyinaḥ//13//
XXdivyav_u:7309: 168.019. kathaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ vitathaṃ bhaviṣyati? kiṃ tu tena
XXdivyav_u:7310: svāmināpi asau tathā tathā upakrāntā, yathā kālagatā/
XXdivyav_u:7314: 168.021. sa subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--na yuktaṃ gṛhapate tvayā kṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:7315: 168.022. kiṃ kṛtam? asmākaṃ sattvavatī bhaginī tvayā nirgranthavigrāhitena tathā tathā upakrāntā, yathā kālagatā/
XXdivyav_u:7323: rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu cāvaraṇaṃ niścārayāmah--asmākaṃ bhaginī subhadreṇa gṛhapatinā
XXdivyav_u:7328: 168.028. yathaiṣa paribhāṣate, nūnamevaṃ karomīti viditvā rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--deva, mama jñātaya evaṃ paribhāṣante--yadi tāvat kumāramānayasītyevaṃ kuśalam, no cedānayasi, vayaṃ tvāṃ jñātimadhyādutkṣipāmaḥ, saṃkāraṃ pātayāmaḥ, rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu cāvaraṇaṃ niścārayāmah--asmākaṃ bhaginī subhadreṇa gṛhapatinā praghātitā/
XXdivyav_u:7333: 169.001. rājā kathayati--gṛhapate, na mayā tvatsakāśāt jyotiṣkaḥ kumāro gṛhītaḥ, kiṃ tu bhagavatā mama nyastaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7336: 169.003. pādayor nipatya kathayati--bhagavan, mama jñātaya evaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7338: 169.004. no cedānayasi, vayaṃ tvāṃ jñātimadhyādutkṣipāmaḥ, saṃkāraṃ
XXdivyav_u:7345: 169.007. bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--yadi subhadro jyotiṣkaṃ kumāraṃ na
XXdivyav_u:7346: labhate, sthānametadvidyate yaduṣṇaṃ rudhiraṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:7347: 169.008. iti viditvā āyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate--gaccha ānanda, rājānaṃ bimbisāraṃ madvacanenārogyaya, evaṃ ca vada--anuprayaccha mahārāja subhadrasya gṛhapaterjyotiṣkaṃ kumāram/
XXdivyav_u:7348: 169.010. yadi subhadro gṛhapatirjyotiṣkaṃ kumāraṃ na labhate,
XXdivyav_u:7349: sthānametadvidyate yaduṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyatīti/
XXdivyav_u:7350: 169.012. evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yena rājā
XXdivyav_u:7353: ārogyayati, kathayati ca--anuprayaccha mahārāja subhadrasya gṛhapaterjyotiṣkaṃ kumāram/
XXdivyav_u:7354: 169.014. yadi subhadro gṛhapatirjyotiṣkaṃ kumāraṃ na labhate,
XXdivyav_u:7355: sthānametadvidyate yat subhadro gṛhapatiruṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7360: 169.017. rājā bimbisāraḥ kathayati--gṛhapate, mayā ayaṃ kumāraḥ
XXdivyav_u:7363: 169.018. samayato 'haṃ muñcāmi, yadi māṃ divase divase triṣkālaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmatīti/
XXdivyav_u:7365: 169.020. ko 'nya upasaṃkramitavya iti? sa rājñā sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7367: 169.022. ācaritametallokasya--na tāvat putrasya nāma prajñāyate yāvat pitā
XXdivyav_u:7372: 169.024. buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7373: 169.024. tena yasmin pradeśe tena subhadreṇa patnī āghātitā, tasmin pradeśe vihāraṃ kārayitvā sarvāpakaraṇasampūrṇaścāturdiśāryabhikṣusaṃghāya niryātitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7374: 169.026. tathā sthavirairapi sūtrānta upanibaddham--bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati mṛditakukṣike dāva iti//
XXdivyav_u:7375: 169.028. subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ pauruṣeyā ye paṇyamādāya deśāntaraṃ gatāḥ,
XXdivyav_u:7378: 169.029. sa buddhe 'bhiprasanno dharme saṃghe 'bhiprasanno buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gata iti/
XXdivyav_u:7383: 169.032. ghaṇḍāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--nedaṃ kenacit viṣṭayā vā <170>śītayā vā karkaṭakena vā
XXdivyav_u:7384: 170.001. ya etacchramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā maharddhiko vā mahānubhāvah ṛddhyā
XXdivyav_u:7392: 170.005. yāvat sthavirasthavirā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7393: 170.006. tairdṛṣṭvā tairapi jyotiṣko gṛhapatiḥ pṛṣṭah--kimetaditi? tena tathaiva vistareṇa
XXdivyav_u:7394: 170.007. te kathayanti--gṛhapate, kiṃ pātramātrasyārthāyātmānaṃ saṃprakāśayāmah? uktaṃ bhagavatā--pracchannakalyāṇairvo bhikṣavo vihartavyaṃ dhūtapāpairityuktvā prakrāntāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7397: 170.010. āyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapaḥ saṃlakṣayati--yena mayā anādikālopacitaṃ kleśagaṇaṃ vāntaṃ tyaktaṃ charditaṃ pratinisṛṣṭam, taṃ māṃ gṛhapatistīrthikasādhāraṇayā ṛddhyā āhvayati/
XXdivyav_u:7400: 170.012. sa tadgṛhītvā vihāraṃ gato bhikṣubhirucyate--sthavira, kutastava gośīrṣacandanamayaṃ pātramiti? tena yathāvṛttamārocitam/
XXdivyav_u:7402: ṛddhiṃ vidarśayitumiti? kathayati--āyuṣmantaḥ, kalpatu vā mā vā/
XXdivyav_u:7404: 170.015. kiṃ kriyatāmiti? etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti/
XXdivyav_u:7408: 170.017. api tu catvāri pātrāṇi suvarṇamayaṃ rūpyamayaṃ varḍūryamayaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7410: 170.018. aparāṇyapi catvāri pātrāṇi rītimayaṃ tāmramayaṃ kaṃsamayamabhramayaṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:7411: 170.019. tatra yāni pūrvakāṇi catvāri pātrāṇi, etānyanupasthāpitāni
XXdivyav_u:7416: 170.022. api tvadhīṣṭāni te dve pātre āyasaṃ mṛṇmayam/
XXdivyav_u:7417: 170.022. yāvadapareṇa samayena jyotiṣkasya gṛhapaterdivyamānuṣī śrīḥ prādurbhūtā/
XXdivyav_u:7418: 170.023. antarā ca rājagṛhamantarā ca campāmatrāntare śulkaśālā/
XXdivyav_u:7421: 170.024. tena putrāṇāṃ svapnadarśanaṃ dattam--yaḥ kaścit paṇyamaśulkayitvā gamiṣyati, sā ghaṇṭā tāvadviraviṣyati yāvadasau nivartya śulkaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7423: 170.027. taistaṃ svapnaṃ saṃbandhibāndhavānāṃ nivedya divasatithimuhūrtena tasmin pradeśe yakṣasthānaṃ kāritam/
XXdivyav_u:7427: 170.030. sā brāhmaṇī saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ brāhmaṇo yaistairupāyairdhanopārjanaṃ karoti/
XXdivyav_u:7433: 171.001. tayā brāhmaṇa uktah--brāhmaṇa, asyā yamalyāḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasraṃ
XXdivyav_u:7436: 171.002. yadi kaścit yācati, kārṣāpaṇasahasreṇa dātavyā, no cedapattanaṃ ghoṣayitvā anyatra
XXdivyav_u:7439: 171.004. so 'pattanaṃ ghoṣayitvā tām yamalīṃ chatradaṇḍe prakṣipya sārthena sārdhaṃ rājagṛhaṃ saṃprasthito yāvadanupūrveṇa śulkaśālāmanuprāptaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7443: 171.007. śailkikāḥ kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, yatheyaṃ ghaṇṭā raṇati, nūnaṃ sārtho na nipuṇaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7451: bhūyo bhūyaḥ pratinivartayadhvamiti? tairasau dvidhā kṛtvā muktaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7452: 171.011. yeṣāṃ madhye sa brāhmaṇo nāsti, te 'tikrāntāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7453: 171.012. anyeṣāṃ gacchatāṃ sā ghaṇṭā tathaiva raṭitumārabdhā/
XXdivyav_u:7455: 171.013. evaṃ tāvat dvidhākṛtāḥ, yāvat sa caiko brāhmaṇo 'vasthita iti/
XXdivyav_u:7460: 171.015. tairasau brāhmaṇaḥ pratinivartyoktah--bho brāhmaṇa kathaya, naiva śulkaṃ dāpayāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7461: 171.016. kiṃ tu devasyaiva sānnidhyaṃ jñātaṃ bhavatīti/
XXdivyav_u:7464: 171.017. te paraṃ vismayamāpannāh--bhavantaḥ, īdṛśamapi devasya sānnidhyamiti/
XXdivyav_u:7466: 171.018. brāhmaṇaḥ kathayati--yūyaṃ kathayatha śulkaṃ na dāpayāma iti/
XXdivyav_u:7469: 171.020. api devasyaitat sānnidhyamiti kṛtvā asmābhiḥ prāvṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7471: 171.021. sa taṃ punargṛhītvā punaśchatranāḍikāyāṃ prakṣipya prakrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7474: 171.022. tatrāpi tāṃ na kaścit kārṣāpaṇasahasreṇa yācate/
XXdivyav_u:7476: 171.023. jyotiṣkaśca kumāro rājakulānniṣkramya hastiskandhābhirūḍho vīthīmadhyena svagṛhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7479: 171.025. jyotiṣkeṇoktah--bho brāhmaṇa, kimarthaṃ tvam apattanaṃ ghoṣayasi?
XXdivyav_u:7499: aparibhuktaka iti, sa kaṇṭakavāṭasyopariṣṭāt kṣipto 'sajjamāno gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7501: 172.002. sa brāhmaṇo bhūyasyā mātrayā abhiprasannaḥ kathayati--gṛhapate,
XXdivyav_u:7509: 172.005. jyotiṣkeṇa tato yaḥ paribhuktakaḥ sa dārakāya dattaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:7512: 172.007. jyotiṣkasya sa snānaśāṭaka upari gṛhasyābhyavakāśe śoṣito vāyunā hriyamāṇo rājño bimbisārasyopari patitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7515: 172.009. te kathayanti--deva, śrūyate rājño māndhātuḥ saptāhaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ patitam/
XXdivyav_u:7524: 172.014. rājā kathayati--kumāra, tvaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛto divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti/
XXdivyav_u:7530: 172.016. sa vismṛtya kathayati--deva, madīyo 'yaṃ snānaśāṭako vāyunopakṣipta ihāgata iti/
XXdivyav_u:7531: 172.017. kumāra, tava divyamānuṣyakī śrīḥ prādurbhūtā? deva, prādurbhūtā/
XXdivyav_u:7532: 172.018. kumāra, yadyevam, kimarthaṃ na nimantrayasi? deva, nimantrito
XXdivyav_u:7535: 172.019. deva, yasya divyamānuṣī śrīḥ prādurbhūtā, kiṃ tena sajjīkartavyam? nanu sajjīkṛtameva,
XXdivyav_u:7545: 172.023. jyotiṣkaḥ kathayati--deva, ayamapi na vadhūjanaḥ, kiṃ tu madhyo
XXdivyav_u:7551: 172.026. jyotiṣkaḥ kathayati--deva kasyārthe upānahau apanayasīti? sa
XXdivyav_u:7554: 172.028. sa kathayati--kumāra, ime matsyā upari bhramantaḥ paśyanti/
XXdivyav_u:7562: 172.031. rājā kathayati--kumāra, kasmādayaṃ vadhūjano roditi? deva nāyaṃ roditi, kiṃ tu devasya kāṣṭhadhūmena vastrāṇi dhūpitāni, tena
XXdivyav_u:7564: 173.001. rājā tatra divyamānuṣyā śriyā upacaryamāṇaḥ pramatto na
XXdivyav_u:7567: 173.002. amātyairajātaśatruḥ kumāro 'bhibhūtah--kumāra, devo jyotiṣkasya gṛhaṃ praviśya
XXdivyav_u:7569: 173.003. tena gatvā uktah--deva, kimatra praviśyāvasthitah? amātyāḥ
XXdivyav_u:7571: 173.005. sa kathayati--kumāra, na śaknoṣi tvamekaṃ divasaṃ rājyaṃ kārayitum? kiṃ devo jānīte--mamaiko divasaḥ praviṣṭasaya? adya devasya saptamo divaso vartate/
XXdivyav_u:7572: 173.006. rājā jyotiṣkasya mukhaṃ nirīkṣya kathayati--kumāra satyam? deva
XXdivyav_u:7575: 173.007. kumāra, kathaṃ rātrijñāyate divaso vā? deva, puṣpāṇāṃ saṃkocavikāsānmaṇīnāṃ jvalanājvalanayogācchakunīnāṃ ca kūjanākūjanāt/
XXdivyav_u:7576: 173.009. santi tāni puṣpāṇi yāni rātrau vikasanti, divā mlāyanti? santi yāni divā vikasanti rātrau mlāyanti? santi te maṇayo ye rātrau jvālanti,
XXdivyav_u:7577: na divā? santi ye divā jvalanti, na rātrau? santi te śakunayo ye rātrau kūjanti, na divā? santi ye divā kūjñati, na rātrau? rājā vismayamāpannaḥ kathayati--kumāra, avitathavādī bhagavān/
XXdivyav_u:7578: 173.013. yathā tvaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtastathaiva nānyathetyuktvā jyotiṣkagṛhāt niṣkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7579: 173.014. ajātaśatrukumāreṇa jyotiṣkasantako maṇirapahṛtya dārakasya haste dattaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7581: 173.015. ajātaśatruḥ kathayati--dāraka, ānaya taṃ maṇiṃ paśyāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:7582: 173.015. sa muṣṭhiṃ vighāṭya kathayati--kumāra, na jāne kutra gata iti/
XXdivyav_u:7587: 173.018. sa kathayati--kumāra, na tvayā apahṛto nāpyanena, api tu yata eva tvayā gṛhītastatraiva gatvā avasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7588: 173.019. api tu kumāra, svakaṃ te gṛham/
XXdivyav_u:7592: 173.021. yadā ajātaśatruṇā devadattavigrāhitena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo
XXdivyav_u:7593: jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ, svayameva ca paṭṭaṃ baddhvā pratitiṣṭhitaḥ, tadā tena jyotiṣko 'bhihitah--gṛhapate, tvaṃ mama bhrātā bhavasi/
XXdivyav_u:7595: 173.024. sa saṃlakṣayati--yena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ praghātitaḥ, sa māṃ marṣayatīti kuta etat? nūnamayaṃ madgṛhamāgacchatu, kāmaṃ prayacchāmīti viditvā kathayati--deva, vibhaktameva, kimatra vibhaktavyam?
XXdivyav_u:7603: 173.029. ajātaśatruḥ saṃlakṣayate--evamapi mayā na śakitaṃ jyotiṣkasya
XXdivyav_u:7613: 174.001. teṣām yo yatrābhirūḍhaḥ sa tatraivāsthito yāvat prabhātā rajanī saṃvṛttā/
XXdivyav_u:7615: 174.002. te kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, anena kalirājena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:7617: 174.003. tatkiṃ na me moṣiṣyata iti? purakṣobho jātaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7618: 174.004. ajātaśatruṇā jyotiṣkasay dūto 'nupreṣitah--muñcata mamāyaṃ khalīkāra saṃlakṣayate--yena nāma pitā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ, sa māṃ na
XXdivyav_u:7619: praghātayitṣyatīti kuta etat? sarvathā ahaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtah--mama
XXdivyav_u:7624: 174.009. atha jyotiṣko gṛhapatiḥ suhṛtsambandhibāndhavānavalokya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7625: 174.010. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7629: 174.012. sa bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitah--ehi bhikṣo, cara
XXdivyav_u:7634: 174.016. ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaśca saṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7637: 174.020. tenodyacchamānena vyāyacchamānena idameva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatyasarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:7641: 174.025. bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā jyotiṣkeṇa karma kṛtam yena
XXdivyav_u:7642: citāmāropitaḥ, divyamānuṣī śrīḥ prādurbhūtā, bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajya
XXdivyav_u:7647: 174.029. ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ kārmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante
XXdivyav_u:7650: 175.002. sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//15//
XXdivyav_u:7651: 175.003. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣava ekanavatikalpe vipaśyī nāma śāstā loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato
XXdivyav_u:7652: lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān/
XXdivyav_u:7653: 175.005. dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāro janapadacārikāṃ caran bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāpto bandhumatyāṃ viharati sma bandhumatīyake dāve/
XXdivyav_u:7654: 175.006. tena khalu samayena bandhumatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ bandhumān nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsampannam/
XXdivyav_u:7656: 175.009. tasyānaṅgaṇo nāma gṛhapatirāḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
XXdivyav_u:7659: 175.011. na tu kadācit traimāsīṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravāritaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7660: 175.012. yannvahaṃ vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ traimāsīṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārayeyam/
XXdivyav_u:7662: 175.013. upasaṃkramya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā
XXdivyav_u:7664: 175.014. ekāntaniṣaṇṇamanaṅgaṇaṃ gṛhapatiṃ vipaśyī samyakasmbuddho dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
XXdivyav_u:7665: 175.015. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya
XXdivyav_u:7667: 175.016. athānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatirutthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena vipaśyī samyaksambuddhastenāñjaliṃ praṇamya vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhamidavocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavāṃs traimāsīṃ
XXdivyav_u:7672: vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt
XXdivyav_u:7674: 175.021. aśrauṣīdbandhumān rājā--vipaśyī samyaksambuddho dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāro janapadacārikāṃ caran bandhumatīmanuprāpto bandhumatyāṃ viharati bandhumatīye dāve iti/
XXdivyav_u:7675: 175.023. śrutvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat--bahuśo mayā bhagavānantargṛhe upanimantrya bhojitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7676: 175.023. na tu kadācit traimāsīṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravāritaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7680: 175.025. upasaṃkramya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā
XXdivyav_u:7682: 175.026. ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ bandhumantaṃ rājānaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā
XXdivyav_u:7684: 175.027. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya
XXdivyav_u:7686: 175.028. atha bandhumān rājā utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena
XXdivyav_u:7690: 175.031. adhivāsayatu bhagavān, ahaṃ tathā kariṣye yathā anaṅgaṇo gṛhapatirājñāsyati/
XXdivyav_u:7691: 175.032. sacet te mahārāja anaṅgaṇo <176>gṛhapatiranujānīte, evaṃ te 'hamadhivāsayāmi/
XXdivyav_u:7692: 176.001. atha bandhumān rājā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrānto yena svaṃ nirveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7693: 176.003. bandhumān rājā anaṅgaṇaṃ gṛhapatiṃ dūtena prakrośyedamavocat--yatkhalu gṛhapate jānīyāt--ahaṃ tvatprathamato vipaśyinaṃ samyakasmbuddhaṃ bhojayāmi, tataḥ paścāt tavāpi na duṣkaraṃ bhaviṣyati vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ bhojayitumiti/
XXdivyav_u:7697: 176.006. rājā kathayati--gṛhapate, yadyapyevam, tathāpi tvaṃ mama
XXdivyav_u:7699: 176.007. nārhāmyahaṃ tvatprathamato bhojayitum? deva, yadyapyahaṃ tava viṣayanivāsī, tathāpi yena pūrvanimantritaḥ sa eva bhojayati/
XXdivyav_u:7702: 176.009. api tu yo bhaktottarikayā jeṣyati, so 'vaśiṣṭaṃ kālaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7705: 176.010. tathā anaṅgaṇo gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyamevotthāyodakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato
XXdivyav_u:7706: dūtena kālamārocayati--samayo bhadanta, sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate/
XXdivyav_u:7707: 176.012. atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya
XXdivyav_u:7710: 176.015. athānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
XXdivyav_u:7711: 176.016. anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya/
XXdivyav_u:7712: 176.018. atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddho 'naṅgaṇaṃ gṛhapatiṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
XXdivyav_u:7713: 176.020. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya prakrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7717: 176.022. tato bandhumān rājā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7718: 176.022. amātyāḥ kathayanti--deva, kasmāt tvaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparastiṣṭhasīti? sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, kathamahaṃ na cintāparastiṣṭhāmi yo 'haṃ mama viṣayanivāsinaṃ kuṭumbinaṃ na śaknomi bhaktottarikayā parājayitum? te kathayanti, deva, tasya gṛhapateḥ kāṣṭhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7722: 176.026. bhavantaḥ, na kenacit madviṣayanivāsinā kāṣṭhaṃ vikretavyam/
XXdivyav_u:7723: 176.027. yo vikrīṇīte, tena madviṣaye na vastavyamiti/
XXdivyav_u:7726: 176.028. surabhiṇā gandhena sarvā bandhumatī nagarī sphuṭā saṃvṛttā/
XXdivyav_u:7727: 176.029. bandhumān rājā pṛcchati--bhavantaḥ, kuta eṣa manojñagandha iti?
XXdivyav_u:7730: 176.030. kiṃ mama vibhavo nāstīti? amātyāḥ kathayanti--deva, kasyārthe evaṃ kriyate? ayaṃ gṛhapatiraputro nacirāt kālaṃ kariṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:7735: 177.002. tena cittaṃ pradūṣya kharā vāg niścārita--tāvanme
XXdivyav_u:7736: bhaktakāṣṭhamasti, yenāham enaṃ sahāmātyaṃ citāmāropya dhmāpayāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:7737: 177.003. rājā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7738: 177.004. amātyāḥ kathayanti--deva, kimarthaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā
XXdivyav_u:7741: 177.005. vayaṃ tathā kariṣyāmo yathā devaścānaṅgaṇaṃ gṛhapatiṃ
XXdivyav_u:7743: 177.006. tairaparasmin divase bandhumatī rājadhānī apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhalyā vyavasthāpitā candanavāripariṣiktā surabhidhūpaghaṭikopanibanddhā āmuktapaṭṭadāmakalāpā ucchritadhvajapatākā nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇā nandanavanodyānasadṛśā/
XXdivyav_u:7747: 177.011. tato bandhumān rājā dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayamāpannaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7749: dūtena kālamārocayati--samaye bhadanta, sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
XXdivyav_u:7750: 177.014. atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya
XXdivyav_u:7751: bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena bandhumato rājño bhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7753: 177.017. bandhumato rājño maṅgalyābhiṣeko hastināgo vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya śataśalākaṃ chatramupari mūrdhno dhārayati, avaśiṣṭā hastināhā bhikṣūṇām/
XXdivyav_u:7754: 177.018. bandhumato rājño 'gramahiṣī vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ sauvarṇena maṇivālavyajanena vījayati, avaśiṣṭā antaḥpurikā avaśiṣṭānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:7756: 177.020. anaṅgaṇena gṛhapatinā avacarakaḥ puruṣaḥ preṣitah--gaccha bhoḥ
XXdivyav_u:7757: puruṣa, paśya kīdṛśenāhāreṇa bandhumān rājā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7763: 177.023. so 'pi tāṃ vibhūtiṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ viṣādamāpannaḥ saṃlakṣayati--śakyamanyat saṃpādayitum/
XXdivyav_u:7764: 177.024. kiṃ tu hastināmantaḥpurasya ca kuto mama vibhavah? iti viditvā niveśanaṃ gato dauvārikaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--bhoḥ puruṣa, yadi kaścidyācanaka āgacchati, sa yat prārthayate taddātavyam, no tu praveśaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7770: 177.029. iti viditvā kauśiko brāhmaṇaveṣamabhinirmāya yenānaṅgaṇasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7772: anaṅgaṇasya gṛhapateḥ kathaya--kauśikagotro brāhmaṇo dvāre tiṣṭhati
XXdivyav_u:7774: 177.031. sa kathayati--brāhmaṇa, gṛhapatinā ahaṃ sthāpitah--yaḥ kaścid yācanaka āgacchati, sa yat prāthayate<178>, taddātavyaṃ na tu praveśa iti/
XXdivyav_u:7776: 178.001. kiṃ te gṛhapatinā dṛṣṭeneti? sa kathayati--bhoḥ puruṣa, na mama kenacit prayojanam/
XXdivyav_u:7779: 178.003. tenānaṅgaṇasya gṛhapatergatvā niveditam--ārya, kauśikasagotro brāhmaṇo dvāre tiṣṭhati āryaṃ draṣṭukāma iti/
XXdivyav_u:7780: 178.004. sa kathayati--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa, yena taysa prayojanaṃ tat
XXdivyav_u:7781: prayaccha--kiṃ tenātra praviṣṭeneti? sa kathayati--ārya, ukto mayā evaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7782: kathayati--nāhaṃ kiṃcit prārthayāmi, api tu gṛhapatimeva draṣṭukāma iti/
XXdivyav_u:7785: 178.007. brāhmaṇaḥ kathayati--kasmāt tvaṃ gṛhapate kare kapolaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7787: 178.009. na tasya kathayecchokam yaḥ śokānna pramocayet/
XXdivyav_u:7789: 178.011. śakraḥ kathayati--gṛhapate, kastava śokah? kathaya, ahaṃ te śokātpramocayāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:7791: 178.012. atha śakro devendraḥ kauśikabrāhmaṇarūpamantardhāpy svarūpeṇa sthitvā kathayati--gṛhapate, viśvakarmā te devaputraḥ sāhāyyaṃ kalpayiṣyatītyuktvā prakrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7792: 178.013. atha śakro devendro devāṃstrāyastriṃśān gatvā viśvakarmāṇaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7795: 178.015. paraṃ bhadraṃ tava kauśiketi viśvakarmaṇā devaputreṇa śakrasya devendrasya pratiśrutya
XXdivyav_u:7796: 178.016. prativiśiṣṭatarā nagaraśobhā nirmitā, divyo maṇḍalavāṭo divyāsanaprajñaptirdivya āhāraḥ samanvāhṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7797: 178.017. airāvaṇo nāgarājo vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya śataśalākaṃ chatramupari mūrdhno dhārayati, avaśiṣṭā nāgā avaśiṣṭānāṃ bhikṣūṇām/
XXdivyav_u:7798: 178.018. śacī devakanyā vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ sauvarṇena maṇivālavyajanena vījayati, avaśiṣṭā apsaraso bhikṣūn/
XXdivyav_u:7799: 178.019. bandhumatā rājñā avacarakaḥ puruṣaḥ preṣitah--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa,
XXdivyav_u:7801: sa puruṣastatra gatastāṃ vibhūtiṃ dṛṣṭvā tatraiva avasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7806: 178.022. tato bandhumān rājā svayameva taddvāraṃ gatvā avasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7807: 178.023. vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ kathayati--gṛhapate, bandhumān rājā dṛṣṭasatyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7811: 178.025. tenāsau nirgatya kṣamita uktaśca--mahārāja, praviśa svahastena pariveṣaṇaṃ kuru/
XXdivyav_u:7814: 178.026. dṛṣṭvā ca paraṃ vismayamāpannaḥ kathayati--gṛhapate, tvamevaiko
XXdivyav_u:7815: 'rhasi dine dine buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayituṃ na vayaṃtī/
XXdivyav_u:7816: 178.027. athānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatirvipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhamanayā vibhūtyā traimāsyaṃ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7817: kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kārā kṛtā, anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam, divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaveyam, evaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhī syām, evaṃvidhameva śāstāramārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyamiti//
XXdivyav_u:7818: 179.001. <179>kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau anaṅgaṇo nāma gṛhapatiḥ, eṣa evāsau jyotiṣkaḥ kulaputrastena kālena tena samayena/
XXdivyav_u:7819: 179.002. yadanena bandhumato rājño dṛṣṭasatyasyāntike kharā vāgniścāritā,
XXdivyav_u:7820: tasya karmaṇo vipākena pañcaśatāni samātṛkaścitāyāmāropya dhmāpitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7822: 179.004. yadvipaśyini tathāgate kārāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam, tasya karmaṇo vipākena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7825: 179.006. ahamanena vipaśyinā samyaksambuddhena sārdhaṃ samajavaḥ samabalaḥ
XXdivyav_u:7826: samadhuraḥ samasāmānyaprāptaḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7827: 179.007. iti hi bhikṣavah ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:7829: 179.009. tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi
XXdivyav_u:7838: 180.001. ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane
XXdivyav_u:7840: 180.002. satkṛto bhagavān gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito bhikṣubhirbhikṣuṇībhirupāsakairupāsikābhī rājabhī rājamātrair
XXdivyav_u:7846: 'bhyudgatah--ityapi sa bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
XXdivyav_u:7848: 180.009. sa imaṃ sadevakaṃ lokaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇīṃ prajāṃ sadevamānuṣīṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya pravedayate/
XXdivyav_u:7849: 180.011. sa dharmaṃ deśayati ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye paryavasāne kalyāṇam/
XXdivyav_u:7850: 180.012. svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7852: 180.013. tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--sacedbhikṣavaḥ sattvā jānīyurdānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam yathāhaṃ jānāmi dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam, apīdānīm yo 'sau
XXdivyav_u:7853: apaścimaḥ kavalaścarama ālopaḥ, tato 'pyadatvā asaṃvibhajya na paribhuñjīran, sacellabheran dakṣiṇīyaṃ pratigrāhakam/
XXdivyav_u:7854: 180.016. na caiṣāmutpannaṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhet/
XXdivyav_u:7855: 180.017. yasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ sattvā na jānante dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam yathāhaṃ jānāmi dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam, tasmāddhetoradattvā asaṃvibhajya paribhujyante āgṛhīteṃś cetasā/
XXdivyav_u:7856: 180.019. utpannaṃ caiṣāṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati/
XXdivyav_u:7859: abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paramayā suvarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7860: 180.022. rājā bhikṣavaḥ kanakavarṇa āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7862: 180.024. rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya khalu bhikṣavaḥ kanakāvatī nāma rājadhānī babhūva pūrveṇa paścimena ca dvādaśa yojayānyāmena, dakṣiṇenottareṇa ca sapta yojanāni ca vistāreṇa/
XXdivyav_u:7863: 180.026. ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca ramaṇīyā ca/
XXdivyav_u:7865: 180.028. aṣṭādaśa kulakoṭī ṛddhāni sphītāni kṣemāṇi subhikṣāṇyākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṇi/
XXdivyav_u:7866: 180.029. saptapañcāśadgrāmakoṭya ṛddhāḥ sphītāḥ kṣemāḥ subhikṣā ramaṇīyā
XXdivyav_u:7868: 180.030. ṣaṣṭiḥ karvaṭasahasrāṇyabhūvann ṛddhāni sphītāni kṣemāṇi subhikṣāṇyākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṇi/
XXdivyav_u:7873: 181.001. <181>athāpareṇa samayena rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya ekākino rahogatasya pratisamlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparivitarkamudapādi--yannvahaṃ sarvavaṇijo 'śulkānagulmān muñceyam/
XXdivyav_u:7876: gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapariṣadyānāmantrayate--adyāgreṇa vo grāmaṇyaḥ sarvavaṇijo 'śulkān muñcāmi, sarvajāmbudvīpakān manuṣyānakārānaśulkān muñcāmi/
XXdivyav_u:7877: 181.005. tasyānenopāyena bahūni varṣāṇi rājyaṃ kārayato 'pareṇa samayena nakṣatraṃ viṣamībhūtam, dvādaśa varṣāṇi devo na varṣati/
XXdivyav_u:7878: 181.006. atha brāhmaṇā lakṣaṇajñā naimittikā bhūmyantarikṣamantrakuśalā nakṣatraśukragrahacariteṣu tat saṃlakṣayitvā yena rājā kanakavarṇaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:7881: jānīyāt--nakṣatraṃ viṣamībhūtam, dvādaśa varṣāṇi devo na varṣiṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:7882: 181.009. atha rājā kanakavarṇa idamevamrūpaṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā aśrūṇi
XXdivyav_u:7883: pravartayati--aho bata me jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ, aho bata me jambudvīpah ṛddhaḥ sphītaḥ kṣemaḥ subhikṣo ramaṇīyo bahujanākīrṇamanuṣyo nacirādeva śūnyo bhaviṣyati rahitamanuṣyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7884: 181.012. atha rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya muhūrtaṃ śocitvā etadabhavat--ya ime āḍhyā mahādhanā mahābhogāḥ, te śakṣyanti yāpayitum/
XXdivyav_u:7885: 181.013. ya ime daridrā alpadhanā alpānnapānabhogāḥ, te katham yāpayiṣyanti? tasyaitadabhavat--yannvahaṃ jambudvīpādannādyaṃ saṃhareyam,
XXdivyav_u:7887: 181.015. atha gaṇayitvā māpayeyam, māpayitvā sarvagrāmanagaranigamakarvaṭarājadhānīṣvekaṃ koṣṭhāgāraṃ kārayeyam/
XXdivyav_u:7888: 181.016. ekaṃ koṣṭhāgāraṃ kārayitvā sarvajāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ samaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7892: grāmaṇyaḥ, sarvajambudvīpādannādyaṃ saṃhṛtya gaṇayata, gaṇayitvā māpayata,
XXdivyav_u:7895: 181.019. paraṃ deveti gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapāriṣadyā rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya pratiśrutya sarvajambudvīpādannādyaṃ gaṇayanti, gaṇayitvā
XXdivyav_u:7897: 181.021. ekasmin koṣṭhāgāre sthāpayitvā yena rājā kanakavarṇaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:7900: saṃhṛtya gaṇitam, gaṇayitvā māpitam, māpayitvā sarvagrāmanagaranigamarājadhānīṣvekasmin koṣṭhāgāre sathāpitam yasyedānīṃ devaḥ kālaṃ manyate/
XXdivyav_u:7902: etadavocat--gacchata yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ, sarvajāmbudvīpakān manuṣyān gaṇayata, gaṇayitvā grāmaṇyaḥ sarvajāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ samaṃ bhaktaṃ prayacchata/
XXdivyav_u:7903: 181.027. paraṃ deveti saṃkhyāgaṇakalipikapauruṣeyā rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya pratiśrutya sarvajāmbudvīpakān manuṣyān gaṇayanti, saṃgaṇya rājānaṃ kanakavarṇamādau kṛtvā sarvajāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ samaṃ bhaktaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7906: 181.030. nirgato dvādaśasya varṣasyaiko māso yāvadbahavaḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikā jighatsitāḥ pipāsitāḥ kālaṃ kurvanti/
XXdivyav_u:7907: 181.031. ten khalu punaḥ samayena sarvajambudvīpādannādyaṃ parikṣīṇamanyatra rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyaikā mānikā bhaktasyāvaśiṣṭā//
XXdivyav_u:7910: 182.002. adrākṣīd bodhisattvo 'nyatarasmin banaṣaṇḍe putraṃ mātrā sārdhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7913: saṃkliśyanti bateme sattvāḥ, yatra hi nāma asyāmeva nava māsān kukṣau
XXdivyav_u:7914: uṣitvā, asyā eva stanau pītvā, atraiva kālaṃ kariṣyati iti/
XXdivyav_u:7918: 182.006. ka utsahata īdṛśānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya bodhisattvacaryāṃ caritum?
XXdivyav_u:7922: 182.008. paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya pañcasūpādānaskandheṣūdayavyayānudarśī viharati yadutedaṃ rūpam, ayaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7923: rūpasamudayaḥ, ayaṃ rūpasyāstaṃgamaḥ, iyaṃ vedanā, iyaṃ saṃjñā, ime
XXdivyav_u:7924: saṃkrārāḥ, idaṃ vijñānam, ayaṃ vijñānasamudayaḥ, ayaṃ vijñānasyāstaṃgama iti/
XXdivyav_u:7925: 182.011. sa evaṃ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣūdayavyayānudarśī viharannacirādeva yatkiṃcit samudayadharmakaṃ tat sarvaṃ nirodhadharmakamiti viditvā tatraiva pratyekāṃ bodhimadhigatavān/
XXdivyav_u:7926: 182.013. atha bhagavān pratyekabuddho yathāprāptānavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:7928: 182.014. saṃsevamānasya bhavanti snehāḥ snehānvayaṃ saṃbhavatīha duḥkham/
XXdivyav_u:7930: 182.018. atha tasya bhagavataḥ pratyekabuddhasyaitadabhavat--bahūnāṃ me sattvānāmarthāya duṣkarāṇi cīrṇāni, na ca kasyacit sattvasya hitaṃ kṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:7931: 182.019. kamadyāhamanukampeyam, kasyāhamadya piṇḍapātamāhṛtya paribhuñjīya? atha bhagavān pratyekabuddho divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa sarvāvantamimaṃ jambudvīpaṃ
XXdivyav_u:7932: samantādanuvilokayannadrākṣīt sa bhagavān pratyekabuddhaḥ sarvajambudvīpādannādyaṃ parikṣīṇam, anyatra rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyaikā
XXdivyav_u:7935: 182.023. yannvahaṃ rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya niveśanāt piṇḍapātamahṛtya paribhuñjīya/
XXdivyav_u:7936: 182.024. atha bhagavān pratyekabuddhastat eva ṛddhyā vihāyasamabhyudgamya
XXdivyav_u:7937: dṛśyatā kāyena śakuniriva ṛddhyā yena kanakāvatī rājadhānī
XXdivyav_u:7939: 182.025. tena khalu samayena rājā kanakavarṇa upariprāsādatalagato 'bhūt
XXdivyav_u:7941: 182.026. adrākṣīdanyatamo mahāmātrastaṃ bhagavantaṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ dūrata evāgacchantam/
XXdivyav_u:7944: 182.028. dvitīyo mahāmātra evamāha--naiṣa grāmaṇyo lohitapakṣaḥ śakuntaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:7947: 182.030. atha rājā kanakavarṇa ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ mukhaṃ saṃparimārjya
XXdivyav_u:7948: mahāmātrānāmantrayate--naiṣa grāmaṇyo lohitapakṣaḥ śakuntaḥ, na ca rākṣasa
XXdivyav_u:7951: 182.032. atha sa bhagavān pratyekabuddho rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya prāsāde
XXdivyav_u:7954: pratyekabuddhamutthāyāsanāt pratyudgamya pādau śirasā vanditvā prajñapta evāsane niṣīdayati/
XXdivyav_u:7959: 183.004. aśrūṇi pravartayannevamāha--aho me dāridryam, aho dāridryam,
XXdivyav_u:7960: yatra hi nāma jambudvīpaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayitvā ekasyāpi ṛṣerasamarthaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ pratipādayitum/
XXdivyav_u:7961: 183.005. atha yā kanakāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāmadhyuṣitā devatā, sā rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya purastādgāthāṃ
XXdivyav_u:7962: 183.007. kiṃ duḥkhaṃ dāridryaṃ kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ tadeva dāridryam/
XXdivyav_u:7965: bhoḥ puruṣa, mama niveśane kiṃcidbhaktam, yadahamasya ṛṣeḥ pradāsyāmi? sa
XXdivyav_u:7970: 183.012. tasyaitadabhavat--yadi paribhokṣye, yadi vā na paribhokṣye,
XXdivyav_u:7973: 183.013. kathaṃ nāmehedṛśa ṛṣiḥ śīlavān kalyāṇadharmā mama niveśane 'dya
XXdivyav_u:7974: yathādhautena pātreṇa nirgamiṣyati? atha rājā kanakavarṇo
XXdivyav_u:7976: yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ, ayaṃ rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyāpaścima odanātisargaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7977: 183.016. anena kuśalamūlena sarvajāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ dāridryasamucchedaḥ syāt/
XXdivyav_u:7978: 183.017. atha rājā kanakavarṇastasya maharṣestat pātraṃ gṛhītvā ekāṃ mānikāṃ bhaktasya pātre prakṣipya ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā
XXdivyav_u:7979: jānubhyāṃ nipatya tasya bhagavataḥ pratyekabuddhasya dakṣiṇe pāṇau pātraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati/
XXdivyav_u:7980: 183.019. dharmatā punarbhagavatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ kāyikī dharmadeśanā na
XXdivyav_u:7982: 183.020. atha bhagavān pratyekabuddho rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyāntikāt piṇḍapātramādāya tat eva ṛddhyā uparivihāyasā prakrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:7983: 183.022. atha rājā kanakavarṇaḥ prāñjalirbhūtvā tāvadanimiṣaṃ prekṣamāṇo
XXdivyav_u:7987: 183.024. mā ihaiva prāsāde jighatsāpipāsābhyāṃ sarva eva kālaṃ kariṣyatha/
XXdivyav_u:7988: 183.025. ta evamāhuh--yadā devasya śrīsaubhāgyasampadāsīt, tadā vayaṃ devena sārdhaṃ krīḍatā ramatā kathaṃ punarvayamidānīṃ devaṃ paścime kāle
XXdivyav_u:7993: 183.028. mā ihaiva prāsāde jighatsāpipāsābhyāṃ sarva eva kālaṃ kariṣyatha/
XXdivyav_u:7997: 183.030. upasaṃkramya rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya pādau śirasā vanditvā añjaliṃ kṛtvā rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyaitadūcuh--kṣantavyaṃ te yadasmābhiḥ kiṃcidaparāddham/
XXdivyav_u:7999: 184.001. <184>tadyathā tena bhagavatā pratyekabuddhena sa piṇḍapātraḥ paribhuktaḥ, atha tasminneva kṣaṇe samantāccatasṛṣu dikṣu catvāryabhrapaṭalāni vyutthitāni, śītalāśca vāyavo vātumārabdhāḥ, ye jambudvīpādaśuciṃ vyapanayanti, meghāśca pravarṣayantaḥ pāṃśūñ śamayanti/
XXdivyav_u:8000: 184.003. atha tasminneva divase dvitīye 'rdhabhāge vividhasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya varṣaṃ
XXdivyav_u:8002: idamevamrūpaṃ khādanīyaṃ mūlakhādanīyaṃ skandhakhādanīyaṃ patrakhādanīyaṃ puṣpakhādanīyaṃ phalakhādanīyaṃ tilakhādanīyaṃ khaṇḍaśarkaraguḍakhādanīyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:8004: 184.006. atha rājā kanakavarṇo hṛṣṭatuṣṭah udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapārṣadyānāmantrayate--paśyatha yūyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:8007: 184.010. atha dvitīye divase saptāhaṃ dhānyavarṣaṃ pravarṣanti,
XXdivyav_u:8009: 184.011. saptāhaṃ sarpivarṣaṃ pravarṣanti, saptāhaṃ karpāsavarṣaṃ pravarṣanti, saptāhaṃ nānāvidhadūṣyavarṣaṃ pravarṣanti, saptāhaṃ saptaratnānāṃ varṣaṃ pravarṣanti, suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya
XXdivyav_u:8011: 184.013. sarvasya rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyānubhāvena jāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ dāridryasamucchedo
XXdivyav_u:8012: 184.015. syāt khalu bhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena
XXdivyav_u:8013: kālena tena samayena rājā kanakavarṇo babhūva/
XXdivyav_u:8015: 184.016. ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājā kanakavarṇo babhūva/
XXdivyav_u:8017: 184.017. sacedbhikṣavaḥ sattvā jānīyurdānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca
XXdivyav_u:8018: phalavipākam--apīdānīm yo 'sau apaścimakaḥ kavalaścarama ālopaḥ, tato
XXdivyav_u:8019: 'pyadattvā asaṃvibhajya na paribhuñjīran, sacellabheran dakṣiṇīyaṃ pratigrāhakam/
XXdivyav_u:8020: 184.019. na caiṣāmutpannaṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati/
XXdivyav_u:8021: 184.020. yasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ sattvā na jānate dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam--yathā ahaṃ jāne dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam, tasmātte 'dattvā asaṃvibhajya paribhuñjate āgṛhītena cetasā, utpannaṃ caiṣāṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādattaṃ tiṣṭhati/
XXdivyav_u:8022: 184.024. na naśyate pūrvakṛtaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ na naśyate sevanaṃ piṇḍatānām/
XXdivyav_u:8023: 184.026. na naśyate āryajaneṣu bhāṣitaṃ kṛtaṃ kṛtajñeṣu na jātu naśyati//3//
XXdivyav_u:8025: 184.029. asti caitasya vipāko avaśya dāsyate phalam//4//
XXdivyav_u:8027: 184.030. āttamanasaste bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikādevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayaḥ sarvāvatī ca parṣadbhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan//
XXdivyav_u:8031: 185.002. buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe/
XXdivyav_u:8032: 185.002. ācaritamāyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya kālena kālaṃ narakacārikāṃ carituṃ tiryakcārikāṃ carituṃ pretacārikāṃ devacārikāṃ manuṣyacārikāṃ
XXdivyav_u:8034: 185.004. sa yāni tāni nārakāṇāṃ sattvānāmutpāṭānupāṭanacchedanabhedanādīni duḥkhāni, tiraścāmanyonyabhakṣaṇādīni, pretānāṃ kṣuttṛṣādīni, devānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:8035: cyavanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanādīni, manuṣyāṇāṃ paryeṣṭicyasanādīni duḥkhāni, tāni dṛṣṭvā jambudvīpamāgatya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāmārocayati/
XXdivyav_u:8036: 185.007. yasya kasyacit sārdhaṃvihārī antevāsī vā anabhirato brahmacaryaṃ
XXdivyav_u:8037: carati, sa tamādāya yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanastenopasaṃkrāmati, āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana enaṃ samyagavavadiṣyati, anuśāsiṣyatīti/
