XXdivyav_u:8039: 185.010. evamaparamaparaṃ te āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena samyagavavāditāḥ samyaganuśiṣṭā abhiratā brahmacaryaṃ caranti, uttare ca viśeṣamadhigacchanti/
XXdivyav_u:8040: 185.011. tena khalu samayenāuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaścatasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhirākīrṇo viharati bhikṣubhirbhikṣuṇībhirupāsakairupāsikābhiśca/
XXdivyav_u:8044: kālena kālaṃ narakacārikāṃ carituṃ tiryakcarikāṃ pretacārikāṃ devacārikāṃ manuṣyacārikāṃ caritum/
XXdivyav_u:8045: 185.015. sa yāni tāni nārakāṇāṃ sattvānāmutpāṭānupāṭanacchedanabhedanādīni duḥkhāni, tiryaścāmanyonyabhakṣaṇādīni, pretānāṃ kṣuttṛṣādīni, devānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:8046: cyavanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanādīni, manuṣyāṇāṃ paryeṣṭivyasanādīni duḥkhāni, tāni dṛṣṭvā jambudvīpamāgatya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāmārocayati/
XXdivyav_u:8047: 185.018. yasya kasyacit sārdhaṃvihārī antevāsī vā anabhirato brahmacaryaṃ
XXdivyav_u:8048: carati, sa tamādāya yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanastenopasaṃkrāmati, āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana eva samyagavavadiṣyati samyaganuśāsiṣyatīti, tamāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ samyagavavadati samyaganuśāsti/
XXdivyav_u:8049: 185.021. evamaparamaparaṃ te āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena samyagavavāditāḥ samyagavuśiṣṭā abhiratā brahmacaryaṃ caranti, uttare ca viśeṣamadhigacchanti/
XXdivyav_u:8050: 185.023. ayaṃ bhadanta heturayaṃ pratyayo yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaścatasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhirākīrṇo
XXdivyav_u:8052: 185.024. na sarvatra ānanda maudgalyāyano bhikṣurbhaviṣyati maudgalyāyanasadṛśo vā/
XXdivyav_u:8054: 185.026. uktaṃ bhagavatā dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṃ cakraṃ kārayitavyamiti/
XXdivyav_u:8056: 185.027. bhagavānāha--pañca gatayaḥ kartavyā narakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyāśca/
XXdivyav_u:8057: 185.028. tatrādhastāt narakāḥ kartavyāḥ, tiryañcaḥ pretāśca, upariṣṭāt devā manuṣyāśca/
XXdivyav_u:8060: 185.029. madhye rāgadveṣamohāḥ kartavyāḥ, rāgaḥ pārāvatākāreṇa, dveṣo
XXdivyav_u:8063: 185.031. anupapādukāḥ sattvā ghaṭīyantraprayogeṇa cyavamānā upapadyamānāśca kartavyāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8066: 185.033. sarvamanityatayā grastaṃ kartavyam, gāthādvayaṃ ca lekhayitavyam--
XXdivyav_u:8071: 186.005. uktaṃ bhagavatā dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṃ cakraṃ kārayitavyamiti bhikṣubhiḥ
XXdivyav_u:8073: te kathayanti--bhadramukhāḥ, vayamapi na jānīma iti/
XXdivyav_u:8077: 186.008. te aviśeṣeṇoddiśanti bālānapi mūḍhānapi avyaktānapi akuśalānapi/
XXdivyav_u:8078: 186.009. te ātmanā na jānate, kutaḥ punarāgatānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ
XXdivyav_u:8082: 186.012. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
XXdivyav_u:8083: 186.012. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8084: 186.013. tasya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kulasadṛśaṃ nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam/
XXdivyav_u:8088: 186.015. sa suhṛtsambandhibāndhavānāmantrayitvā antarjanaṃ ca samāśvāsya mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyamādāya divasatithimuhūrtena
XXdivyav_u:8091: 186.017. tasya patnyā sa dārako jñātibalena hastabalena pālitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhito lipyāmupanyasto lipyakṣareṣu ca kṛtāvī saṃvṛttaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8092: 186.018. sa vayaskareṇa sārdhaṃ veṇuvanaṃ gato vihāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ paśyati dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṃ cakramabhilikhitam/
XXdivyav_u:8094: kathayati--bhadramukha, etāḥ pañca gatayo narakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā
XXdivyav_u:8096: 186.021. ārya, kimebhiḥ karma kṛtam yenaivaṃvidhāni duḥkhāni praryanubhavantīti? sa kathayati--ete prāṇātipātikā adattādāyikāḥ kāmamithyācārikā mṛṣāvādikāḥ paiśunikāḥ pāruṣikāḥ saṃbhinnapralāpikā abhidhyālavo vyāpannacittā mithyādṛṣṭikāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8097: 186.024. tadebhirete daśākuśalāḥ karmapathā atyarthamāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ, yena evaṃvidhāni duḥkhānyutpāṭānupāṭacchedanabhedanādīni
XXdivyav_u:8100: 186.026. ebhiranyaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam yena evaṃvidhāni duḥkhāni
XXdivyav_u:8103: 186.028. ebhiranyaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam yena evaṃvidhāni duḥkhāni
XXdivyav_u:8104: pratyanubhavanti? bhadramukha, ete 'pi matsariṇa āsan kuṭukuñcakā
XXdivyav_u:8106: 186.030. tattena mātsaryeṇāsevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena evaṃvidhāni duḥkhāni kṣuttṛṣādīni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:8108: 186.031. ebhiranyaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam yena evaṃvidhāni sukhāni
XXdivyav_u:8109: pratyanubhavanti? bhadramukha, ete prāṇātipātāt prativiratā adattādānāt
XXdivyav_u:8111: 187.002. tadebhirete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā atyarthamāsevitā bhāvitā
XXdivyav_u:8115: 187.004. ebhiranyaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam yena sukhāni pratyanubhavanti?
XXdivyav_u:8116: bhadramukha, ebhirapi daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāstanutarā mṛdutarāścāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ, yena evaṃvidhāni hastyaśvarathānnapānaśayanāsanastrīlalitodyānasukhāni pratyanubhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:8117: 187.006. ārya, āsāṃ pañcānāṃ gatīnām yā etāstisro gatayo narakāstiryañcaḥ
XXdivyav_u:8119: 187.007. ye tu ete devā manuṣyāśca ete rocete/
XXdivyav_u:8120: 187.008. tatkathamete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ samādāya vartayitavyāh?
XXdivyav_u:8121: bhadramukha, svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya saced dṛṣṭa eva dharme
XXdivyav_u:8124: 187.010. uktaṃ hi bhagavatā--pañcānuśaṃsān samanupaśyatā piṇḍatenālameva pravrajyādhimuktena
XXdivyav_u:8125: 187.011. katamāni pañca? āveṇikā ime svārthā anuprāpto bhaviṣyāmīti saṃpaśyatā piṇḍatenālameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
XXdivyav_u:8126: 187.012. yeṣāmahaṃ dāsaḥ preṣyo nirdeśyo bhujiṣyo nayena kāmaṃgamaḥ, teṣāṃ pūjyaśca bhaviṣyāmi praśaṃsyaśceti saṃpaśyatā piṇḍatena alameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
XXdivyav_u:8127: 187.014. anuttaram yogakṣemaṃ nirvāṇamanuprāpsyāmīti saṃpaśyatā piṇḍatena alameva pravrajyādhimuktena
XXdivyav_u:8128: 187.015. anuttaraṃ vā yogakṣemaṃ nirvāṇamanuprāpnuvato 'nāpattikasya sato deeveṣūpapattirbhaviṣyatīti saṃpaśyatā piṇḍatena alameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
XXdivyav_u:8131: 187.017. kiṃ tatra pravrajyāyāṃ kriyate? bhadramukha, yāvajjīvaṃ brahmacaryaṃ caryate/
XXdivyav_u:8133: 187.018. anyo 'sti upāyah? bhadramukha, asti, upāsako bhava/
XXdivyav_u:8134: 187.019. ārya, kiṃ tatra kriyate? bhadraṃkha, yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātāt prativiratiḥ saṃrakṣyā, adattādānāt kāmamithyācārāt surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānāt prativiratiḥ saṃrakṣyā/
XXdivyav_u:8144: 187.024. tatra mayā dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṃ cakramabhilikhitaṃ dṛṣṭam/
XXdivyav_u:8145: 187.025. tatra pañca gatayo narakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyāśca/
XXdivyav_u:8152: 187.028. āsāṃ mama tisro gatayo nābhipretāḥ, dve abhiprete/
XXdivyav_u:8157: 187.031. putra, mayā tvaṃ jñātibalena hastabalena cāpyāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ
XXdivyav_u:8159: 187.032. kuto me pañcānāṃ kārṣāpaṇaśatānāṃ vibhavah? amba, yadi
XXdivyav_u:8165: 188.002. sa tayā anujñāto bhṛtakavīthīṃ gatvā avasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8166: 188.003. brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo 'nyān bhṛtakapuruṣān gṛhṇanti, taṃ na kaścit
XXdivyav_u:8168: 188.004. sa tatra divasamatināmya vikāle gṛhaṃ gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8169: 188.004. sa mātrā pṛṣṭah--putra, kṛtaṃ te bhṛtikayā karma? amba, kiṃ
XXdivyav_u:8173: 188.006. yadyavaśyaṃ tvayā bhṛtikayā karma kartavyam, īdṛśaṃ veṣamāsthāya bhṛtakavīthīṃ gatvā tiṣṭha/
XXdivyav_u:8176: 188.007. so 'parasmin divase tādṛśaṃ veṣamāsthāya bhṛtakavīthīṃ gatvā avasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8179: 188.009. tena taṃ pratyākhyāya anye bhṛtakapuruṣā gṛhītāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8180: 188.010. sa kathayati--gṛhapate, ahamapi bhṛtikayā karma karomīti/
XXdivyav_u:8181: 188.010. gṛhapatiḥ kathayati--putra, tvaṃ sukumāraḥ, na śakṣyasi bhṛtikayā
XXdivyav_u:8183: 188.011. tāt, kiṃ tvaṃ pūrvaṃ bhṛtiṃ dadāsi, āhosvit paścāt?/
XXdivyav_u:8187: 188.013. adya tāvat jijñāsyāmi yadi śakṣyati karma kartum, dāsyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:8188: 188.014. na śakṣyati, na dāsyāmīti viditvā kathayati--putra āgaccha,
XXdivyav_u:8195: 188.017. tadyadi śāṭhyena karma kariṣyāmaḥ, itaścyutānāṃ kā gatibhaviṣyati? te kathayanti--bhāgineya, tvaṃ navadāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8199: 188.019. teṃs teṣāṃ tādṛśī lokākhyānakathā prastutā, yāṃ śrutvā te
XXdivyav_u:8201: 188.020. tasyātisvareṇa gacchato 'nupadaṃ gacchanti, mā lokākhyāyikāṃ na
XXdivyav_u:8204: 188.022. so 'dhiṣṭhāyakapuruṣaṃ pṛcchati--bhoḥ puruṣa, kiṃ tvayā apare
XXdivyav_u:8206: 188.023. atha kasmādadya dviguṇaṃ karma kṛtam? tena yathāvṛttamārocitam/
XXdivyav_u:8207: 188.024. śrutvā gṛhapatistasya dārakasya dviguṇāṃ bhṛtiṃ dātumārabdhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8208: 188.025. sa kathayati--tāt, kiṃ dvidaivasikāṃ bhṛtiṃ dadāsīti? sa
XXdivyav_u:8209: kathayati--putra, na dvidaivasikāṃ dadāmi, api tu prasanno 'haṃ
XXdivyav_u:8211: 188.026. sa kathayati--tāt, yadi tvaṃ mamābhiprasannaḥ, yāvat tava gṛhe
XXdivyav_u:8212: karma kartavyaṃ tāvat tavaiva haste tiṣṭhatu/
XXdivyav_u:8214: 188.028. yadā tasya gṛhapatestadgṛhaṃ parisamāptam, tadā asau dārako
XXdivyav_u:8215: bhṛtiṃ gaṇayitumārabdho yāvat pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni na paripūryante/
XXdivyav_u:8217: 188.029. sa gṛhapatiḥ kathayati--putra, kiṃ rodiṣi? māsi mayā kiṃcit
XXdivyav_u:8219: 188.030. tāt, mahātmā tvam, kiṃ māṃ vyaṃsayiṣyasi? api tu ahameva
XXdivyav_u:8221: 188.031. mayā pañcānāṃ kārṣāpaṇaśatānāmarthāya bhṛtikayā karma prārabdhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:8224: 189.001. punarapi mayā anyatra bhṛtikayā karma kartavyamiti/
XXdivyav_u:8228: 189.002. putra, abhiśraddadhāsi tvaṃ bhagavatah? tāt abhiśraddadhe/
XXdivyav_u:8231: 189.004. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8232: 189.004. sa gṛhapatiputro bhagavantamidamavocat--bhagavan, mayā pañcānāṃ kārṣāpaṇaśatānāmarthāya bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ
XXdivyav_u:8236: 189.007. bhagavan kim? āha--vatsa gṛhāṇa, śrāddhaḥ sa gṛhapatiḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8237: 189.007. bhagavan, mā deveṣu nopapatsye? vatsa upapatsyase, gṛhāṇa/
XXdivyav_u:8238: 189.008. sa parituṣṭo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt
XXdivyav_u:8240: 189.009. upasaṃkramya gṛhapaterantikāt pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni gṛhītvā mātuḥ
XXdivyav_u:8245: 189.011. sā kathayati--putra, na mama bhāṇḍopaskaro na śayanāsanam/
XXdivyav_u:8249: 189.013. sa tasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ śiraḥpraṇāmaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--tvayaiva
XXdivyav_u:8251: 189.014. asmākaṃ gṛhe na bhāṇḍopaskaro nāpi śayanāsanam/
XXdivyav_u:8255: 189.016. gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--mamedaṃ gṛhamacirotthitaṃ buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena paribhuktaṃ bhaviṣyati, pratijāgarmi/
XXdivyav_u:8257: 189.018. sthāpayitvā kārṣāpaṇān gaccha, śvo buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamupanimantraya/
XXdivyav_u:8259: 189.019. sa saṃjātasaumanasyaḥ śiraḥpraṇāmaṃ kṛtvā prakrānto yena
XXdivyav_u:8264: 189.021. atha sa gṛhapatiputro bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt
XXdivyav_u:8265: 189.023. tenāpi gṛhapatinā tāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyamevotthāya gṛhaṃ saṃmārjitam/
XXdivyav_u:8266: 189.024. sukumārī gomayakārṣī dattā, āsanaprajñaptiḥ kāritā, udakamaṇayaḥ
XXdivyav_u:8268: 189.025. tenāpi gṛhapatiputreṇa gatvā bhagavata ārocitam--samayo bhadanta,
XXdivyav_u:8269: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate iti/
XXdivyav_u:8270: 189.026. atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena tasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ
XXdivyav_u:8272: 189.027. ṣaḍvargīyāḥ pṛcchanti--kenāayaṃ buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgha upanimantrita iti? apare kathayanti--amukena gṛhapatiputreṇeti/
XXdivyav_u:8275: 189.029. kimasau dāsyati? gacchāma kulopakagṛheṣu gatvā purobhaktakāṃ karma iti/
XXdivyav_u:8280: 189.031. bhagavāṃstasya gṛhapater niveśane purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8282: 190.001. atha sa gṛhapatipurtaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhijanīyena svahastaṃ
XXdivyav_u:8284: 190.002. satatapariveṣaṇaṃ kurvāṇaḥ paśyti ṣaḍvargīyān na satkṛtya
XXdivyav_u:8286: 190.003. dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhagavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitvā kathayati--bhagavan, kaiścidatrāryakair na satkṛtya paribhuktamāhāram/
XXdivyav_u:8287: 190.005. deveṣu nopapatsye iti? bhagavānāha--vatsa, śayanāsanaparibhogena tāvat tvaṃ deveṣūpapadyethāḥ
XXdivyav_u:8288: 190.006. atha bhagavāṃstaṃ gṛhapatiputraṃ ca dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:8289: 190.008. atrāntare pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni mahāsamudrāt saṃsiddhayānapātrāṇni rājagṛhamanuprāptāni/
XXdivyav_u:8290: 190.009. rājagṛhe ca parva pratyupasthitamiti na kiṃcit krayeṇāpi
XXdivyav_u:8293: 190.010. sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, āgamayata kasyādya gṛhe buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhaktam, tatrāvaśyaṃ kiṃcidutsadanadharmakaṃ bhavatīti/
XXdivyav_u:8297: bhukte iha parva pratyupasthitamiti na kiṃcit krayeṇāpi labhyate/
XXdivyav_u:8299: 190.014. na mamaitadbhaktam, api tu tasyaitadgṛhapatiputrasya bhaktam/
XXdivyav_u:8306: 190.016. te tenānnapānena saṃtarpitā gṛhapatergatvā kathayanti--tasya te gṛhapate lābhāḥ sulabdhā yasya te niveśane buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho
XXdivyav_u:8309: 190.019. anena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho 'nnapānena saṃtarpito na mayeti/

XXdivyav_u:8384: pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati--samayo bhadanta, sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/

XXdivyav_u:8398: 192.011. eṣo 'haṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca

XXdivyav_u:8403: 192.015. bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāaḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta sahasodgatena gṛhapatinā karma kṛtam yena bhṛtikayā karma kṛtam, yena sahasā bhogairabhivṛddhaḥ, satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtamiti? bhagavānāha--sahasodgatenaiva bhikṣavo gṛhapatinā karmāṇi
XXdivyav_u:8407: 192.019. ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipaṣyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau,

XXdivyav_u:8441: 193.010. so 'pi tasya piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṃ kartuṃ pravṛttaḥ/

XXdivyav_u:8490: 194.010. (iyaṃ tāvadutpattir na tāvat buddho bhagavāñ śrāvakāṇāṃ vinaye
XXdivyav_u:8498: 195.002. ekasmin samaye bhagavān bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśābhirbhikṣuśataiḥ/

XXdivyav_u:8511: 195.019. hastyaśvarathapattibalakāyasampannā yugyayānopaśobhitā vistīrṇātiramaṇīyavīthīmahāpathā ucchritavicitradhvajapatākā toraṇagavākṣārdhacandrāvanaddhā amarālaya iva śobhate/
XXdivyav_u:8515: 195.025. bhadraśilāyāṃ ca rājadhānyāmanyataraṃ maṇigarbhaṃ nāma rājodyānaṃ

XXdivyav_u:8520: 195.029. na khalu rājñaścandraprabhasya gacchato 'ndhakāraṃ bhavati, na ca maṇirvā pradīpo vā ulkā vā purastāt nīyate, api tu svakāt kāyāt rājñaścandraprabhasya prabhā niścaranti tadyathā candramaṇḍalādraśmayaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8521: 195.032. anena kāraṇena rājñaścandraprabhasya candraprabha iti saṃjñā

XXdivyav_u:8529: 196.004. tena khalu samayena catuścatvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāṇi jambudvīpe manuṣyāṇāmāyuṣaḥ
XXdivyav_u:8530: 196.005. rājā candraprabho bodhisattvo 'bhūt sarvaṃdadaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī
XXdivyav_u:8532: 196.006. tena bhadraśilāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ nirgatya bahirdhā nagarasya
XXdivyav_u:8533: caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu catvāro catvāro mahāyajñavāṭā māpitāśchatradhvajayūpapatākātyucchritāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8534: 196.007. tataḥ suvarṇabherīḥ saṃtāḍya dānāni dīyante, puṇyāni kriyante,
XXdivyav_u:8538: 196.011. kumārāḥ kumārikāśca sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāḥ kṛtvā pradānāni dīyante/
XXdivyav_u:8541: 196.014. rājñā candraprabheṇa tāvantaṃ dānamanudattam, yena sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyā āḍhyā mahādhanā mahābhogāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8543: pradānamanupradattāni, yathā asmiñ jambudvīpe ekamanuṣyo 'pi padbhyāṃ na gacchati/
XXdivyav_u:8544: 196.016. sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyā hastipṛṣṭhaiśca caturaśvayuktaiśca rathairuparisuvarṇamayai rūpyamayaiścātapatrairudyānenodyānaṃ grāmeṇa
XXdivyav_u:8546: 196.018. tato rājñaścandraprabhasyaitadabhavat--kiṃ punarme itvareṇa dānena pradattena? yannvaham yādṛśānyeva mama vastrālaṃkārāṇyābharaṇāni,
XXdivyav_u:8547: tādṛśānyeva dānamanuprayaccheyam, yat sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyā rājakrīḍayā krīḍeyuḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8550: 196.022. rājñā candraprabheṇa tāvanti rājārhāṇi vastrāṇyalaṃkārāṇi maulayaḥ paṭṭāścānupradattāḥ, yena sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyā maulidharāḥ paṭṭadharāśca saṃvṛttāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8551: 196.023. yā rājñaścandraprabhasyākṛtistādṛśā eva sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8552: 196.024. tato rājñā candraprabheṇāṣṭaṣaṣṭiṣu nagarasahasreṣu ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--sarve bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyā rājakrīḍayā,
XXdivyav_u:8554: 196.026. atha jambudvīpakā manuṣyā rājñaścandraprabhasya ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇāṃ śrutvā sarva eva rājakrīḍayā krīḍitumārabdhāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8556: 196.029. tena khalu samayena jambudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ rājalīlayā
XXdivyav_u:8557: krīḍatām yaśca vīṇāveṇupaṇavasughoṣakavallarībherīmṛdaṅgapaṭahaśabdo yaścāṣṭaṣaṣṭiṣu tālavaṃśanirghoṣo yaścandraprabhasya caturṣu mahāyajñavāṭeṣu suvarṇabherīṇāṃ tāḍyamānānāṃ varṇamanojñaśabdo niścarati,
XXdivyav_u:8558: tena sarvo jambudvīpo manojñaśabdanādito 'bhūt tadyathā devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmabhyantaraṃ devaputam <197>nṛttagītavāditaśabdena
XXdivyav_u:8560: 197.001. evameva tasmin kāle tasmin samaye sarvo jambudvīpavāsināṃ janakāyastena gītavāditaśabdena ekāntasukhasamarpito 'tyarthaṃ ramate/
XXdivyav_u:8561: 197.002. tena khalu samayena bhadraśilāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ dvāsaptatirayutakoṭīśatāni manuṣyāṇāṃ prativasanti sma/
XXdivyav_u:8562: 197.004. teṣāṃ rājā candraprabha ṛṣṭo babhūva priyo manāpaśca/
XXdivyav_u:8563: 197.004. apīdānīṃ varṇākṛtiliṅgasthairyamasya nirīkṣamāṇā na tṛptimupayānti sma/
XXdivyav_u:8564: 197.005. yasmiṃśca samaye rājā candraprabho mahāyajñavāṭaṃ gacchati,
XXdivyav_u:8566: cāhuh--devagarbho batāyaṃ rājā candraptabha iha jamudvīpe rājyaṃ kārayati/
XXdivyav_u:8567: 197.007. na khalu manuṣyā īdṛgvarṇasaṃsthānā yādṛśā devasya
XXdivyav_u:8569: 197.008. rājā candraprabho yena yenāvalokayati, tena tena strīsahasrāṇyavalokayanti--dhanyāstāḥ striyo yāsāmeṣa bharteti/
XXdivyav_u:8574: 197.011. vyaktau paṇḍitau medhāvinau guṇaiśca sarvāmātyamaṇḍalaprativiśiṣṭau sarvādhikṛtau
XXdivyav_u:8578: kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu niyojayati--imān bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyā daśa kuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartatheti/
XXdivyav_u:8580: 197.016. mahācandrasyāgrāmātyasya rājā candraprabha iṣṭaścābhūt priyaśca manāapaśca/
XXdivyav_u:8586: abhūdromaharṣah--mā haiva devasya candraprabhasya śiroyācanaka āgacchet/
XXdivyav_u:8592: 197.022. api tu ratnamayāni śirāṃsi kārayitvā koṣakoṣṭhāgāraṃ praveśya
XXdivyav_u:8594: 197.023. yadi nāma kaściddevasya śiroyācanaka āgacchet, tamenamebhī ratnamayaiḥ śirobhiḥ pralobhayiṣyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:8595: 197.024. iti viditvā ratnamayāni śirāṃsi kārayitvā koṣakoṣṭhāgareṣu
XXdivyav_u:8599: 197.026. dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhītastrastaḥ saṃvignah--mā haiva rājñaścandraprabhasya rājyacyutirbhaviṣyati jīvitasya cāntarasya cāntarāya
XXdivyav_u:8601: 197.027. tena brāhmaṇā ye naimittikā vipaścikāścāhūya uktāh--bhavantaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:8604: 'yaṃ tvayā svapno dṛṣṭaḥ, nacirādeva rājñaścandraprabhasya śiroyācanaka
XXdivyav_u:8607: 197.030. tato mahīdharo 'grāmātyaḥ svapnanirdeśaṃ śrutvā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--atikṣipraṃ rājñaścandraprabhasya maitrātmakasya kāruṇikasya sattvavatsalasyānityatābalaṃ
XXdivyav_u:8612: 198.002. dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhītāstrastāḥ saṃvignāh--mā haiva rājñaścandraprabhasya mahāpṛthivīpālasya maitrātmakasya kāruṇikasya sattvavatsalasyānityatābalamāgacchet, mā haiva asmākaṃ devena sārdhaṃ nānābhāvo bhaviṣyati vinābhāvo viprayogaḥ, mā haiva atrāṇo 'paritrāṇo
XXdivyav_u:8616: kāritam--rājalīlayā bhavantaḥ sarve jambudvīpakā mānuṣyāḥ krīḍantu yāvadahaṃ jīvāmi/
XXdivyav_u:8618: rājñaścandraprabhasya ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ śrutvā sarva eva jambudvīpakā manuṣyā rājalīlayā krīḍitumārabdhāḥ,
XXdivyav_u:8620: 198.010. tena khalu samayena jambudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ rājakrīḍayā
XXdivyav_u:8621: krīḍatām yaśca rājñaścandraprabhasya caturṣu mahāyajñavāṭeṣu suvarṇabherīṇāṃ tāḍyamānānāṃ valgurmanojñaḥ śabdo niścarati, tena sarvo jambudvīpo manojñaśabdanir nādito 'bhūt/
XXdivyav_u:8623: nṛttagītavāditam, evameva tasmin kāle tasmin samaye sarvo jambudvīpanivāsī janakāyastena gītaśabdenaikāntasukhasamarpito 'tyarthaṃ ramate//
XXdivyav_u:8624: 198.016. tena khalu samayena gandhamādane parvate raudrākṣo nāma brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati sma indrajālavidhijñaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8625: 198.017. aśrauṣīdraudrākṣo brāhmaṇo bhadraśilāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ candraprabho nāma rājā sarvaṃdado 'smītyātmānaṃ pratijānīte/
XXdivyav_u:8627: 198.018. tasyaitadabhavat--yadi tāvat sarvadado bhaviṣyati, mama śiro dāsyati/
XXdivyav_u:8628: 198.019. api tu duṣkarametadasthānamanavakāśo yadevamiṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:8629: manāpamuttamāṅgaṃ parityakṣyati yaduta śīrṣam, nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate/
XXdivyav_u:8631: 198.021. atha gandhamādananivāsinī devatā vikroṣṭumārabdhā--hā kaṣṭaṃ rajñaścandraprabhasya maitrātmakasya mahākāruṇikasya sattvavatsalasyānityatābalaṃ pratyupasthitamiti/
XXdivyav_u:8632: 198.023. tena khalu samayena sarvajambudvīpa ākulākulaḥ, dhūmāndhakāraḥ,
XXdivyav_u:8634: 198.024. bhadraśilāyāṃ ca rājadhānyāṃ nātidūre pañcābhijño ṛṣiḥ praivasati viśvāmitro nāṃnā pañcaśataparivāro maitrātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sattvavatsalaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8635: 198.026. atha sa ṛṣiḥ sarvajambudvīpamākulaṃ dṛṣṭvā māṇavakānāmantrayate--yatkhalu māṇavakā jānīta sarvajambudvīpa
XXdivyav_u:8637: 198.027. sūryācandramasau evamahānubhāvau na bhāsato na tapato na
XXdivyav_u:8641: 198.029. rodanti kinnaragaṇā vanadevatāśca dhikkāramutsṛjanti devagaṇā pi
XXdivyav_u:8643: 198.031. candro na bhāti na vibhāti sahasraraśmir naiva vādyavāditaravo 'pi niśāmyate 'tra//1//
XXdivyav_u:8644: 199.001. <199>ete hi pādapagaṇāḥ phalapuṣpanaddhā bhūmau patanti pavanairapi cālitāni/
XXdivyav_u:8645: 199.003. saṃśrūyate dhvanirayaṃ ca yathātibhīmo vyakto bhaviṣyati pure vyasanaṃ mahāntam//2//
XXdivyav_u:8646: 199.005. ete bhadraśilānivāsaniratāḥ sarve saduḥkhā janā atyantapratiśokaśalyavihatāḥ praspandakaṇṭhānanāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8647: 199.007. etāścandranibhānanā yuvatayo rodanti veśmottame sarve ca
XXdivyav_u:8649: 199.009. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ puranivāsijanāḥ samagrāḥ saṃpiṇḍitaṃ manasi
XXdivyav_u:8652: 199.013. ete payodā vinadantyatoyā jalāśrayāḥ śokamamī vrajanti/
XXdivyav_u:8653: 199.015. bhuvorivāmbhasi ca bālasamīraṇāstā vātāḥ pravānti ca kharā rajasā vimiśrāḥ//5//
XXdivyav_u:8656: 199.019. api tu khalu māṇavakā rājñaścandraprabhasya caturṣu
XXdivyav_u:8657: mahāyajñavāṭeṣu suvarṇabherīṇāṃ tāḍyamānānāṃ na bhūyo manojñaḥ svaro
XXdivyav_u:8661: 199.021. tato nagaravivāsinī devatā raudrākṣaṃ brahmaṇaṃ dūrādeva dṛṣṭvā yena rājā candraprabhāstenopasaṃkrāntā/
XXdivyav_u:8663: jānīyāh--adya devasya yācanaka āgamiṣyati hiṃsako viheṭhako 'vatāraprekṣī
XXdivyav_u:8667: 199.025. atha rājā candraprabhaḥ śiroyācanakamupaśrutya pramuditamanā vismayotphalladṛṣṭirdevatāmuvāca--gaccha devate, yadyāgamiṣyati, ahamasya dīrghakālābhilaṣitaṃ manorathaṃ paripūrayiṣyamīti/
XXdivyav_u:8668: 199.027. atha sā devatā rājñaścandraprabhasya idamevamrūpaṃ vyavasāyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:8673: 199.030. tato raudrākṣo brāhmaṇo dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa praviśan devatayā
XXdivyav_u:8675: 199.031. kathamidānīṃ tvam <200>mohapuruṣa rājñaścandraprabhasya maitrātmakasya kāruṇikasya sattvavatsalasyānekaguṇasampannasya jambudvīpaparipālakasyādūṣiṇo 'napakāriṇaḥ śiraśchetsyasi? raudracitta
XXdivyav_u:8677: 200.003. yāvadetat prakaraṇaṃ rājñā candraprabheṇa śrutam--yācanako me nagaradvāre devatayā vidhāryate iti/
XXdivyav_u:8679: mahācandra jānīyāh--yācanako me nagaradvāri devatayā vidhāryate/
XXdivyav_u:8681: 200.005. evaṃ deveti mahācandro 'grāmātyo rājñaścandraprabhasya pratiśrutya nagaradvāraṃ gatvā tāṃ devatāmuvāca--yatkhalu devate
XXdivyav_u:8682: jānīyāh--praviśatveṣa brāhmaṇa, rājā candraprabha enamāhvāpayata iti/
XXdivyav_u:8684: mahācandramagrāmātyamidamavocat--yatkhalu mahācandra jānīyāh--eṣa brāhmaṇo raudracitto niṣkāruṇiko rājñaścandraprabhasya vināśārthaṃ bhadraśilāmanuprāptaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8685: 200.009. kimanena durātmanā praveśitena? eṣa mayā devate upāyaścintito yenāyaṃ brāhmaṇo na prabhaviṣyati devasya śiro grahītumiti/
XXdivyav_u:8689: 200.013. bhāṇḍāgārikai ratnamayānāṃ śīrṣāṇāṃ rājadvāre rāśiḥ kṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8693: 200.015. yāvadāptaṃ ca te hiraṇyasuvarṇamanuprayacchāmi, yena te putrapautrāṇāṃ jīvikā
XXdivyav_u:8694: 200.016. kiṃ te devasya śīrṣeṇa majjāśiṅghāṇakavasādipūrṇeneti? evamukte raudrākṣo brāhmaṇo mahācandramagrāmātyamidamavocat--na ratnamayairme śirobhiḥ prayojanam/
XXdivyav_u:8696: 200.018. api tvahamasya mahāpṛthivīpālasya sarvaṃdadasya sakāśamāgataḥ śiraso 'rthāya/
XXdivyav_u:8697: 200.019. evamukte mahācandramahīdharau agrāmātyau kare kapolaṃ dattvā
XXdivyav_u:8699: 200.020. athaitadvṛttāntamupaśrutya rājā candraprabho mahācandramahīdharau agrāmātyau dūreṇa prakrośyaitadavocat--ānīyatāmeṣa matsamīpam/
XXdivyav_u:8701: 200.022. evamukte mahācandramahīdharau agrāmātyau sāśrudurdinavadanau karuṇakaruṇaṃ paridevamānau abhirudya devasya maitrātmakasya kāruṇikasya sattvavatsalāsyānekaguṇasamuditasya jñānakuśalasya divyacakṣuṣo
XXdivyav_u:8702: 'nityatābalaṃ pratyupasthitam, adyāsmākaṃ devena sārdhaṃ nānābhāvo bhaviṣyati vinābhāvo viprayogo
XXdivyav_u:8703: 200.025. iti viditvā rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya ekānte niṣaṇṇau/
XXdivyav_u:8704: 200.025. atha rājā candraprabhaḥ paramatyāgaprativiśiṣṭaṃ tyāgaṃ parityakukāmo dūrata eva taṃ brāhmaṇamāmantrayate--ehi tvaṃ brāhmaṇa,
XXdivyav_u:8706: 200.027. atha raudrākṣo brāhmaṇo yena rājā candraprabhastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8707: 200.028. upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ candraprabhaṃ jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvā
XXdivyav_u:8711: 200.031. mahyaṃ śiraḥ sṛja mahākaruṇāgracetā mahyaṃ dadasva mama toṣakaro bhavādya//7//
XXdivyav_u:8713: vākpravyāhāraṃ śrutvā pramuditamanāḥ prītivisphāritākṣo raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamuvāca--hantedaṃ brāhmaṇa śiro 'vighnataḥ sādhu
XXdivyav_u:8716: 201.004. priyo yathā yadyapi caikaputrakastathāpi me kharpamidaṃ gṛhāṇa/
XXdivyav_u:8717: 201.006. tvaccintitānāṃ phalamastu śīghraṃ śiraḥpradānāddhi labheya bodhim//8//
XXdivyav_u:8719: 201.008. yadā ca rājā candraprabheṇa śiraso maulirapanītaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:8720: tatsamanantarameva sarveṣāṃ jambudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ maulayaḥ patitāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8721: 201.010. bhadraśilāyāṃ ca rājadhānyāṃ caturdiśamulkāpātā diśodāhāśca prādurbhūtāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8722: 201.010. nagaradevatābhiśca śabdo niścāritah--asya rājñaścandraprabhasya pāpabrāhmaṇo śiraśchetsyatīti/
XXdivyav_u:8724: rājñaścandraprabhasyedamevamrūpaṃ śarīraparityāgaṃ viditvā sāśrudurdidavadanau rājñaścandraprabhasya pādau pariṣvajyāhatuh--dhanyāste
XXdivyav_u:8725: puruṣā deva ya evamatyadbhutarūpadarśanaṃ vā drakṣyantīri/
XXdivyav_u:8726: 201.014. tau abhimukhamudvīkṣyamāṇau rājani candraprabhe cittamabhiprasādya raudrākṣe ca brāhmaṇe maitryacittamutpādya nāvāṃ śakṣyāmo nirupamaguṇādhārāsya devasyānityatāṃ draṣṭumiti tasminneva
XXdivyav_u:8729: 201.016. rājñaścandraprabhasyedamevamrūpaṃ vyavasāyaṃ buddhvā tāṃ ca nagaranivāsinīnāṃ devatānāmārtadhvanimupaśrutya bhaumā yakṣā antarikṣacarāśca yakṣāḥ krinditumārabdhāh--hā kaṣṭamidānīṃ rājñaścandraprabhasya śarīranikṣepo bhaviṣyatīti//
XXdivyav_u:8732: 201.019. tato raudrākṣo brāhmaṇastaṃ mahājanakāyamavekṣya śiro grahītum/
XXdivyav_u:8733: 201.021. yadi ca te śiraḥ parityaktam, ekāntaṃ gacchāva iti/
XXdivyav_u:8736: 201.023. ṛddhyantāṃ tava saṃkalpāḥ, paripūryantāṃ manorathā iti/
XXdivyav_u:8737: 201.023. atha rājā candraprabho rājā āsanādutthāya tīkṣaṇamasimādāya yena maṇiratnagarbhamudyānaṃ
XXdivyav_u:8738: 201.024. atha rājā candraprabhasya idamevamrūpaṃ vyavasāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā
XXdivyav_u:8739: bhadraśilāyāṃ rājadhānyāmanekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi vikrośamānāni pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhāni/
XXdivyav_u:8741: 201.026. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ samāśvāsayannāha--apramādaḥ karaṇīyaḥ kuśaleṣu dharmoṣviti/
XXdivyav_u:8742: 201.027. saṃkṣepeṇa dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamādāya maṇiratnagarbhamudyānaṃ
XXdivyav_u:8744: udyāne bhadraśilāyāṃ chatrāṇi dhvajapatākāśca yena maṇiratnagarbhamudyānaṃ
XXdivyav_u:8746: 201.029. tato rājā candraprabho maṇiratnagarbhasyodyānasya dvāraṃ pidhāya
XXdivyav_u:8754: 202.002. atha yā devatāstasminnudyāne 'dhyavasitāḥ, tā rājñaścandraprabhasyedamevamrūpaṃ svaśarīraparityāgaṃ
XXdivyav_u:8757: mahājanavatsalasyānekaguṇasampannasya śiraśchetsyasīti? tato rājā candraprabha udyānadevatā nivārayati--mā devatā mama śiroyācanakasyāntarāyaṃ kuruta/
XXdivyav_u:8758: 202.006. tatkasya hetoh? bhūtapūrvaṃ devatā mamottamāṅgam yācanakasya devatāyā antarāyaḥ kṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8760: 202.007. tatkasya detoh? yadi tayā devatayā antarāyo na kṛto 'bhaviṣyat,
XXdivyav_u:8762: 202.008. ataśca tvāmahamevaṃ bravīmi--mā me tvamuttamāṅgayācanakasyāntarāyaṃ kuruṣveti/
XXdivyav_u:8763: 202.009. asminneva te maṇiratnagarbha udyāne mayā sahasraśaḥ
XXdivyav_u:8764: śiraḥparityāgaḥ kṛtaḥ, na ca me kenacidantarāyaḥ kṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8765: 202.010. tasmāt tvaṃ devate mamottamāṅgayācanakasyāntarāyaṃ mā kuru/
XXdivyav_u:8766: 202.011. eṣa eva devate sa pṛṣṭhībhūto maitreyo yo vyāghryā ātmānaṃ
XXdivyav_u:8767: parityajya catvāriṃśatkalpasamprasthito maitreyo bodhisattva ekena śiraḥparityāgenāvapṛṣṭhīkṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8768: 202.013. atha sā devatā rājñaścandraprabhasya maharddhitāmavetya tasmin
XXdivyav_u:8772: devatāsuragaruḍagandharvakinnarā adhyuṣitāḥ, ihāhamudyāne tyāgaṃ kariṣyāmi, asmiṃs tyāgaṃ svaśiraḥparityāgam yena cāhaṃ satyena svaśiraḥ
XXdivyav_u:8773: parityajāmi, na rājyārthāya na svargārthāya na bhogārthāya na śakratvāya na brahmatvāya na cakravartivijayāya nānyatra kathamahamanuttarāṃ
XXdivyav_u:8777: 202.020. anena satyena satyavacanena saphalaḥ pariśramaḥ syāt,
XXdivyav_u:8778: parinirvṛtāsya ca sarṣapaphalapramāṇadhātavo bhaveyuḥ, asya ca maṇiratnagarbhasyodyānasya madhye mahān stūpaḥ syāt sarvastūpaprativiśiṣṭaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8779: 202.022. ye ca sattvāḥ śāntakāyā mahācaityaṃ vanditukāmā gaccheyuḥ, te taṃ sarvastūpaprativiśiṣṭaṃ dhātuparaṃ dṛṣṭvā viśrāntā bhaveyuḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8780: 202.023. parinirvṛtasyāpi mama caityeṣu, janakāyā āgatya kārāṃ kṛtvā svargamokṣaparāyāṇā bhaveyuriti/
XXdivyav_u:8781: 202.024. evaṃ samyak praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā tasmiṃścampakavṛkṣe śikhāṃ baddhvā raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamuvāca--āgaccha mahābrāhmaṇa, pratigṛhyatām/
XXdivyav_u:8783: 202.027. tato rājā candraprabha ātmanaḥ kāyasya sthāma ca balaṃ ca
XXdivyav_u:8784: saṃjanya tasmiṃśca brāhmaṇe karuṇāsahagataṃ maitracittamutpādya śiraśichattvā raudrākṣāya brāhmaṇāya niryātitavān/
XXdivyav_u:8785: 202.028. kālaṃ ca kṛtvā atikramya brahmalokaṃ praṇītatvācchubhakṛtsne
XXdivyav_u:8787: 202.029. samanantaraparityakte rājñā candraprabheṇa śirasi ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus triḥ kampitaḥ saṃkampitaḥ saṃprakampitaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:8788: calitaḥ saṃcalitaḥ saṃpracalitaḥ, vyadhitaḥ pravyādhitaḥ saṃpravyādhitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:8789: 202.031. gaganatalasthāśca devatā divyānyutpalāni kṣeptumārabdhāḥ, padmāni kumudāni puṇḍarīkānyagarucūrṇāni tagaracūrṇāni candanacūrṇāni tamālapatrāṇi divyāni <203>māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi, divyāni ca vādyāni
XXdivyav_u:8795: 203.003. tata ekatyāḥ pṛthivyāmāvartante parivartante, eke bāhubhiḥ prakrośanti, kāścit prakīrṇakeśyo rudanti/
XXdivyav_u:8797: 203.005. tata ekatyāstasminneva pradeśe sthitvā dhyānānyutpādya tatraiva
XXdivyav_u:8798: kālaṃ kṛtvā śubhakṛtsne devanikāye upapannā rājñaścandraprabhasya
XXdivyav_u:8800: 203.006. apare dhyānānyutpādya tatraiva kālaṃ kṛtvā bhāsvare devanikāye

XXdivyav_u:8819: 203.015. syātkhalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣuvaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena

XXdivyav_u:9215: 211.004. yāvat tāni pañca vaṇikśatāni bhāṇḍaṃ pratisāmayanti/
XXdivyav_u:9219: 211.005. kutra gacchasi? sa kathayati--imāni pañca kulaputraśatānyākāṅkṣanti svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
XXdivyav_u:9226: 211.010. tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣuparṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ

XXdivyav_u:9231: 211.013. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/

XXdivyav_u:9239: 211.020. ehīti caoktā hi tathāgatena muṇḍāśca saṃghāṭiparītadehāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9240: 211.022. sadyaḥ praśāntendriyā eva tasthurevaṃ sthitā buddhamanorathena//5//
XXdivyav_u:9243: 211.025. arhantaḥ saṃvṛttāstraidhātukavītarāgāḥ pūrvavadyāvat pūjyāśca abhivādyāśca saṃvṛttāḥ//
XXdivyav_u:9245: bhadanta sattvānadrākṣaṃ kuḍyākārān stambhākārān vṛkṣākārān patrākārān puṣpākārān phalākārāan rajjvākārān saṃmārjanyākārān khaṭvākārānudūkhalākārān sthālikākārān/

XXdivyav_u:9249: 212.001. te tasya karmaṇo vipākena kuḍyākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9251: 212.002. yān saṃgharakṣita sattvānādrākṣīrvṛkṣākārāṃste kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvakā
XXdivyav_u:9252: 212.003. taiḥ sāṃghikāḥ puṣpavṛkṣāḥ phalavṛkṣāḥ paudgalikaparibhogena bhuktāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9253: 212.004. te tasya karmaṇo vipākena vṛkṣākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9254: 212.004. yathā vṛkṣākārāḥ, evaṃ patrākārāaḥ phalākārāḥ puṣpākārāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9255: 212.005. yaṃ tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita sattvamadrākṣī rajjvākāram, sa kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvaka āsīt/
XXdivyav_u:9261: 212.010. sa taiḥ pṛṣṭah--śrāmaṇeraka, kiṃ saṃghasya pānakaṃ bhaviṣyati? sa
XXdivyav_u:9265: 212.011. sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena tapvākāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9266: 212.012. yaṃ tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita sattvamadrākṣīrudūkhalākāram, sa kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvaka āsīt/
XXdivyav_u:9269: 212.014. sa tenoktah--śrāmaṇeraka, dadasva me khalastokaṃ kuṭṭayitvā/
XXdivyav_u:9274: tvāmevāhamasminn udūkhale prakṣipya kuṭṭaye prāgeva khalastokam/
XXdivyav_u:9275: 212.016. yattadarhato 'ntike kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam, sa tasya karmaṇo
XXdivyav_u:9277: 212.017. yāṃstvaṃ saṃgharakṣita sattvānadrākṣīḥ sthālyākārāṃste kāśyapasya samyaksambbuddhasya kalpikārakā āsan/
XXdivyav_u:9278: 212.018. te bhikṣūṇāṃ bhaiṣajyāni kvāthayamānāḥ sthālikāṃ bhañjate/
XXdivyav_u:9280: 212.019. te tasya karmaṇo vipākena sthālyākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9281: 212.020. yaṃ tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita sattvamadrākṣīrmadhye chinnastantunā dhāryamāṇo gacchati, sa kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya pravacane pravrajita āsīllābhagrāhikaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9282: 212.021. tena yadvārṣikaṃ lābhaṃ tad dhaimantikaṃ pariṇāmitam,
XXdivyav_u:9284: 212.022. tasya karmaṇo vipākena madhye chinnastantunā dhāryamāṇo
XXdivyav_u:9289: 213.002. bhikṣuvaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kuto bhadanta tena nāgakumāreṇa tatprathamataḥ śraddhā pratilabdhā? bhagavānāha--bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣuvo 'sminneva bhadrakalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā lokam utpannastathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato
XXdivyav_u:9290: lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān/
XXdivyav_u:9291: 213.005. sa evaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati--etāni bhikṣavo 'raṇyāni
XXdivyav_u:9297: kecinmandākinyāḥ puṣkariṇyāstīre, kecidanavatapte mahāsarasi, kecit saptasu kāñcanamayeṣu parvateṣu, kecit tāsu tāsu
XXdivyav_u:9299: 213.011. anyatamaśca cirajātako nāgakumāraḥ suparṇinā pakṣirājena sumerupariṣaṇḍāyāmupariṣṭādapahriyate/
XXdivyav_u:9300: 213.012. yāvat tena bhikṣavo dhyānādhyayanayogamanasikārayuktā viharanto dṛṣṭāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9302: 213.013. prasādajātaḥ saṃlakṣayati--muktā hyete āryakā evaṃvidhād duḥkhāt/
XXdivyav_u:9303: 213.014. cyutaḥ kālagato vārāṇasyāṃ ṣaṭkarmanirate brāhmaṇakule jātaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9313: 213.017. kutra mama mātāpitarau? yāvat paśyati nāgabhavane rudantau
XXdivyav_u:9316: 213.018. gatvā pṛcchitumārabdhah--amba tāta kasyārthe ruditah? tau
XXdivyav_u:9319: 213.020. ārya, tādṛśaḥ sa duṣṭānāgo yadvayaṃ sugatigamanamapi na
XXdivyav_u:9322: 213.021. pādayor nipatya kathayatah--ārya, evaṃvidhāstvayā guṇagaṇā adhigatāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9324: 213.023. ihaiva tvamāgamya divase divase bhaktakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā gaccha/
XXdivyav_u:9325: 213.023. sa nāgabhavane divyāṃ sudhāṃ paribhuktvā āgacchati/
XXdivyav_u:9327: 213.024. sa bhikṣubhiruktah--śrāmaṇeraka, ayaṃ te upādhyāyaḥ kutra bhuktvā āgacchati? sa kathayati--nāhaṃ jāne/
XXdivyav_u:9330: 213.026. tvaṃ kasyārthe na gacchati? sa kathayati--ayaṃ maharddhiko mahānubhāvo yena gacchati/
XXdivyav_u:9331: 213.027. kathamahaṃ gacchāmi? te kathayanti--yadā ayam ṛddhyā gacchati,
XXdivyav_u:9335: cīvarakarṇikamavalambate, nāsau patet, prāgeva tvaṃ patiṣyasīti/
XXdivyav_u:9336: 213.030. yo yasmin sthāne 'ntardhāsyati, tena tatra nimittamudgṛhītam/
XXdivyav_u:9339: 213.031. tau upari vihāyasā <214>prakrāntau yāvat tau nāgairdṛṣṭau/
XXdivyav_u:9342: 214.001. sa saṃlakṣayati--kasyārthe 'yamapara āsanaḥ prajñaptah? sa pratinivartya paśyati yāvat śrāmaṇerakam/
XXdivyav_u:9348: 214.005. taistasya divyā sudhā dattā, tasyāpi prākṛta āhāraḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9350: 214.005. tena tasya pātraṃ gṛhītam yāvat tatraikā odanamijya(?)
XXdivyav_u:9354: 214.007. ekadhye niṣaṇṇayorasya divyā sudhā dattā, mamāpi prākṛta āhāraḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9355: 214.008. sa praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā bhagavati kāśyape samyaksambuddhe 'nuttare mahādakṣiṇīye brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇam, anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlenaitaṃ nāgamasmādbhavanāccyāvayitvā atraivopapadyeyamiti/
XXdivyav_u:9356: 214.010. tasya dṛṣṭa eva dharme ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ jalaṃ
XXdivyav_u:9361: 214.012. sa kathayati--bhadramukha, apāyā hyete, nivartaya cittam/
XXdivyav_u:9364: 214.015. ihasthasyaiva me bhadanta pāṇibhyāṃ syandate jalam//1//
XXdivyav_u:9366: 214.016. tatra bhikṣavastena nāgakumāreṇa tatprathamataḥ śraddhā pratilabdhā//
XXdivyav_u:9370: 215.002. bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā saṃgharakṣitena karma kṛtam, yasya karmaṇo vipākenāḍhye mahābhoge kule jāto bhagavato 'ntike pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam? evaṃ taṃ ca vaineyakāryaṃ kṛtam?
XXdivyav_u:9378: 215.008. anena tatra yāvadāyuḥparyantaṃ brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇam, na kaścidguṇo 'dhigataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9381: 215.010. maraṇasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā kāśyape bhagavati samyaksambuddhe 'nuttare mahādakṣiṇīye yāvadāyurbrahmacaryaṃ cīrṇam, na kāścidguṇagaṇo 'dhigataḥ, anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yo 'sau
XXdivyav_u:9382: bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksambuddhenottaro nāma māṇavo varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāmavaśyabhāgīyakasya bhāvyatāyāṃ buddho, vyākṛtaḥ, tasya śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkuryām/
XXdivyav_u:9384: 215.014. te kathayanti--upādhyāya, asti kiṃcit tvayā guṇagaṇamadhigatam?
XXdivyav_u:9386: 215.015. kiṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam? idaṃ cedaṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:9387: 215.016. te kathayanti--vayamapyupādhyāyameva kalyāṇamitramāgamya tasyaiva bhagavato 'ntike sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkuryuḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9388: 215.017. karvaṭanivāsinā janakāyena śrutaṃ glāna āryaka iti/
XXdivyav_u:9391: 215.019. kiṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam? idaṃ cedaṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:9392: 215.019. te kathayanti--vayamapyāryameva kalyāṇamitramāgamya tasyaiva bhagavato 'ntike sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkuryuḥ//
XXdivyav_u:9393: 215.021. kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavah? yo 'sau vaiyāvṛtyakaraḥ, eṣa evāsau saṃgharakṣito bhikṣuḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9394: 215.022. yāni tāni pañca sārdhaṃvihāriśatāni, etānyeva tāni pañcabhikṣuśatāni/
XXdivyav_u:9395: 215.022. yo 'sau karvaṭanivāsī janakāyaḥ, etānyeva tāni pañca vaṇikśatāni/
XXdivyav_u:9396: 215.023. yadanena tara dharmavaiyāvṛtyaṃ kṛtam, tasya karmaṇo vipākenāḍhye
XXdivyav_u:9398: 215.024. yat tanmaraṇasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam, tasya karmaṇo vipākena
XXdivyav_u:9399: mamāntike pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtamevaṃ ca vaineyakāryaṃ kṛtam//
XXdivyav_u:9400: 215.027. iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākah...pūrvavat//
XXdivyav_u:9403: 216.002. yo 'sau svamāṃsatanubhiryajanāni kṛtvā tāvacciraṃ karuṇayā jagato hitāya/
XXdivyav_u:9404: 216.003. tasya śramasya saphalīkaraṇāya santaḥ saṃmārjitaṃ śṛṇuta
XXdivyav_u:9406: 216.006. ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharatīti sūtraṃ vaktavyam/
XXdivyav_u:9407: 216.007. atra tāvadbhagavattathāgatavadanāṃmodharavivarapratyudgatavacanasaratsaliladhārāsampātāpanītarāgadveṣamohamadamānamāyāśāṭhyapaṅkapaṭalānāṃ śabdanyāyāditarkaśāstrārthāvalokanotpannaprajñāpradīpaprotsāritakuśāstradarśanāndhakārāṇāṃ saṃsāratṛṣṇāchedipravarasaddharmapayaḥpānaśauṇḍānāṃ gurūṇāṃ saṃnidhau sarvāvavādakaṃ mahātmānamatimāharddhikaṃ sthaviropaguptamārabhya kāṃcideva vibuddhajanamanaḥprasādakarīṃ dharmyāṃ kathāṃ samanusmariṣyāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9410: vinīya kumbhakārīṃ caṇḍālīṃ gopālīṃ ca, teṣāṃ mathurāmanuprāptaḥ, tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma--asyāmānanda mathurāyāṃ mama varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya gupto nāma gāndhiko bhaviṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:9411: 216.015. tasya putro bhaviṣyatyupagupto nāma alakṣaṇako buddho yo mama varṣaśatapatinirvṛtasya buddhakāryaṃ bhavi(kari)ṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:9415: 216.018. eṣo 'gro me ānanda śrāvakāṇāṃ bhaviṣyatyavavādakānām yaduta upagupto bhikṣuḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9416: 216.019. paśyasi tvamānanda dūrata eva nīlanīlāmbararājim? evaṃ bhadanta/
XXdivyav_u:9418: 216.020. atra varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya śāṇakavāsī nāma bhikṣurbhaviṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:9419: 216.021. so 'tra rurumuṇḍaparvate vihāraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati, upaguptaṃ ca pravrājayiṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:9420: 216.022. mathurāyāmānanda naṭo bhaṭaśca dvau bhrātarau śreṣṭhinau
XXdivyav_u:9423: 216.024. etadagraṃ me ānanda bhaviṣyati śamathānukūlānāṃ śayyāsanānām
XXdivyav_u:9425: 216.025. athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--āścaryaṃ bhadanta yadīdṛśamāyuṣmānupagupto bahujanahitaṃ kariṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:9426: 216.026. bhagavānāha--na ānanda etarhi, yathā atīte 'pyadhvani tena vinipatitaśarīreṇāpyatraiva urumuṇḍaparvate trayaḥ pārśvāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9430: 216.028. tatra yo 'sau pañcānāṃ markaṭaśatānām yūthapatiḥ, sa tam yūthamapahāya yatra pārśve pañca pratyekabuddhaśatāni prativasanti, tatra
XXdivyav_u:9432: 216.030. tasya tān pratyekabuddhān dṛṣṭvā prasādo jātaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9433: 216.030. sa teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ śīrṇaparṇāni mūlaphalāni copanāmayati/
XXdivyav_u:9434: 216.031. yadā ca te paryaṅkenopaviṣṭā bhavanti, sa vṛddhānte praṇāmaṃ
XXdivyav_u:9435: kṛtvā yāvannavāntaṃ gatvā paryaṅkenopaviśati, yāvat te pratyekabuddhāḥ
XXdivyav_u:9437: 217.001. <217>sa teṣāṃ śīrṇaparṇāni mūlaphalāni copanāmayati, te na pratigṛhṇanti/
XXdivyav_u:9440: 217.003. tataḥ sa markaṭaḥ śocitvā paridevitvā ca dvitīyaṃ pārśvaṃ gato
XXdivyav_u:9442: 217.004. te ca ṛṣayaḥ kecit kaṇḍakāpāśrayāḥ, kecidbhasmāpāśrayāḥ,
XXdivyav_u:9449: 217.007. yadā ca tairīryāpatho vikopito bhavati, tadā sa teṣāmagrataḥ
XXdivyav_u:9452: 217.008. tenāpi coktam--paryaṅkena tāvanniṣīdatha, yāvat tāni pañca
XXdivyav_u:9454: 217.009. te 'nācāryakā anupadeśakāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣān dharmānāmukhīkṛtya pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ sākṣātkṛtavantaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9455: 217.011. atha teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāmetadabhavat--yat kiṃcidasmābhiḥ śreyo 'vāptam, tatsarvamimaṃ
XXdivyav_u:9456: 217.012. tairyāvat sa markaṭaḥ phalamūlaiḥ paripālitaḥ, kālagatasya ca taccharīraṃ gandhakāṣṭhairdhmāpitam//
XXdivyav_u:9457: 217.014. tatkiṃ manyase ānanda? yo 'sau pañcānāṃ markaṭaśatānām yūthapatiḥ, sa eṣa upaguptaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9458: 217.015. tadāpi tena vinipatitaśarīreṇāpyatraivorumuṇḍe parvate bahujanahitaṃ kṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:9461: 217.016. tacca yathaivaṃ tathopadarśayiṣyāmah--yadā sthavireṇa śāṇakavāsinā urumuṇḍe parvate vihāraḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:9462: samanvāharati--kimasau gāndhika utpannaḥ, athādyāpi notpadyate iti?
XXdivyav_u:9464: 217.018. sa yāvat samanvāharati--yo 'sau tasya putra upagupto nāṃnā
XXdivyav_u:9465: alakṣa.ṅko buddho nirdiṣṭaḥ, yo mama varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya buddhakāryaṃ
XXdivyav_u:9466: kariṣyatīti, kimasau utpanno 'dyāpi notpadyate? tena yāvadupāyena gupto
XXdivyav_u:9468: 217.021. sa yadā abhiprasannastadā sthaviraḥ saṃbahulairbhikṣubhiḥ sārdhamekadivasaṃ tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9471: 217.023. yāvadgupto gandhikaḥ sthaviraṃ śāṇakavāsinamekākinaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati--na khalu āryasya kaścit paścāccchramaṇah? sthavira
XXdivyav_u:9472: uvāca--jarādharmāṇāṃ kuto 'smākaṃ paścācchramaṇo bhavati? yadi kecit śraddhāpurogena pravrajanti, te 'smākaṃ paścācchramaṇā bhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:9473: 217.025. gupto gāndhika uvāca--ārya, ahaṃ tāvadgṛhavāse parigṛddho
XXdivyav_u:9476: 217.026. api tu yo 'smākaṃ putro bhavati, taṃ vayamāryasya paścācchramaṇaṃ
XXdivyav_u:9482: 217.029. sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttastadā sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī guptaṃ
XXdivyav_u:9488: 217.032. yo 'smākaṃ dvitīyaḥ putro bhaviṣyati, taṃ vayamāryasya paścācchramaṇaṃ dāsyāmaḥ/

XXdivyav_u:9849: 228.018. tataḥ sthaviropagupto 'nekeṣu brāhamaṇaśatasahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu siṃha iva nirbhīḥ
XXdivyav_u:9851: 228.020. māṃ prati na te śakyaṃ siṃhāsanamaviduṣā samabhiroḍhum/
XXdivyav_u:9852: 228.021. yaḥ sa siṃhāsanastho mṛga iva sa hi yāti saṃkocam//53//
XXdivyav_u:9853: 228.022. siṃha iva yastu nirbhīr ninadati pravarāridarpanāśārtham/
XXdivyav_u:9855: 228.024. yāvat sthaviropaguptena pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyāni
XXdivyav_u:9862: 228.028. tatra corumuṇḍaparvate guhā aṣṭadaśahastā dairdhyeṇa dvādaśahastā
XXdivyav_u:9865: madīyenāvavādena sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyati, tena caturaṅgulamātrā śalākā guhāyāṃ prakṣeptavyā/
XXdivyav_u:9869: 229.001. tadyathā hi vinītakāmadhātvīśvare dvitīyaśāstṛkalpe mahātmani sthaviropagupte suramanujamahoragāsuragaruḍayakṣagandharvavidyādharārcitapādayugme pūrvabuddhakṣotrāvaropitakuśalabījasaṃtatīnāmanekeṣāṃ sattvaśatasahasrāṇāṃ saddharmasalilavarṣadhārānipātena mokṣāṅkurānabhivardhayannurumuṇḍe śaile//
XXdivyav_u:9874: 229.007. atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
XXdivyav_u:9879: 229.014. dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ sābhisaṃskāraṃ nagaradvāramindrakīle pādau vyavasthāpayanti, tadā citrāṇyadbhutāni prādurbhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:9886: 229.018. vatsā dāmāni cchittvā mātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ samāgacchanti/
XXdivyav_u:9887: 229.019. hastinas trośanti, aśvā heṣante, ṛṣabhā garjanti,
XXdivyav_u:9890: 229.021. aparāhatāni ca vāditrabhāṇḍāni madhuraṃ śabdaṃ niścārayanti/
XXdivyav_u:9893: 229.022. iyaṃ ca tasmin samaye pṛthivī ṣaḍanikāraṃ prakampate/
XXdivyav_u:9895: 'vanamati madhya unnamati, calitaḥ pracalito vedhitaḥ pravedhitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9896: 229.024. itīme cānye cādbhutadharmāḥ prādurbhavanti bhagavato nagarapraveśe/
XXdivyav_u:9905: 230.001. <230>niṃnā connamate natāvanamate buddhānubhāvānmahī sthāṇuḥ śarkarakaṇḍakavyapagato nirdoṣatām yāti ca/
XXdivyav_u:9906: 230.002. andhā mūkajaḍendriyāśca puruṣā vyaktendriyāstatkṣaṇaṃ saṃvādyantyanighaṭṭitāśca nagare nandanti tūryakhanāḥ//57//
XXdivyav_u:9907: 230.005. sarvaṃ ca tannagaraṃ sūryasahasrātirekayā kanakamarīcivarṇayā buddhaprabhayā sphuṭaṃ
XXdivyav_u:9909: 230.007. sūryaprabhāmavabhartsya hi tasya bhābhirvyāptaṃ jagatsakalameva sakānanastham/
XXdivyav_u:9910: 230.009. saṃprāpya ca pravaradharmakathābhirāmo lokaṃ surāsuranaraṃ hi
XXdivyav_u:9918: 230.013. yāvajjayena dārakena saktuṃ dāsyāmīti pāṃśvañjalirbhagavataḥ pātre prakṣiptaḥ, vijayena ca kṛtāñjalinābhyanumoditam/
XXdivyav_u:9921: 230.018. dhīreṇa vaktreṇa kṛtaprasādaḥ pāṃśuṃ dadau jātijarāntakāya//59//
XXdivyav_u:9923: kuśalamūlena ekacchatrāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ rājā syām, atraiva ca buddhe kārāṃ
XXdivyav_u:9925: 230.022. tato munistasya niśābhya bhāvaṃ bālasya samyakpraṇidhiṃ ca
XXdivyav_u:9927: 230.024. iṣṭaṃ phalaṃ kṣṛtravaśena dṛṣṭvā jagrāha pāṃśuṃ
XXdivyav_u:9930: 230.026. dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ
XXdivyav_u:9933: 230.029. ye 'dho gacchanti, te saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanamavīciparyanteṣu gatvā ye śītanarakāsteṣūṣṇībhūtvā nipatanti, ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu śītībhūtvā
XXdivyav_u:9942: 231.004. te nirmite cittāni prasādayitvā narakavedanīyāni karmāṇi
XXdivyav_u:9943: kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā
XXdivyav_u:9945: 231.005. ye ūrddhvato gacchanti, te cāturmahārājikān devāṃstrāyastriṃśān
XXdivyav_u:9946: yāmāṃstuṣitānnirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmān parīttābhānapramāṇābhānābhāsvarān parīttaśubhānapramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnānanabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalānabṛhānatapān sudṛśān sudarśanānakaniṣṭhaparyanteṣu deveṣu gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyamanātmetyuddhoṣayanti/
XXdivyav_u:9954: 231.015. yadi bhagavānatītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, pṛṣṭhato
XXdivyav_u:9968: 231.022. atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato vāme karatale 'ntarhitāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9971: 231.027. nākāraṇaṃ śaṅkhamṛṇālagauraṃ smitaṃ vidarśayanti jinā jitārayaḥ//36//
XXdivyav_u:9972: 231.029. tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya vīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra
XXdivyav_u:9980: 232.004. api tu sahetu sapratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ
XXdivyav_u:9982: 232.005. paśyasi tvamānanda dārakam yena tathāgatasya pātre pāṃśvañjaliḥ
XXdivyav_u:9984: 232.006. ayamānanda dārako 'nena kuśalamūlena varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya pāṭaliputre nagare aśoko nāṃnā rājā bhaviṣyati caturbhāgacakravartī dhārmiko dharmarājā, yo me śarīradhātūn vaistārikān
XXdivyav_u:9989: 232.010. astaṃgate mayi bhaviṣyati ekarājā yo 'sau hyaśoka iti nāma
XXdivyav_u:9992: 232.014. ayamasya deyadharmo yattathāgatasya pāṃśvañjaliḥ pātre pakṣiptaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9993: 232.014. yāvadbhagavatā teṣāṃ sarva āyuṣmate ānandāya dattāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:9994: 232.015. gomayena miśrayitvā yatra caṃkrame tathāgataścaṃkramyate, tatra gomayakārṣīṃ prayacchati/
XXdivyav_u:9995: 232.016. yāvadāyuṣmatā ānandena teṣāṃ sagomayena miśrayitvā yatra
XXdivyav_u:9997: 232.018. tena khalu punaḥ samayena rājagṛhe bimbisāro rājā rājyaṃ kārayati/
XXdivyav_u:10008: 232.021. pāṭaliputre nagare biṃdusāro nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati/
XXdivyav_u:10011: 232.023. tena ca samayena campāyāṃ nagaryāmanyatamo brāhmaṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:10012: 232.023. tasya duhitā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā janapadakalyāṇī/
XXdivyav_u:10013: 232.024. sā naimittikairvyākṛtā--āsyā dārikāyā rājā bhartā bhaviṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:10018: 232.026. sa tāṃ duhitaraṃ grahāya pāṭaliputraṃ gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:10019: 232.027. tena sā sarvālaṃkārairvibhūṣayitvā rājño bindusārasya bhāryārthamanupradattā--iyaṃ hi devakanyā dhanyā praśastā ceti/
XXdivyav_u:10023: 232.029. yadi rājā anayā sārdhaṃ paricārayiṣyati, asmākaṃ bhūyaścakṣuḥsampreṣaṇamapi na kariṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:10025: 232.031. sā rājñaḥ kṛśaśmaśruṃ prasādhayati yāvat suśikṣitā saṃvṛttā/
XXdivyav_u:10026: 232.031. yadā <233>ārabhate rājñaḥ keśaśmaśrum, tadā rājā śete/
XXdivyav_u:10027: 233.001. yāvat rājñā prītena vareṇa pravāritā--kiṃ tvaṃ varamicchasīti?
XXdivyav_u:10028: tayā abhihitam--devena me saha samāgamaḥ syāt/
XXdivyav_u:10029: 233.002. rājā āha--tvaṃ nāpinī, ahaṃ rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:10030: 233.003. kathaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ samāgamo bhaviṣyati? sā kathayati--deva nāhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:10033: 233.005. rājā kathayati--kena tvaṃ nāpitakarma śikṣāpitā? sā
XXdivyav_u:10041: 233.008. tasya vistareṇa jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kiṃ kumārasya bhavatu nāma? sā
XXdivyav_u:10048: 233.011. atha rājā bindusāraha kumāraṃ parīkṣitukāmaḥ piṅgalavatsājīvaṃ
XXdivyav_u:10049: parivrājakamāmantrayate--upādhyāya, kumārāṃstāvatparīkṣāmah--kaḥ śakyate śakyate mamātyayādrājyaṃ kārayitum? piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājakaḥ kathayati--tena hi deva kumārānādāya suvarṇamaṇḍapamudyānaṃ nirgaccha,
XXdivyav_u:10052: 233.015. yāvadaśokaḥ kumāro mātrā cocyate--vatsa, rājā kumārān parīkṣitukāmaḥ suvarṇamaṇḍapamudyānaṃ gataḥ, tvamapi tatra gaccheti/
XXdivyav_u:10053: 233.016. aśokaḥ kathayati--rājño 'hamanabhipreto darśanenāpi, kimahaṃ tatra gāmiṣyāmi? sā kathayati--tathāpi gaccheti/
XXdivyav_u:10056: cāgrāmātyaputreṇoktah--aśoka, kva gamiṣyasīti? aśokaḥ kathayati--rājā adya suvarṇamaṇḍape udyāne kumārān parīkṣayati/
XXdivyav_u:10058: 233.020. yāvadaśokastasmin mahallake 'bhiruhya suvarṇamaṇḍapamudyānaṃ gatvā kumārāṇāṃ madhye 'tra pṛthivyāṃ prastīrya niṣasāda/
XXdivyav_u:10061: 233.023. tato rājñā bindusāreṇa piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājako 'bhihitah--upādhyāya, parīkṣa kumārān--kaḥ śakyate mamātyayādrājyaṃ kartumiti? paśyati piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājakaḥ, cintayati ca--aśoko
XXdivyav_u:10064: 233.025. yadi kathayiṣyāmi aśoko rājā bhaviṣyatīti, nāsti me jīvitam/
XXdivyav_u:10067: 233.027. āha--yasya yānaṃ śobhanaṃ sa rājā bhaviṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:10071: 233.029. mama yānaṃ śobhanam, ahaṃ rājā bhaviṣyāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:10080: kathayati--abhedena vyākṛtam--yasya yānamagramāsanaṃ pānaṃ bhājanaṃ ceti,
XXdivyav_u:10083: 234.003. mama hastiskandham yānaṃ pṛthivī āsanaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ bhājanaṃ śālyodanaṃ dadhivyañjanaṃ pānīyaṃ pānamiti//
XXdivyav_u:10084: 234.005. tataḥ piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājakah aśoko rājā bhaviṣyatīti
XXdivyav_u:10091: 234.008. yadā śṛṇoṣi aśoko rājā saṃvṛttāḥ, tadā āgantavyam/
XXdivyav_u:10093: 234.010. atha rājño bindusārasya takṣaśilā nāma nagaraṃ viruddham/
XXdivyav_u:10094: 234.010. tatra rājñā bindusāreṇa aśoko visarjitah--gaccha kumāra,
XXdivyav_u:10096: 234.011. caturaṅgaṃ balakāyaṃ dattam, yānaṃ praharaṇaṃ ca pratiṣiddham/
XXdivyav_u:10098: bhṛtyairvijñaptah--kumāra, naivāsmākaṃ sainyapraharaṇam--kena vayaṃ kam yudhyāmah? tatah aśokenābhihitam--yadi nāma rājyavipākyaṃ kuśalamasti,
XXdivyav_u:10103: 234.016. śrutvā takṣaśilānivāsinaḥ paurā ardhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārge
XXdivyav_u:10105: 234.017. pratyudgamya ca kathayanti--na vayaṃ kumārasya viruddhāḥ, nāpi rājño bindusārasya, api tu duṣṭāmātyā asmākaṃ paribhavaṃ kurvanti/
XXdivyav_u:10109: 234.019. tena tau vṛttyā saṃvibhaktau tasyāgrataḥ parvatān saṃchindantau
XXdivyav_u:10114: 234.023. yāvat susīmaḥ kumāra udyānāt pāṭaliputraṃ praviśati/
XXdivyav_u:10116: 234.024. tasya susīmena kumāreṇa trīḍābhiprāyatayā khaṭakā pātitā/
XXdivyav_u:10118: 234.025. yadā rājā bhaviṣyati, tadā śastraṃ pātayiṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:10119: 234.026. tathā kariṣyāmi yathā rājaiva na bhaviṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:10130: 234.030. yāvadamātyairaśokaḥ kumāro haridrayā pralipto lakṣāṃ ca lohapātre kvāthayitvā kvathitena rasena lohapātrāṇi mrakṣayitvā chorayanti--aśokaḥ
XXdivyav_u:10132: 234.032. yadā bindusāraḥ svalpāvaśeṣaprāṇaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ, tadā amātyairaśokaḥ kumāraḥ sarvālaṃkārairbhūṣayitvā<235> rājño bindusārasyopanītah--imaṃ
XXdivyav_u:10134: 235.001. yadā susīma āgato bhaviṣyati, tadā taṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:10136: 235.002. aśokena cābhihitam--yadi mama dharmeṇa rājyaṃ bhavati, devatā mama paṭṭaṃ bandhantu/
XXdivyav_u:10138: 235.003. taṃ dṛṣṭvā bindusārasya rājña uṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ mukhādāgatam
XXdivyav_u:10140: 235.004. yadā aśoko rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ, tasyordhvam yojanam yakṣāḥ
XXdivyav_u:10143: 235.006. susīmenāpi śrutam--bindusāro rājā kālagataḥ, aśoko rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:10146: 235.007. aśokenāpi pāṭaliputre nagare ekasmin dvāre eko nagnaḥ sthāpitaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:10147: dvitīye dvitīyaḥ, tṛtīye rādhaguptaḥ, pūrvadvāre svayameva rājā aśoko
XXdivyav_u:10149: 235.009. rādhaguptena ca pūrvasmin dvāre yantramayo hastī sthāpitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:10150: 235.009. aśokasya ca pratimāṃ parikhāṃ khanayitvā khadirāṅgāraiśca
XXdivyav_u:10156: 235.012. yadā ca susīmaḥ praghātitaḥ, tasyāpi mahānagno bhadrāyudho nāṃnā
XXdivyav_u:10158: 235.014. yadā aśoko rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ sa tairamātyairavajñayā dṛśyate/
XXdivyav_u:10160: 235.015. amātyā āhuh--devena kutra dṛṣṭam? api tu kaṇṭakavṛkṣāṃś chittvā puṣpavṛkṣān phalavṛkṣāṃśca
XXdivyav_u:10161: 235.017. tairyāvat trirapi rājña ājñā pratikūlitā, tato rājñā ruṣitena
XXdivyav_u:10162: asiṃ niṣkośaṃ kṛtvā pañcānāmamātyaśatānāṃ śiraṃsi cchinnāni/
XXdivyav_u:10163: 235.018. yāvadrājā aśoko 'pareṇa samayenāntaḥpuraparivṛto vasantakālasamaye puṣpitaphaliteṣu pādapeṣu pūrvanagarasyodyānaṃ gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:10164: 235.019. tatra ca paribhramatā aśokavṛkṣaḥ supuṣpito dṛṣṭaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:10165: 235.020. tato rājño mamāpi sahanāmā ityanunayo jātaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:10172: 235.023. śrutvā ca rājñā amarṣajātena pañca strīśatāni kiṭikaiḥ saṃveṣṭya dagdhāni/
XXdivyav_u:10173: 235.024. tasyemānyaśubhānyālokya caṇḍo rājā caṇḍāśoka iti vyavasthāpitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:10175: 235.026. api tu devasya vadhyaghātakāḥ puruṣāḥ sthāpayitavyāḥ, ye devasya vadhyakaraṇīyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:10181: 235.029. caṇḍo duṣṭātmā mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca paribhāṣate, dārakadārikāśca
XXdivyav_u:10182: tāḍayati, pipīlikān makṣikān mūṣikān matsyāṃśca jālena baḍiśena
XXdivyav_u:10184: 235.031. caṇḍo dārakastasya caṇḍagirika iti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:10202: 236.008. sa āha--deva, varaṃ me prayaccha, yastatra praviśettasya na bhūyo nirgama iti/
XXdivyav_u:10207: 236.012. yāvannarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmau ādīptāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmekajvālibhūtāyāmuttānakān pratiṣṭhāpya ayomayena
XXdivyav_u:10208: viṣkambhakena mukhadvāraṃ viṣkambhya ayoguḍānādīptān pradīptān saṃprajvalitānekajvālībhūtānāsye prakṣipānti, ye teṣāṃ sattvānāmoṣṭhau api
XXdivyav_u:10209: dahanti, jahvāmapi kaṇṭhamapi kaṇṭhamapi hṛdayamapi hṛdayasāmantamapi antrāṇyantraguṇānapi dagdhvā adhaḥ pragharati/
XXdivyav_u:10210: 236.016. evaṃ duḥkhā hi bhikṣavo nārakāḥ sattvā narakeṣūpapannāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:10211: 236.017. yāvannarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmau ādīptāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:10212: saṃprajvalitāyāmekajvālibhūtāyāmuttānakān pratiṣṭhāpya ayomayena viṣkambhakena mukhadvāraṃ viṣkambhya kvathitaṃ tāmramāsye prakṣipanti,
XXdivyav_u:10213: yatteṣāṃ sattvānāmoṣṭhāvapi dahati, jihvāmapi tālvapi kaṇṭhamapi
XXdivyav_u:10216: 236.020. santi sattvā narakeṣūpapannā yānnarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:10217: bhūmau ādīptāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmekajvālībhūtāyāmavānmukhān pratiṣṭhāpya ayomayena sūtreṇādīptena saṃprajvalitenaikajvālībhūtenāskphāṭya ayomayena kuṭhāreṇādīptena saṃpradīptena saṃprajvalitenaikajvālībhūtena takṣaṇuvanti saṃtakṣṇuvanti saṃpratakṣṇuvanti aṣṭāṃśamapi ṣaḍaṃśamapi ṣaḍaṃśamapi caturasnamapi vṛttamapi maṇḍalamapi unnatamapi avanatamapi śāntamapi viśāntamapi takṣṇuvanti/
XXdivyav_u:10219: 236.025. santi sattvā narakeṣūpapannā yānnarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:10220: bhūmau ādīptāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmekajvalībhūtāyāmavanmukhān pratiṣṭhāpya ayomayena ayomayena sūtreṇādīptena pradīptena saṃprajvalitenaikajvālībhūtenāsphāṭya ayomayyāṃ bhūmyāmāadīptāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmekajvālībhūtāyāṃ takṣṇuvanti saṃtakṣṇuvanti
XXdivyav_u:10221: saṃparitakṣṇuvanti, aṣṭāṃśamapi ṣaḍaṃśamapi caturasnamapi maṇḍalamapi unnatamapi avanatamapi śāntamapi viśāntamapi takṣṇuvanti/
XXdivyav_u:10223: 236.031. santi sattvā narakeṣūpapannā yānnarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:10224: bhūmāvādīptāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmekajvalībhūtāyāmuttānakān pratiṣṭhāpya pañcaviṣaṭabandhanāṃ kāraṇāṃ kārayanti,
XXdivyav_u:10225: ubhayorhastayorāyasau<237> kīlau trāmanti, ubhayoḥ pādayorāyase kīle
XXdivyav_u:10228: 237.002. evaṃ pañca vedanā iti kurute sadṛśāśca kāraṇāḥ sattvānāmārabdhāḥ kārayitum//

XXdivyav_u:10236: 237.007. sa ca samudraḥ sārthavāhaputro bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:10238: 237.008. sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya pāṭaliputraṃ piṇḍāya
XXdivyav_u:10247: 237.012. tenocyate--kimidaṃ bāladāraka iva rudasīti? sa bhikṣuḥ prāha--
XXdivyav_u:10250: 237.015. durlabhaṃ prāpya mānuṣyaṃ pravrajyāṃ ca sukhodayām/
XXdivyav_u:10255: 237.017. tataḥ sakaruṇairvacanaistaṃ bhikṣuḥ kramam yācati sma māsam
XXdivyav_u:10258: 237.018. sa khalu maraṇabhayodvignahṛdayaḥ saptarātreṇa me na
XXdivyav_u:10260: 237.020. atha saptame divase 'śokasya rājño 'ntaḥpurikāṃ kumāreṇa saha saṃraktāṃ nirīkṣamāṇāṃ saṃlapantīṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sahadarśanādeva ruṣitena rājñā tau dvāvapi taṃ cārakamanupreṣitau/
XXdivyav_u:10265: 237.025. kva tadvadanakāntitvaṃ gātraśobhā kva sā gatā/
XXdivyav_u:10269: 237.029. tena tāṃ rajanīṃ kṛtsnāam yujyatā buddhaśāsane/
XXdivyav_u:10274: 238.002. tato bhikṣurāha--dīrghāyuḥ, mamāpi nirgatā rātriḥ, udita ādityaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:10286: 238.011. tatastena nirghṛṇena dāruṇahṛdayena paralokanirapekṣeṇa roṣāviṣṭena bahūdakāyāṃ sthālyāṃ nararudhiravasāmūtrapurīṣasaṃkulāyāṃ mahālohyāṃ prakṣiptaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:10289: 238.013. tataḥ prajvālayitum (prārabdhaḥ/) yadā tadāpi na prajvalati, tato vicārya tāṃ lohīm, paśyati taṃ bhikṣuṃ pādmasyopari paryaṅkenopaviṣṭam/
XXdivyav_u:10291: 238.015. atha rājani samāgate prāṇisahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu sa
XXdivyav_u:10293: 238.015. riddhiṃ samutpādya sa tanmuhūrtaṃ lohyanatarasthaḥ salilārdragātraḥ/
XXdivyav_u:10294: 238.018. nirīkṣamāṇasya janasya madhye nabhastalaṃ haṃsa ivotpapāt//76//
XXdivyav_u:10297: 238.021. ardhena gātreṇa vavarṣa toyamardhena jajvāla hutāśanaśca/
XXdivyav_u:10298: 238.023. varṣañ jvalaṃścaiva rarāja yaḥ khe dīptaucadhiprasravaṇeva
XXdivyav_u:10301: 238.029. manuṣyatulyaṃ tava saumya rūpam ṛddhiprabhāvastu narānatītya/
XXdivyav_u:10302: 238.031. na niścayaṃ tena vibho vrajāmi ko nāma bhāvastava śuddhabhāva//79//
XXdivyav_u:10303: 239.001. <239>tatsāmprataṃ brūhi mamedamartham yathā prajānāmi tava prabhāvam/
XXdivyav_u:10304: 239.003. jñātvā ca te dharmaguṇaprabhāvān yathābalaṃ śiṣyavadācareyam//80//
XXdivyav_u:10305: 239.005. tato bhikṣuḥ pravacanaparigrāhako 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati, bhagavaddhātuṃ ca vistarīṃ kariṣyati, mahājanahitārthaṃ ca pratipatsyata iti matvā svaguṇamudbhāvayaṃstamuvāca--
XXdivyav_u:10307: 239.009. buddhasya putro vadatāṃ varasya dharmānvayaḥ sarvabhaveṣvasaktaḥ//81//
XXdivyav_u:10308: 239.011. dāntena dāntaḥ puruṣarṣabheṇa śāntiṃ gatenāpi śamaṃ praṇītaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:10311: 239.015. mahārāja, tvaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtah--varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mama pāṭaliputre nagare 'śoko nāma rājā bhaviṣyati caturbhāgacakravartī
XXdivyav_u:10312: dharmarājaḥ, yo me śarīradhātūn vaistārikān kariṣyati, caturaśītiṃ dharmarājikāsahasraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:10313: 239.017. idaṃ ca devena narakasadṛśaṃ sthānameva sthāpitam yatra prāṇisahasrāṇi nipātyante/
XXdivyav_u:10314: 239.018. tadarhasi deva sarvasattvebhyo 'bhayapradānaṃ dātum, bhagavataśca manorathaṃ paripūrayitum/
XXdivyav_u:10317: 239.022. nāthasya saṃpūrya manorathaṃ ca vistārikān dharmadharān
XXdivyav_u:10318: 239.024. atha sa rājā buddhe samupajātaprasādaḥ kṛtakarasampuṭastaṃ
XXdivyav_u:10321: 239.027. śaraṇamṛṣimupaimi taṃ ca buddhaṃ gaṇavaramāryaniveditaṃ ca
XXdivyav_u:10339: 240.008. tato rājā bhagavaccharīradhātuṃ vistarīṣyāmīti caturaṅgena balakāyena gatvā ajātaśatrupratiṣṭhāpitaṃ droṇastūpamutpāṭya śarīradhātuṃ gṛhītavān/
XXdivyav_u:10340: 240.010. yatroddhāraṇaṃ ca vistareṇa kṛtvā dhātupratyaṃśaṃ datvā stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya evaṃ dvitīyaṃ stūpaṃ vitareṇa bhaktimato yāvatsaptadroṇādgrahāya stūpāṃśca pratiṣṭhāpya rāmagrāmaṃ gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:10346: 240.014. rāmagrāme tvaṣṭamaṃ stūpamadya nāgāstatkālaṃ bhaktimanto rarakṣuḥ/
XXdivyav_u:10347: 240.016. dhātūnyetasmānnopalebhe sa rājā śraddhābhū(?) rājā cintayati yastvetatkṛtvā jagāma//86//
XXdivyav_u:10350: 240.019. evaṃ vistareṇa caturaśītikumbhasahasraṃ paṭṭasahasraṃ ca yakṣāṇāṃ
XXdivyav_u:10351: haste datvā visarjitam--āsamudrāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ hīnotkṛṣṭamadhyameṣu nagareṣu yatra koṭiḥ paripūryate, tatra dharmarājikāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitavyam//
XXdivyav_u:10354: 240.023. rājā cintayati--na yadi vaistārikā dhātavo bhaviṣyanti/
XXdivyav_u:10357: 240.024. vistareṇa yāvadrājñā abhihitam--yatrādhikatarā bhavanti, yatra ca nyūnatarāḥ, tatra na dātavyam//
XXdivyav_u:10359: me manorathah--ekasmin divase ekasminmuhūrte caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyamiti/
XXdivyav_u:10361: 240.028. ahaṃ tasmin samaye pāṇinā sūryamaṇḍalaṃ praticchādayiṣyāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:10362: 240.028. yāvat tasmin divase sthavirayaśasā pāṇinā sūryamaṇḍalaṃ
XXdivyav_u:10367: 241.001. <241>tābhyaḥ saptabhyaḥ pūrvikābhyaḥ kṛtibhyo dhātuṃ tasya ṛṣeḥ
XXdivyav_u:10369: 241.003. cakre stūpānāṃ śāradābhraprabhānāṃ loke sāśīti śāsadahnā
XXdivyav_u:10374: 241.007. āryamauryaśrīḥ sa prajānāṃ hitārthaṃ kṛtsnaṃ stūpān kārayāmāsa
XXdivyav_u:10376: 241.009. caṇḍāśokatvaṃ prāpya pūrvaṃ pṛthivyāṃ dharmāśokatvaṃ karmaṇā tena
XXdivyav_u:10380: 242.002. sa idānīmacirajātaprasādo buddhaśāsane yatra śākyaputrīyān dadarśa ākīrṇe rahasi vā, tatra śirasā pādayor nipatya vandate sma/
XXdivyav_u:10381: 242.003. tasya ca yaśo nāmāmātyaḥ paramaśrāddho bhagavati/
XXdivyav_u:10382: 242.004. sa taṃ rājānamuvāca--deva, nārhasi sarvavarṇapravrajitānāṃ praṇipātaṃ kartum/
XXdivyav_u:10383: 242.004. santi hi śākyaśrāmaṇerakāścaturbhyo varṇebhyaḥ pravrajitā iti/
XXdivyav_u:10385: 242.005. atha sa rājā kenacit kālāntareṇa sarvasacivānuvāca--vividhānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:10389: 242.008. samānīteṣu ca śiraḥsu abhihitāh--gacchata, imāni śiraṃsi mūlyena
XXdivyav_u:10395: 242.011. tato yaśāmātyastasyaḥ śirasaḥ pratigrāhakamanāsādya savrīḍo rājānamupetyedamarthamuvāca--
XXdivyav_u:10397: 242.015. śirastvidaṃ mānuṣamapraśastaṃ na gṛhyate mūlyamṛte 'pi rājan//1//
XXdivyav_u:10398: 242.017. atha sa rājā tamamātyamuvāca--kimidamitīdaṃ mānuṣaśiro na kaścidgṛhṇātīti? amātya
XXdivyav_u:10399: 242.018. rājābravīt--kimetadeva śiro jugupsitamāhosvit sarvamānuṣaśirāṃsīti? amātya uvāca--sarvamānuṣaśirāṃsīti/
XXdivyav_u:10400: 242.019. rājābravīt--kimidaṃ madīyamapi śiro jugupsitamiti? sa ca bhayānnecchati tasmādbhūtārthamabhidhātum/
XXdivyav_u:10403: 242.021. tataḥ sa rājā tamamātyaṃ pratijñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya
XXdivyav_u:10405: yuktamidaṃ bhavataḥ, yasmāt tvaṃ bhikṣucaraṇapraṇāmaṃ māaṃ
XXdivyav_u:10407: 242.024. vināpi mūlyairvijugupsitatvāt pratigrahītā bhuvi yasya nāsti/
XXdivyav_u:10408: 242.026. śirastadāsādya mameha puṇyam yadyarjitaṃ kiṃ viparītamatra//2//
XXdivyav_u:10409: 242.028. jātiṃ bhavān paśyati śākyabhikṣuṣvantargatāṃsteṣu guṇānna ceti/
XXdivyav_u:10411: 243.001. <243>āvāhakāle 'tha vivāhakāle jāteḥ parīkṣā na tu dharmakāle/

XXdivyav_u:10415: 243.007. cittavaśena hi puṃsāṃ kalevaraṃ nindyate 'tha satkriyate/
XXdivyav_u:10417: 243.009. yadi guṇaparivarjito dvijātiḥ patita iti prathito 'pi
XXdivyav_u:10419: 243.011. na tu nidhanakulodgato 'pi jantuḥ śubhaguṇayukta iti praṇamya
XXdivyav_u:10421: 243.014. kiṃ te kāruṇikasya śākyavṛṣabhasyaitadvaco na śrutaṃ prājñaiḥ sāramasārakebhya iha yannṛbhyo grahītuṃ kṣamam/
XXdivyav_u:10422: 243.016. tasyānanyathavādino yadi ca tāmājñāṃ cikīrṣāmyahaṃ vyāhantuṃ ca bhavān yadi prayatate naitat suhṛllakṣaṇam//8//
XXdivyav_u:10423: 243.018. ikṣukṣodavadujijñato bhuvi yadā kāyo mama svapsyati
XXdivyav_u:10425: 243.020. kāyenāhamanena kiṃ nu kuśalaṃ śakṣyāmi kartuṃ tadā tasmānnāryamataḥ śmaśānanidhanāt sāraṃ grahītuṃ mayā//9//
XXdivyav_u:10431: 243.028. na bhavati bahu śocyam yadvadevaṃ śarīre sucaritahṛtasāre naiti śoko 'ntakāle//12//

XXdivyav_u:10434: 244.003. dahati hṛdayameṣāṃ śokavahnistadānīṃ dadhighaṭa iva bhagne
XXdivyav_u:10436: 244.005. kartuṃ vighnamato na me 'rhati bhavān kāyapraṇāmaṃ prati śreṣṭho
XXdivyav_u:10438: 244.007. kāyam yastu parīkṣate daśabalavyāhāradīpairbudho nāsau pārthivabhṛtyayorviṣamatāṃ kāyasya saṃpaśyati//14//
XXdivyav_u:10439: 244.009. tvagmāṃsāsthiśirāyakṛtprabhṛtayo bhāvā hi tulyā nṛṇāmāhāryaistu vibhūṣaṇairadhikatā kāyasya niṣpadyate/
XXdivyav_u:10440: 244.011. etatsāramiheṣyate tu yadimaṃ niśritya kāyādhamaṃ pratyutthānanamaskṛtādikuśalaṃ prājñaiḥ samutthāpyate//15// iti/

XXdivyav_u:10443: kurkuṭārāmaṃ gatvā tatra vṛddhānte sthitvā kṛtāñjaliruvāca--asti--
XXdivyav_u:10446: 244.020. tatra yaśo nāṃnā saṃghasthavira uvāca--asti mahārāja/
XXdivyav_u:10447: 244.020. yadā bhagavataḥ parinirvāṇakālasamaye tadā apalālaṃ nāgaṃ
