XXdivyav_u:11245: 268.017. tataḥ kuṇālaḥ patnyā saha rājño 'śokasya samīpamānītaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11246: 268.017. atha rājā aśokah {paśyati} kuṇālamuddhṛtanayanaṃ vātātapaparidagdhagātraṃ rathyācolakasaṃghātapratyavareṇa
XXdivyav_u:11248: 268.019. sa tamapratyābhijñāya ākṛtimātrakaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājā kathayati--tvaṃ
XXdivyav_u:11249: kuṇāla iti? kuṇālaḥ prāha--evaṃ deva, kuṇālo 'smīti/
XXdivyav_u:11252: 268.021. tataḥ kuṇālasya mukhaṃ nirīkṣya netroddhṛtaṃ śokaparītacetāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11253: 268.023. rājā hyaśokaḥ patito dharaṇyāṃ hā putraśokena hi
XXdivyav_u:11255: 268.025. atha rājā kathaṃcit saṃjñāmupalabhya kuṇālamutsaṅge sthāpayāmāsa/
XXdivyav_u:11257: 268.027. tato muhūrtaṃ nṛpa āśvasitvā kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya rasāśrukaṇṭhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11258: 268.028. muhuḥ kuṇālasya mukhaṃ pramṛjya bahūni rājā vilalāpa tatra//145//
XXdivyav_u:11259: 268.030. netre kuṇālapratime vilokya sutaṃ kuṇāleti purā babhāṣe/
XXdivyav_u:11260: 269.001. <269>tadasya netre nidhanaṃ gate te putraṃ kuṇāleti kathaṃ ca vakṣye//146//
XXdivyav_u:11262: 269.004. kathaya kathaya sādhu putra tāvadvadanamidaṃ tava cārunetram/
XXdivyav_u:11264: 269.008. akaruṇahṛdayena tena tāta munisadṛśasya na sādhu sādhubuddheḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11266: 269.012. vada suvadana kṣiprametadarthaṃ vrajati śarīramidaṃ purā vināśam/
XXdivyav_u:11269: 269.017. rājannatītaṃ khalu naiva śocyaṃ kiṃ na śrutaṃ te munivākyametat/
XXdivyav_u:11271: 269.021. labdhāḥ phalasthāśca pṛthagjanāśca kṛtāni kāmānyaśubhāni dehinām/
XXdivyav_u:11272: 269.023. svayaṃkṛtānāmiha karmāṇāṃ phalaṃ kathaṃ tu vakṣyāmi parairidaṃ
XXdivyav_u:11275: 269.027. na śastravajrāgniviṣāṇi pannagāḥ kurvanti pīḍāṃ nabhaso
XXdivyav_u:11277: 269.029. śarīralakṣyeṇa dhṛtena pārthiva patanti duḥkhānyaśivāni dehinām//153//
XXdivyav_u:11279: 269.032. kenoddhṛtāni nayanāni sutasya mahyaṃ ko jīvitaṃ sumadhuraṃ tyajituṃ vyavastaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11280: 270.001. <270>śokānalo nipatito hṛdaye pracaṇḍah ācakṣva putra kasya
XXdivyav_u:11282: 270.003. yāvadrājñā aśokena śrutam--tiṣyarakṣitāyā ayaṃ prayoga iti/
XXdivyav_u:11284: 270.005. kathaṃ hi dhanye na nimajjase kṣitau cchindāmi śīrṣaṃ paraśuprahāraiḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11287: 270.010. utpāṭya netre paripātayāmi gātraṃ kimasyā nakharaiḥ sutīkṣṇaiḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11288: 270.012. jīvantiśūlāmatha kārayāmi cchindāmi nāsāṃ krakacena vāsyāḥ//156//
XXdivyav_u:11289: 270.014. kṣureṇa jihvāmatha kartayāmi viṣeṇa pūrṇāmatha ghātayiṣye/
XXdivyav_u:11292: 270.020. anāryakarmā yadi tiṣyarakṣitā tvamāryakarmā bhava mā vadha
XXdivyav_u:11293: 270.022. phalaṃ hi maitryā sadṛśaṃ na vidyate prabhostitakṣā sugatena varṇitā/
XXdivyav_u:11294: 270.024. punaḥ praṇasya pitaraṃ kumāraḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ sūnṛtavāgjagāda//159//
XXdivyav_u:11295: 270.026. rājanna me duḥkhamalo 'sti kaścittīvrāpalāre 'pi na manyutāpaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11296: 270.028. manaḥ prasannam yadi me jananyām yenoddhṛte me nayane svayaṃ hi/
XXdivyav_u:11297: 270.030. tattena satyena mamāstu tāvannetradvayaṃ prāktanameva sadyaḥ//160//
XXdivyav_u:11299: 270.032. yāvadrājñā aśokena tiṣyarakṣitā amarṣitena jatugṛhaṃ praveśayitvā
XXdivyav_u:11301: 271.001. <271>bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaśayacchettāramāyuṣmantaṃ sthaviropaguptaṃ pṛcchanti--kiṃ kuṇālena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena nayanānyutpāṭitāni? sthavira uvāca--tena hyāyuṣmantaḥ śrūyatām--
XXdivyav_u:11310: 271.008. kiṃ manyadhvamāyuṣmantah? yo 'sau lubdhakaḥ, sa eṣa kuṇālaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11311: 271.008. yattatrānena bahūnāṃ mṛgaśatānāṃ nayanānyutpāṭitāni, tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi narakeṣu duḥkhamanubhūya tataḥ karmāvaśeṣeṇa pañca janmaśatāni tasya nayanānyutpāṭitāni//
XXdivyav_u:11312: 271.011. kiṃ karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākenocce kule upapannaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:11315: catvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ krakucchando nāma samyaksambuddho loka udapādi/
XXdivyav_u:11316: 271.014. yadā krakucchandaḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā
XXdivyav_u:11317: nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ, tasya aśokena rājñā
XXdivyav_u:11319: 271.016. yadā rājā aśokaḥ kālagataḥ, aśrāddho rājā rājyaṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11322: 271.017. atra janakāyo gatvā viśīrṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā śocitumārabdhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11325: samyaksambuddhasya stūpaṃ catūratnamayamāsīt, sa idānīṃ viśīrṇa iti/
XXdivyav_u:11326: 271.020. tatastena ca tatra krakucchandasya samyaksambuddhasya kāyapramāṇikā pratimā babhūva viśīrṇā, sā abhisaṃskṛtā, samyakpraṇidhānaṃ ca kṛtam--yādṛśaḥ krakucchandaḥ śāstā, īdṛśameva śāstāramārāgayeyaṃ mā
XXdivyav_u:11328: 271.023. kiṃ manyadhvamāyuṣmantah? yo 'sau śreṣṭhiputraḥ, sa eṣa kuṇālaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11329: 271.023. yatrānena krakucchandasya stūpamabhisaṃskṛtam, tasya karmaṇo vipākenoccakule upapannaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11330: 271.024. yatpratimā abhisaṃskṛtā, tena karmaṇo vipākena kuṇākaḥ prāsādikaḥ samṛttaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11331: 271.025. yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam, tasya karmaṇo vipākena kuṇālena śākyamuniḥ samyaksambuddhastādṛśa eva śāstā samārāgito na virāgitaḥ, satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam//
XXdivyav_u:11335: 272.002. yadā rājñā aśokena bhagavacchāsane śraddhā pratilabdhā, tena caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ pañcavārṣikaṃ ca kṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:11336: 272.003. trīṇi śatasahastāṇi bhikṣūṇāṃ bhojitāni yatraiko 'rhatāṃ dvau śaikṣāṇāṃ pṛthagjanakalyāṇakānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:11342: 272.007. yāvadrājñā aśokenocyate--vītaśoka, mā tvamanāyatane 'prasādamutpādaya, api tu buddhadharmasaṃghe prasādamutpādaya/
XXdivyav_u:11344: 272.008. atha rājā aśoko 'pareṇa samayena mṛgavadhāya nirgataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11347: 272.010. tenābhigamya pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā sa ṛṣiḥ pṛṣṭah--bhagavan,
XXdivyav_u:11348: kiyaccitraṃ te ihāraṇye prativasatah? sa uvāca--dvādaśa varṣāṇīti/
XXdivyav_u:11352: 272.013. vītaśoka uvāca--bhagavan, kiṃ duḥkhaṃ bādhate? ṛṣiruvāca--ime
XXdivyav_u:11354: 272.014. yadā mṛgānāṃ saṃvāso dṛṣṭo bhavati, tasmin samaye rāgeṇa
XXdivyav_u:11356: 272.015. vītaśoka uvāca--asya kaṣṭena tapasā rāgo 'dyāpi na bādhyate,
XXdivyav_u:11358: 272.016. kuta eṣāṃ rāgaprahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati? āha ca--
XXdivyav_u:11359: 272.017. kaṣṭe 'smin vijane vane nivasatāṃ vāyvambumūlāśināṃ rāgo naiva
XXdivyav_u:11361: 272.019. bhuktavānnaṃ sadhṛtaṃ prabhūtapiśitaṃ dadhyuttamālaṃkṛtaṃ śākyeṣvindriyanigraho yadi bhavedvindhyaḥ plavetsāgare//1//
XXdivyav_u:11362: 272.021. sarvathā vañjito rājā aśoko yacchramaṇeṣu śākyaputrīyeṣu kārāṃ
XXdivyav_u:11367: 272.023. amātyā āhuh--deva, kimājñāpayasi? rājā āha--yadā ahaṃ rājā alaṃkāraṃ mauliṃ paṭṭaṃ cāpanayitvā snānaśālāṃ praviṣṭo bhavāmi, tadā yūyaṃ vītaśokasyopāyena mauliṃ paṭṭaṃ ca baddhvā siṃhāsane niṣādayiṣyatha/
XXdivyav_u:11369: 272.025. yāvadrājā rājālaṃkāraṃ mauliṃ paṭṭaṃ cāpanayitvā snānaśālāyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:11370: praviṣṭaḥ, tato 'mātyairvītaśoka ucyate--rājño 'śokasyātyayāt tvaṃ rājā bhaviṣyasi/
XXdivyav_u:11371: 272.027. imaṃ tāvadrājālaṃkāraṃ pravaramauliṃ paṭṭaṃ ca baddhvā siṃhāsane
XXdivyav_u:11373: 272.028. taistadābharaṇamauliṃ paṭṭaṃ ca baddhvā siṃhāsane niṣādito
XXdivyav_u:11375: 272.029. tato rājā aśoko vītaśokaṃ rājālaṃkāraṃ maulipaṭṭabaddhaṃ ca siṃhāsanopaviṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati--adhyāpyahaṃ jīvāmi/
XXdivyav_u:11377: 272.030. tato rājñā abhihitam--ko 'tra? tato yāvadvadhyaghātakā nīlāmbaravasanāḥ pralambakeśā ghaṇṭāśabdapāṇayo rājñaḥ pādayor nipatyovāca--deva, kimājñāpayasi? rājā āha--vītaśoko mayā parityakta iti/
XXdivyav_u:11380: 273.001. tato 'mātyā rājñaḥ pādayor nipalyovāca--deva, marṣaya vītaśokam/
XXdivyav_u:11384: 273.003. mama bhrātuḥ snehādasya saptāhaṃ rājyaṃ prayacchāmi/
XXdivyav_u:11392: 273.006. vistareṇa yāvatsaptāhadivase vītaśoko rājālaṃkāravibhūṣito rājño 'śokasya samīpamupanītaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11393: 273.007. tato rājñā aśokenābhihitam--vītaśoka, kañcitsugītaṃ sunṛtyaṃ suvāditamiti ? vītaśoka uvāca--na me dṛṣṭaṃ vā syācchrutaṃ veti/
XXdivyav_u:11395: 273.010. yena śrutaṃ bhavedgītaṃ nṛtyaṃ cāpi nirīkṣitam/
XXdivyav_u:11397: 273.012. rājā āha--vītaśoka, idaṃ mayā rājyaṃ saptāhaṃ tava dattam,
XXdivyav_u:11400: 273.013. kathaṃ tvaṃ kathayasi--naiva me dṛṣṭaṃ na śrutamiti? vītaśoka
XXdivyav_u:11402: 273.015. na me dṛṣṭaṃ nṛtyaṃ na ca nṛpa śruto gītaninado na me gandhā
XXdivyav_u:11403: ghrātā na khalu rasā me 'dya viditāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11404: 273.017. na me spṛṣṭaḥ sparśaḥ kanakamaṇihārāṅgajanitaḥ samūho nārīṇāṃ maraṇaparibaddhena
XXdivyav_u:11405: 273.019. striyo nṛttaṃ gītaṃ bhavaśayanānyāsanavidhirvayo rūpaṃ lakṣmīrbahuvividharatnā ca vasudhā/
XXdivyav_u:11406: 273.021. nirānandā śūnyā mama nṛpa varaśayyā gatasukhā sthitān dṛṣṭvā dvāre vadhakapuruṣānnīlavasanān//4//
XXdivyav_u:11410: 273.026. nādrākṣaṃ nṛpate nṛttaṃ na ca bhoktuṃ manaḥspṛhā//6//
XXdivyav_u:11413: 273.029. rājā āha--vītaśoka, mā tāvat tavaikajanmikasya maraṇabhayāttava rājaśriyaṃ prāpya harṣo notpannaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11422: śūnyagrāmabhūtānyāyatanāni, cauribhūtāni viṣayāṇi, kṛtsnaṃ ca traidhātukamanityatāgninā pradīptaṃ paśyanti/
XXdivyav_u:11424: 274.004. mā tāvadekajanmikasya maraṇabhayāttava na jāyate harṣaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11431: 274.012. kathaṃ ca teṣāṃ na bhavedvimokṣo mokṣārthināṃ janmaparānmukhānām/
XXdivyav_u:11434: sa kṛtakarapuṭa uvāca--deva, eṣo 'haṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ
XXdivyav_u:11435: samyaksambuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ceti/
XXdivyav_u:11438: 274.020. budhavibudhamanujamahitaṃ jinaṃ virāgaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca//12//iti/
XXdivyav_u:11439: 274.021. atha rājā aśoko vītaśokaṃ kaṇṭhe pariṣvajyovāca--na tvaṃ mayā parityaktaḥ, api tu buddhaśāsanābhiprasādārthaṃ tava mayā eṣa upāyaḥ
XXdivyav_u:11442: bhagavataścaityānarcayati, saddharmaṃ ca śṛṇoti, saṃghe ca kārāṃ kurute/
XXdivyav_u:11451: 274.027. tata utthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ sthavitamuvāca--labheyāhaṃ svakhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ
XXdivyav_u:11454: 274.029. tato vītaśoko yena rājā aśokastenopasaṃkramya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--deva, anujānīhi
XXdivyav_u:11455: 274.030. pravrajiṣyāmi svākhyāte dharmavinaye samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikām/
XXdivyav_u:11457: 275.001. <275>udbhrānto 'smi niraṅkuśo rājā iva vyāvartito vibhramāt tvadbuddhiprabhavāṅkuśena
XXdivyav_u:11458: 275.001. ekaṃ tvamarhasi me varaṃ pradarśituṃ tvaṃ pārthivānāṃ pate lokālokavarasya śāsanavare liṅgaṃ śibhaṃ dhārayet//13//
XXdivyav_u:11459: 275.005. śrutvā ca rājā sāśrukaṇṭho vītaśokaṃ kaṇṭhe
XXdivyav_u:11461: 275.006. pravrajya khalu vaivarṇikābhyupagatāvasaḥ, pāṃśukūlaṃ pravaraṇaṃ parijanojjñitam, āhāro bhaiṣyaṃ parakule, śayanāsanaṃ vṛkṣamūle tṛṇasaṃstaraḥ parṇasaṃstaraḥ, vyābādhe khalvapi bhaiṣajyamasulabhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:11466: 275.010. naiva hi jāne taṃ nūnaṃ viṣayatṛṣito 'nāyāsavihataḥ pravrajyāṃ prāptukāmo na ripuhṛtabalo
XXdivyav_u:11467: 275.012. duḥkhārtaṃ mṛtyuneṣṭaṃ vyasanaparigataṃ dṛṣṭvā jagadidaṃ panthānaṃ janmabhīruḥ śivamabhayamahaṃ gantuṃ vyavasitaḥ//14//
XXdivyav_u:11468: 275.014. śrutvā ca rājā aśokaḥ satvaraṃ praruditumārabdhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11470: 275.016. saṃsāradolāmabhiruhya lolam yadā nipāto niyataḥ prajānām/
XXdivyav_u:11471: 275.018. kimarthamāgacchati vikriyā te sarveṇa sarvasya yadā viyogaḥ//15//
XXdivyav_u:11473: 275.020. rājakule vṛkṣavāṭikāyāṃ tasya tṛṇasaṃstaraḥ saṃstṛtaḥ, bhojanaṃ cāsya dattam/
XXdivyav_u:11474: 275.021. so 'ntaḥpuraṃ paryaṭati, mahārhaṃ cāhāraṃ na labhate/
XXdivyav_u:11492: 275.031. dṛṣṭvā ca rajā aśokaḥ saṃhāsanādutthāya mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ sarvaśarīreṇāyuṣmantaṃ vītaśokaṃ nirīkṣamānaḥ prarudannuvāca--
XXdivyav_u:11493: 276.001. <276>bhūteṣu saṃsargagateṣu nityaṃ dṛṣṭvāpi māṃ naiti yathā
XXdivyav_u:11497: 276.005. sa paśyati--āyuṣmato vītaśokasya pāṃśukūlaṃ ca cīvaraṃ mṛṇmayaṃ pātram yāvadannaṃ bhaikṣyaṃ lūhapraṇītam/
XXdivyav_u:11498: 276.006. dṛṣṭvā ca rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--deva, yathā ayamalpecchaḥ saṃtuṣṭaśca, niyatamayaṃ kṛtakaraṇīyo bhaviṣyati,
XXdivyav_u:11503: 276.011. nirāśravam yasya mano viśālaṃ nirāmayaṃ copacitaṃ śarīram/
XXdivyav_u:11504: 276.013. svacchandato jīvitasādhanaṃ ca nityotsavaṃ tasya manuṣyaloke//18//
XXdivyav_u:11508: 276.018. atyuddhṛtamiva manye yaśasā pūtaṃ puramiva mahaṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:11510: 276.020. atha rājā aśokaḥ sarvāṅgena parigṛhya prajñapta evāsane
XXdivyav_u:11514: 276.022. athāyuṣmān vītaśoko rājānamaśokaṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayannuvāca--
XXdivyav_u:11516: 276.025. durlabhā trīṇi ratnāni nityaṃ pūjaya pārthiva//21//
XXdivyav_u:11518: 276.027. atha rājā aśokaḥ kṛtakarapuṭaḥ pañcabhiramātyaśataiḥ parivṛto
XXdivyav_u:11524: 277.001. <277>tata āyuṣmān vītaśokaḥ svaguṇānudbhāvayan paśyataḥ sarvajanakāyasya ṛddhyā vaihāyasamutpatya
XXdivyav_u:11525: 277.002. atha rājā aśokaḥ kṛtakarapuṭaḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ
XXdivyav_u:11532: 277.009. ṛddhyā khalvavabhartsatāḥ paramayā śrīgarvitāste vayaṃ buddhyā
XXdivyav_u:11534: 277.011. prāptārthena phalāndhabuddhimanasaḥ saṃvejitāste vayaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa sabāṣpadurdinamukhāḥ sthāne vimuktā vayam//25//
XXdivyav_u:11535: 277.013. tatrāyuṣmān vītaśokaḥ pratyantimeṣu janapadeṣu śayyāsanāya nirgataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11537: 277.014. śrutvā ca rājñā aśokena bhaiṣajyamupasthāyikāśca visarjitāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11538: 277.014. tasya tena vyādhinā spṛṣṭasya śiraḥ khustamabhavat/
XXdivyav_u:11539: 277.015. yadā ca vyādhirvigataḥ, tasya virūṭāni śirasi romāṇi/
XXdivyav_u:11543: 277.017. tasmiṃśca samaye puṇḍravardhananagare nirgranthopāsakena buddhapratimā nirgranthasya pādayor nipātitā citrārpitā/
XXdivyav_u:11546: 277.019. tasyordhvam yojanam yakṣāḥ śṛṇvanti, adho yojanaṃ nāgāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11548: 277.020. dṛṣṭvā ca rājñā ruṣitenābhihitam--puṇḍravardhane sarve ājīvikāḥ praghātayitavyāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11550: 277.021. tataḥ pāṭaliputre bhūyo 'nyena nirgranthopāsakena buddhapratimā nirgranthasya pādayor nipātitā citrārpitā/
XXdivyav_u:11551: 277.022. śrutvā ca rājñā amarṣitena sa nirgranthopāsakaḥ sabandhuvargo gṛhaṃ praveśāyitvā agninā dagdhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11552: 277.023. ājñaptaṃ ca--yo me nirgranthasya śiro dāsyati, tasya dīnāraṃ dāsyāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:11554: 277.024. sa cāyuṣmān vītaśoka ābhīrasya gṛhe rātriṃ vāsamupagataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11555: 277.025. tasya ca vyādhinā kliṣṭasya lūhāni cīvarāṇi,
XXdivyav_u:11560: 277.028. tataḥ sa ābhīro 'siṃ niṣkoṣaṃ kṛtvā āyuṣmantaṃ
XXdivyav_u:11562: 277.029. āyuṣmatā ca vītaśokena pūrvānte jñānaṃ kṣiptam/
XXdivyav_u:11567: 277.031. dṛṣṭvā ca rājñā aśokena parijñātam--viralāni cāsya śirasi romāṇi
XXdivyav_u:11575: 278.003. yāvadrājñā abhayapradānaṃ dattam--na bhūyaḥ kaścit praghātayitavyaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:11577: sarvasaṃśayacchettāramāyuṣmantamupaguptaṃ pṛcchanti--kiṃ karma kṛtamāyuṣmatā vītaśokena yasya karmaṇo vipākena śastreṇa praghātitah?
XXdivyav_u:11578: sthavira uvāca--tena hyāyuṣmantaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāni pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu/
XXdivyav_u:11583: 278.008. sa tatra lubdho gatvā pāśān yantrāṃśca sthāpayitvā mṛgān praghātayati/
XXdivyav_u:11586: 278.009. anyataraḥ pratyekabuddhastasminnudapāne āhārakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā udapānāduttīrya vṛkṣamūle paryaṅkena niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11588: 278.011. sa lubdha āgatya paśyati--neiva mṛgā udapānamabhyāgatāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11591: 278.013. tenāsiṃ niṣkoṣaṃ kṛtvā sa pratyekabuddhaḥ praghātitaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:11592: 278.014. kiṃ manyadhve āyuṣmantah? yo 'sau lubdhaḥ sa eṣa vītaśokaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11593: 278.014. yatrānena megāḥ praghātitāḥ, tasya karmaṇo vipākena mahān
XXdivyav_u:11595: 278.015. yatpratyekabuddhaḥ śastreṇa praghātitaḥ, tasya karmaṇo vipākena
XXdivyav_u:11596: bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi narakeṣu duḥkhamanubhūya pañca janmaśatāni manuṣyeṣūpapannaḥ śastreṇa
XXdivyav_u:11598: 278.018. kiṃ karma kṛtam yenoccakule upapannaḥ, arhattvaṃ ca prāptam?
XXdivyav_u:11600: 278.019. tena dāyakadānapatayaḥ saṃghabhaktaṃ kārāpitāstarpaṇāni yavāgūpānāni nimantraṇakāni/
XXdivyav_u:11609: 279.002. yadā rājñā aśokena ardhāmalakadānena bhagavacchāsane śraddhā
XXdivyav_u:11610: pratilabdhā, sa bhikṣūnuvāca--kena bhagavacchāsane prabhūtaṃ dānaṃ dattam?
XXdivyav_u:11612: 279.004. rājā āha--kiyattena bhagavacchāsane dānaṃ dattam? bhikṣava
XXdivyav_u:11614: 279.005. śrutvā ca rājā aśokaścintayati--tena gṛhapatinā bhūtvā koṭiśataṃ
XXdivyav_u:11617: 279.007. tena yāvaccaturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam, sarvatra ca śatasahasrāṇi dattāni--jātau, bodhau, dharmacakre, parinirvāṇe ca,
XXdivyav_u:11620: 279.009. tatra ca catvāri śatasahasrāṇi dattāni, trīṇi śatasahasrāṇi bhikṣūṇāṃ bhojitāni yatrekarmahatāṃ dvau śaikṣāṇāṃ pṛthagjanakalyāṇakānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:11622: 279.010. kośaṃ sthāpayitvā mahāpṛthivīmantaḥpurāmātyagaṇamātmānaṃ kuṇālaṃ ca āryasaṃghe niryātayitvā catvāri śatasahasrāṇi dattvā niṣkrītavān/
XXdivyav_u:11625: 279.012. atha rājā idānīṃ na bhaviṣyāmīti viklavībhūtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11626: 279.013. tasya rādhagupto nāmāmātyo yena saha pāṃśudānaṃ dattam/
XXdivyav_u:11627: 279.014. tadā sa rājānamaśokaṃ viklavībhūtamavekṣya pādayor nipatya
XXdivyav_u:11631: 279.017. padmānanaśrīśatasamprapītaṃ kasmāt sabāṣpaṃ tava deva vaktram//1//
XXdivyav_u:11632: 279.019. rājā āha--rādhagupta, nāhaṃ dravyavināśaṃ na rājyanāśanaṃ na cāśrayaviyogaṃ śocāmi, kiṃ tu śocāmi--āryairyadviprayukṣyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:11633: 279.021. nāhaṃ punaḥ sarvaguṇopapannaṃ saṃghaṃ samakṣaṃ naradevapūjitam/
XXdivyav_u:11635: 279.025. api ca rādhagupta, ayaṃ me manoratho babhūva--koṭiśataṃ
XXdivyav_u:11636: bhagavacchāsane dānaṃ dāsyāmīti, sa ca me 'bhiprāyo na paripūrṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11637: 279.026. tato rājñā aśokena catvāraḥ koṭyaḥ paripūrayiṣyāmīti
XXdivyav_u:11639: 279.028. tasmiṃśca samaye kuṇālasya saṃpadir nāma putro yuvarājye
XXdivyav_u:11656: 280.004. atha rājā aśokaḥ saṃvigno 'mātyān paurāṃśca saṃnipātya kathayati--kaḥ sāmprataṃ pṛthivyāmīśvarah? tato 'mātya utthāyāsanādyena rājā aśokastenāñjaliṃ praṇamyovāca--deva, pṛthivyāmīśvaraḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11658: 280.008. dākṣiṇyādanṛtaṃ hi kiṃ kathayata bhraṣṭādhirājyā vayaṃ śeṣaṃ tvāmalakārdhamityavasitam yatra prabhutvaṃ mama/
XXdivyav_u:11661: 280.012. athavā ko bhagavato vākyamanyathā kariṣyati? saṃpattayo hi sarvā
XXdivyav_u:11662: vipattinidhanā iti pratijñātam yadavitathavādinā gautamena, na hi tadvisaṃvadati//
XXdivyav_u:11663: 280.014. pratiśiṣyate 'smanne cirādājñā mama yāvatī yathā manasā/
XXdivyav_u:11667: 280.018. bhraṣṭasvāyatano na bhāti kṛpaṇaḥ saṃpratyaśoko nṛpah
XXdivyav_u:11669: 280.020. tato rājā aśokaḥ samīpo gataṃ puruṣamāhūyovāca--bhadramukha,
XXdivyav_u:11670: pūrvaguṇānurāgādbhraṣṭaiśvaryasyāpi mama imaṃ tāvadapaścimaṃ vyāpāraṃ kuru/
XXdivyav_u:11671: 280.021. idaṃ mamārdhāmalakaṃ grahāya kurkuṭārāmaṃ gatvā saṃghe niryātaya/
XXdivyav_u:11673: vaktavyam--jambudvīpaiśvaryasya rājña eṣa sāmprataṃ vibhava iti/
XXdivyav_u:11674: 280.023. idaṃ tāvadapaścimaṃ dānaṃ tathā paribhoktavyam yathā me saṃghagatā dakṣiṇā vistīrṇā
XXdivyav_u:11676: 280.025. idaṃ pradānaṃ caramaṃ mamādya rājyaṃ ca taṃ caiva gataṃ
XXdivyav_u:11679: 280.029. tatathā bhujyatām yena pradānaṃ mama paścimam/
XXdivyav_u:11680: 280.030. yathā saṃghagatā me 'dya vistīrṇā dakṣiṇā bhavet//7//
XXdivyav_u:11681: 280.031. evaṃ deveti s puruṣo rājño 'śokasya pratiśrutya tadardhāmalakaṃ kurukuṭārāmaṃ gatvā vṛddhānte sthitvā kṛtāñjalistadardhāmalakaṃ saṃghe
XXdivyav_u:11683: 281.001. <281>ekacchatrasamucchrayāṃ vasumatīmājñāpayan yaḥ purā lokaṃ tāpayati sma madhyadivasaprāpto divā bhāskaraḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11686: 281.005. bhaktyavanatena śirasā praṇamya saṃghāya tena khalu
XXdivyav_u:11695: 281.011. mṛtyaiḥ sa bhūmipatiradya hṛtādhikāro dānaṃ prayacchati
XXdivyav_u:11698: 281.015. yāvattadardhāmalakaṃ cūrṇayitvā yūṣe prakṣipya saṃghe cāritam/
XXdivyav_u:11699: 281.015. tato rājā aśoko rādhaguptamuvāca--kathaya rādhagupta, kaḥ sāmprataṃ pṛthivyāmīśvarah? atha rādhagupto 'śokasya pādayor nipatya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--devaḥ pṛthivyāmīśvaraḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11700: 281.017. atha rājā aśokaḥ kathaṃcidutthāya caturdiśamavalokya saṃghāya
XXdivyav_u:11701: añjaliṃ kṛtvovāca--eṣa idānīṃ mahatkośaṃ sthāpayitvā imāṃ samudraparyantāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ bhagavacchrāvakasaṃghe niryātayāmi/
XXdivyav_u:11704: 281.022. dadāmyahaṃ bhūtadharāṃ samandarāṃ saṃghāya tasminnupabhujyate phalam//11//
XXdivyav_u:11706: 281.025. dānenāhamanena nendrabhavanaṃ na brahmaloke phalaṃ kāṅkṣāmi
XXdivyav_u:11708: 281.027. dānasyāsya phalaṃ tu bhaktimahato yanme 'sti tenāpnuyāṃ cittaiśvaryamahāryamāryamahitaṃ nāyāti yadvikriyām//12//
XXdivyav_u:11710: 281.029. tato rājā mahāpṛthivīṃ saṃghe datvā kālagataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11711: 281.030. yāvadamātyair nīlapītābhiḥ śibikābhir nirhāritvā śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā rājānaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāma iti, yāvadrādhaguptenābhihitam/
XXdivyav_u:11717: 282.003. yāvadamātyaiścatasraḥ koṭyo bhagavacchāsane dattvā pṛthivīṃ niṣkrīya saṃpadī rājye
XXdivyav_u:11721: tiṣṭhet? nairabhihitam--devasya ca vaṃśādaśoko nāṃnā rājā babhūveti/
XXdivyav_u:11726: 282.009. anyaḥ kaścidupāya iti? tasya brāhmaṇapurohitaḥ pṛthagjano
XXdivyav_u:11728: 282.010. tenābhihitam--deva, dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ nāma ciraṃ sthāsyati/
XXdivyav_u:11736: 282.013. kimicchatha stūpaṃ saṃghārāmān vā? bhikṣubhiḥ parigṛhītāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11737: 282.014. yāvatpuṣyamitro yāvat saṃghārāmaṃ bhikṣūṃśca praghātayan prasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11739: 282.015. tenābhihitam--yo me śramaṇaśiro dāsyati, tasyāhaṃ dīnāraśataṃ dāsyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:11748: 282.019. tasya duhitā kṛmiśena yakṣeṇa yācyate, na cānuprayacchati--tvaṃ
XXdivyav_u:11750: 282.020. yāvatsā duhitā tena kṛmiśasya dattā bhagavacchāsanaparitrāṇāryaṃ
XXdivyav_u:11752: 282.021. puṣyamitrasya rājñaḥ pṛṣṭhato yakṣo mahān pramāṇe yūyam(?)/
XXdivyav_u:11756: 282.023. kṛmiśena ca yakṣeṇa mahāntaṃ parvatamānayitvā puṣyamitro rājā sabalavāhano 'vaṣṭabdhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11758: 282.024. yadā puṣyamitro rājā praghātitastadā mauryavaṃśaḥ samucchinnaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:11762: 283.002. punarapi mahārāja yanmayā anuttarasamyaksambodhiprāptaye dānāni dattāni, puṇyāni kṛtāni, vīryapāramitā ca pariripūtā, anuttarā samyaksambodhir nārādhitā, tacchrūyatām//
XXdivyav_u:11765: 283.005. tatrottarapāñcālo mahādhano nāṃnā dastināpure rājyaṃ kārayati
XXdivyav_u:11766: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca śāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍmarataskaradurbhikṣarogāpagataṃ śalīkṣugomahiṣīsampannam/
XXdivyav_u:11769: 283.008. tatra ca hrade janmacitrako nāṃ nāgapotaḥ prativasati/
XXdivyav_u:11775: 283.011. dakṣiṇapāñcālastu rājā adharmabhūyiṣṭhaścaṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśo 'dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati, nityaṃ daṇḍena ghātanadhāraṇabandhanahiḍinigaḍoparodhana rāṣṭranivāsināṃ trāsayati/
XXdivyav_u:11776: 283.013. adharmabhūyiṣṭhatayā cāsya devo na kālena kālaṃ
XXdivyav_u:11778: 283.014. tato 'sau mahājanakāyaḥ saṃtrastaḥ svatrastaḥ svajīvitāpekṣayā rāṣṭraparityāgaṃ kṛtvā uttarapāñcālasyaiva rājño viṣayaṃ gatvā
XXdivyav_u:11780: 283.015. yāvadapareṇa samayena dakṣiṇapāñcālo rājā mṛgayāvyapadeśena janapadān vyavalokanāya
XXdivyav_u:11783: 283.017. sa janakāyaḥ kva gata iti kathayati/
XXdivyav_u:11784: 283.018. amātyāḥ kathayatnti--deva, uttarapāñcālasya rājño viṣayaṃ gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11787: 283.019. tataste kathayanti--deva, uttarapāñcālo rājā dharmeṇa rājyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:11789: 283.020. tasya janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāśca subhikṣāśca
XXdivyav_u:11792: 283.022. devastu caṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśo nityaṃ tāḍanaghātanadhāraṇabandhananigaḍoparodha(na) rāṣṭraṃ trāsayati/
XXdivyav_u:11793: 283.023. yato 'sau janakāyaḥ saṃtrastaḥ saṃvegamāpanna uttarapāñcālasya rājño viṣayaṃ gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11795: syādenāsau janakāyaḥ punarāgatya eṣu grāmanagareṣu prativaset? amātyā
XXdivyav_u:11796: āhuh--yadi deva uttarapāñcālavaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayasi, maitracitto
XXdivyav_u:11797: 'nukampācittaśca rāṣṭraṃ pālayasi, nacirādasau janakāyaḥ punarāgatya eṣu grāmanagareṣu prativaset/
XXdivyav_u:11799: ahamapyuttarapāñcālavaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayāmi, maitracitto hitacitto 'nukampācittaśca rāṣṭraṃ pālayāmi/
XXdivyav_u:11800: 283.029. yūyaṃ tathā kuruta, yathā asau janakāyaḥ punarāgatya eṣu grāmanagareṣu prativasatīti/
XXdivyav_u:11806: 284.002. teṃs tasya śasyavatī vasumatī, subhikṣānnapānaśca deśaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11807: 284.003. rājā āha--ko 'sau upāyaḥ syādyenāsau nāgapota ihānīyeta? amātyā
XXdivyav_u:11810: 284.004. tato rājñā suvarṇapiṭakaṃ dhvajāgre baddhvā svavijite
XXdivyav_u:11811: ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--ya uttarapāñcālarājaviṣayājjanmacitrakaṃ nāma nāgapotakamānayati, tasyemaṃ suvarṇapiṭakaṃ dāsyāmi, mahatā ca satkāreṇa
XXdivyav_u:11816: 284.009. sa kathayati--yo yuṣmākaṃ śraddhayitaḥ pratyayitaśca, tasya haste tiṣṭhatu/
XXdivyav_u:11819: 284.010. tato 'sau ahituṇḍikaḥ pratyayitasya puruṣasya haste suvarṇapiṭakaṃ sthāpayitvā hastināpuraṃ
XXdivyav_u:11830: 284.016. tasya hradasya nātidūre dvau lubdhakau prativasataḥ, sārako
XXdivyav_u:11837: 284.019. janmacitro nāgapotaḥ saṃlakṣayati--ko 'nyo 'sti mama śaraṇamṛte halakāt lubdhakāt? tato manuṣyaveṣamāsthāya halakasya lubdhakasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11838: 284.021. gatvā kathayati--bhoḥ puruṣa, kiṃ tvaṃ jānīṣe
XXdivyav_u:11839: kasyānubhāvāddhanasya rājño janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca subhikṣākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamarataskaradurbhikṣarogāpagatāḥ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsampannā iti? sa kathayati--jāne sa rājā dhārmiko dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati, maitracitto hitacitto 'nukmpācittaśca rāṣṭraṃ pālayatīti/
XXdivyav_u:11840: 284.025. asmin pradeśe janmacitrako nāma nāgapitakaḥ prativasati/
XXdivyav_u:11844: 284.028. janmacitraḥ kathayati--taṃ nāgapotakamito viṣayādapaharet, tasya nāgapotakasya kiṃ syāt? na śobhanaṃ syāt, mātāpitṛviyogajaṃ duḥkhaṃ syādrājño rāṣṭrasya ca/
XXdivyav_u:11845: 284.030. yo 'paharati, tasya kiṃ tvaṃ kuryāh? sa
XXdivyav_u:11847: 284.030. jānīṣe tvaṃ kataro 'sau nāgapotaka iti? na jāne/
XXdivyav_u:11852: 285.001. <285>āgatya asya hradasya catasṛṣu dikṣu khadiraśalākānnikhanya nānāraṅgaiḥ sūtrairveṣṭayitvā
XXdivyav_u:11854: 285.002. yadā tenāyamevamrūpaḥ prayogaḥ kṛto bhavati, tadā hradamadhyāt kvathamānaṃ pānīyamutthāsyati ahaṃ cotthāsyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:11855: 285.003. tadā tvayāsau ahituṇḍikaḥ śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍayitavyaḥ, āśu copasaṃkramya vaktavyah--mantrānupasaṃhara/
XXdivyav_u:11856: 285.004. mā te utkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātayiṣyāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:11859: 285.006. lubdhakaḥ prāha--yadi tavaikasyaivaṃ guṇaḥ syāt, tathāpyahamevaṃ
XXdivyav_u:11863: 285.008. yāvadasau lubdhakaḥ saptame divase pratigupte pradeśe ātmānaṃ gopayitvā avasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11865: 285.010. tena catasṛṣu dikṣu catvāraḥ khadirakīlakā nikhātāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11871: 285.013. mā te utkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātayāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:11874: 285.015. tato nāgo mantrapāśavinirmukto hradādabhyudgamya lubdhakaṃ pariṣvaktavān, evaṃ cāha--tvaṃ me mātā, tvaṃ me pitā, yanmayā tvāmāgamya mātāpitṛviyogajaṃ duḥkhaṃ notpannam/
XXdivyav_u:11876: 285.017. tenāsau bhavanaṃ nītaḥ, nānāvidhena cānnapānena saṃtarpitaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:11879: 285.019. asyānubhāvādyuṣmābhiḥ saha viyogo na jāta iti/
XXdivyav_u:11880: 285.019. tābhyāmasau vareṇa pravārito vividhāni ca ratnāni dattāni/
XXdivyav_u:11882: 285.020. tasya ca hradasya nātidūre puṣpaphalasalilasampanne nānāśakunikūjite ṛṣeragramāśramapadam/
XXdivyav_u:11883: 285.021. tatra ca nāgapotakena sārdhaṃ vṛttakaṃ tatsarvaṃ vistareṇa
XXdivyav_u:11885: 285.022. tata ṛṣiḥ kathayati--kiṃ ratnaiḥ kiṃ vā te suvarṇena? tasya bhavane 'mogho nāṃ pāśastiṣṭhati, tam yācasva/
XXdivyav_u:11886: 285.023. tato lubdhako 'moghapāśe saṃjātatṛṣṇah ṛṣivacanamupaśrutya punarapi nāgabhavanaṃ
XXdivyav_u:11888: 285.025. tasyaitadabhavat--eṣa sa pāśo yo mayā prārthanīyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11890: 285.025. tato janmacitreṇa nāgapotakena anyaiśca nāgaiḥ sasambhramaiḥ
XXdivyav_u:11894: 285.027. sa nāga āha--tavānena kiṃ prayojanam? yadā garutmatopadrutā bhavāmaḥ, tadā anenātmānaṃ
XXdivyav_u:11895: 285.028. lubdhaka āha--yuṣmākameṣa kadācit karhicit garutmatopadrutānāmupayogaṃ gacchati/
XXdivyav_u:11900: 285.031. ten mātāpitarau avalokya sa pāśo dattaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11903: 286.001. <286>yāvadapareṇa samayena dhano rājā devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati
XXdivyav_u:11905: 286.001. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato na putro na duhitā/
XXdivyav_u:11906: 286.002. sa kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--anekadhanasamuditaṃ me gṛham/
XXdivyav_u:11908: 286.003. mamātyayātsvakulavaṃśacchede rāṣṭrāpahāraḥ sarvasantasvāpateyamaputramiti kṛtvā anyarājavidheyo bhaviṣyatīti/
XXdivyav_u:11912: 286.006. so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberavāsavādīnanyāṃśca devatāviśeṣānāyācate, tadyathā--ārāmadevatā vanadevatā catvaradevatā śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11913: 286.008. sahajāḥ sahadharmikā nityāvubaddhā api devatā āyācate/
XXdivyav_u:11914: 286.009. asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante
XXdivyav_u:11919: 286.010. api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvātputrā jāyante
XXdivyav_u:11921: 286.011. katameṣāṃ trayāṇām? mātāpitarau raktau bhavataḥ saṃnipatitau/
XXdivyav_u:11922: 286.012. mātā cāsya kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī ca/
XXdivyav_u:11924: 286.013. eṣā trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvātputrā jāyante duhitaraśca/
XXdivyav_u:11928: 286.015. katame pañca? raktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti viraktaṃ jānāti/
XXdivyav_u:11933: 286.017. saceddārako bhavati, dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati/
XXdivyav_u:11934: 286.018. saceddārikā bhavati, vāmaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati/
XXdivyav_u:11935: 286.018. sā āttamanāḥ svāminn ārocayati--diṣṭyā vardhasva āryaputra/
XXdivyav_u:11937: 286.019. yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati, niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyatīti/
XXdivyav_u:11945: 286.023. asmākaṃ cāpyatītakālagatānāmalpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādekṣyati--idaṃ
XXdivyav_u:11950: 286.027. na cāsyāḥ kiṃcidamanojñaśabdaśravaṇam yāvadeva garbhasya paripākāya/
XXdivyav_u:11951: 286.028. sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayātprasūtā/
XXdivyav_u:11958: 286.032. tato rājñā taṃ sarvaṃ nagaramapagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallam <287>vyavasthitam, candanavārisiktamucchratadhvajapatākaṃ surabhidhūpaghaṭikopanibuddhaṃ nānāpuṣpābhikīrṇaramaṇīyam/
XXdivyav_u:11961: 287.003. tasyaivaṃ trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātakarma karoti/
XXdivyav_u:11963: bhavatu dāraksya nāmeti? amātyāḥ kathayanti--ayaṃ dārako dhanasya rājñaḥ
XXdivyav_u:11967: dvābhyāmaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:11968: 287.007. so 'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navatītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍairvā
XXdivyav_u:11970: 287.010. sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttastadā lipyāmupanyastaḥ saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:11972: 287.012. so 'ṣṭāsu parīkṣāsu ghaṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:11973: 287.012. sa yāni tāni bhavanti rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryamanuprāptānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:11974: pṛthivīmaṇḍalamabhinirjityādhyāvasatāṃ pṛthagbhavanti śilpasthānakarmasthānāni, tasyathā--hastigrīvāyāmaśvapṛṣṭhe rathe tsarau dhanuṣi apayāne niryāṇe 'ṅkuśagrahe pāśagrahe chedye bhedye muṣṭibandhe padabandhe dūravedhe śabdavedhe marmavedhe 'kṣuṇṇavedhe dṛḍhaprahāritāyām/
XXdivyav_u:11976: 287.017. tasya pitrā trīṇyantaḥpurāṇi vyavasthāpitāni jyeṣṭhaṃ madhyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:11978: 287.017. trīṇi vāsagṛhāṇi māpitāni, haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikam/
XXdivyav_u:11980: 287.019. tataḥ sudhanakumāra upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati//
XXdivyav_u:11981: 287.021. yāvadapareṇa samayena halako lubdhako mṛgayāmanveṣamāṇastena tenānuvicarannanyatamaṃ
XXdivyav_u:11982: 287.022. tasya ca parvatasyādhastādṛṣerāśramapadaṃ paśyati puṣpaphalasampannaṃ nānāpakṣigaṇavicāritam/
XXdivyav_u:11987: 287.025. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ
XXdivyav_u:11990: 287.027. asti tvayā iyatā kālenāsmin pradeśe kaścidāścaryādbhutadharmo
XXdivyav_u:11991: dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā? praśāntātmā ṛṣirmandaṃ mandamuvāca--bhadramukha, dṛṣṭaste
XXdivyav_u:11993: 287.029. eṣā brahmasabhā nāma puṣkiriṇī utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkasaṃchannā nānāpakṣigaṇaniṣevitā
XXdivyav_u:11995: 287.030. asyāṃ puṣkiriṇyāṃ pañcadaśamyāṃ manoharā nāma drumasya
XXdivyav_u:11998: 288.001. ahamapi taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā mahatā prītisaumanasyena
XXdivyav_u:12001: 288.002. atha halakasya lubdhakasyaitadabhavat--śobhano 'yaṃ mayā amoghaḥ pāśo nāgāllabdho manoharāyāḥ kinnaryāḥ kṣepsyāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:12004: 288.004. yāvanmanoharā kinnarī pañcaśataparivāritā tādṛśyaiva vibhūtyā brahmasabhāṃ puṣkiriṇīmavatīrṇā
XXdivyav_u:12005: 288.005. tatsamantaraṃ ca halakena lubdhakena amoghaḥ pāśaḥ kṣiptaḥ, yena manoharā kinnarī
XXdivyav_u:12006: 288.006. tayā amoghapāśaśritayā hrade mahāhatanādaḥ kṛto bhīṣaṇaśca śabdo
XXdivyav_u:12007: niścāritaḥ, yaṃ śrutvā pariśiṣṭaḥ kinnarigaṇa itaścāmutaśca saṃbhrānto
XXdivyav_u:12013: 288.010. sā āha--hā hatāsmi, hā mandabhāgyā, mamodṛśīmavasthāmāptām/
XXdivyav_u:12014: 288.011. mā naiṣīstvaṃ hi mā sprākṣīr naitattva suceṣṭitam/
XXdivyav_u:12015: 288.012. rājabhogyā surūpāhaṃ na sādhu grahaṇaṃ tava//1// iti/
XXdivyav_u:12016: 288.013. lubdhakaḥ prāha--yadi tvāṃ na gṛhṇāmi, niṣpalāyase/
XXdivyav_u:12018: 288.014. yadi na śraddadhāsi, imaṃ cūḍāmaṇiṃ gṛhāṇa/
XXdivyav_u:12020: 288.015. lubdhakaḥ kathayati--kathaṃ jāne? tayā śirasthaścūḍāmaṇirdatta uktaśca--eṣa cūḍāmaṇiryasya haste, tasyāhaṃ vaśā bhavāmi/
XXdivyav_u:12021: 288.016. tato lubdhakenāsau cūḍāmaṇirgṛhītaḥ, pāśabaddhāṃ caināṃ saṃprashtitaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:12023: 288.017. adrākṣītsa lubdhakaḥ sudhanaṃ rājakumāramabhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikam/
XXdivyav_u:12024: 288.018. dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat--ayaṃ ca rājakumāraḥ, iyaṃ ca paramadarśanīyā/
XXdivyav_u:12028: 288.020. upasaṃkramya pādayor nipatya kathayati--idaṃ mama devasya strīratnaṃ prābhṛtamānītam,
XXdivyav_u:12029: 288.021. adrākṣītsudhanakumāro manoharāṃ kinnarīmabhirūpāṃ darśanīyāṃ prāsādikāṃ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatāṃ sarvaguṇasamuditāmaṣṭādaśābhiḥ strīlakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtāṃ janapadakalyāṇāṃ kāñcanakalaśakūrmapīnonnatakaṭhinasahitasujātavṛttapragalbhamānastanīmabhinīlaraktāṃśukavisṛtāyatanavakamalasadṛśanayanāṃ subhruvamāyatatuṅganāsāṃ vidrūmamaṇiratnaviṃvaphalasaṃsthānasadṛśādharoṣṭhīṃ sudṛḍhaparipūrṇagaṇḍapārśvāmatyartharatikarakapolatilakānupūrvacaritāṃ saṃgatabhruvāravindavikacasadṛśaparipūrṇavimalaśaśivapuṣaṃ pralambabāhuṃ gambhīrativalikasaṃtatamadhyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:12030: stanabhārāvanāmyamānapūrvārdhāṃ rathāṅgasaṃsthitasujātajaghanāṃ kadalīgarbhasadṛśakarānupūrvāvasthitasujātakarabhoruṃ sunigūḍhasuracitasarvāṅgasundaraśirāṃ sahitamaṇipīḍāsamraktakaratalapraharṣanūpuravalayām hārardhahāranirghoṣavimalaśitagatimāyatanīlasūkṣmakeśīṃ sacīvaraprabhraṣṭakāñcīguṇāṃ nūpurāvacchāditapādāṃ kṣāmodarīm/
XXdivyav_u:12031: 288.030. tāṃ pratikīrṇahārāmuttaptajāmbūnadacārupūrṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā kumāraḥ sahasā papāta viddho
XXdivyav_u:12034: tūlaparivartanalaghutareṇa vānarāvasthitacapalodbhrāntatareṇa satatābhyāsakleśaniṣevaṇarāgasukhāsvādalobhena sarvakleśaviṣamadurgaprapātaniḥsaṅgena paramasalīlena cittena tadbhūtānugatayā ayoniśomanaskāradhanurvisṛtaiḥ samyogābhilaṣitaparamarahasyaśabdena kāmaśareṇa hṛdaye viddha/
XXdivyav_u:12036: 289.005. dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ sudhana indusamānvaktrāṃ prāvṛḍaghanāntaraviniścariteva vidyuta/
XXdivyav_u:12037: 289.007. tatsnehamanmathavilāsasamudbhavena sadyaḥ sa cetasi nu rāgaśareṇa
XXdivyav_u:12040: 289.010. tataḥ sudhano rājakumāro manoharayā rūpayauvanaguṇena sughanaḥ
XXdivyav_u:12041: kumāronekaiścopacāraśataistathā apahṛto yathā muhūrtamapi tāṃ na jahāti/
XXdivyav_u:12043: 289.012. tatraiko rājānāṃ saṃśritaḥ, dvitīyaḥ sudhanaṃ kumāram/
XXdivyav_u:12044: 289.012. yo rājānaṃ saṃśritaḥ, sa rājñā purohitaḥ sthāpito bhogaiśca saṃvibhaktaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12045: 289.013. yastu sudhanaṃ kumāram, sa bhogamātreṇa saṃvibhaktaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12046: 289.014. sa kathayati--yathā tava sahāyo brāhmaṇo mama pitrā paurohitye
XXdivyav_u:12048: 289.016. eṣa ca vṛttāntastena brāhmaṇena karṇaparamparayā śrutaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12049: 289.016. tasyaitadabhavat--ahaṃ tathā kariṣye, yathā kumāro rājyameva
XXdivyav_u:12050: nāsādayiṣyati, kutastaṃ purohitaṃ sthāpayiṣyatīti? yāvadapareṇa samayena tasya rājño vijite 'nyatamaḥ kārvaṭikaḥ prativiruddhaḥ, tasya samucchittaye eko daṇḍaḥ preṣitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12052: 289.019. evam yāvatsapta, ye daṇḍāḥ preṣitāḥ, te 'pi hastavidhvastāḥ
XXdivyav_u:12055: 289.022. brāhmaṇa purohitaḥ saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ sa kumārasya vadhopāyakāla
XXdivyav_u:12057: 289.022. tena rājā vijñaptah--deva, naivamasau śakyaḥ saṃnāmayitum/
XXdivyav_u:12058: 289.023. rājā kathayati--kiṃ mayā svayaṃ gantavyam? purohitaḥ
XXdivyav_u:12059: kathayati--kimarthaṃ devaḥ svayaṃ gacchati? ayaṃ sudhanaḥ kumāro yuvā
XXdivyav_u:12063: 289.025. tato rājā kumāramāhūya kathayati--gaccha kumāra, daṇḍasahāyaḥ kārvaṭikaṃ saṃnāmaya/
XXdivyav_u:12064: 289.026. evaṃ deveti sudhanaḥ kumāro rājñaḥ pratiśrutya antaḥpuraṃ
XXdivyav_u:12068: 289.028. purohitena cābhihitah--deva, sudhanaḥ kumāro manoharayā atīva sakto na śakyate preṣayitum/
XXdivyav_u:12070: 289.029. nirgataḥ kumāro 'ntaḥpurāt preṣayitavyo yathā manoharāyāḥ sakāśaṃ na prativasatīti/
XXdivyav_u:12071: 289.030. evaṃ deveti amātyai rājñaḥ pratiśrutya balaugho
XXdivyav_u:12073: 289.032. tataḥ kumāro nirgatah uktah--gaccha kumāra, sajjo balaugha iti/
XXdivyav_u:12076: 290.001. sa kathayati--tāvadyadi evam, mātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā gacchāmi/
XXdivyav_u:12079: 290.003. pādayor nipatya kathayati--amba, ahaṃ kārvaṭikaṃ saṃnāmanāya
XXdivyav_u:12085: 290.008. sa evaṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ saṃdiśya abhivādya ca nānāyodhabalaughatūryanir nāditaiḥ
XXdivyav_u:12091: 290.011. tasya tena pathā gacchataḥ khagapathena yānamavasthitam/
XXdivyav_u:12094: 290.013. ko 'tra heturyenedānīṃ pratihata iti? paśyati sudhanaṃ kumāram/
XXdivyav_u:12099: 290.015. na ca kasyacitprāṇinaḥ pīḍā karaṇīyeti viditvā pāñcikaṃ
XXdivyav_u:12100: mahāyakṣasenāpatimāmantrayate--ehi tvaṃ pāñcika, sudhanasya kumārasya kārvaṭikamayuddhena
XXdivyav_u:12101: 290.017. na ca te kasyacitprāṇinaḥ pīḍā kartavyeti/
XXdivyav_u:12102: 290.017. tatheti pāñcikena yakṣasenāpatinā vaiśravaṇasya mahārājasya pratiśrutya divyaścaturaṅgo balakāyo nirmitah--tālamātrapramāṇāḥ puruṣaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:12104: 290.019. tato nānāvidhakhaṅgamuśalatomarapāśacakraśaraparaśvadhādiśastraviśeṣeṇa nānāvāditrasaṃkṣobheṇa ca mahābhayamupadarśayan mahatā balaudhena pāñciko
XXdivyav_u:12108: 290.023. tataste karvaṭanivāsinastaṃ balaughaṃ dṛṣṭvā tacca prākārapatanaṃ
XXdivyav_u:12109: paraṃ viṣādamāpannāḥ papracchuh--kuta eṣa balaugha āgacchatīti? te
XXdivyav_u:12112: 290.025. tasya ca balaugho yadi ciraṃ vidhārayiṣyatha, sarvathā na bhaviṣyatheti/
XXdivyav_u:12114: 290.027. vyutpannā na vayaṃ rājño na kumārasya dhīmataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12117: 290.029. tata ucchritadhvajapatākāpūrṇakalaśā nānāvidhatūryanir nāditaiḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ
XXdivyav_u:12118: 290.030. tena ca samāśvāsitāḥ, tadabhiprāyaśca rājabhaṭaḥ sthāpitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12122: 291.001. dhanena ca rājñā tāmeva rātriṃ svapno dṛṣṭah--gṛdhreṇāgatya rājña udaraṃ sphoṭayitvā antrāṇyākṛṣya sarvaṃ tannagaramantrairveṣṭitam, sapta ratnāni gṛhaṃ praveśyamānāni dṛṣṭāni/
XXdivyav_u:12123: 291.002. tato rājā bhītastrastaḥ saṃvigna āhṛṣṭaromakūpo laghukadhvevotthāya mahāśayane niṣadya kare kapokaṃ dattvā cintāparo
XXdivyav_u:12124: vyavasthitah--mā haiva me atonidānaṃ rājyaccyutirbhaviṣyati, jīvitasya vā antarāya iti/
XXdivyav_u:12125: 291.005. sa prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ svapnaṃ brāhmaṇāya purohitāya
XXdivyav_u:12127: 291.005. sa saṃlakṣayati--yādṛśo devena svapno dṛṣṭaḥ, niyataṃ kumāreṇa karvaṭako nirjitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12129: 291.007. iti kṛtvā kathayati--deva, na śobhanaḥ svapnaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12131: 291.008. kevalaṃ tu atrāsti pratikāraḥ, sa ca brāhmaṇakamantreṣu dṛṣṭaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12132: 291.008. ko 'sau pratikārah? deva, udyāne puṣkariṇī puruṣapramāṇikā
XXdivyav_u:12136: 291.010. tato devena snānaprayatena tāṃ puṣkariṇīmekena so
XXdivyav_u:12139: 291.012. tataścaturbhirbrāhmaṇairvedavedāṅgapāragairdevasya pādayorjihvayā nirleḍhavyam, kinnaravasayā ca dhūpo deyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12142: 291.014. purohitaḥ kathayati--deva, yadeva durlabhaṃ tadeva sulabham/
XXdivyav_u:12143: 291.015. rājā kathayati--yathā katham? purohitaḥ kathayati--deva, nanviyaṃ manoharā kinnarī/
XXdivyav_u:12150: 291.021. śakṣyasi hyaparāṃ kartuṃ ghātayaināṃ manoharām//7// iti/
XXdivyav_u:12151: 291.022. ātmābhinandino na kiṃcinna pratipadyanta iti tenādhivāsitam/
XXdivyav_u:12158: 291.026. tāḥ pramuditā dṛṣṭvā manoharā pṛcchati--kim yūyamatīva praharṣitā iva? yāvadaparayā sa vṛttānto vistareṇa manoharāyā niveditaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12159: 291.027. tato manoharā saṃjātaduḥkhadaurmanasyā yena sudhanasya kumārasya
XXdivyav_u:12167: 291.030. tatastayā sa cūḍāmaṇirvastrāṇi ca manoharāyai dattāni, uktā
XXdivyav_u:12170: 291.032. tato rājā yathādiṣṭena krameṇa snānaprayato rudhirapūrṇāṃ
XXdivyav_u:12175: 292.004. nāgīva bandhanānmuktā eṣā gacchāmi sāmpratam//8// iti/
XXdivyav_u:12177: 292.005. sa bhītaḥ purohitamāmantrayate--yadarthaṃ kṛto yatnaḥ, sa na saṃpannaḥ, manoharā kinnarī niṣpalāyiteti/
XXdivyav_u:12182: 292.008. yadi tena nākhyātamabhaviṣyat, nāhaṃ grahaṇa gatā abhaviṣyat/
XXdivyav_u:12183: 292.009. tena hi yasyāmi tāvadasyaiva ṛṣeḥ sakāśāmiti/
XXdivyav_u:12185: 292.009. pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā tam ṛṣimuvāca--maharṣe, tava vyapadeśādahaṃ grahaṇaṃ gatā, manuṣyasya saṃsparśaśca saṃprāptaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12187: 292.011. tadvijñāpayāmi--yadi yadā kadācitsudhanaḥ kumāra āgacchati māṃ samanveṣamāṇaḥ, tasyemāmaṅgulimudrāṃ dāturmahasi/
XXdivyav_u:12188: 292.012. evaṃ ca vaktavyam--kumāra, viṣamāḥ panthāno durgamāḥ,
XXdivyav_u:12190: 292.013. yadi nirvāyamāṇo na riṣṭhet, tasya mārgaṃ vyapadeṣṭumarhasi--kumāra, manoharayā samākhyātam--uttare digbhāge trayaḥ kālaparvatāḥ, tānatikramya apare trayaḥ, tānapyatikramya apare trayaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:12191: tānatikramya himavān parvatarājaḥ, tasyottareṇotkalakaparvataḥ, tata utkūlako jalapatha ekadhārako vajrakaḥ kāmarūpī/
XXdivyav_u:12192: 292.017. tatra khadirake parvate guhā, praveśa ekadhārake tu kīlakāḥ,
XXdivyav_u:12194: 292.018. ebhirupāyaiste parvatā atikramaṇīyāḥ, yantrāṇi ca bhuṅktavyāni/
XXdivyav_u:12195: 292.019. ajavaktrameṇḍhakaḥ puruṣo rākṣasarūpī piṅgalāguhāyāṃ lālāsrotasā mahānajagaro vegena pradhāvati/
XXdivyav_u:12198: 292.022. ayaṃ bhuktena bāṇena hantavyo mama kāraṇāt/
XXdivyav_u:12204: 292.028. yadā paśyettatra kīlakaṃ lalāṭe tasyā nikhānayet//11//
XXdivyav_u:12209: 293.001. <293>raṅgā pataṅgā tapanī citrā rudantī hasantī āśīviṣā vetranadī
XXdivyav_u:12214: 293.005. āśīviṣāyāṃ nānāvidhāḥ sarpā vetranadyāṃ tu śālmaliḥ//15//
XXdivyav_u:12222: 293.010. tato manoharā tam ṛṣimevamuktvā pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā prakrāntā//
XXdivyav_u:12223: 293.012. yāvatsudhanaḥ kumārastaṃ karvaṭakaṃ saṃnāmya gṛhītaprābhṛto hastināpuramanuprāptaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12225: 293.013. tataḥ kumāro mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya pituḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12227: 293.014. rājñā paramayā saṃtoṣaṇayā saṃbhāṣitaḥ, uktaśca--kumāra, śivena
XXdivyav_u:12228: tvamāgatah? deva, tava prasādātkarvaṭakaḥ saṃnāmitaḥ, nipakā gṛhītāḥ,
XXdivyav_u:12232: 293.017. rājā kathayati--kumāra tiṣṭha, prābhṛtaṃ sahitā eva bhokṣyāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12233: 293.018. deva gacchāmi, ciraṃ dṛṣṭā me manoharā/
XXdivyav_u:12236: 293.019. so 'navabudhyamāna evamāha--tāta, adyaiva mayā avaśyaṃ gantavyam/
XXdivyav_u:12240: 293.020. sa cintāparaḥ praviśya manoharāṃ na paśyati/
XXdivyav_u:12248: 293.023. tāḥ striyaḥ kathayanti--deva, asminnantaḥpure tatpraviśiṣṭatarāḥ striyaḥ santi, kimarthaṃ śokaḥ kriyate? sa pitur nairguṇyamupaśrutya
XXdivyav_u:12254: 293.029. hṛdayaṃ dahyate caiva rahitasya tayā bhṛśam//18//
XXdivyav_u:12255: 293.030. manobhirāmā ca manoharā ca manonukūlā ca manoratiśca/
XXdivyav_u:12256: 294.001. <294>saṃtaptadeho 'smi manoharāṃ vinā kuto mamedaṃ vyasanaṃ samāgatam//19// iti/
XXdivyav_u:12259: 294.003. amba, yathā katham? tayā yathāvṛttaṃ vistareṇa samākhyātam/
XXdivyav_u:12260: 294.004. sa pitur nairguṇyamakṛtajñatāṃ ca jñātvā kathayati--kutra gatā katareṇa vā patheti? sā kathayati--
XXdivyav_u:12262: 294.007. uṣito dharmarājena yatra yātā manoharā//20// iti/
XXdivyav_u:12268: 294.012. hṛdayaṃ dahyate caiva rahitasya tayā bhṛśam//22//
XXdivyav_u:12269: 294.013. manobhirāmā ca manoharā ca manonukūlā ca manoratiśca/
XXdivyav_u:12270: 294.015. saṃtaptadeho 'smi manoharāṃ vinā kuto mamedaṃ vyasanaṃ samāgatam//23// iti/
XXdivyav_u:12271: 294.017. tato mātrā abhihitah--putra, santyasminnantaḥpure tadviśiṣṭatarāḥ striyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12272: 294.017. kimarthaṃ śokas triyata iti? kumāraḥ kathayati--kuto me
XXdivyav_u:12277: 294.020. sa halakasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ pṛcchati--manoharā kutastvayā
XXdivyav_u:12278: labdheti? sa kathayati--amuṣmin pradeśe ṛṣiḥ prativasati/
XXdivyav_u:12283: 294.023. eṣa ca vṛttānto rājñā śrutah--manoharāviyogātkumāro 'tīva viklava
XXdivyav_u:12285: 294.024. tato rājñā abhihitah--kumāra, kimasi viklavah? idānīṃ tadviśiṣṭataramantaḥpuraṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:12286: 294.025. sa kathayati--tāta, na śakyaṃ mayā tāmanānīya antaḥpurasthena bhavitum/
XXdivyav_u:12288: 294.026. tato rājñā nagaraprākāraśṛṅgeṣvārakṣakāḥ puruṣāḥ sthāpitāḥ, yathā kumāro na niṣkāsatīti/
XXdivyav_u:12290: 294.028. uktaṃ ca--pañceme rātryā alpaṃ svapanti bahu jāgārti/
XXdivyav_u:12295: 294.030. atha kumārasyaitadabhavat--yadi dvāreṇa yāsyāmi, rājā dvārapālakān rakṣakāṃśca daṇḍenotsādayiṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:12297: 294.031. sa rātryā vyutthāya nīlotpalamālābaddhaśirā<295> yena rakṣiṇaḥ puruṣā na santi, tena tāṃ mālāṃ dhvaje baddhvā avatīrṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12300: 295.003. bhoḥ pūrṇacandra rajanīkara tārarāja tvaṃ rohiṇīnayanakānta
XXdivyav_u:12302: 295.005. kaccitpriyā mama manoharaṇaikadakṣā dṛṣṭā tvayā bhuvi
XXdivyav_u:12307: 295.008. he tvaṃ kuraṅgi tṛṇavāripalāśabhakṣe svastyastu te cara sukhaṃ na
XXdivyav_u:12309: 295.010. dīrghekṣaṇā mṛgavadhūkamanīyarūpā dṛṣṭā tvayā mama manoharanāmadheyā//25//
XXdivyav_u:12310: 295.012. sa tāmatikramya anyatamaṃ pradeśaṃ gato dadarśa vanaṃ nānāpuṣpaphalopaśobhitaṃ bhramarairupabhujyamānasāram/
XXdivyav_u:12318: 295.021. rāgāgninā tava samo na viṣāgnirugro dṛṣṭā tvayā mama manoharanāmadheyā//27//
XXdivyav_u:12321: 295.025. bhoḥ kokilottama vanāntaravṛkṣavāsin nārī manohara patatrigaṇasya
XXdivyav_u:12331: 296.007. vande ṛṣe nataśirā vada me laghu tvaṃ dṛṣṭā tvayā mama
XXdivyav_u:12332: 296.009. tataḥ sa ṛṣiḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ svāgatavacanāsanadānakriyādipuraḥsaraḥ pratisaṃmodya
XXdivyav_u:12333: 296.011. dṛṣṭā sā paripūrṇacandravadanā nīlotpalābhāsvarā rūpeṇa priyadarśanā subadanā
XXdivyav_u:12334: 296.013. tvaṃ svastho bhuvi bhujyatāṃ hi vividhaṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ ca prabho pañcātsvasti gamiṣyasīti manasā nātrāsti me saṃśayaḥ//31//
XXdivyav_u:12335: 296.015. idaṃ hyavocadvacanaṃ ca subhrūḥ kumāra tṛṣṇā tvayi bādhate me/
XXdivyav_u:12336: 296.017. mahacca duḥkhaṃ vasatāṃ vaneṣu yātāṃ ramāṃ drakṣyasi
XXdivyav_u:12339: 296.019. kathayati ca-- kumāra, viṣamāḥ panthāno durgamāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12341: 296.020. yadi ca nivāryamāṇo na tiṣṭhet, tasya mārgamupadeṣṭumarhasi/
XXdivyav_u:12342: 296.021. kumāra, idaṃ ca tayā samākhyātam--uttare digbhāge trayaḥ kālaparvatāḥ, tānatikramya apare trayaḥ, tānapyatikramya himavān parvatarājaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12345: 296.023. tena ca te na tṛṣā na bubhukṣā, smṛtibalaṃ ca vardhayati/
XXdivyav_u:12350: 296.026. tataḥ kūlako jalapathaḥ khadiraka ekadhārako vajrakaḥ kāmarūpī/
XXdivyav_u:12353: 296.028. tatra khadirake parvate guhā, praveśa ekadhārake tu kolakāḥ,
XXdivyav_u:12355: 296.029. ebhirupāyaiste sarve parvatāḥ samatikramaṇīyāḥ, yantrāṇi ca bhaṅktavyāni/
XXdivyav_u:12356: 296.029. ajavaktro meṇḍhakaḥ puruṣo rākṣasīrūpī piṅgalāyāṃ guhāyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:12366: 297.007. yadā paśyettadā kīlaṃ lalāṭo tasyā nikhānayet//35//
XXdivyav_u:12371: 297.012. raṅgā pataṅgā tapanī citrā rudantī hasantī āśīviṣā vetranadī ca/
XXdivyav_u:12375: 297.016. āśīviṣāyāṃ nānāvidhāḥ sarpā vetranadyāṃ tu śālmaliḥ//39//
XXdivyav_u:12379: 297.019. hasantyāṃ tūṣṇībhāvena, āśīviṣāyāṃ sarvaviṣamantraprayogeṇa samuttāraḥ, vetranadyāṃ tīkṣṇaśastrasampātayogena samuttāraḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12383: 297.022. tataḥ sudhanaḥ kumāro yathopadiṣṭānauṣadhimantrāgadaprayogān samudānīya tasya ṛṣeḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12384: 297.023. tatastena yathopadiṣṭāḥ sarve samudānītāḥ sthāpavitvā vānaram/
XXdivyav_u:12386: 297.024. uktaśca--alaṃ kumāra, kimanena vyavasāyena? kiṃ manoharayā?
XXdivyav_u:12390: 297.027. candrasya khe vicarataḥ kva sahāyabhāvo daṃṣṭrābalena balinaśca
XXdivyav_u:12392: 297.029. agneśca dāvadahane kva sahāyabhāvah asmadvidhasya ca sahāyabalena kiṃ syāt//41//
XXdivyav_u:12393: 298.001. <298>kiṃ bho mahārṇavajalaṃ na vigāhitavyaṃ kiṃ sarpadaṣṭa iti naiva cikitsanīyaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:12394: 298.003. vīryaṃ bhajetsumahadūrjitasattvadṛṣṭam yatne kṛte yadi na
XXdivyav_u:12397: 298.005. anupūrveṇa parvatanadīguhāprapātādīni bhaiṣajyamantrāgadaprayogeṇa vinirjitya drumasya kinnararājasya bhavanasamīpaṃ gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12401: 298.008. tatastāḥ sudhanakumāreṇābhihitāh--kimanena bahunā pānīyena kriyata iti? tāḥ kathayanti--asti drumasya kinnararājasya duhitā manoharā
XXdivyav_u:12405: 298.011. sudhanaḥ kumāraḥ pṛcchati--kimete ghaṭāḥ samastāḥ sarve tasyā upari nipātyante, āhosvidanupūrveṇeti? tāḥ kathayanti--anupūrvyā/
XXdivyav_u:12409: 298.014. sā ca kinnarī abhihitā--anena tvayā ghaṭena manoharā
XXdivyav_u:12412: 298.015. tatastayāsau ghaṭaḥ prathamataraṃ manoharāyā mūrdhni nipātito
XXdivyav_u:12415: 298.016. tataḥ kinnarīṃ pṛcchati--mā tatra kaścinmanuṣyo 'bhyāgatah? sā
XXdivyav_u:12419: 298.018. tato manoharā pituḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--tāta, yadyasau sudhanaḥ kumāra āgacchet, yenāhaṃ hṛtā, tasya tvaṃ kiṃ kuryāh? sa
XXdivyav_u:12420: kathayati--tamahaṃ khaṇḍaśataṃ kṛtvā catasṛṣu śikṣu kṣipeyam/
XXdivyav_u:12426: tasyāhaṃ tvāṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāṃ prabhūtacitropakaraṇaiḥ kinnarīsahasraparivṛtāṃ bhāryārthaṃ
XXdivyav_u:12427: 298.024. tato manoharayā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditayā sudhanaṃ kumāro divyālaṃkāravibhūṣito drumasya
XXdivyav_u:12428: 298.025. tato drumaḥ kinnnararājaḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ dadarśa abhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prasādikaṃ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam/
XXdivyav_u:12430: 298.027. tatastasya jijñāsāṃ kartukāmena sauvarṇāḥ stambhā ucchritāḥ,
XXdivyav_u:12431: sapta tālāḥ, sapta bheryaḥ, sapta sūkarāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12442: 299.004. tato bodhisattvo nṛttagītavīṇāpaṇavasughoṣakavallarīmṛdaṅgādinānāvidhena daivatopasaṃhṛtena vāditraviśeṣeṇa samantādāpūryamāṇe 'nekaiḥ kinnarasahasraiḥ pativṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12447: 299.011. nīlotpaladalābhenāsinā gṛhītena paśyato drumasya kinnararājasya sauvarṇastambhasamīpaṃ gatvā tān stambhān kadalīcchedena khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ
XXdivyav_u:12449: 299.012. tatastāṃs tilaśo 'vakīrya sapta tālān sapta bherīḥ sapta ca
XXdivyav_u:12451: 299.013. tato gaganatalasthābhirdevatābhiśca kinnaraśatasahasrairhāhākārakilikilāprakṣveḍoccair nādo muktaḥ, yaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca kinnararājaḥ paraṃ vismayamupagataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12452: 299.015. tataḥ kinnarīsahasrasya manoharāsamānarūpasya madhye manoharāṃ sthāpayitvā sudhanaḥ kumāro 'bhihitah--ehi kumāra, pratyabhijānāsi
XXdivyav_u:12455: 299.018. yathā drumasya duhitā mameha tvaṃ manoharā/
XXdivyav_u:12461: 299.022. tato drumaḥ kinnararājaḥ kinnaragaṇena saṃvarṇitaḥ sudhanaṃ
XXdivyav_u:12462: kinnarābhimetena mahatā satkāreṇa puraskṛtya manoharāṃ divyālaṃkāravibhūṣitāṃ vāmena pāṇinā gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena sauvarṇabhṛṅgāraṃ sudhanaṃ kumāramabhihitah--kumāra, eṣā te manoharā kinnarīpativṛtā bhāryārthāya dattā/
XXdivyav_u:12464: 299.025. paraṃ tāteti sudhanaḥ kumāro drumasya kinnararājasya pratiśrutya kinnarabhavanastho manoharayā sārdhaṃ niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍate ramate paricārayati/
XXdivyav_u:12466: duḥkhenātyāhato manoharāyā nivedayati--mātāpitṛviyogajaṃ me duḥkhaṃ bādhata iti/
XXdivyav_u:12467: 299.028. tato manoharayā eṣa vṛttānto vistareṇa pitur niveditaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12471: 299.030. tato drumeṇa kinnararājena prabhūtaṃ maṇimuktāsuvarṇādīn dattvā
XXdivyav_u:12476: 300.001. tato hastināpuraṃ nagaraṃ nānāmanohareṇa surabhinā gandhaviśeṣeṇa
XXdivyav_u:12478: 300.002. śrutvā dhanena rājñā ānandabheryastāḍitāḥ, sarvaṃ ca tannagaramapagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṃ
XXdivyav_u:12480: 300.004. tataḥ kumāro 'nekanaravarasahasraparivṛto manoharayā sārdhaṃ hastināpuraṃ nagaraṃ
XXdivyav_u:12481: 300.005. tato mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya vividhāni ratnānyādāya pituḥ
XXdivyav_u:12486: 300.007. tato dhanena rājñā atibalavīryaparākrama iti viditvā
XXdivyav_u:12488: 300.008. sudhanaḥ kumāraḥ saṃlakṣayati--yanmama manoharayā sārdhaṃ samāgamaḥ saṃvṛtto rājyābhiṣekaścānuprāptaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:12490: 300.010. tena hastināpure nagare dvādaśa varṣāṇi nirgaṭo yajña iṣṭaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:12491: 300.011. syātkhalu te mahārāja anyaḥ sa tena kālena samayena sudhanaḥ
XXdivyav_u:12493: 300.012. api tvahameva tena kālena tena samayena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ vartamānaḥ sudhano nāma rājā babhūva/
XXdivyav_u:12494: 300.013. yanmayā manoharānimittaṃ balavīryaparākramo darśitaḥ, dvādaśa varṣāṇi nirargaṭo yajña iṣṭaḥ, na tena mayā anuttarā
XXdivyav_u:12495: samyaksambodhiradhigatā, kiṃ tu taddānaṃ tacca vīryamanuttarāyāḥ samyaksamboderhetumātrakaṃ pratyayamātrakaṃ saṃbhāramātrakam//
XXdivyav_u:12497: 300.016. āttamanasaste ca sarve lokā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan//
XXdivyav_u:12504: 301.003. atha bhagavān yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12508: 301.005. dadarśa sa brāhmaṇo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā
XXdivyav_u:12509: mahāpuruṣalakcaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtamaśītyānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamamiva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam/
XXdivyav_u:12511: 301.008. na tathā dvādaśavarṣābhyastaḥ śamathaścattasya kalyatāṃ janayati,
XXdivyav_u:12512: aputrasya vā putrapratilambhaḥ, daridrasya vā nidhidarśanam,
XXdivyav_u:12513: rājyābhinandano vā rājyābhiṣekaḥ, yathopacitakuśalamūlasya sattvasya tatprathamato buddhadarśanam/
XXdivyav_u:12514: 301.010. sa tāṃ peyāmādāya laghuladhveva yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12517: 301.012. tato bhagavatā brāhmaṇasya jīrṇakūpo darśitah--sacette brāhmaṇa
XXdivyav_u:12520: 301.013. sa jīrṇakūpo vāpyāyamānaḥ peyāpūrṇaḥ, yathāpi tadbuddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena/
XXdivyav_u:12524: 301.015. bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitā yathā sarvasaṃghena pītā/
XXdivyav_u:12526: 301.017. tato 'sau brāhmaṇo bhūyasyā mātrayā abhiprasanno bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya/
XXdivyav_u:12527: 301.018. tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāyasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXdivyav_u:12528: pūrvavadyāvadanādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāapattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:12530: 301.020. eṣo 'haṃ bhagavantaṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca
XXdivyav_u:12532: 301.021. upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatamabhiprasannam/
XXdivyav_u:12533: 301.022. athāsau brāhmaṇo vaṇigiva labdhalābhaḥ śasyasampanna iva
XXdivyav_u:12534: kṛṣīvalaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ sarvaroganirmukta ivāturo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyānandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato
XXdivyav_u:12536: 301.025. paśyati tasmin kṣetre sauvarṇān yavān saṃpannān/
XXdivyav_u:12541: 301.029. upasaṃkramya jayenāyuṣā vardhayitvā rājānamuvāca--deva, mayā yavāḥ prakīrṇāḥ, te sauvarṇāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12560: 302.006. te 'pi balīvardā baddhaiḥ prayoktraiḥ pratodayaṣṭibhiḥ kṣatavikṣatagātrā muhurmuhur niśvasanto vahanti/
XXdivyav_u:12561: 302.007. tadṛśuste kārṣākā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ
XXdivyav_u:12565: 302.010. dṛṣṭvā ca punarvineyāpekṣayā mārgādapakramya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane
XXdivyav_u:12566: 302.010. eta kārṣakā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12567: 302.011. tato bhagavatā teṣāṃ kārṣakāṇāmāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXdivyav_u:12568: pūrvavadyāvadanādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāapattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:12570: 302.014. praṇamayya bhagavantamidamavocat--deśaya bhadanta, svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ
XXdivyav_u:12576: 302.017. te 'pi balīvardā yoktrāṇi varatrāṇi ca cchittvā yena
XXdivyav_u:12579: 302.019. teṣāṃ bhagavatā tribhiḥ padārthairdharmo deśitaḥ pūrvavadyāvadyathā gaṅgāvatāre haṃsamatsyakūrmāṇām yāvad dṛṣṭasatyāḥ svarbhavanaṃ gatāḥ//
XXdivyav_u:12580: 302.021. bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ nu taiḥ kārṣakapūrvakairbhikṣubhiḥ karma kṛtam yena
XXdivyav_u:12582: sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam? tairbalīvardapūrvakairdevaputraiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam, yana balīvardeṣūpapannāḥ, satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtamiti?
XXdivyav_u:12583: bhagavānāha--ebhireva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pūrvavadyāvatphalanti khalu dehinām//
XXdivyav_u:12584: 302.026. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'sminneva bhadrakalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā loka udapādi/
XXdivyav_u:12588: 302.028. tasya śāsane etāni pañca karṣakaśatāni pravrajitānyabhūvan/
XXdivyav_u:12589: 302.028. tatraibhir na paṭhitaṃ na svādhyāyitaṃ nāpi manasikāro vihitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12590: 302.029. kiṃ tu śraddhādeyaṃ bhuktvā bhuktvā saṃgaṇikābhirataiḥ
XXdivyav_u:12592: 303.001. <303>kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāni tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni,
XXdivyav_u:12594: 303.002. yo 'sau vihārasvāmī, sa evāsau gṛhapatiryasyaite kārṣahāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12595: 303.002. yadebhirvihārasvāmisantakaṃ śraddhādeyaṃ paribhujya na paṭhitaṃ na svādhyāyitaṃ nāpi manasikāro vihitaḥ, kiṃ tu saṃgaṇikābhirataiḥ
XXdivyav_u:12596: kausīdyenābhināmitam, tena karmaṇā pañca janmaśatāni tasya vihārasvāminaḥ
XXdivyav_u:12599: 303.005. yadebhiḥ kāśayapasya samyaksambuddhāsya śāsane pravrajya brahmacaryaṃ caritam, tenaitarhi mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:12600: 303.007. te ca balīvardapūrviṇo devaputrāḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya
XXdivyav_u:12605: 303.009. yatkāśyape samyaksambuddhe brahmacaryaṃ vāsitam, tenedānīṃ devaputrabhūtaiḥ satyadarśanaṃ
XXdivyav_u:12609: 303.013. tatra bhagavānāyucmantamāmantrayate sma--āgamaya ānanda yena toyikā/
XXdivyav_u:12613: 303.015. athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtagātraṃ pūrvavadyāvatsamantato bhadrakam/
XXdivyav_u:12614: 303.016. dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati--yadi bhagavantaṃ gautamamupetya abhivādayiṣyāmi, karmaparihāṇirme
XXdivyav_u:12616: 303.018. tatko 'sāvupāyaḥ syādyena me na karmaparihāṇi syānnāpi puṇyaparihāṇiriti? tasya buddhirutpannā--atrastha evābhivādanaṃ karomi/
XXdivyav_u:12625: 303.023. evamanena dvābhyāṃ samyaksambuddhābhyāṃ vandanā kṛtā bhavet/
XXdivyav_u:12626: 303.024. tatkasya hetoh? asminn ānanda pradeśe kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasyāvikopito 'sthisaṃghātastiṣṭhatīti/
XXdivyav_u:12629: 303.027. evamayaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo dvābhyāṃ samyaksambuddhābhyāṃ paribhukto bhaviṣyati, yacca kāśyapena samyaksambuddhena, yaccaitarhi bhagavateti/
XXdivyav_u:12631: 303.028. niṣadya bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghātamavikopitaṃ draṣṭum? etasya bhagavan kālaḥ, etasya sugata samayo 'yam/
XXdivyav_u:12635: 303.032. dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavanto laukikam <304>
XXdivyav_u:12643: 304.004. tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--gṛhṇīta bhikṣavo nimittam/
XXdivyav_u:12646: 304.006. rājñā prasenajitā śrutam--bhagavatā śrāvakāṇāṃ darśanāya avikopitaḥ kaśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghāta ucchrāpita iti/
XXdivyav_u:12650: purāṇasthapatiḥ, viśākhā mṛgaramātā, anekāni ca prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi
XXdivyav_u:12651: kutūhalajātāni draṣṭuṃ saṃprasthitāni pūrvakaiśca kuśalamūlaiḥ saṃcodyamānāni/
XXdivyav_u:12653: 304.011. taiḥ śrutam--antarhito 'sau bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śīrarasaṃghāta
XXdivyav_u:12657: 304.013. evaṃ cetasā cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--asmānme padāvihārāt kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃstasya mahājanakāyasyāvipratisārasaṃjananārthaṃ
XXdivyav_u:12658: tasya copāsakasya cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣite--
XXdivyav_u:12659: 304.016. śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇaniṣkā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:12660: 304.018. yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ padāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān//2//
XXdivyav_u:12664: 304.021. asya tu mṛttikāpiṇḍasya kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃs tasyāpi cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
XXdivyav_u:12665: 304.023. śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇapiṇḍaṃ jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:12670: cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--padāvihārasya mṛttikāpiṇḍasya ceyatpuṇyamuktaṃ bhagavatā, asmākaṃ tu muktapuṣpāṇāṃ kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
XXdivyav_u:12676: 305.006. asmākaṃ mālāvihārasya kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
XXdivyav_u:12677: 305.008. śatasahasrāṇi suvarṇavāhā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:12678: 305.010. yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto mālāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān//5//
XXdivyav_u:12682: 305.013. asmākaṃ pradīpadānasya kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
XXdivyav_u:12684: 305.017. yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ pradīpadānaṃ prakaroti vidvān//6// iti/
XXdivyav_u:12687: 305.020. asmākaṃ gandhābhiṣekasya kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
XXdivyav_u:12688: 305.022. śatasahasrāṇi suvarṇāśayo jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:12689: 305.024. yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto gandhābhiṣekaṃ prakaroti vidvān//7// iti/
XXdivyav_u:12691: cābhisaṃskṛtam--padavihārasya mṛtpiṇḍadānasya, muktapuṣpāṇāṃ mālavihārasya pradīpadānasya gandhābhiṣekasya ca iyatpuṇyamuktaṃ bhagavatā, āsmākaṃ chatradhvajapatākāropaṇasya kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
XXdivyav_u:12694: 306.005. eṣāṃ hi dakṣiṇā proktā aprameye tathāgate/
XXdivyav_u:12696: 306.007. teṣāmetadabhavat--parinirvṛtasya tāvadbhagavataḥ pūjākaraṇādi yatpuṇyamuktaṃ bhagavatā, tiṣṭhataḥ kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti/
XXdivyav_u:12697: 306.008. atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
XXdivyav_u:12703: 306.014. tato bhagavatā tasya mahājanakāyasya tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā
XXdivyav_u:12709: 306.018. yadbhūyasā sā parṣadbuddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
XXdivyav_u:12710: 306.019. sārdhaṃ tatra brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhistasmin pradeśe mahaḥ sthāpitah--toyikāmahastoyikāmaha iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā//
XXdivyav_u:12715: 307.002. ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane
XXdivyav_u:12717: 307.003. satkṛto bhagavān gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito bhikṣubhibhikṇyupāsakopāsikai rājñā rājamātrair
XXdivyav_u:12720: 307.005. lābhī ca bhagavān prabhutānāṃ praṇītānāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ divyānāṃ ca
XXdivyav_u:12721: manuṣyāṇāṃ ca, taiśca bhagavānanupaliptaḥ padmamiva vāriṇā/
XXdivyav_u:12722: 307.007. tena khalu punaḥ samayena ayameva bhagavato 'nurūpa udāraḥ kalyāṇakīrtiśabda śloko 'bhyudgatah--ityapi sa bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan
XXdivyav_u:12723: samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca buddho bhagavān/
XXdivyav_u:12724: 307.010. sa imāṃ sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇīṃ prajāṃ sadevamanuṣīṃ svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya viharati/
XXdivyav_u:12725: 307.011. sa dharmaṃ deśayatyādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇāṃ paryavasāne
XXdivyav_u:12727: 307.012. svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ
XXdivyav_u:12729: 307.013. tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--evaṃ ca bhikṣavaḥ sattvā
XXdivyav_u:12730: jānīyuh--dānaṃ dānaphalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca vipākam, apīdānīm yo 'sau
XXdivyav_u:12731: caramaḥ kavalaḥ paścima ālopaḥ, tamapi nāsaṃvibhajya pariṣvātmanā vā
XXdivyav_u:12732: paribhuñjīran, na cotpannaṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭheyuḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12733: 307.016. yasmāttarhi bhikṣavaḥ sattvā na jānanti dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam yathāhaṃ jāne dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam, tasmātsattvā yo 'sau caramaḥ kavalaḥ paścima ālopaḥ, tamevādattvā imamasaṃvibhajya pareṣvātmanā vā
XXdivyav_u:12734: paribhuñjate, utpannaṃ cauṣāṃ mātsaryamalaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati//
XXdivyav_u:12735: 307.020. bhikṣavaḥ sarvasaṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayānāṃ chettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantamapṛcchan--āścaryaṃ bhadanta yāvacca bhagavata etarhi yācakāḥ priyāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12736: 307.021. na bhikṣava etarhi mama, yathā atīte 'pyadhvani yācanakāḥ priyāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12738: 307.023. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvanyuttarāpatheṣu janapadeṣu utpalāvatī nāṃ nagarī rājadhānī babhūva ṛddhā ca sphaītā ca kṣemā ca
XXdivyav_u:12740: 307.024. athāpareṇa samayena utpalāvatyāṃ nagararājadhānyāṃ durbhikṣamabhūd durjīvaṃ durlabhapiṇḍaṃ nasukaramapatāne pragrahaṇe
XXdivyav_u:12742: 307.026. tena khalu samayenotpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ rūpāvatī nāma strī babhūva abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā śubhavarṇapuṣkalanayā samanvāgatā/
XXdivyav_u:12743: 307.027. atha rūpāvatī strī svānniveśanānniṣkramya utpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ jaṅghāvihāramanukrāmati/
XXdivyav_u:12745: 307.028. tasmin khalu samaye tasminnapavarake strī prasūtā, dārakaṃ prajātā abhirūpaṃ prāsādikaṃ śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam/
XXdivyav_u:12746: 307.030. taṃ sā strī kṣutkṣāmaparītā raikṣacittā dārakaṃ gṛhṇāti, icchati ca svāni putramāṃsāni
XXdivyav_u:12747: 307.031. tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rūpāvatī strī etadavovat--kimidaṃ bhagini kartukāmāsi?
XXdivyav_u:12750: 308.001. rūpāvatī āha--tenabhagini niveśane kiṃcitsaṃvidyate 'nnaṃ vā pānaṃ vā bhojanaṃ vā svādanīyaṃ vā? durlabhaḥ putraśabdo lokasya/
XXdivyav_u:12751: 308.002. na me bhagini kiṃcitsaṃvidyate niveśane annaṃ vā pānaṃ vā khādyaṃ vā bhojanaṃ vā svādanīyaṃ vā lehyaṃ vā/
XXdivyav_u:12753: 308.004. rūpāvatyāha--tena hi bhagini muhūrtamāgamaya, yāvadahaṃ niveśanaṃ gatvā tavārthāya
XXdivyav_u:12754: 308.005. sā āha--yatkhalu bhagini jānīyāh--kukṣirme lupyati, pṛthivī me sphuṭati, hṛdayaṃ me dhūmāyati, diśo me na pratibhānti/
XXdivyav_u:12755: 308.006. na tāvattvaṃ dvāraśālāyā nirgatā bhaviṣyasi yāvanme vāyava
XXdivyav_u:12757: 308.007. yathā rūpāvatyā etadabhavat--yadi dārakaṃ gṛhītvā gamiṣyāmi, eṣā strī kṣutkṣāmaparītā kālaṃ kariṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:12758: 308.008. atha dārakamapahāya yāsyāmi, niyataṃ dārakaṃ bhakṣayiṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:12759: 308.009. yathākathaṃ punarmama kurvantyā dvayorjīvitalābhaḥ syāt? tasyā
XXdivyav_u:12760: etadabhavat--anaparādhyāśayavati saṃsāre bahūni duḥkhānyanubhūtāni asakṛ nnarakeṣvasakṛttiryakṣvasakṛd yamaloke 'sakṛ nmanuṣyalokeṣu hastacchedāḥ pādacchedāḥ karṇacchedā karṇanāsācchedā aṅgapratyaṅgacchedāstathānyāni vividhāni bahūni duḥkhanyanubhūtāni/
XXdivyav_u:12761: 308.012. ko mayā tenārtho 'nuprāpto yadā āhamātmanaḥ sthāmaṃ ca balaṃ ca
XXdivyav_u:12762: vīryaṃ ca saṃjanayitvā imāṃ striyaṃ svena rudhireṇa māṃsena saṃtarpya imaṃ dārakaṃ parimocayeyam/
XXdivyav_u:12763: 308.014. rūpāvatī pṛcchati--asti te bhagini niveśane śastram? sā strī āha--astīti/
XXdivyav_u:12766: 308.016. tato rūpāvatyā svayameva śastraṃ tīkṣṇaṃ gṛhītvā tau stanau cchittvā tāṃ striyaṃ svakena māṃsarudhireṇa saṃtarpayati sma/
XXdivyav_u:12768: jānīyāh--ayaṃ dārako mayā svakena māṃsarudhireṇa krītaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:12769: 308.018. sāhaṃ tava nikṣepamanuprayacchāmi--mā bhūyo dārakaṃ bhakṣayiṣyasi, yāvadahaṃ niveśanaṃ gatvā tavārthāya bhojanamānayiṣyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:12771: 308.020. atha rūpāvatī strī rudhireṇoddharatā yena svaṃ niveśanaṃ
XXdivyav_u:12773: 308.021. adrākṣīdrūpāvatyāḥ striyāḥ svāmī rūpāvatīm, strīṃ rudhireṇoddharatā pradharatā dūrata eva agacchantīm/
XXdivyav_u:12774: 308.022. dṛṣṭvā ca punā rūpāvatīmetadavocat--kenedamevamrūpaṃ rūpāvati viprakāraṃ kṛtam? sautāṃ prakṛtiṃ vistareṇārocayati sma/
XXdivyav_u:12775: 308.023. ārocayitvā etadavocat--prajñapaya āryaputra tasyā striyā bhaktam/
XXdivyav_u:12778: 308.024. yenāryaduhitaḥ satyena satyavacanena ayamevamrūpa āścaryādbhuto dharmo na kadācid dṛṣṭo vā śruto vā, tena satyena satyavacanena ubhau tava stanau yathāpaurāṇau prādurbhavetām/
XXdivyav_u:12779: 308.026. sahakṛtenāsminnevamrūpe satyavacane tasyā asminneva kṣaṇe ubhau
XXdivyav_u:12783: 308.029. mā haiva sā rūpāvatī strī ataḥ śakrabhavanāccyāvayet/
XXdivyav_u:12785: 308.030. atha śakro devendra udārabrāhmaṇarūpamātmānamabhinirmāya sauvarṇadaṇḍakamaṇḍalumādāya suvarṇadaṇḍena maṇivālavyajanena vījyamānastadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃmiñjitaṃ bāhuṃ prasārayet prasāritaṃ saṃmiñjayet, evameva śakro devānāmindro deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣvantarhita utpalāvatyām <309>rājadhānyāṃ pratyasthāt/

XXdivyav_u:13032: 314.013. atha prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā pānīyaghaṭamādāya yena caṇḍālagṛhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya pānīyaghaṭamekānte nikṣipya svāṃ
XXdivyav_u:13033: jananīmidamavocat--yatkhalu evamamba jānīyāh--ānando nāma śramaṇo mahāśramaṇagautamasya śrāvaka upasthāyakaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:13035: 314.016. śakṣyasi tamamba ānayitum? sā tāmavocat--śaktāhaṃ putri ānandamānayituṃ sthāpayitvā yo mṛtaḥ syādyo vā vītarāgaḥ/

XXdivyav_u:13053: 314.028. vismayaṃ mahārājasya samabhivardhayituṃ devebhyo manuṣyebhyo gandharvebhyaḥ śikhigrahā devā viśikhigrahā devā ānandasyāgamanāya
XXdivyav_u:13056: 315.001. sa vihārānniṣkramya yena caṇḍālagṛhaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmati sma/
XXdivyav_u:13058: 315.002. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prakṛtiṃ duhitaramidamavocat--ayamasau putri śramaṇa ānanda āgacchati/
XXdivyav_u:13060: 315.004. atha prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā hṛṣṭatuṣṭā pramuditamanā āyuṣmata ānandasya śayyāṃ prajñapayati sma//
XXdivyav_u:13071: 315.011. ītayo yatra śāmyanti bhayāni calitāni ca//1//

XXdivyav_u:13083: 315.020. ye putri mantrāḥ sarvalokasya prabhavanti, tān mantrāñ śramaṇo

XXdivyav_u:13102: 316.001. <316>yaḥ kaścidānanda ṣaḍakṣaryā vidyayā paritrāṇaṃ svastyayanaṃ kuryāt, sa yadi vadhārho bhavet, daṇḍena mucyate, daṇḍārhaḥ prahāreṇa,
XXdivyav_u:13103: prahārārhaḥ, paribhāṣaṇayā, paribhāṣaṇārho romaharṣaṇena, romaharṣaṇārhaḥ punareva mucyate/
XXdivyav_u:13104: 316.003. nāhamānanda taṃ samanupaśyāmi sadevaloke samāraloke sabrahmaloke
XXdivyav_u:13105: saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣikāyāṃ sāsurāyām yastvanayā ṣaḍkṣaryā vidyayā rakṣāyāṃ kṛtāyāṃ rakṣāsūtre bāhau baddhe svastyayane kṛte abhibhavituṃ śaknoti varjayitvā paurāṇaṃ karmavipākam//
XXdivyav_u:13106: 316.007. atha prakṛtirmāraṅgadārikā tasyā eva rātryā atyayāt śiraḥsnātā anāhatadūṣyaprāvṛtā muktāmālyābharaṇā yena śrāvastī nagarī tenopasaṃkramya nagaradvāre kapāṭamūle
XXdivyav_u:13108: 316.009. dadarśāyuṣmānānandaḥ prakṛtiṃ mātaṅgadārikāṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhām/
XXdivyav_u:13109: 316.010. dṛṣṭvā ca punarjehrīyamāṇarūpo 'pragalbhāyamānarūpo duḥkhī durmanāḥ śīghraṃ śīghraṃ śrāvastyā vinirgamya yena jetavanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:13111: 316.012. ekāntasthita āyucmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--iyaṃ me bhagavan prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā
XXdivyav_u:13113: 316.014. yadyadeva kulaṃ pinṇḍāya praviśāmi, tasya tasyaiva dvāre
XXdivyav_u:13115: 316.015. trāhi me bhagavan, trāhi me sugata/
XXdivyav_u:13116: 316.015. evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamidamavocat--kiṃ te prakṛte mātaṅgadārike ānandena bhikṣuṇā? prakṛtirāha--svāminaṃ bhadanta
XXdivyav_u:13121: 316.019. atha prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato 'ntikāt
XXdivyav_u:13124: 316.021. upasaṃkramya mātāpitroḥ pādāñ śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt/
XXdivyav_u:13125: 316.021. ekāntasthitā svakau mātāpitarāvidamavocat--saṃmukhaṃ me amba tāta
XXdivyav_u:13127: 316.023. atha prakṛtermātaṅgadārikāyā mātāpitarau prakṛtimādāyā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntau/
XXdivyav_u:13128: 316.024. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt/
XXdivyav_u:13131: mātāpitarāvidamavocat--anujñātā yuvābhyāṃ prakṛtirmātaṅgadārikā ānandāyeti? tāvāhatuh--anujñātā bhagavan, anujñātā sugata/
XXdivyav_u:13132: 316.028. tena hi yūyaṃ prakṛtimapahāya gacchata svagṛham/
XXdivyav_u:13133: 316.028. atha prakṛtermātaṅgadārikāyā mātāpitarau bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā
XXdivyav_u:13135: 316.031. atha prakṛtermātaṅgadārikāyā mātāpitarāvaciraprakrāntau viditvā bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅgadārikāmidamavocat--arthikāsi prakṛte ānandena bhikṣūṇā? prakṛtirāha--arthikāsmi bhagavan, <317>arthikāsmi sugata/
XXdivyav_u:13136: 317.001. tena hi prakṛte ya ānandasya veṣaḥ, sa tvayā dhārayitavyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:13138: 317.002. pravrajayatu māṃ sugata, pravrajayatu māṃ bhagavān/
XXdivyav_u:13142: 317.004. atha bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅgadārikāmehibhikṣuṇīvādena pravrājayitvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma, samādāpayati sma,
XXdivyav_u:13144: 317.006. yeyaṃ kathā dīrgharātraṃ saṃsārasamāpannānāṃ pratikūlā śravaṇīyā,
XXdivyav_u:13145: tadyathā--dānakathā śīlakathā svargakathā kāmeṣvādīnavaṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ bhayaṃ saṃkleśavyavadānam, bodhipakṣāṃstān dharmān bhagavān prakṛtyai bhikṣuṇyai saṃprakāśayati sma/
XXdivyav_u:13146: 317.008. atha prakṛtirbhikṣuṇī bhagavatā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśitā
XXdivyav_u:13147: samādāpitā samuttejitā saṃpraharṣitā hṛṣṭacittā kalyāṇacittāa muditacittā vinīvaraṇacittā ṛjucittākhilacittā bhavyā dharmadeśitamājñātum/
XXdivyav_u:13148: 317.010. yadā ca bhagavāñ jñātaḥ prakṛtiṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ hṛṣṭacittāṃ kalyāṇacittāṃ muditacittāṃ vinīvaraṇacittāṃ bhavyāṃ pratibalāṃ
XXdivyav_u:13149: sāmutkarṣikīṃ dharmadeśanāmājñātum, tadā yeyaṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ caturāyasatyaprativedhikī dhrmadeśanā, yaduta duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho
XXdivyav_u:13150: mārgaḥ, tāṃ bhagavān prakṛterbhikṣuṇyā vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma/
XXdivyav_u:13153: 317.015. tadyathā vastramapagatakālakaṃ rajanopagataṃ raṅgodake prakṣiptaṃ samyageva raṅgaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt, evameva prakṛtirbhikṣuṇī tasminnevāsane
XXdivyav_u:13154: niṣaṇṇā caturāyasatyāni abhisamayati sma, tadyathā--duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ mārgam//
XXdivyav_u:13155: 317.018. atha praṛtirbhikṣuṇī dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā akopyadharmā paryavasitadharmā
XXdivyav_u:13156: tīrṇakāṅkṣāvicikitsā vigatakathaṃkathā vaiśāradyaprāptā aparapratyayā ananyaneyā śāstuḥ śāsane anudharmacāriṇī ājāneyamānā dharmeṣu bhagavataḥ pādayoḥ śirasā nipatya bhagavantamidamavocat--atyayo me bhagvan, atyayo me sugata/
XXdivyav_u:13157: 317.021. yathā bālā yathā mūḍhā yathā avyaktā yathā akuśalā duṣṭrajñajātīyā, yāhamānandaṃ bhikṣuṃ svāmivādena samudācārṣam/
XXdivyav_u:13162: 317.024. atastasyā mama bhagavann atyayamatyayato jānātu pratigṛhṇātu

XXdivyav_u:13165: 317.026. yathā bālā yathā mūḍhā yathā avyaktā yathā akuśalā duṣprajñajātīyā tvamānandaṃ bhikṣuṃ svāmivādena samudācarasīti/
XXdivyav_u:13166: 317.027. yataśca tvaṃ prakṛte atyayaṃ jānāsi, atyayaṃ paśyasi, āyatyāṃ ca saṃvaramāpadyase, ahamapi te 'tyayamatyayato gṛhṇāmi/
XXdivyav_u:13167: 317.028. vṛddhireva te prakṛte pratikāṅkṣitavyā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām, na
XXdivyav_u:13169: 317.029. atha prakṛtirbhikṣuṇī bhagavatābhinanditānuśiṣṭā ekā vyapakṛṣṭā apramattā ātāpinī smṛtimatī saṃprajānā prahitāni viviktāni viharati sma/
XXdivyav_u:13170: 317.031. yadarthaṃ kuladuhitaraḥ keśānavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanāgārikāṃ pravrajanti,
XXdivyav_u:13171: tadanuttarabrahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayamabhijñāya sākṣākṛtyopasampadya<318> pravedayate sma--kṣīṇā me jātiḥ, uṣitaṃ
XXdivyav_u:13173: 318.002. aśrauṣuḥ śrāvasteyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayah--bhagavatā kila caṇḍāladārikā pravrājiteti/
XXdivyav_u:13174: 318.004. śrutvā ca punaravadhyāyanti--kathaṃ hi nāma caṇḍāladārikā
XXdivyav_u:13175: bhikṣūṇāṃ samyakcaryāṃ cariṣyati? bhikṣuṇīnāmupāsakānāmupāsikānāṃ samyakcaryāṃ cariṣyati? kathaṃ hi nāma caṇḍāladārikā brahmakṣatriyagṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu pravekṣyati?
XXdivyav_u:13178: 318.008. śrutvā ca punaravadhyāyati--kathaṃ hi nāma caṇḍāladārikā
XXdivyav_u:13179: bhikṣūṇāṃ samyakcaryāṃ cariṣyati? bhikṣuṇīnāmupāsakānāmupādikānāṃ samyakcaryāṃ cariṣyati? kathaṃ brāhmaṇakṣatriyagṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu pravekṣyati? vimṛśya ca bhadraṃ yānaṃ yojayitvā bhadraṃ yānamabhiruhya saṃbahulaiśca śrāvasteyairbrāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ śrāvastyā niryāti sma/
XXdivyav_u:13181: 318.012. tasya khalu yāvatī yānasya bhūmiḥ, tāvadyānena gatvāṃ sa
XXdivyav_u:13185: 318.014. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:13187: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:13188: 318.016. apyaikatyā bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃrañjanīṃ saṃmodinīṃ
XXdivyav_u:13190: 318.017. apyaikatyā bhagavataḥ purataḥ svakasvakāni mātāpaitṛkāṇi nāmagotrāṇi nāmagotrāṇi anuśrāvya ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:13191: 318.018. apyaikatyā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:13193: 318.020. atha bhagavān rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamārabhya teṣāṃ ca saṃbahulānāṃ śrāvasteyakānāṃ brāhmaṇakṣatriyagṛhapatīnāṃ cetasā cittamājñāya prakṛterbhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrvanivāsamārabhya bhikṣūnāmantrayate
XXdivyav_u:13194: sma--icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavastathāgatasya saṃmukhaṃ prakṛterbhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrvanivāsamārabhya dharmakathāṃ śrotum? bhikṣavo bhagavantamāhuh--etasya
XXdivyav_u:13195: bhagavan kālaḥ, etasya sugata samayaḥ, yadbhagavān prakṛterbhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrvanivāsamārabhya dharmakathāṃ kathayet, yadbhagavataḥ śrutvā bhikṣavo
XXdivyav_u:13197: 318.025. bhagavānāha--tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca
XXdivyav_u:13199: 318.025. evaṃ sādhu bhagavanniti te bhikṣavo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣuḥ/
XXdivyav_u:13201: 318.027. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani gaṅgātaṭe atimuktakadalīpāṭalakāmalakīvanagahanapradeśe tatra triśaṅkur nāma mātaṅgarājāḥ prativasati sma saṃbahulaiśca mātaṅgasahasraiḥ sārdham/
XXdivyav_u:13202: 318.028. sa punaribhikṣavastriśaṅkurmātaṅgarājaḥ pūrvajanmādhītān vedān smanusmarati sma sāṅgopāṅgān sarahasyān sanighaṇṭakaiṭabhān
XXdivyav_u:13204: vaiyākaraṇo lokāyate yajñamantre mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇe niṣṇāto niṣkāṅkṣaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:13205: 318.031. bhāṣyaṃ ca yathādharmaṃ vedavratapadānyanuśrutaṃ ca bhāṣate sma/
XXdivyav_u:13209: 319.002. atha triśaṅkurmātaṅgarājaḥ śārdūlakarṇaṃ kumāraṃ pūrvajanmādhītān vedānadhyāpayati sma yaduta sāṅgopāṅgān sarahasyān sanighaṇṭakaiṭabhān
XXdivyav_u:13210: sākṣaraprabhedānitihāsapañcamānm, anyāni ca śāstrāṇi, bhāṣyaṃ ca yathādharmaṃ vedavratapadāni//
XXdivyav_u:13211: 319.005. atha triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasyaitadabhavat--ayaṃ mama putraḥ śārdūlakarṇo nāma kumārah upeto rūpataśca kulataśca śīlataśca guṇataśca,
XXdivyav_u:13212: sarvaguṇopetp^bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ, paramayā ca varṇapuṣkalatayā
XXdivyav_u:13216: 319.008. tatkuto nvahaṃ śārdūlakarṇasya putrasya śīlavatīṃ guṇavatīṃ
XXdivyav_u:13218: 319.010. tasmin khalu samaye puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇa utkūṭaṃ nāma droṇamukhaṃ paribhuṅkte sma sasaptotsadaṃ stṛṇakāṣṭhodakaṃ dhānyasahagataṃ
XXdivyav_u:13220: 319.011. puṣkarasārī punarbrāhmaṇa upeto mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ saṃśuddho
XXdivyav_u:13221: gṛhiṇyāmanā {kule jātyāṃ vā} kṣipto jātivādena gotravādena
XXdivyav_u:13227: 319.016. puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā bhūtā/
XXdivyav_u:13228: 319.016. upetā rūpataśca kulataśca śīlataśca guṇataśca, sarvaguṇopetā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā paramayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā śīlavatī guṇavatī//
XXdivyav_u:13232: 319.020. upeto mātṛtaḥ pitṛto yāvat traivedike pravacane vistareṇa/
XXdivyav_u:13233: 319.021. sa cotkūṭaṃ droṇamukhaṃ paribhuṅkte sasaptotsadaṃ satṛṇakāṣṭhodakaṃ dhānyabhogaiḥ sahagataṃ rājñāgnidattena brahmadeyaṃ dattam/
XXdivyav_u:13234: 319.022. tasya puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā upetā rūpataśca kulataśca śīlataśca srvaguṇopetā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā paramayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā śīlavatī guṇavatī putrasya me śārdūlakarṇasya pratirūpā patnī bhaviṣyatīti/
XXdivyav_u:13235: 319.025. atha triśaṅkurmātaṅgarāja etamevārthaṃ bahulaṃ rātrau cintayitvā
XXdivyav_u:13236: vitarkya tasyā eva rātryā atyayāt pratyūṣakālasamaye srvaśvetaṃ vaḍavārathamabhiruhya mahatā śvapākagaṇena amātyagaṇena parivṛtaścaṇḍālanagarānniṣkramyottareṇa prāgacchadyenotkūṭaṃ droṇamukham/
XXdivyav_u:13237: 319.027. atha triśaṅkurmātaṅgarāja utkūṭasyottarapūrveṇa sumanaskaṃ nāmodyānaṃ nānāvṛkṣasaṃchannaṃ nānāvṛkṣakusumitaṃ nānādvijanikūjitaṃ nandanamiva devānāṃ tadupasaṃkrāntaḥ/
