XXdivyav_u:13916: 337.003. parivṛto madhyāhne tripuruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ rohito nāma muhūrto
XXdivyav_u:13923: 337.006. avataramāṇa āditye ṣaṇṇavatipauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ parabhayo nāma
XXdivyav_u:13926: 337.008. atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin rātryā muhūrtāni vyākhyāsyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:13943: 337.013. iti bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn imāni triṃśanmuhūrtāni yairahorātraṃ
XXdivyav_u:13957: 337.019. caturojāḥ śvetaḥ samṛddhaḥ śarapatho 'tisamṛddha udgataḥ sumukho vajrako rohito balo vijayaḥ sarvaraso vasuḥ sundaraḥ parabhayaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:13958: 337.020. raudrastārāvacaraḥ samyamaḥ sāmpraiyako 'nanto gardabho rākṣaso 'vayavo brahmā ditirarko vidhamano āgneya ātapāgnirabhijit/
XXdivyav_u:13973: 337.029. yadā caivaṃ śīryeta tat toyaṃ ghaṭasya tadaikā nāḍikā/
XXdivyav_u:13974: 337.029. etena nāḍikāpramāṇena vibhakte dve nāḍike eko muhūrtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:13975: 337.030. etena bho brāhmaṇa triṃśanṃhūrtāḥ, yai rātridivasā anumīyanta
XXdivyav_u:13983: 338.003. etena punarakṣinimeṣeṇa ṣoḍaśakoṭyo 'ṣṭapañcāśañca śatasahasrāṇi aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi sa evaṃ māpitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:13999: 338.010. paramāṇūnāṃ koṭiśatasahasrāṇi caturviṃśatiścaikonatriṃśatkoṭisahasrāṇi dvādaśa ca śatasahasrāṇi/
XXdivyav_u:14006: 338.014. dve koṭī pañcaviṃśatiśca sahasrāṇi pañcaśatānyaṣṭau ca
XXdivyav_u:14012: 338.017. paramāṇūnāmaṣṭakoṭayaḥ saptacatvāriṃśacca śatasahasrāṇi sapta ca sahasrāṇi dve śate aśītiśca paramāṇavaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:14018: 338.020. dve koṭiśate tisraśca koṭaya ekonatriṃśacca śatasahasrāṇi
XXdivyav_u:14019: catuḥsaptatisahasrāṇi sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiśca paramāṇavaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:14025: 338.024. koṭiśatamaṣṭapañcāśacca koṭayo dviraśītiśca śatāshasrāṇi ekaṣaṣṭiśca sahasrāṇi pañcaśatāni triṃśacca paramāṇavaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:14028: 338.027. atha khalu bho brāhmaṇa nakṣatravyākaraṇaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:14038: 339.001. maghāyāṃ jāto matimān bhavati, mahātmā ca/
XXdivyav_u:14043: 339.004. svātyāṃ jāto gaṇako bhavati, gaṇakamahāmātro vā/
XXdivyav_u:14047: 339.006. mūle jātaḥ putravān bhavati, yaśasvī ca/
XXdivyav_u:14061: 339.012. atha bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatranirdeśaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:14064: 339.014. kṛttikāsu niviṣṭaṃ vai nagaraṃ jvalati śriyā/
XXdivyav_u:14066: 339.016. rohiṇyāṃ tu niviṣṭaṃ vai nagaraṃ tad vinirdiśet/
XXdivyav_u:14073: 339.023. punarvasau niviṣḍe tu nagaraṃ dīpyate śriyā/
XXdivyav_u:14075: 339.025. śrīmatpuṣye niviṣṭe tu prajā duṣṭā prasīdati/
XXdivyav_u:14081: 339.031. maghāyāṃ ca niviṣṭe tu vidyāvanto mahādhanāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:14085: 340.003. uttarāyāṃ tu phalgunyāṃ dhānyāni ca dhanāni ca/
XXdivyav_u:14086: 340.004. mūrkhā janā strībhir niviṣṭe nagare bhavet//102//
XXdivyav_u:14087: 340.005. haste ca viniviṣṭe tu vidyāvanto mahādhanāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:14088: 340.006. parasparaṃ ca rucitaṃ śayanaṃ nagare bhavet//103//
XXdivyav_u:14089: 340.007. citrāyāṃ ca niviṣṭe tu strījitāḥ sarvamānavāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:14092: 340.010. lubdhāḥ krūrāśca mūrkhāśca prabhūtā nagare bhavet//105//
XXdivyav_u:14093: 340.011. viśākhāyāṃ niviṣṭaṃ tu nagaraṃ jvalati śriyā/
XXdivyav_u:14105: 340.023. abhijiti niviṣṭe tu nagare tatra moditāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:14116: 341.004. pūrṇaṃ ca dhanadhānyābhyāṃ ratnāḍhyaṃ ca vinirdiśet//117//
XXdivyav_u:14117: 341.005. pure niviṣṭe revatyāṃ sundarī janatā bhavet/
XXdivyav_u:14123: 341.011. purāṇi rāṣṭrāṇi tathā gṛhāṇi nakṣatrayogaṃ prasamīkṣya vidvān/
XXdivyav_u:14124: 341.013. iṣṭe praśaste ca niveśayettu pūrve ca janme 'dhigataṃ
XXdivyav_u:14126: 341.016. atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ
XXdivyav_u:14158: 341.028. ayaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇāṃ sthānanirdeśavyākaraṇo nāmādhyāyaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:14162: 342.001. <342>kṛttikāsu grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14168: 342.005. rohiṇyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14172: 342.006. eṣa ca varṣārātraḥ sāroparodhaḥ sasyaṃ ca saṃpādayati/
XXdivyav_u:14177: 342.009. mṛgaśīrṣe grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse devaḥ pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14185: 342.012. ārdrāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14192: 342.014. trayaścātra rogāḥ prabalā bhavanti--jvaraḥ śvāso galagrahaśca/
XXdivyav_u:14195: 342.016. punarvasau grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14202: 342.019. puṣye grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14210: 342.021. tatra trayo rogāśca bhavanti--gāṇḍāḥ piṭakāḥ pāmāni ca/
XXdivyav_u:14212: 342.023. āśleṣāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14221: 342.027. maghāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
XXdivyav_u:14226: 342.030. pūrvaphalgunyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14229: 342.031. tacca sasyaṃ janayitvā paracakrapīḍitā manuṣyā na
XXdivyav_u:14231: 342.032. paśūnāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ cātra garbhāḥ sukhino bhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:14233: 343.001. <343>uttaraphalgunyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, aśītyāḍakāni
XXdivyav_u:14239: 343.005. haste grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse devaḥ pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14245: 343.008. citrāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14251: 343.011. svātyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14256: 343.013. viśākhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14263: 343.016. anurādhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14265: 343.017. jyeṣṭhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse cātra dṛḍāni bhavanti/
XXdivyav_u:14267: 343.018. jyeṣṭhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14277: 343.022. mūle grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14286: 343.026. pūrvasyāmāṣāḍhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ
XXdivyav_u:14293: 343.029. uttarasyāmāṣāḍhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ
XXdivyav_u:14300: 343.031. trayaścātra rogāḥ prabalā bhavanti--gaṇḍaḥ kacchaḥ kaṇṭharoga iti/
XXdivyav_u:14302: 344.001. <344>abhijiti grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14308: 344.004. śravaṇe tu grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14316: 344.007. dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14326: 344.011. śatabhiṣāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14332: 344.013. manuṣyā dārakadārikāśca skandhe kṛtvā deśāntaraṃ gacchanti/
XXdivyav_u:14334: 344.015. pūrvasyāṃ bhādrapadāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ
XXdivyav_u:14339: 344.017. dvau cātra mahāvyādhī bhavatah--prathamaṃ pittatāpajvaro bhavati,
XXdivyav_u:14343: 344.020. uttarasyāṃ bhādrapadāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime yadyatra devaḥ
XXdivyav_u:14352: 344.024. etāśca varṣāḥ puṣpāṇi phalāni ca saṃpādayanti/
XXdivyav_u:14354: 344.025. revatyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devo pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14364: 344.030. aśvinyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
XXdivyav_u:14366: 344.031. yacca madhye varṣā bhavati, tatra niṃnāni kṛṣikartavyāni/
XXdivyav_u:14382: 345.006. amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ rāhugrahe
XXdivyav_u:14384: 345.007. kṛttikāsu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin yadi candragraho bhavati,
XXdivyav_u:14386: 345.008. yadi rohiṇyāṃ candragraho bhavati, prajānāmupapīḍā bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:14387: 345.008. yadi mṛgaśirasi candragraho bhavati, videhānāṃ janapadānāmupapīḍā bhavati rājopasevakānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:14389: 345.010. āśleṣāyām yadi candragraho bhavati, nāgānāṃ haimavatānāṃ ca pīḍā
XXdivyav_u:14391: 345.011. yadi madhāsu candragraho bhavati, gauḍikānāmupapīḍā bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:14392: 345.011. yadi pūrvaphalgunyāṃ somo gṛhyate, caurāṇāmupapīḍā bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:14394: 345.013. yadi hasteṣu somo gṛhyate, saurāṣṭrikāṇāmupapīḍā bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:14395: 345.013. yadi citrāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, pakṣiṇāṃ dvipadānāṃ ca pīḍā bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:14396: 345.014. yadi svātyāṃ somo gṛhyate, sarveṣāṃ pravrajyāsamāpannānāmupapīḍā bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:14397: 345.015. yadi viśākhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, audakānāṃ sattvānāmupapīḍā bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:14398: 345.016. yadyanurādhāsu somo gṛhyate, vaṇijānāmupapīḍā bhavati śākaṭikānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:14400: 345.017. yadi jyeṣṭhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, dauvālikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:14401: 345.017. yadi mūle somo gṛhyate, adhvagānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:14402: 345.018. yadi pūrvāṣāḍhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, avantīnāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:14403: 345.019. yadyuttarāṣāḍhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, kāmbojakānāṃ pīḍā bhavati
XXdivyav_u:14405: 345.019. yadyabhijiti somo gṛhyate, dakṣiṇāpathikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati
XXdivyav_u:14407: 345.020. yadi śravaṇeṣu somo gṛhyate, caurāṇāṃ ghātakānāṃ copapīḍā
XXdivyav_u:14409: 345.021. yadi dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, kurupāñcālānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:14410: 345.022. yadi śatabhiṣāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, maulikānāmātharvaṇikānāṃ ca pīḍā
XXdivyav_u:14412: 345.023. yadi pūrvabhādrapadāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, gāndhikānām yavanakāmbojakānāṃ ca pīḍā bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:14413: 345.024. yadyuttarabhādrapadāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, gandharvāṇāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:14414: 345.024. yadi revatyāṃ somo gṛhyate, nāvikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:14415: 345.025. yadyaśvinyāṃ somo gṛhyate, aśvavaṇijānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:14416: 345.025. yadi bharaṇyāṃ somo gṛhyate, bharukacchānāṃ pīḍā bhavati//
XXdivyav_u:14417: 345.027. evaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin yasminnakṣatre candragraho bhavati tasya tasya deśasya pīḍā
XXdivyav_u:14430: 346.008. navaṃ ca cchādayedvastraṃ krayaṇaṃ nātra kārayet//126//
XXdivyav_u:14434: 346.012. taijasāni ca bhāṇḍāni kārayecca krīṇīta ca//128//
XXdivyav_u:14435: 346.013. āyuṣyaṃ ca śiraḥsnānaṃ strīṇāṃ viṣkambhaṇāni ca/
XXdivyav_u:14436: 346.014. pravarṣaṇaṃ ced devasya nātra vairaṃ praśāmyati//129//
XXdivyav_u:14438: 346.016. āyuṣmāṃśca yaśasvī ca yajñaśīlo 'tra jāyate//130// kṛttikāsu//
XXdivyav_u:14443: 346.021. ṛṇaṃ na dadyāttatraiva vairamatra tu vardhate/
XXdivyav_u:14445: 346.023. pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya janma cātra praśasyate/
XXdivyav_u:14447: 346.025. āyuṣmān paśumān dhanyo mahābhogo 'tra jāyate//134// rohiṇyām//
XXdivyav_u:14448: 346.026. saumyaṃ mṛgaśiro vidyād ṛju tisraśca tārakāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:14449: 346.027. mṛdūni yāni karmāṇi tāni sarvāṇi kārayet/
XXdivyav_u:14450: 346.028. yāni karmāṇi rohiṇyāṃ tāni sarvāṇi kārayet//135//
XXdivyav_u:14451: 346.029. sakṣīrān vāpayed vṛkṣān bījāni kṣīravanti ca/
XXdivyav_u:14457: 347.003. pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya suvṛṣṭiṃ cātra nirdiśet/
XXdivyav_u:14458: 347.004. svapnaśīlastathā trāsī medhāvī sa ca jāyate//139// mṛgaśirasi//
XXdivyav_u:14459: 347.005. ārdrāyāṃ mṛgayedarthān bhadraṃ karma ca kārayet/
XXdivyav_u:14462: 347.008. ūheta (uhayet) prathamāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ vikrīṇīyācca nātra gām/
XXdivyav_u:14472: 347.018. pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya janma cātra praśasyate//145//
XXdivyav_u:14480: 347.026. purohitaṃ ca kurvīta dhvajāgraṃ ca prakārayet//149//
XXdivyav_u:14482: 347.028. na ca rogo na cauraśca kṣemaṃ cātra sadā bhavet//150//
XXdivyav_u:14485: 347.031. āyuṣmāṃśca yaśasvī ca mahābhogaḥ prajāyate//151// puṣye//
XXdivyav_u:14498: 348.013. saṃgrāmaṃ jīyate tatra yadi pūrvaṃ pravartate/
XXdivyav_u:14499: 348.014. dāruṇāni ca karmāṇi tāni vidvān vivarjayet//157// maghāsu//
XXdivyav_u:14504: 348.020. bhāgam ye copajīvanti teṣāṃ karma prayojayet//160//
XXdivyav_u:14507: 348.023. naṣṭaṃ viddhaṃ kṛtaṃ cāpi na tadastīti nirdiśet//161//
XXdivyav_u:14511: 348.026. athātra naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā sarvamastīti nirdiśet/
XXdivyav_u:14517: 348.031. cauryaṃ ca sidhyate tatra tacca vidvān vivarjayet//165//
XXdivyav_u:14522: 349.005. rājānaṃ bhūṣitaṃ paśyet senāvyūhaṃ ca darśayet//167//
XXdivyav_u:14523: 349.006. hiraṇyaṃ rajataṃ dravyaṃ nagarāṇi ca māpayet/
XXdivyav_u:14525: 349.008. gaṇakānāṃ ca vidyāṃ ca vādyaṃ nartanagāyanam/
XXdivyav_u:14556: 350.008. kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca rājñāṃ ca sarvakarmāṇi kārayet//181//
XXdivyav_u:14558: 350.010. āyuṣmāṃśca yaśasvī ca vidvatsu ca kutūhalī//182//
XXdivyav_u:14566: 350.018. ṛṇaṃ vai yatpurāṇaṃ syādartho vāsyāgrataḥ sthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:14569: 350.021. nadīṣu snapanaṃ caiva mūle sarvān prayojayet//187//
XXdivyav_u:14573: 350.025. athātra naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā naitadastīti nirdiśet/
XXdivyav_u:14575: 350.027. āṣāḍhāyāṃ ca pūrvasyāṃ saritaśca sarāṃsi ca/
XXdivyav_u:14577: 350.029. utpādyāni ca puṣpāṇi tathā mūlaphalāni ca/
XXdivyav_u:14579: 350.031. yāni cogrāṇi karmāṇi sidhyantyatra tu tāni ca//191//
XXdivyav_u:14586: 351.007. śreṇībandhaṃ ca rājā tu samayaṃ cātra kārayet//194//
XXdivyav_u:14592: 351.012. abhijiti na kurvīta brahmadevasya hyarcanam//197// abhijiti//
XXdivyav_u:14593: 351.013. śravaṇe na ca kurvīta sarvāḥ saṃgrāmikāḥ kriyāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:14594: 351.014. gītaśikṣādhyayanaṃ ca na cireṇa hi sidhyati//198//
XXdivyav_u:14600: 351.020. naṣṭaṃ ca labhyate tatra śravaṇasthe niśākare//201// śravaṇe//
XXdivyav_u:14605: 351.025. medhāvī ca yaśasvī ca mahābhogī mahādhanaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:14607: 351.027. naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ praviddhaṃ vā kleśenaivātra labhyate/
XXdivyav_u:14615: 352.004. ādeyaṃ ca tadādadyād vyayaṃ cātra na kārayet//208//
XXdivyav_u:14617: 352.006. bhiṣakkarma ca kurvīt bhaiṣajyāni ca saṃharet//209//
XXdivyav_u:14618: 352.007. nidhiṃ vā khānayettatra nidadhyādapi vā nidhim/
XXdivyav_u:14619: 352.008. dhanaṃ cātra prayuñjīt bhiṣakkarma ca śikṣayet//210//
XXdivyav_u:14625: 352.014. dīrghaśrotro mahābhogo jñātīnāṃ ca sadā priyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:14627: 352.016. pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya caṇḍāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ samādiśet//213//
XXdivyav_u:14629: 352.017. uttarasyāṃ tu kurvīt āyuṣyaṃ puṣṭikarma ca/
XXdivyav_u:14630: 352.018. na ca dakṣiṇato gacchetpuraṃ cātra pradāpayet//214//

XXdivyav_u:16231: 398.011. puruṣasya pathi vrajato vāmato vāśati, mārgaṃ nivedayati/
XXdivyav_u:16234: 398.012. pūrveṇottareṇāpi śivā vāśati, kṣemaṃ tatra nivedayati/
XXdivyav_u:16235: 398.013. dakṣiṇe paścime yadi vāśati, yā bhayaṃ tatra nivedayati/
XXdivyav_u:16236: 398.014. vāmato na praśaṃsanti tathaiva vidiśāsu ca/
XXdivyav_u:16238: 398.016. adharāṃ tu bhayaṃ vakṣye triśaṅkuvacanam yathā//751//
XXdivyav_u:16239: 398.017. madhusvarāṃ śivāṃ jñātvā kāle vele upasthite/
XXdivyav_u:16244: 398.020. yaḥ śivāyā divaso bhavati, sa divaso jñātavyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16268: 399.008. tṛtīya sā lekhā yatra pradeśinyā pravartate/
XXdivyav_u:16278: 399.018. dīrghāyuṣaṃ vijānīyād dīrghalekhā tu yā bhavet/
XXdivyav_u:16282: 399.022. avyakto yavako yatra tatra lagnaṃ vinirdiśet/
XXdivyav_u:16284: 399.024. divasaṃ janma nirdiśed rātrau strīsaṃjñako bhavet/
XXdivyav_u:16285: 399.025. rātriḥ saṃdhyā samākhyātā bhāgairanyair na saṃśayaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16291: 399.031. yasya syād yavakaścāpi cāpo vā svastikastathā/
XXdivyav_u:16292: 399.032. taleṣu yeṣu dṛśyante dhanyante dhanyāste puruṣā hyamī//766//
XXdivyav_u:16298: 400.006. preṣkyante śākhayā pañca haste catvāra eva ca/
XXdivyav_u:16299: 400.007. kṣatriyo vā bhaved bhogī rājabhiścāpi satkṛtaḥ//769//
XXdivyav_u:16300: 400.008. vaiśyo 'tha kṣatriyo vāgmī dhanadhānyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16303: 400.011. viśīlaḥ śīlakuñco vā bahubhir na bahustathā//771//
XXdivyav_u:16304: 400.012. śyāmavarṇātha bhinnā vā sā lekhā duḥkhabhāginī/
XXdivyav_u:16305: 400.013. trilekhā yasya dṛśyante yasya pūrṇāḥ karasthitāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16308: 400.016. taleṣu yasya dṛśyante taṃ vidyāt pṛthivīpatim//773//
XXdivyav_u:16310: 400.019. matsyo nu pānāya yavo dhanāya vedistu yajñāya gavāṃ ca
XXdivyav_u:16311: 400.021. anāmikāparva atikramed yadi kaniṣṭhikā varṣaśataṃ sa jīvati/
XXdivyav_u:16312: 400.023. same tvaśītirvarṣāṇi saptabhiryathā nadīnāṃ bharitāya nirdiśed//775//
XXdivyav_u:16313: 400.025. śarīravarṇaprabhavāṃ tu lekhāṃ savaiśikhāṃ varṇavihīnakāṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:16319: 401.003. dvirapi ca {sa} bhavāntare mahātmā vipuladhanaśriya āha
XXdivyav_u:16320: 401.005. dadati satatamunnatastu pāṇirbhavati cirāya tu dīrghapīnapāṇiḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16328: 401.019. iha hi bahudhano balena yuktaḥ sutanususaṃcitapāṇirekhako
XXdivyav_u:16329: 401.021. dhanamupanayatīha pāṇilekhā kṛtajanitā jalavacca yā sudīrghā/
XXdivyav_u:16333: 401.029. apagataghṛtavarṇapāṇilekho bhavati naro dhanavān balena yuktaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16339: 402.006. atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin vāyasarutaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:16348: 402.010. jayaṃ parājayaṃ caiva lābhālābhaṃ tathaiva ca//787//
XXdivyav_u:16351: 402.013. devāḥ pravadanti śreṣṭhā vāyasānāṃ namo namaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16358: 402.020. asūpaṃ nirdiśed bhojyaṃ guḍamiśraṃ tu gorasam//782//
XXdivyav_u:16360: 402.022. pāyasaṃ sarpiṣā miśraṃ tatra vidyānna saṃśayaḥ//783//
XXdivyav_u:16364: 402.026. vyādhena ca hataṃ māṃsaṃ nivedayati bhojanam//785//
XXdivyav_u:16367: 402.029. śuṣkavṛkṣe niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
XXdivyav_u:16368: 402.030. kalahaṃ sumahat kṛtvā na cārthaṃ tatra sidhyati//787//
XXdivyav_u:16369: 402.031. kṣīrivṛkṣe niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
XXdivyav_u:16370: 402.032. krameṇa yugamātreṇa na cārthaṃ tatra sidhyate//788//
XXdivyav_u:16375: 403.005. pakṣaṃ vidhūyamāno yaḥ paśyan pathasya vāśati/
XXdivyav_u:16377: 403.007. rajjuṃ vā phalakaṃ vāpi yadi karṣati vāyasaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16379: 403.009. gomaye śuṣkakāṣṭhe vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16380: 403.010. kalahaḥ kuvaco vyādhir na cārthaṃ tatra sidhyati//803//
XXdivyav_u:16381: 403.011. tṛṇaṃ vā yadi vā kāṣṭhaṃ darśayecca sadā khagaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16383: 403.013. sārthopari niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
XXdivyav_u:16385: 403.015. yadā pradakṣiṇaṃ trastaṃ vāśanti vividhaṃ khagāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16391: 403.021. vāstumadhye pratisthāne kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
XXdivyav_u:16392: 403.022. vyādhiṃ tatra vijānīyād vāse vā gṛhasvāminām//809//
XXdivyav_u:16393: 403.023. śakaṭasya yathā śabdaṃ viśrabdhaṃ vāśati vāyasaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16396: 403.026. niṣaṇṇo vāśati kākaḥ prasiddhaṃ gamanaṃ dhruvam//811//
XXdivyav_u:16397: 403.027. āsane śayane vāpi sthito vāśati vāyasaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16410: 404.008. kāṣṭhaṃ vā vāyasā yatra gṛhamāropayanti ca/
XXdivyav_u:16412: 404.010. nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitaṃ ca pratisaṃharaṇāni ca/
XXdivyav_u:16413: 404.011. nigṛhṇanti yatra kākā vyādhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet//819//
XXdivyav_u:16414: 404.012. grāmānte bhayamākhyāti kāko vā vāśati dhruvam/
XXdivyav_u:16418: 404.016. yasya śīrṣe niṣīditvā karṇaṃ karṣati vāyasaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16425: 404.023. vakṣo vidhunvan vāyasaḥ sadyo vṛṣṭiṃ vinirdiśet//825//
XXdivyav_u:16428: 404.026. prakāre toraṇāgre vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16429: 404.027. abhīkṣṇaṃ gharṣate tuṇḍaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ tatra nirdiśet//827//
XXdivyav_u:16431: 404.029. vairaṃ ca vigrahaṃ ghoraṃ tatra caiva vinirdiśet//828//
XXdivyav_u:16432: 404.030. grāme vā nagare vāpi kurvate yatra maṇḍalam/
XXdivyav_u:16437: 405.004. varṣati prathame māse paścāddevo na varṣati/
XXdivyav_u:16447: 405.014. yadā tu madhye vṛkṣasya nilayaṃ karoti vāyasī/
XXdivyav_u:16449: 405.016. skandhamūle tu vṛkṣasya yadā sūyati vāyasī/
XXdivyav_u:16451: 405.018. caturaḥ pañca vā potān yadā sūyati vāyasī/
XXdivyav_u:16454: 405.021. atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvāralakṣaṇaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:16460: 405.024. mohendramatha divyaṃ ca māṅgalyaṃ pūrvataḥ smṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:16461: 405.025. dakṣiṇe tu diśo bhāge pūṣā ca pitryameva ca//839//
XXdivyav_u:16465: 405.029. atha vai dhanamitraṃ ca paramaṃ mairameva ca//841//
XXdivyav_u:16473: 406.006. vyāyamato jalaṃ caiva vāstu tasya dhanauṣadhī//845//
XXdivyav_u:16475: 406.008. anāvāsyaṃ ca tat proktam yacca putrakṣayāvaham//846//
XXdivyav_u:16491: 406.024. mahendre pure vā rājyaṃ sūrye sūraprabhāvatā//854//
XXdivyav_u:16494: 406.027. puṣpe tu subhago nityaṃ vitathe 'pyaśubho bhavet/
XXdivyav_u:16495: 406.028. śoke bhūtavikāraḥ syāt śoṣe tasya viṣaṇṇatā//856//
XXdivyav_u:16506: 407.007. asure maraṇaṃ ghoraṃ roge tu bahudoṣatā//861//
XXdivyav_u:16510: 407.011. mahendre muktapuṣpāṇi pāvake ca payo dadhi//863//
XXdivyav_u:16511: 407.012. āditye parideyaṃ tu bhaktaṃ caiva priyaṅgavaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16512: 407.013. antarīkṣe jalaṃ divyaṃ puṣpāṇi jalajāni ca//864//
XXdivyav_u:16513: 407.014. nandā pratipadā jñeyā ṣaṣṭhī trayodaśī jayā/
XXdivyav_u:16514: 407.015. tāsu tāsu dhruvaṃ kuryātprājño hyevaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ//865//
XXdivyav_u:16516: 407.017. atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvādaśarāśikaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:16525: 407.023. dvādaśaiva tu cittāste ye loke pracaranti vai//867//
XXdivyav_u:16526: 407.024. tānahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvena me tataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16528: 407.026. prathamaṃ meṣo nāma syād dvitīyaṃ tu vṛṣaḥ smṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16529: 407.027. tṛtīyaṃ mithunaṃ nāma caturthaṃ cāpi karkaṭaḥ//869//
XXdivyav_u:16530: 407.028. pañcamaṃ cāpi siṃhastu ṣaṣṭhaṃ kanyā iti smṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:16531: 407.029. tulā tu saptamaṃ jñeyā vṛścikastu tathāṣṭamam//870//
XXdivyav_u:16532: 407.030. dhanvī tu navamaṃ jñeyā daśamaṃ makaraḥ smṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16536: 408.003. cintyate pañcame putraḥ ṣaṣṭhe maṇḍale śatrutā/
XXdivyav_u:16538: 408.005. navame cintyate dharmo daśame karmajaṃ phalam/
XXdivyav_u:16540: 408.007. ete dvādaśa cittāstu yathā dṛṣṭā maharṣibhiḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16542: 408.009. āgatya pṛcchate kaścit prathamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
XXdivyav_u:16545: 408.012. yadi brūyāttadā tasya ātmārthaṃ cintitaṃ bhavet//877//
XXdivyav_u:16546: 408.013. kāñcanaṃ rajataṃ tāmraṃ lohaṃ caiva bhṛśaṃ bhavet/
XXdivyav_u:16551: 408.018. grīvāṃ vā parimārjayed galaṃ ca cibukaṃ punaḥ//880//
XXdivyav_u:16552: 408.019. yadi śabdaśca śrūyeta dṛṣṭā gāvastathaiva ca/
XXdivyav_u:16553: 408.020. īdṛśaṃ ca dṛṣṭvotpātaṃ gośabdaṃ tatra nirdiśet/
XXdivyav_u:16554: 408.021. atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdastādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//881//
XXdivyav_u:16557: 408.024. atha śabdo bhavettatra śrūyantāṃ tādṛśāstu te/
XXdivyav_u:16560: 408.027. atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdastādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//884//
XXdivyav_u:16562: 408.029. kacchapaṃ spṛśate yastu kalahaṃ tatra nirdiśet/
XXdivyav_u:16564: 408.031. ākaṭṭā kaṭṭeti śabdā bhavanti ca nirantaram/
XXdivyav_u:16567: 409.002. hṛdayaṃ spṛśate yastu apatyaṃ tatra cintitam//887//
XXdivyav_u:16569: 409.004. śastradravyaṃ ca yattasya brāhmaṇānāṃ kule sthitam//888//
XXdivyav_u:16570: 409.005. atha śabdo bhavettatra yaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu maharṣibhiḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16573: 409.008. puruṣaḥ kaścidāgatya ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
XXdivyav_u:16574: 409.009. spṛśate cāpi pārśvāni gātracintā tu cintitā//890//
XXdivyav_u:16576: 409.011. atha vā tatra ye śabdāḥ śrotavyāste na saṃśayaḥ//891//
XXdivyav_u:16579: 409.014. atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdastādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//892//
XXdivyav_u:16581: 409.016. hastena mardayed hastaṃ tathā nāḍīṃ ca mardayet//893//
XXdivyav_u:16584: 409.019. sthitaṃ niviṣṭaṃ vartaṃ ca kṛtaṃ hastagataṃ tathā/
XXdivyav_u:16586: 409.021. yādṛśo vā śrutaḥ śabdastādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//895//
XXdivyav_u:16588: 409.023. udaraṃ caiva phicakaṃ dve ime parimārjayet//896//
XXdivyav_u:16589: 409.024. nidhanaṃ dṛśyate tasya maraṇaṃ cāpi dṛśyate/
XXdivyav_u:16591: 409.026. tatreme śabdāḥ śrotavyā mṛta eva bhaviṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:16594: 409.029. ūruṃ ca spṛśate bhūyo dharmacintā ca cintitā//899//
XXdivyav_u:16595: 409.030. tatra śabdāśca śrotavyā bhavanti hi na saṃśayaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16600: 410.003. spṛśate jānunī caiva karmacintāṃ tu nirdiśet/
XXdivyav_u:16601: 410.004. tatra śabdā bhavantīme śrotavyāśca na saṃśayaḥ//902//
XXdivyav_u:16602: 410.005. bhūmikarma ca kṣetraṃ ca kṣetrakarma tathaiva ca/
XXdivyav_u:16605: 410.008. jaṅghe tu spṛśate bhūyo hyarthalābhaṃ vinirdiśet//904//
XXdivyav_u:16606: 410.009. tatreme śabdāḥ śrotavyā bhavantīha na saṃśayaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16608: 410.011. etādṛśaṃ ravaṃ śrutvā hiraṇyaṃ tasya nirdiśet/
XXdivyav_u:16611: 410.014. pādau ca spṛśate pṛcchaṃś cittaṃ cāpyanarthikam//907//
XXdivyav_u:16612: 410.015. yastu taccintito hyartha āśā āgantukā ca yā/
XXdivyav_u:16615: 410.018. atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdastādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//909//
XXdivyav_u:16617: 410.020. atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin kanyālakṣaṇaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:16624: 410.024. ninditaṃ ca praśastaṃ ca strīṇāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam//910//
XXdivyav_u:16625: 410.025. pitaraṃ mātaraṃ caiva mātulaṃ bhrātaraṃ tathā/
XXdivyav_u:16628: 410.028. tadvijñaiḥ saha saṃgamya kanyāṃ paśyeta śāstravit//912//
XXdivyav_u:16630: 410.030. pāṇilekhāśca jaṅghe ca kaṭi nābhyūrumeva ca//913//

XXdivyav_u:16632: 411.002. akṣibhruvau lalāṭaṃ ca karṇau keśāṃstathaiva ca//914//
XXdivyav_u:16633: 411.003. romarājīṃ svaraṃ varṇaṃ mantritaṃ gītameva ca/
XXdivyav_u:16641: 411.011. dhanyān sā janayetputrāṃsteṣāṃ prītiṃ ca bhuñjate//918//
XXdivyav_u:16642: 411.012. yasyāḥ pāṇitale vyaktaḥ kacchapaḥ svastiko dhvajaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16644: 411.014. ekaṃ sā janayetputraṃ taṃ ca rājānamādiśet//919//
XXdivyav_u:16652: 411.022. subhrūḥ suvarakeśāntā sā tu kanyā bahuprajā//923//
XXdivyav_u:16655: 411.025. yasyāvartau samau snigdhau ubhau pārśvau susaṃsthitau/
XXdivyav_u:16659: 411.029. ūrū jaṅghe ca pārśve ca tathā vikramaḥ saṃsthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16660: 411.030. raktānte vipule netre sā kanyā sukhamedhate//927//
XXdivyav_u:16667: 412.005. kāntajihvā tu yā nārī raktoṣṭhī priyabhāṣiṇī/
XXdivyav_u:16670: 412.008. sahasrāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ tu svāminī sā bhaviṣyati//932//
XXdivyav_u:16675: 412.013. ūrdhvaprekṣī adhaḥprekṣī yā ca tiryak ca prekṣiṇī/
XXdivyav_u:16682: 412.020. trīṃśca sā puruṣān hanti devaraṃ śvaśuraṃ patim//938//
XXdivyav_u:16683: 412.021. pārśvato romarājī tu vinatā ca kaṭirbhavet/
XXdivyav_u:16685: 412.023. kākajaṅghā ca yā nārī raktākṣī ghargharasvarā/
XXdivyav_u:16686: 412.024. niḥsukhā ca nirāśā ca varjitā naṣṭabāndhavā//940//
XXdivyav_u:16689: 412.027. yā tu sarvasamācārā mṛdvaṅgī samatāṃ gatā/
XXdivyav_u:16692: 412.030. putraṃ vā bhrātaraṃ vāpi jāramicchati tādṛśī//943//
XXdivyav_u:16694: 412.032. uttaroṣṭhe ca romāṇi sā tu bhakṣayate patim//944//
XXdivyav_u:16695: 413.001. <413>yasyā hastau ca pādau ca cchidrau dantāntarāṇi ca/
XXdivyav_u:16696: 413.002. patinopārjitaṃ dravyaṃ na tasyā ramate gṛhe//945//
XXdivyav_u:16699: 413.005. yasyā kaniṣṭhikā pāde bhūmiṃ na spṛśate 'ṅguliḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16700: 413.006. kaumāraṃ sā patiṃ tyaktvā ātmanaḥ kurute priyam//947//
XXdivyav_u:16702: 413.008. na sā ramati kaumāraṃ bandhakītvena jīvati//948//
XXdivyav_u:16705: 413.011. āvartaḥ pṛṣṭhato yasyā nābhī sā cānubandhati/
XXdivyav_u:16706: 413.012. na sā ramati kaumāraṃ dvitīyaṃ labhate patim//950//
XXdivyav_u:16710: 413.016. agnikārye 'pi sā gatvā kṣipraṃ doṣaṃ kariṣyati//952//
XXdivyav_u:16712: 413.018. pralamboṣṭhī tu yā nārī naikatra ramate ciram//953//
XXdivyav_u:16715: 413.021. na devikā na nadikā na ca daivatanāmikā/
XXdivyav_u:16717: 413.023. nakṣatranāmā yā nārī yā ca gotrasanāmikā/
XXdivyav_u:16731: 414.006. punarvasuśca dhanyā syātpuṣye vai vastravān bhavet/
XXdivyav_u:16733: 414.008. phālgunīṣu bhaved vidyā uttarāsu ca vastravān/
XXdivyav_u:16735: 414.010. svātyāṃ ca śobhanaṃ vastraṃ viśākhā priyadarśanam/
XXdivyav_u:16742: 414.017. bharaṇī ca bhayākīrṇā cauragamyā ca sā bhavet//965//
XXdivyav_u:16744: 414.019. atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasāriṃl luṅgādhyāyaṃ pravakṣyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:16749: 414.022. kutrotpannā ime bījāh(?) śasyānāṃ ca yavādayaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:16751: 414.024. vāpayet tu kathaṃ bījaṃ lāṅgalam yojayetkatham/
XXdivyav_u:16753: 414.026. śāradaṃ vātha graiṣmaṃ tu kasmin māse tu vāpayet/
XXdivyav_u:16754: 414.027. nimittaṃ kati śasyante kāni vā parivarjayet/
XXdivyav_u:16755: 414.028. kasya vā dāpayed dhūpaṃ kena mantreṇa dāpayet//968//

XXdivyav_u:17547: 435.013. tāḥ pṛcchanti--asti sarpa iti? sa kathayati--kīdṛśaṃ sarpaṃ mṛgayatha jīvantamāhosvit mṛtakamiti? tāḥ kathayanti--mṛtakam/
XXdivyav_u:17548: 435.014. sa saṃlakṣayati--kemetā mṛtakena sarpeṇa kariṣyanti? nūnametā etaṃ vṛddhaṃ mārayitukāmā
XXdivyav_u:17549: 435.015. dharmatā khalu sarpasya ruṣitasya dvayoḥ sthānayorviṣaṃ
XXdivyav_u:17551: 435.016. tena roṣitvā śiraḥ pucchaṃ svayaṃ chittvā tāsāṃ madhye sarpā
XXdivyav_u:17553: 435.017. tābhirjomāṃ sādhayitvā sa brāhmaṇa uktah--tāta, hilimāṃ joma pāsyasi? sa brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kimetā me hilimāṃ jomāṃ dāsyanti?
XXdivyav_u:17555: 435.019. sa saṃlakṣayati--pibāmi, yathā ca tathā marāmi/
XXdivyav_u:17563: 435.021. tāḥ kathayanti--tāta, bhūyaḥ pāsyasi? sa kathayati--pāsyāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:17566: 435.023. tasya tena bāṣpeṇa bhūyasyā mātrayā paṭale sphuṭite/
XXdivyav_u:17568: 435.024. tāḥ pūrvam yathā tasyāndhasya tato viśvastā vihṛtavantyastathaiva
XXdivyav_u:17571: 435.025. kathayati ca--kim yūyaṃ jānītha idānīmapyahaṃ na paśyāmi?
XXdivyav_u:17575: 435.027. yo 'sau brāhmaṇaḥ, eṣa evāsau panthakastena kālena tena samayena/
XXdivyav_u:17576: 435.028. yāstāstasya dvādaśa snuṣāḥ, etā eva tā dvādaśavargīyāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17578: 435.029. etarhyapi ābhirasyānarthaṃ kariṣyāma ityartham eva kṛtaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:17579: 435.030. bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmān panthakaḥ parīttenāvavādenācodya saṃsārakāntārāduttārya atyantaniṣṭhe anuttare yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭāpitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17580: 435.032. bhagavānāha--na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'pyadhvanyeṣo mayā parīttenāvavādenācodya mahatyaiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17582: 436.001. <436>bhūtabhūtaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasmin kartavaṭake gṛhapariḥ prativasati āḍyo sahādhano mahābhogaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17584: 436.002. sa tayā sārdhaṃ trīṭati ramate paticārayati/
XXdivyav_u:17589: 436.004. sa gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--yadahamasyai prabhūtānaṃ kārṣāpaṇān dāsyāmi, parapuruṣaiḥ sārdhaṃ vihariṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:17591: 436.006. tasmin karpaṭake śreṣṭhī prativasati tasya gṛhapatervayasyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17592: 436.006. tasya haste prabhūtāḥ kārṣāpaṇāḥ sthāpitāh--yadi mama patnyā bhaktācchādena yogodvahanaṃ
XXdivyav_u:17595: 436.008. tayā sa dārako jñātibakena svahastabalena vā āyāpitā(payitvā)
XXdivyav_u:17597: 436.009. sa mātaraṃ pṛcchati--amba, kimasmākaṃ pitā pitāmahāśca
XXdivyav_u:17598: karmākārṣuh? sā saṃlakṣayati--yadyasya vakṣyāmi mahāsamudre potasaṃvyavahāriṇa āsann iti, sthānametadvidyate yadeṣo 'pi
XXdivyav_u:17600: 436.011. śrutamāhitastava putā ca pitāmahāśca ihaiva vāṇijyamakārṣuḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17601: 436.012. sa kathayati--kārṣāpaṇān mamānuprayaccha, yairihaiva vāṇijyaṃ kariṣyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:17602: 436.013. mātā kathayati--kuto mama kārṣāpaṇāh? tvaṃ mayā kathaṃcit
XXdivyav_u:17604: 436.014. kuto me kārṣāpaṇānāṃ vibhavah? api tvayaṃ śroṣṭī tava pitṛvayasyo bhavati/
XXdivyav_u:17605: 436.015. asya sakāśāt kārṣāpaṇān gṛhītvā karma kuru/
XXdivyav_u:17609: 436.017. tasya ca gṛhāt preṣyadārikāyāḥ saṃkāratalasyopari mṛtamūṣikāṃ
XXdivyav_u:17611: 436.018. sa śreṣṭhī tasya puruṣasya kathayati--yaḥ puruṣaḥ syāt, śakyate anayā mṛtamūṣikayā
XXdivyav_u:17622: 436.023. tena vāṇijakena dāraka ucyate--anuprayaccha asya biḍālasya mṛtamūṣikām/
XXdivyav_u:17625: 436.025. sa saṃlakṣayati--yadyetān bhakṣayiṣyāmi, mūlameva bbhikṣitaṃ bhaviṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:17626: 436.026. sa tān bhrāṣṭre bharjayitvā śītalasya pānīyasya vardhanīyasya pūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tadgṛhya tasmātsthānakānniṣkramya yasmin pradeśe kāṣṭhahārakā viśrāmyanti, tasmin pradeśe gatvāvasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17630: 436.029. tena teṣāṃ kalāyānāṃ stoktaṃ dattaṃ śītalaṃ ca pānīyaṃ pātam/
XXdivyav_u:17632: 436.030. bhāgineya, vayaṃ tāvat kalyamevotthāya gatvā idānīmāgacchāmaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17637: 436.032. sa tāṃ vikrīya <437>kalāyānāṃ gṛhītvā bharjayitvā udakasya
XXdivyav_u:17639: 437.002. te kāṣṭhahārakāstathaiva tena kalāyaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ, śītalena pānīyena saṃtarpitāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17640: 437.002. te tasya kathayati--bhāgineya, divase divase tvaṃ kalāyān pānīyaṃ ca gṛhītvā āgamya atraiva tiṣṭham/
XXdivyav_u:17643: 437.004. sa teṣāṃ kathayati--mātula, mā yūyaṃ kāṣṭhabhārān vīrthāṃ
XXdivyav_u:17656: 437.010. tasya tatprabhūto lābhaḥ sa saṃlakṣayati--etat pratikruṣṭataraṃ vāṇijyānām yaduta
XXdivyav_u:17663: 437.013. tasya mūṣikāhairaṇyako mūṣikāhairaṇyaka iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
XXdivyav_u:17664: 437.014. te hairaṇyakāḥ kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, sarve vayamanena mūṣikāhairaṇyakenābhibhūtāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17665: 437.015. vayamenaṃ mānaṃ prāhayāmaḥ, yathā mahāsamudramavataret tatraivānayena vyasanamāpatsyate tathā kariṣyāma iti/
XXdivyav_u:17666: 437.016. te tasya nātidūre sthitvā svaiḥ kathāsamlāpena tiṣṭhanti--yathāpi
XXdivyav_u:17667: nāma bhavantaḥ puruṣo hastigrīvāyāṃ gatvā aśvapṛṣṭhena gacchet,
XXdivyav_u:17668: aśvapṛṭhena gatvā śibikāyāṃ gacchet, śibikāyāṃ gatvā padbhyāṃ gacchet,
XXdivyav_u:17669: evamevāsya mūṣkikāhairaṇyikasya pitā ca pitāmahāśca samudre potasaṃvyavahātiṇa āsan/
XXdivyav_u:17670: 437.019. eṣa idānīṃ kuṛcchreṇa jīvikāṃ kalpayati hairaṇyikāpaṇaṃ
XXdivyav_u:17672: 437.020. śrutvā sa kathayati--kiṃ kathayata? te kathayanti--tava pitā ca pitāmahāśca potasaṃvyavahāriṇa
XXdivyav_u:17673: 437.021. sa tvamidānīṃ kṛcchreṇa jīvikāṃ kalpayasi, hairaṇyikāpaṇaṃ
XXdivyav_u:17674: vāhayasi? sa gṛhaṃ gatvā mātaraṃ pṛcchati--amba, satyamasmākaṃ pitā ca
XXdivyav_u:17683: 437.026. tena ghaṇṭāvadhoṣaṇaṃ kṛtam--yo yuṣmākamutsahate mūṣikāhairaṇyena sārdhamaśulkenāgulmenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavataritum, sa mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyaṃ samudānayatu/
XXdivyav_u:17690: 437.031. sārthavāhaḥ karṇadhārasya kathayati--kathaya kathaya bhoḥ puruṣa
XXdivyav_u:17693: <438>mahāsamudre imānyevamrūpāṇi ratnāni tadyathā--maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravāla rajatajātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitakā dakṣiṇāvartaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17694: 438.002. yo yuṣmākamutsahate evamrūpai ratnairātmānaṃ samyaksukhena pratiṇayitum, mātāpitarau putradārān dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:17695: motrāmātyajñātisālohitaṃ kālena kālaṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitum, mūrdhagāminīṃ saubhāsikīṃ sukhavipākāmāyatyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:17699: 438.006. sārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kimidānīṃ vakṣyāmi avatarateti? sa karṇadhārasya kathayati--ghoṣaya bhoḥ puruṣa mahāsamudrasya yathābhūtaṃ
XXdivyav_u:17701: 438.008. tataḥ karṇadhāra uddhoṣitumāravdhah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā vaṇijaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17703: tadyadhā timibhayaṃ timiṃgalabhayaṃ timitimiṃgalabhayamāvartabhayaṃ kumbhīrabhayaṃ śiśumārabhayamantarjalagatānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:17704: 438.011. caurā apyatrāgavvhanti nīlaiḥ sitairvanacāriṇaḥ, asmākaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitādvyavaropayiṣyanti/
XXdivyav_u:17705: 438.012. yena yuṣmākaṃ priyamātmānaṃ parityaktvā mātāpitarau putradāraṃ
XXdivyav_u:17709: 438.014. tataḥ karṇadhārastriruddḥpṣaṇāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ paścādekāṃ vastrāṃ muñcati, dvitrivastrāṃ muñjati, yatastadvahanaṃ mahākarṇadhārasaṃdhānabalavadvāyusampreritaṃ mahāmegha iva saṃprasthito 'nuguṇena vāyunā yāvad ratnadvīpamanuprāptam/
XXdivyav_u:17710: 438.016. tataḥ karṇadhāra uddhoṣayitumārabdhah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā vaṇijaḥ, santyasmin ratnadvīpe kācamaṇayo ratnasadṛśāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17713: 438.019. asminneva ca ratnadvīpe kroñjakumārikā nāma rākṣasyaḥ
XXdivyav_u:17715: 438.020. tāḥ puruṣaṃ tathā upalālayanti yathā tatraivānayena
XXdivyav_u:17718: 438.021. tāni yaḥ paribhuṅkte, sa saptarātraṃ mūrcchitastiṣṭhati/
XXdivyav_u:17722: 438.023. saptāahasyātyayāt tādṛśaṃ vāyumutsṛjanti yena vahanamapahriyate yathāpi tadkṛtakāryāṇām/
XXdivyav_u:17723: 438.024. yaṃ śrutvā te vaṇijo 'vahitā apramattā avasthitāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17729: 438.027. sa kathayati--agradhanikaṃ tāvacchinadbhi, tataḥ paścānniveśaṃ kariṣyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:17730: 438.028. sa tathā uktah--putra na tava putā na putāmaho dhanikaḥ kṛtaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:17731: kutastava dhaniko jātah? sa kathayati--amba, ahameva jānāmi/
XXdivyav_u:17733: 438.030. tena suvarṇasya phelāṃ pūrayitvā catasno mūṣikāścaturṣu pārśveṣu sthāpayitvā śroṣṭhigṛhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:17734: 438.031. sa śreṣṭhī tadā tasyaiva tadvarṇaṃ bhāṣamāṇastiṣṭhati--paśyata
XXdivyav_u:17735: bhavanto mūṣikāhairaṇyikaḥ kathaṃ puṇyamaheśākhyo yam yameva gṛhṇāti tṛṇaṃ vā loṣṭaṃ vā sarvaṃ tat suvarṇaṃ saṃpadyate/
XXdivyav_u:17739: 439.002. sa praviśya kathayati--idaṃ te mūlam, ayaṃ lābhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17748: 439.005. tava pitrā gacchatā mama hasto kārṣāpaṇāḥ sthāpitāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17749: 439.006. tena śreṣṭhinā duhitā sarvlamlāravibhūṣitā tasya bhāryārthamanupradattā//
XXdivyav_u:17750: 439.007. kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau śreṣṭhī, ahameva tena kālena tena
XXdivyav_u:17752: 439.007. yo 'sau mūṣikāhairaṇyakaḥ, eṣa eva panthakastena kālena tena samayena/
XXdivyav_u:17755: 439.009. etarhyapyeṣa mayā parittenāvavādenāvavādya saṃsārakāntārāduttārya atyantaniṣṭhe 'nuttare yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ//
XXdivyav_u:17756: 439.011. bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kiṃ bhadanta panthakena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaścūḍaḥ paramacūḍo jātah? panthakenaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāni/
XXdivyav_u:17757: 439.012. na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye vipacyante, nābdhātau,
XXdivyav_u:17758: na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu
XXdivyav_u:17761: 439.016. sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//7//
XXdivyav_u:17762: 439.017. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śastā loka utpannastathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyāciraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
XXdivyav_u:17763: devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān/
XXdivyav_u:17764: 439.019. sa viṃśatibhirbhikṣusahasraiḥ parivāro vārāṇasīmupaniśritya viharati sma/
XXdivyav_u:17766: 439.020. anena tatra mātsaryeṇa na kasyaciccatuṣpadikāpi gāthā uddiṣṭo/
XXdivyav_u:17770: 439.022. sa saṃlakṣayati--yadi sūkarān praghātya nayiṣyāmi, māṃsasya krayiko na bhaviṣyati, kledaṃ gamiṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:17772: 439.024. tatra tatra praghātya neṣyāmi, yatra yatra krāyiko 'sti/
XXdivyav_u:17773: 439.025. sa prabhūtān sūkarāñ jānuṣu buddhvā nāvamāropya saṃprasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17780: 439.028. sa saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ tāvadayaṃ mṛtah āhosvijjīvatīti? paśyati
XXdivyav_u:17782: 439.028. sa tena gajamujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya uddhṛtya vālukāyāḥ
XXdivyav_u:17787: 439.030. sa tena pādānusāreṇa gato yāvatpaśyati pañcamātrāṇi
XXdivyav_u:17789: 439.031. sa teṣāṃ patreṇa puṣpeṇa phalena dantakāṣṭhena copasthānaṃ
XXdivyav_u:17794: 440.001. tadā so 'pyekānte sthitvā paryaṅkaṃ buddhcā dhyāyati/
XXdivyav_u:17798: āsīt, paścādasau saukarikaḥ, eṣa eva panthako bhikṣuḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17799: 440.004. yadanena mātsaryeṇa na kasyaciccatuṣpadikā gāthā uddiṣṭā, yacca sūkarān praghātya yaccāsaṃjñisattvebhya ihopapannaḥ, tasya karmaṇo vipākena cūḍaḥ paramacūḍo dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:17800: 440.007. yadā āyuṣmān panthakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:17801: jīvakena śrutam--panthakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajita iti/
XXdivyav_u:17802: 440.008. sa saṃlakṣayati--yadi bhagavān rājagṛhamāgamiṣyati, ahaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmi sthāpayitvā bhadantaṃ
XXdivyav_u:17804: 440.009. bhagavān yathābhiramyaṃ śrāvastīṃ vihṛtya yena rājagṛhe tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17807: 440.011. aśrauṣījjīvakaḥ kumārabhūtah--bhagavān magadheṣu janapadacārikāṃ caran rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe/
XXdivyav_u:17809: 440.013. apasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānto niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17810: 440.013. ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ jīvakaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā
XXdivyav_u:17812: 440.015. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya
XXdivyav_u:17814: 440.015. atha jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtah utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadvocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavāñchvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena/
XXdivyav_u:17816: 440.018. sa na śaknoti bhagavantaṃ vaktuṃ sthāpayitvā bhadantaṃ panthakam/
XXdivyav_u:17817: 440.018. atha jīvakaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrānto yenāyuṣmānāndastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17818: 440.020. upasaṃkramyāyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vinditvā ekānte
XXdivyav_u:17822: buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargehe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ sthāpayitvā bhadantaṃ panthakam/
XXdivyav_u:17823: 440.023. yathā te jīvaka kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vṛddhirbhavati/
XXdivyav_u:17824: 440.023. atha jīvakaḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmata ānandasya bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya āyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vanditvā
XXdivyav_u:17829: panthaka jānīyāh--jīvakena kumārabhūtena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo
XXdivyav_u:17832: 440.028. sa jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtastāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kalyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati--samaye bhadanta, sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate/
XXdivyav_u:17833: 440.031. atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena jīvakasya kumārabhūtasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17838: 441.002. jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sauvarṇabhṛṅgāraṃ gṛhītvā vṛddhānte tiṣṭhati/
XXdivyav_u:17840: 441.003. jīvikaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ kathayati--kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan vāridhārāṃ
XXdivyav_u:17845: 441.006. jīvakaḥ kathayati--bhagavan, nāsau mayā nimantrita iti/
XXdivyav_u:17848: 441.007. kimasau bhikṣusaṃghādbahir na vā? bhagavān kathayati jīvakam--gaccha tvaṃ śabdāpaya/
XXdivyav_u:17849: 441.008. jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ cāpyahaṃ bhagavato gauraveṇa śabdāpayāmi, na satkṛtya pariveṣayiṣyāmi/
XXdivyav_u:17852: 441.010. tena dūtena gatvā panthaka iti śabdo muktaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:17854: 441.011. sa dūta āgatya jīvakasya kathayati--tathaiva veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpo bhikṣūṇāṃ

XXdivyav_u:18957: 464.013. yaḥ punarbhikṣurityudāyī iti, so vā punaranyo 'pyevaṃjātīyah

XXdivyav_u:18999: kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/

XXdivyav_u:19005: 'mātyānāmantrayate--bhavantaḥ, asti kasyacidanyasyāpi rājña evamavidhā janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāṣca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca?

XXdivyav_u:19018: 465.020. yadā tava kiṃcid roruke nagare karaṇīyaṃ bhavati, mama lekho dātavyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19020: 465.021. te taṃ prābhṛtamādāya yena rājagṛhaṃ tena prakrāntāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19022: 465.022. taiḥ sā ratnapeṭā rājño bimbisārasyopanāmitā lekhaśca/
XXdivyav_u:19024: bhavantastadrājño durlabham? amātyāḥ kathayanti--devo vastrādhipatiḥ, sa rājā ratnādhipatiḥ/

XXdivyav_u:19027: 465.026. yatkiṃcittava rājagṛhe prayojanaṃ bhavati, mama lekho dātavyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19029: 465.027. te taṃ prābhṛtamādāya yena rorukaṃ tena prakrāntāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19031: 465.028. taiḥ sā vastrapeṭā rājño rudtāyaṇasyopanāmitā lekhaṣca/

XXdivyav_u:19035: 465.030 prātisīmaiḥ kīdṛśaṃ rajabhiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayati? rudrāyaṇasya rājño maṇivarma pañcāṅgepetośītam uṣṇasaṃsparśamuṣṇe śootasaṃsparśaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19038: dattah--priyavayasya, idaṃ mayā ca tava maṇivarma prābhṛtamanupreṣitaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19039: pañcāṅgopetaṃ śīte uṣṇasaṃsparśamuṣṇe śītasaṃsparśaṃ duśchedaṃ durbhedaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19042: 466.003. sa dūtastanmaṇivarma ādāya lekhaṃ ca, yena rājagṛhaṃ tena
XXdivyav_u:19049: 466.006. dharmatā khalu yasya na śakyate mūlyaṃ kartum, tasyaikaikasya koṭimūlyaṃ kriyate/
XXdivyav_u:19050: 466.007. rājā bimbisāro vyathitaḥ kathayati--kiṃ mayā tasya prābhṛtamanupreṣitavyaṃ bhaviṣyati? sa saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ buddho bhagavān/

XXdivyav_u:19063: 466.015. te kathayanti--yadi devo bhagavantamantargṛhe bhojayet, evaṃ svayaṃ saṃjñāpaya bhagavato
XXdivyav_u:19066: 466.017. te yamevāvayavaṃ bhagavataḥ paśyanti, tameva paśyanto na tṛptiṃ
XXdivyav_u:19073: 466.020. tatra bhagavatā chāyā utsṛṣṭā, uktāśca--raṅgaiḥ pūrayata/

XXdivyav_u:19100: 467.004. na śakyaṃ tena yadvā tadvā pratiprābhṛtamanupreṣayitum/

XXdivyav_u:19106: 467.007. vistīrṇāvakāśe pradeśe sthāpayitvā mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvoddhāṭitā/

XXdivyav_u:19117: hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam/

XXdivyav_u:19193: 469.007. rudrāyaṇo rājā dine dine āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasyāntikād dharmaṃ śrutvā antaḥpurasyārocayati--āryo mahākātyāyano madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19197: 469.010. yadyevam, yūyaṃ kasmāñ śṛṇutha? deva, vayaṃ hrīmantyaḥ/

XXdivyav_u:19199: 469.011. rudrāyaṇena rājñā āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana uktah--mama ārya sāntaḥpuramicchati śrotum/

XXdivyav_u:19202: 469.014. ārya, atra ko 'ntaḥpurasya dharmaṃ deśayati? mahārāja,

XXdivyav_u:19209: 469.016. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19214: saṃlakṣayati--katarasyā bhikṣuṇyā rudrāyaṇasya rājño antaḥpuraparijano vineyo raurukanivāsī ca strījana iti? paśyati śailāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19215: 469.021. tatra bhagavāñchailāṃ bhikṣuṇīmāmantrayate--samanvāhara śaile rauruke nagare rudrāyaṇasya rājño 'ntaḥpurajanaṃ raurukanivāsinaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19217: 469.022. evaṃ bhadanteti śailā bhikṣuṇī bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntā/

XXdivyav_u:19223: 469.028. asyāṃ tvayārdharṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kartavyā nagaraśobhā
XXdivyav_u:19226: 469.029. abhyantare ca nagarasya pañca vihāraśatāni kārayitavyāni, pañca
XXdivyav_u:19229: 469.032. rudrāyaṇena rājñā lekhaṃ vācayitvā prāmodyajātenārdhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā
XXdivyav_u:19230: 470.001. anekajanasahasraparivāreṇa ca svayameva pratyudgamya mahatā satkāreṇa raurukaṃ nagaraṃ praveśitā/
XXdivyav_u:19231: 470.002. abhyantare ca nagarasya pañca vihāraśatāni kāritāni, pañca mañcapīṭhavṛṣikoṣabimbopadhānacaturasrakaśatāni dāpitāni, pañca piṇḍapātaśatāni prajñaptāni/
XXdivyav_u:19232: 470.003. śailā bhikṣuṇī rudrāyaṇasya rājño 'ntaḥpuraṃ praviśya dine dinai
XXdivyav_u:19234: 470.004. rudrāyaṇo rājā vīṇāyāṃ kṛtāvī, candraprabhā devī nṛtye/
XXdivyav_u:19235: 470.005. yāvadapareṇa samayena rudrāyaṇo rājā vīṇāṃ vādayati, candraprabhā devī nṛtyati/
XXdivyav_u:19240: 470.007. candraprabhā devī kathayati--deva, mā mayā durnṛtyam? devi, na tvayā dunṛtyam/
XXdivyav_u:19241: 470.008. api tu mayā tava nṛtyantyā vināśalakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam--saptame divase tava kālatriyā bhavatīti/
XXdivyav_u:19242: 470.009. candraprabhā devī pādayor nipatya kathayati--deva yadyevam,

XXdivyav_u:19247: 470.012. atha sāvaśeṣasamyojanā kālaṃ kṛtvā deveṣūpapadyase, devabhūtayā te mamopadarśayitavyamiti/
XXdivyav_u:19249: 470.013. sā rudrāyaṇena rājñā śailāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ samarpitā--āryacandraptabhā devī ākāṅkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikcuṇībhāvam/
XXdivyav_u:19255: 470.017. sā saptame divase kālagatā cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannā/
XXdivyav_u:19256: 470.018. dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya,
XXdivyav_u:19261: 470.021. kena karmaṇā? bhagavataḥ śāsane brāhmacaryaṃ caritveti/
XXdivyav_u:19262: 470.021. tasyā etadabhavat--tadapratirūpaṃ syādyadahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāsā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramitum/
XXdivyav_u:19264: 470.023. atha candraprabhā devakanyā calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrī tāmeva rātrīṃ divyānāmutpalakumudapuṇḍarīkamāndāravāṇāmutsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ veṇuvanaṃ kalandakakanivāpamudāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ puṣpairavakīrya bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya/
XXdivyav_u:19265: 470.026. bhagavatā tasyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā candraprabhayā
XXdivyav_u:19267: 470.028. sā dṛṣṭasatyā trirudānamudānayati--idamasmākaṃ bhadanta, na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā kṛtaṃ na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭair nasvajanabandhuvargair na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇairyadbhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam/
