XXdivyav_u:19278: 471.013. avanamya tataḥ pralambahārā caraṇau dvāvabhivandya jāraharṣā/
XXdivyav_u:19279: 471.015. parigamya pradakṣiṇaṃ jitāriṃ suralokābhimukhī divaṃ jagāma//7//
XXdivyav_u:19280: 471.017. atha candraprabhā devakanyā vaṇigiva labdhalābhaḥ, sasyasampanna iva karṣakaḥ, śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ, sarvarogaparimukta ivāturaḥ, yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśāmāgatā tayaiva vibhūtyā svarbhavanaṃ saṃprasthitā/
XXdivyav_u:19282: 471.020. atha candraprabhā devakanyā yena rājā rudrāyaṇastenopasaṃkrāntā/
XXdivyav_u:19283: 471.020. tena khalu samayena rudrāyaṇo rājā ekākī gṛhasyoparitalake
XXdivyav_u:19285: 471.021. sa tayā udārāvabhāsaṃ kṛtvā acchaṭāśabdena pratibodhitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19291: 471.024. yadīcchasi mayā sārdhaṃ samāgamam, bhagavato 'ntike pravraja/
XXdivyav_u:19296: 471.026. tatra te mayā sārdhaṃ samāgamo bhaviṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:19298: 471.027. rudrāyaṇo rājā kṛtsnāṃ rātriṃ pravrajyāmanuvicintayan kālyamevotthāya amātyānāmantrayate--paśyata bhavantaḥ, candraprabhā devī kva tiṣṭhatīti? te kathayanti--deva, kālagateti/
XXdivyav_u:19303: keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajeyamiti/
XXdivyav_u:19305: yādṛśa eva mama śikhaṇḍī kumāraḥ putraḥ, tādṛśa eva yuvayoḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19306: 472.001. sa eṣa yuvābhyāmahitānnivārayitavyo hite ca saṃniyojayitavyaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19309: 472.003. śikhaṇḍyapi kumāro 'bhihitah--putra, yathaiva tvaṃ mama vacanaṃ śrotavyaṃ kartavyaṃ manyase, tathā anayorapi hirubhirukayoragrāmātyayorvacanaṃ śrotavyaṃ kartavyaṃ manyathāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19312: 472.005. tato rudrāyaṇena rājñā rauruke nagare ghaṇṭāvadhoṣaṇaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19315: 472.007. ahaṃ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ
XXdivyav_u:19319: 472.009. śrutvā sarva eva raurukanivāsī janakāyo 'nyaśca nānādeśābhyāgātaḥ sāśrukaṇṭho vyavasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19320: 472.010. tato rudrāyaṇo rājā śikhaṇḍinaṃ kumāraṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpya bandhujanaṃ kṣamāpayitvā śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānāni datvā
XXdivyav_u:19324: 472.013. so 'nekaiḥ praṇiśatasahasrairanugamyamāno raurukānnagarānniṣkramya anyatamāsminnudyāne vividhataruṣaṇḍamaṇḍite nānāpuṣpasalilasampanne haṃsakroñcamayūraśukasārikākokilajīvaṃjīvakanirghoṣite muhūrtamāsthāya raurukaṃ nagaramavalokya śikhaṇḍinaṃ rājānamāmantrayate--putra, mayā dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kāritam, yena me iyanti praṇiśatasahasrāṇi pṛṣṭhato 'nuvaddhāni/
XXdivyav_u:19326: 472.017. so 'pi janakāyaḥ samāśvāsyoktah--bhavantaḥ, eṣa yuṣmākaṃ rājā
XXdivyav_u:19330: 'śruparuyākulekṣaṇo muhūrmuhūr nivartya nirīkṣamāṇo raurukaṃ nagaraṃ pratinivṛttaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19331: 472.020. tato rudrāyaṇo rājā anupūrveṇa rājagṛhaṃ nagaramanuprāptaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19332: 472.021. tenodyāne sthitvā sa puruṣa uktah--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa, rājño bimbisārasya gatvā nivedaya--rudrāyaṇo nāma udyāne tiṣṭhatīti/
XXdivyav_u:19333: 472.022. tena puruṣeṇa gatvā rājño bimbisārasya niveditam--deva, rudrāyaṇo rājā udyāane tiṣṭhatīti, sa rājā śrutvā sahasaivotthitaḥ
XXdivyav_u:19335: 472.024. na yuṣmākaṃ kenacidvijñāt iti? sa kathayati--deva, kuto 'sya
XXdivyav_u:19337: 472.025. rājā bimbisāraḥ saṃlakṣayati--na mama pratirūpaṃ syādyadahaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19339: 472.027. mahatā satkāreṇa praveśayāmīti viditvā mārgaśobhāṃ bagaraśobhāṃ
XXdivyav_u:19341: 472.028. kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya hastiskandhe āropya rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ
XXdivyav_u:19345: 472.030. mārgaśrame prativinodite uktah--priyavayasya, sphītaṃ rājyamapāsya antaḥpuraṃ kumārānāmātyān paurajanapadān kimihāgamanaprayojanam? mā kenacidbhūmyantareṇa rājñā rāṣṭrāvamardanaḥ
XXdivyav_u:19347: parākrāntamiti? sa kathayati--vayasya, <473>ākaṅkṣāmi svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19348: 473.001. iti śrutvā rājā bimbisāra āttamanāḥ pūrvakāyamabhyunnamayya
XXdivyav_u:19349: dakṣiṇabāhumābhiprasāryodānamudānayati--aho buddhaḥ, aho dharmaḥ, aho saṃghah aho dharmasya svākhyātatā, yatredānīmevaṃvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ sphītaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19350: rājyamapahāya sphītamantaḥpuraṃ vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargaṃ sphītāni ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇyapahāya ākāṅkṣante svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
XXdivyav_u:19351: 473.005. ityuktvā rājānaṃ rudrāyaṇaṃ samādāya yena bhagavāṃsetnopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19352: 473.006. tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣuparṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19353: 473.007. adrākṣīdbhagavān rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāraṃ dūrādeva/
XXdivyav_u:19354: 473.007. dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣa bhikṣavo rājā bimbisāraḥ saprābhṛta
XXdivyav_u:19357: 473.009. rājā bimbisāro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19358: 473.010. ekāntaniṣaṇṇo rājā biṃvisāro bhagavantamidamavocat--ayaṃ bhadanta rājā rudrāyaṇa ākāṅkṣate svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19361: 473.012. sa bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitah--ehi bhikṣo, cara
XXdivyav_u:19363: 473.013. sa bhagavato vācāvasāne eva muṇḍaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ saṃghāṭīprāvṛtaḥ pātrakaravyagrahasto varṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathenāvasthitaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:19364: 473.015. ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaśca saṃghāṭiparivṛtadehaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19365: 473.017. sadyaḥ praśāntendraya eva tasthau evaṃ sthito buddho
XXdivyav_u:19366: 473.019. āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇaḥ pūrvāhne nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19369: 473.020. eṣa ca śabdo rājagṛhe nagare samantato visṛtah--rudrāyaṇo rājā bhagavatā pravrajitaḥ, sa rājagṛhaṃ bhikṣārthī praviṣṭaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19372: 473.023. amātyai rājño bimbisārasya niveditam--deva, rudrāyaṇo rājā rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭo 'nekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtastiṣṭhatīti/
XXdivyav_u:19373: 473.024. śrutvā ca punā rājā bimbisāro yena rudrāyaṇo
XXdivyav_u:19378: 473.028. bhuktvā śatapale pātre sauvarṇe rājate 'tha vā/
XXdivyav_u:19392: 474.011. koṣṭhāgārāṇi kośaṃ ca bahuvittaṃ prahāya vai/
XXdivyav_u:19398: 474.017. kiṃ nu tvaṃ durmanā rājan kiṃ dīna iva bhāṣase/
XXdivyav_u:19400: 474.019. kiṃ nu tvaṃ durmanā rāhan kiṃ dīna iva bhāṣase/
XXdivyav_u:19401: 474.020. dadāmi pravarān bhogān yān kāṃścinmanasecchasi//20// iti/
XXdivyav_u:19403: 474.022. na rājan kṛpaṇo loke dharmakāyena saṃspṛśet/
XXdivyav_u:19407: 474.026. śṛṇu me tvaṃ mahārāja dharmatā deśayāmyaham/
XXdivyav_u:19408: 474.027. śrutvā dharmaṃ tato jñeyo yadi tvaṃ prītimeṣyasi//23//
XXdivyav_u:19412: 474.031. trīṭā tatra ratiḥ kā vā putraparadhaneṣu vā//25//
XXdivyav_u:19414: 475.002. śaurā dhanaṃ prārthayante rājan mukto 'smi bandhanāt//26//
XXdivyav_u:19415: 475.003. na bhaiṣajyāni trāyante na dhanaṃ jñātayo na ca/
XXdivyav_u:19416: 475.004. na sarvavidyā na balaṃ na śauryaṃ trāyate 'ntakāt//27/
XXdivyav_u:19418: 475.007. āyuḥkṣayānte 'pi tataścyavante mucyeta ko neha śarīrabhedāt//28//
XXdivyav_u:19419: 475.009. rājyāni kṛtvāpi mahānubhāvā vṛṣṇyandhakāḥ kuravaśca pāṇḍavāśca/
XXdivyav_u:19420: 475.011. saṃpannacittā yaśasā jvalantas te na śaktā maraṇaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19421: 475.013. na samyamena tapasā na rājan na karmaṇā na rājan na karmaṇā vīryaparākrameṇa vā/
XXdivyav_u:19422: 475.015. na vittapūgair na dhanairudāraiḥ śakyaṃ kadācinmaraṇādvimoktam//30//
XXdivyav_u:19423: 475.017. naivāntarīkṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṃ vivaraṃ praviśya/
XXdivyav_u:19424: 475.019. na vidyate sa pṛthivīpradeśo yatra sthitaṃ na prasaheta mṛtyuḥ//31//
XXdivyav_u:19425: 475.021. naivāntarīkṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṃ vivaraṃ praciśya/
XXdivyav_u:19426: 475.023. na vidyate sa pṛthivīpradeśo yatra sthitaṃ na prasaheta karma//32//
XXdivyav_u:19430: 475.028. śaṅkhavarṇāni śīrṣāṇi tāni dṛṣṭveha kā ratiḥ//34//
XXdivyav_u:19437: 476.005. purā hi tvāṃ vyāghra iva mṛgaṃ nihatya vyādhirjarā karṣati
XXdivyav_u:19439: 476.007. na te mitrāṇyapaneṣyanti rogaṃ saṃgamya sodaryagaṇāśca
XXdivyav_u:19440: 476.009. yadeva labdhādhikamasya bhavati dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpam/
XXdivyav_u:19442: 476.013. sacedṛṇaṃ bhvati piturmṛtasya priyāḥ sutā nāsya vahṇiṃ viśanti mṛtyau na vāpyaśrumukhā rudanti rāhuḥ pitā mama kāryateti(?)//40//
XXdivyav_u:19443: 476.017. āyāntu sattvāḥ pitā mameti prakīrṇakeśāśrumukhā rudanti/
XXdivyav_u:19444: 476.019. jyotiścāsya purato haranti hyaho batāyamamaro bhavediti//41//
XXdivyav_u:19445: 476.021. dūṣyairenaṃ prāvṛtaṃ nirharanti jyotiḥ samādāya {ca tam} dahanti/
XXdivyav_u:19446: 476.023. sa dahyate jñātibhī rudyamāna ekena vastreṇa vihāya bhogam//42//
XXdivyav_u:19447: 476.025. eko hyayaṃ jāyate jāyamānastathā mriyate mriyamāṇo 'yamekaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19448: 476.027. eko duḥkhānanubhavatīha jantur na vidyate saṃsarataḥ
XXdivyav_u:19449: 476.029. etacca dṛṣṭveha parivrajanti kulāyakāste na bhavanti santaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19452: 477.001. <477>atha bimbisāro rājā rudrāyaṇena bhikṣuṇā uttarottareṇa pratibhānena nirākṛtastūṣṇīṃ niṣpratibhaḥ prakrāntaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:19453: 477.003. atha śikhaṇḍī rājā yāvatkaṃciddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā adharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitumārabdhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19454: 477.004. sa hirubhirukābhyāmuktah--deva, dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kāraya, mā
XXdivyav_u:19457: 477.005. tadyathā deva puṣpavṛkṣāḥ phalavṛkṣāśca kālena kālaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19458: samyakparipālyamānā anuparataprayogeṇa yathākālaṃ puṣpāṇi phalāni cānuprayacchanti, evameva janapadāḥ pritipālyamānā anuparataprayogeṇa yathākālaṃ karapratyāyānanuprayacchantīti/
XXdivyav_u:19459: 477.007. sa tābhyāṃ nivārito yāvattāvaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā
XXdivyav_u:19465: mūrdhābhiṣiktasya yāvat trirapyājñāṃ prativahati, tasya kīdṛśo daṇḍa iti/
XXdivyav_u:19466: 477.011. tatra kecidduṣṭāmātyāḥ kathayanti--deva, kimatra jñātavyam? tasya vadho daṇḍa iti/
XXdivyav_u:19468: 477.013. amātyasya ca duṣṭasya dantasya calitasya ca/
XXdivyav_u:19471: 477.016. kośasthaṃ ca balasthaṃ ca yo na hanyātsa ghātyate//43// iti/
XXdivyav_u:19472: 477.017. śikhaṇḍī rājā kathayati--bhavantaḥ, mamaitau pitrā saṃnyastau/
XXdivyav_u:19474: 477.018. kiṃ tvābhyāṃ mama darśanapathe na sthātavyamiti/
XXdivyav_u:19485: 477.025. dharmeṇa vā kārayati svarājyaṃ na cāsya
XXdivyav_u:19488: 477.028. tathyaṃ śikhaṇḍī khalu raurukeṣu sabhṛtyavargo balavānarogaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19489: 477.030. na cāsya kaścitparatopasargo adharmeṇa tu rājyaṃ karoti
XXdivyav_u:19492: pīḍayatīti? sa kathayati--deva, hirubhirukayoramātyayordvāraṃ nivārya anyau duṣṭāmātyau
XXdivyav_u:19494: 478.003. rudrāyaṇaḥ kathayati--gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa, raurukanivāsinaṃ janakāyaṃ samāścāsaya/
XXdivyav_u:19497: 478.006. sa vaṇik paṇyaṃ visarjayitvā pratipaṇyamādāya saṃprasthito
XXdivyav_u:19499: 478.007. tena jñātīnāṃ rahasi niveditam--bhavantaḥ, ahaṃ paṇyamādāya rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19501: 478.008. sa kathayati--ahaṃ pracāritaṃ raurukaṃ gamiṣyāmi, śikhaṇḍinaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19502: cāhitānnivārayiṣyāmi, hite ca saṃniyojayiṣyāmi yathā janapadānna pīḍayatīti/
XXdivyav_u:19504: 478.010. evaṃ karṇaparamparayā sa śabdastayorduṣṭāmātyayoḥ karṇaṃ gataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19505: 478.010. tau saṃlakṣayatah--yadi vṛddharājā āgamiṣyati, niyatamasau bhūyo hirubhirukāvagrāmātyau sthāpayiṣyati, āvayoścānarthaṃ kārayiṣyati/
XXdivyav_u:19506: 478.012. tadupāyasaṃvidhānaṃ ca kartavyam yenāsavantarmārga eva praghātyata iti/
XXdivyav_u:19507: 478.013. tābhyāṃ rājñaḥ śikhaṇḍina ārocitam--deva, śrūyate vṛddharājā āgacchatīti/
XXdivyav_u:19510: yenaikadivasamapi rājyaṃ kāritam, sa vinā rājyenābhiraṃsyata iti kṛta etat? punarapyasau rājyaṃ kārayitukāma iti/
XXdivyav_u:19511: 478.016. śikhaṇḍī kathayati--yadyasau rājā bhaviṣyati, ahaṃ sa eva
XXdivyav_u:19513: 478.016. ko nu virodha iti? tau kathayatah--deva, apratirūpametat/
XXdivyav_u:19515: namasyamānena rājyaṃ kārayitvā punarapi kumāravāsena vastavyam? varaṃ deśaparityāgo na tu kumāravāsena vāsam/
XXdivyav_u:19516: 478.019. tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo hastigrīvāyāṃ gatvā aśvapṛṣṭhena
XXdivyav_u:19517: gacchet,aśvapṛṣṭhena gatvā rathena gacchet, rathena gatvā pādābhyāmeva
XXdivyav_u:19518: gacchet, evameva rājyaṃ kārayitvā punaḥ kumāravāsena vāsa iti/
XXdivyav_u:19519: 478.021. sa tābhyāṃ vipralabdhaḥ kathayati--kimatra yuktam? kathaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19521: 478.022. yadi na praghātyate, niyataṃ duṣṭāmātyavigrāhito devaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19523: 478.023. sa evamukte hīnadīnavadano mūhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīṃ sthitvā
XXdivyav_u:19525: kathayati--bhavantau, kathaṃ pitaraṃ praghātayāmīti? tau kahtayatah--na
XXdivyav_u:19527: 478.026. pitā vā yadi vā bhrātā putro vā svāṅganiḥsṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19531: 478.030. ekaśca tatra śatruḥ syāttadarthe tānnimajjayet//50// iti/
XXdivyav_u:19534: 478.033. grāmaṃ janapadasyārthe ātmārthe pṛthivīṃ tyajet//51// iti/
XXdivyav_u:19537: 479.001. yadi devo 'tra vilambate, yaddevasyānuraktāḥ kumārāmātyapaurajanapadāste kṣobhamāpannā niyatamanarthaṃ kurvantīti/
XXdivyav_u:19538: 479.002. kāmān khalu pratisevamānasya nāsti kiṃcitpāpaṃ karmākaraṇīyamiti
XXdivyav_u:19545: 479.006. tābhyāṃ te hiraṇyasuvarṇagrāmapradānādinā protsāhitā na pratipadyante/
XXdivyav_u:19547: dattā--gacchantu, bhavantah etān puruṣān saputradārān sasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavāṃścārake baddhvā
XXdivyav_u:19548: 479.008. te śrutvā bhītāḥ saṃpratipannāḥ kathayanti--deva, alaṃ krodhena/
XXdivyav_u:19554: 479.011. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantamidamavocat--icchāmyahaṃ bhadanta raurukaṃ nagaraṃ
XXdivyav_u:19557: 479.013. athāyuṣmān rudrāyaṇo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato
XXdivyav_u:19559: 479.014. āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇastasyā eva rātreratyayāt pūrvāhne nivāsya
XXdivyav_u:19561: 479.015. rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātraḥ pratikrānto yathāparibhuktaṃ śayanāsanaṃ pratisāmayya samādāya pātracīvaraṃ karmabalapreritam--
XXdivyav_u:19562: 479.018. dūraṃ hi karṣate karma dūrātkarma prakarṣate/
XXdivyav_u:19563: 479.019. tatra prakarṣate jantum yatra karma vipacyate//52//
XXdivyav_u:19564: 479.020. iti yena raurukaṃ tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19565: 479.020. anupūrveṇa cārikāṃ carannantarmārge 'nyatamaṃ karvaṭakaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19570: 479.022. sa taiḥ puruṣaiḥ sārdhamekasminnevodyāne rātriṃdevā samupagataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19573: 479.026. dharmeṇa vā kārayati svakaṃ rājyaṃ na cāsya
XXdivyav_u:19576: 479.029. deva, tathyaṃ śikhaṇḍī khalu raurukeṣu sabhṛtyavargo bakavānarogaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19577: 479.031. na cāsya kaścitparatopasargah adharmarājyaṃ tu karoti
XXdivyav_u:19580: 480.002. tasyāpi tu yatsadṛśaṃ tadadya upalapsyase saubhyeti//55//
XXdivyav_u:19581: 480.003. āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇaḥ kathayati--bhavantaḥ, kimasau mama tatra
XXdivyav_u:19583: 480.004. sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, yadevaṃ na gacchāmi, pratinivartāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:19585: 480.006. kva yāsyasi tvaṃ naravīra bhūyo na te suto nandati jīvitena/
XXdivyav_u:19588: 480.010. āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇaḥ kathayati--bhavantaḥ, yūyaṃ nāma mama
XXdivyav_u:19590: 480.011. sa saṃlakṣayati--yattaduktaṃ bhagavatā karmasvakatā te rudrāyaṇa
XXdivyav_u:19592: 480.012. sarvathā dhik saṃsārabhaṅguramiti viditvā teṣāṃ kathayati--bhadramukhāḥ, ahamasmi yadarthaṃ pravajitaḥ, so 'rtho mayā na saṃprāptaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19594: 480.014. te parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kṛtvā kathayanti--deva, evaṃ kuru/
XXdivyav_u:19595: 480.014. athāyuṣmān rudrāyaṇo 'nyatamaṃ vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍataṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā
XXdivyav_u:19597: 480.015. uktaṃ bhagavatā--pañcānuśaṃsā bāhuśrutye--skandhakuśalo bhavati dhātukuśala āyatanakuśalaḥ pratītyasamutpādakuśalaḥ, aparapratibaddhā cāsya bhavatyavavādānuśāsanīti/
XXdivyav_u:19598: 480.017. tena vīryamārabhya idameva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19603: 480.022. athāyuṣmān rudrāyaṇo 'rhattvaprāpto vimuktiprītisukhapratisaṃvedī tasyā velāyāṃ gāthāṃ
XXdivyav_u:19605: 480.025. adyāpyudrāyaṇo bhikṣū rājadharmair na mucyate//57// iti/
XXdivyav_u:19606: 480.026. ityuktvā tān vadhakapuruṣānuvāca--bhadramukhāḥ, yaṃ mayā prāptavyaṃ tatprāptam/
XXdivyav_u:19608: 480.027. te kathayati--deva, yadi śikhaṇḍī rājā asmān pṛcchati--kiṃ
XXdivyav_u:19612: 480.031. ahaṃ ca parinirvāsye tvaṃ cāvīciṃ gamiṣyasi//58// iti/
XXdivyav_u:19614: pitā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ, yaccārhan bhikṣuḥ kṣīṇāśravaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19620: 481.004. yam yam ṛddhyupāyaṃ prārabhate, tasya dharmavinaṣṭatvād ṛkaro 'pi
XXdivyav_u:19622: 481.005. tatasteṣāmekena puruṣeṇa nirghṛṇahṛdayena tyaktaparalokena kakṣādasiṃ niṣkṛṣya utkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātitaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:19624: 481.008. dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19625: prāviṣkurvanti, tasmin samaye nīlapītakohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhānniścārya kāścidadhastādgacchanti,
XXdivyav_u:19626: 481.010. yā adhastādgacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanamavīcimarbudaṃ nirarbudamaṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvamutpalaṃ padman mahāpadmaṃ narakaṃ gatvā ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu śītībhūtvā nipatanti, ye śītanarakāsteṣūṣpībhūtvā nipatanti/
XXdivyav_u:19628: 481.013. teṣāmevaṃ bhavati--kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ,
XXdivyav_u:19631: 481.015. teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavati--na hyeva vayaṃ bhavanta
XXdivyav_u:19635: 481.016. te nirmite cittamabhiprasādya taṃ narakanivedanīyaṃ karma
XXdivyav_u:19636: kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā
XXdivyav_u:19638: 481.018. yā upariṣṭādgacchanti, tāścāturmahārājikāṃstrāyastriṃśān yāmāṃstuṣitānnirmāṇaratīn parinirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān brahmapārṣadyān mahabrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhānapramāṇābhānābhāsvarān parīttaśubhānapramāṇaśubhāñchubhakṛtsnānanabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalānabṛhānatapān sudṛśān sudarśanānakaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19645: 481.027. atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokaghātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantameva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti/
XXdivyav_u:19646: 481.028. tadyadi bhagavānatītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante/
XXdivyav_u:19659: 482.001. atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ pādatale 'ntarhitāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19666: 482.013. tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra
XXdivyav_u:19671: 482.018. yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti dhīrāstaṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te
XXdivyav_u:19674: 482.020. nāhetvapratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
XXdivyav_u:19678: 482.024. rudrāyaṇa ānanda arhattvaṃ prāpto jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19680: 482.025. atha te vadhakapuruṣā āyuṣmato rudrāyaṇasya pātracīvaraṃ
XXdivyav_u:19683: 482.026. tau śrutvā prītiprāmodyajātau yena śikhaṇḍī rājā
XXdivyav_u:19687: 482.028. kathaṃ kṛtvā? yo devasya śatruḥ, sa praghātitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19689: 482.029. kathaṃ jñāyate 'sau? praghātita iti? tābhyāṃ te vadhakapuruṣā
XXdivyav_u:19690: darśitāh--deva, ime te badhakapuruṣā yaurasau praghātitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19691: 482.030. śokhaṇḍanā rājñā te pṛṣṭāh--bhavantaḥ, kiyadvṛddharājasya balam/
XXdivyav_u:19692: 482.031. deva, kutastasya balam? idaṃ pātracīvaraṃ khikkhiraṃ ceti/
XXdivyav_u:19694: jalapariṣekapratyāgataprāṇaḥ kathayati--bhavantaḥ, kiṃ vṛddharājena maraṇakāle vyākṛtam? deva, vṛddharājaḥ prāṇaviyogaḥ kathayati--
XXdivyav_u:19696: 483.004. ahaṃ ca parinirvāsye tvaṃ cāvīciṃ gamiṣyase//66// iti/
XXdivyav_u:19697: 483.005. idaṃ cāparaṃ vaktavyah--dve tvayā ānantarye karmaṇī kṛte--yacca
XXdivyav_u:19698: pitā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ, yaccārhan bhikṣuḥ kṣīṇāśravaśca/
XXdivyav_u:19703: 483.008. tena hirubhirukāvagrāmātyāvāhūtoktaubhavantau, na yuvābhyāmahamīdṛśakarma kurvāṇo nivārita iti? tau kathayatah--vayaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19705: 483.010. kathaṃ nivārayāma iti? tena tau duṣṭāmātyau adarśanapathe
XXdivyav_u:19708: 483.011. tābhyāmapi duṣṭāmātyābhyāṃ pracchannaṃ tiṣyapuṣyastūpayordve bale kṛtvā dvau biḍālapotakau
XXdivyav_u:19710: satyena satyavacanena yuvābhyāṃ māyayā lokaṃ vañcayitvā śraddhādeyaṃ vinipātya pratyavarāyāṃ biḍālayonāvupapannau, tena satyena satyavacanena
XXdivyav_u:19711: māṃsapeśīṃ kṛtvā svakasvakaṃ stūpaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakaṃ balaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19713: 483.015. tau yadā suśikṣitau saṃvṛttau, tadā tābhyāṃ duṣṭāmātyābhyāṃ
XXdivyav_u:19714: rudrāyaṇasya rājño devī uktā--devi, putraste kṛśāluko durbalako mlāno
XXdivyav_u:19718: 483.018. tau kathayati--devi, yatra gha{aḥ patitaḥ, kiṃ tatra rajjurapi
XXdivyav_u:19722: 483.021. sā tasya sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--putra, kasmātvamutpāṇḍūtpāḍuḥ kṛśāluko durbalako mlāno 'prāptakāya iti? sa kathayati--amba, tvamapyevaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19724: kathamahaṃ notpāṇḍūtpāṇḍuko bhavāmi kṛśāluko dubalako mlāno 'prāptakāya
XXdivyav_u:19725: iti, yena mayā duṣṭāmātyavigrāhitena dve ānantarye karmaṇī kṛte--yacca
XXdivyav_u:19726: pitā jīvitādvyaparopito yaccārhan bhikṣuḥ kṣīṇāśravah? ciramavīcau mahānarake vastavyamiti/
XXdivyav_u:19730: 483.027. sā kathayati--yathābhūtaṃ putra, nāsau tava pitā, kiṃ tu mayā
XXdivyav_u:19731: ṛtusnātayā anyena puruṣeṇa sārthaṃ paricaritam, tatastvaṃ jāta iti/
XXdivyav_u:19733: 483.029. iti viditvā kathayati--amba, yadyevaṃ pitṛvadho nāsti, athadvadho
XXdivyav_u:19735: 483.029. sa kathaṃ nistārya iti? sā kathayati--putra, jñānakocidāḥ
XXdivyav_u:19738: 483.031. tayā tau duṣṭāmātyau āhūyoktau--mayā asya pitṛvadho vinoditaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19742: 484.001. taiḥ sarvāmātyāḥ saṃnipātitāḥ, ye ca kecijjñānakovidāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19745: 484.003. tatra kecitkathayanti--deva, kenāsau dṛṣṭo 'rhattvam iti? apare
XXdivyav_u:19747: 484.004. tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah--deva, kimatra śokaḥ kriyate? sa
XXdivyav_u:19748: kathayati--yuvāmapyevaṃ kathayatha--kimarthaṃ śokaḥ kriyate iti, nanu yuvābhyāmevāhamarhadvadhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19750: 484.006. kuto 'rhadvadhah? sa kathayati--mayā pratyakṣadṛṣṭau tiṣyapuṣyau arhantau jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau nirvātau/
XXdivyav_u:19751: 484.008. yuvāmevaṃ kathayatha--na santyarhanataḥ, kuto 'rhadvadha iti? tau
XXdivyav_u:19752: kathayatah--vayaṃ devasya pratyakṣīkurmo yathā māyayā lokaṃ vañcayitvā
XXdivyav_u:19757: 484.011. eṣa ca śabdo rauruke nagare samantato visṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19759: 484.012. tatastau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah--yathā tiṣyapuṣyau yena satyena
XXdivyav_u:19760: satyavacanena yuvāṃ māyayā lokaṃ vañcayitvā śraddhādeyaṃ vinipātya pratyavarāyāṃ biḍālayonāvupapannau svakasvake stūpe tiṣṭhataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19761: 484.014. anena satyena satyavacanena imāṃ māṃsapeśīmādāya svakasvakaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19765: 484.016. tau māṃsapeśīmādāya svakasvakastūpaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakabilaṃ praviṣṭau/
XXdivyav_u:19766: 484.017. tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayata--dṛṣṭaṃ deveneti? sa kathayati--dṛṣṭam/
XXdivyav_u:19769: 484.018. tasya yāsau dṛṣṭih--santi loke 'rhanta iti, sā prativigatā/
XXdivyav_u:19770: 484.019. tatra ye 'śraddhāsteṣāmasaddarśanamutpannam, ye madhyasthāsteṣāṃ kāṅkṣā, ye śraddhāsteṣāmadbhutaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19772: 484.020. śikhaṇḍī rājā saṃlakṣayati--yadi na santyeva loke 'rhantaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:19773: kimarhtamāryakāśyapasya kātyāyanasya pañcaśataparivārasya śaulāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ plañcaśataparivārāyāḥ piṇḍakamanuprayacchāmīti? tena bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ ca piṇḍapātaḥ samucchinnaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19775: 484.023. athāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ śaulā ca bhikṣuṇī vinayāpekṣayā
XXdivyav_u:19778: 484.025. āyuṣmāṃśca mahākātyāyano raurukaṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya praviśati/
XXdivyav_u:19782: 484.027. dṛṣṭvā ca punarāmantrayate--bhavantaḥ, kimarthamayamāryo mahākātyāyano māṃ dṛṣṭvā ekānte 'pakramyāvasthita iti/
XXdivyav_u:19785: kṛtakautukamaṅgalo gacchati, mā aprasādaṃ vedayiṣyati, duḥkhaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19786: caradgacchati, karma kriyate, pātracīvarāṇi pāṃśunā avatariṣyatīti/
XXdivyav_u:19788: 484.031. āyuṣmān mahākātyāyano raurukaṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya caritvā
XXdivyav_u:19791: 485.001. śikhaṇḍī rājā kathayati--bhavantaḥ, pūrvamapyayamāryo mahākātyāyano māṃ dṛṣṭvā ekānte 'pakramyāvasthitaḥ, sāmpratimapi/
XXdivyav_u:19792: 485.003. ko 'tra heturiti? tasya pṛṣṭhatastau duṣṭāmātyau gacchataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19793: 485.003. tau kathayatah--deva, eṣa kathayati--mā ahamasya pitṛmārakasya rajasā pravrajyāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:19796: 485.005. sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, yasyāhaṃ priyaḥ, so 'sya muṇḍakasya śramaṇakasyoparyekaikaṃ pāṃśumusṭiṃ kṣipatviti/
XXdivyav_u:19799: 485.006. ekaikayā pāṃśumuṣṭyā āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasyopari mahān pāṃśurāśirvyavasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19805: kalirājena pitṛmārakeṇa āryo mahākātyāyano 'duṣyanayakārī pāṃśunā avaṣṭabdha iti/
XXdivyav_u:19806: 485.011. tau sāśrukaṇṭhau rudanmukhau gopālakapaśupālakaiḥ sārdhaṃ pāṃśūnapanetumārabdhau/
XXdivyav_u:19808: 485.012. tau pādayor nipatya pṛcchatah--ārya, kimidamiti? sa
XXdivyav_u:19809: kathayati--kimanyadbhaviṣyatīti? tau kathayatah--ārya, yadidaṃ śikhaṇḍinā mahākātyāyane janakāyasahāyena karma kṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:19811: 485.015. itaḥ saptame divase raurukaṃ nagaraṃ pāṃśunā avaṣṭapsyate/
XXdivyav_u:19812: 485.015. ārya, kā āvupūrvī bhaviṣyatīti? āyuṣmantau, prathame divase mahāvāyurāgatya raurukaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19816: suvarṇavarṣam, paścādyai raurukasāmāntanivāsibhiḥ sāmavāyikaṃ karma kṛtam,
XXdivyav_u:19818: 485.019. teṣu praviṣṭeṣu ṣaṣṭhe divase ratvavarṣaṃ patiṣyati, saptame divase pāṃśuvarṣamiti/
XXdivyav_u:19819: 485.019. tau kathayatah--ārya, kimāvāmasya karmaṇo bhāvinau? bhadramukhau,
XXdivyav_u:19822: kathayati--yuvām yāvacca gṛham yāvacca nadī atrāntare suruṅgāṃ khānayitvā gṛhasamīpe nāvaṃ sthāpayitvā tiṣṭhata/
XXdivyav_u:19823: 485.023. yadā ratnavarṣaṃ patet, tadā ratnānāṃ nāvaṃ pūrayitvā
XXdivyav_u:19825: 485.023. tau tasya pādayor nipatya raurukaṃ praviṣṭau/
XXdivyav_u:19826: 485.024. rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ praviṣṭau kathayatah--kiṃ devenāryo mahākātyāyanaḥ kiṃciduktaḥ pāṃśunāvaṣṭabdhah? sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, jīvatyasau? deva,
XXdivyav_u:19828: 485.025. kiṃ kathayati--deva, evaṃ kathayati--itaḥ saptame divase raurukaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19830: 485.026. kānupūrvī? kathayati--deva, sa evaṃ kathayati, prathame tāvaddivase mahavāyurāgatya raurukaṃ nagaramapagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakapālaṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyati, dvitīye divase puṣpavarṣaṃ patiṣyati, tṛtīye divase vastravarṣam, caturthe hiraṇyavarṣam, pañcame suvarṇavarṣam, paścādyai raurukasāmantakanivāsibhiḥ sāmavāyikaṃ karma kṛtaṃ te raurukaṃ nagaraṃ pravekṣyanti, teṣu praviṣṭeṣu ṣaṣṭhe divase ratnavarṣaṃ patiṣyati, saptame divase pāṃśuvarṣamiti/
XXdivyav_u:19834: kathayati--<486>yuvām yāvacca gṛham yāvacca nadī atrāntare suruṅgāṃ
XXdivyav_u:19836: 486.002. yadā ratnavarṣaṃ patet, tadā ratnānāṃ nāvaṃ pūrayitvā
XXdivyav_u:19839: pāṃśuvarṣeṇāvaṣṭabadhaḥ sa kimanyadvadatu? īdṛśaṃ vā vadate, devato vā pāpanaramiti(?)/
XXdivyav_u:19841: 486.004. hirubhirukāvagrāmātyau mukhaṃ vibhaṇḍya hastān saṃparivartya prakrāntau/
XXdivyav_u:19844: 486.006. hitukena śyāmāko dāraka āyuṣmate mahākātyāyanāya dattah--ārya,
XXdivyav_u:19847: 486.008. bhirukenāpi śyāmāvatī dārikā śailāyā bhikṣuṇyā dattā--ārye,
XXdivyav_u:19849: 486.009. no cet kauśāmbyāṃ ghoṣilo nāma gṛhapatirmama vayasyastasya
XXdivyav_u:19852: 486.010. atha śailā bhikṣuṇī śyāmāvatīmādāya ṛddhyā raurukānnagarāt
XXdivyav_u:19857: 486.012. hirubhirukābhyāmagrāmātyābhyām yāvacca gṛham yāvacca nadī atrāntare suruṅgāṃ khānayitvā gṛhasamīpe ca nauḥ sthāpitā/
XXdivyav_u:19858: 486.014. yāvadanyatamasmin divase mahāvāyurāgataḥ, yena taṃ raurukaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19861: 486.015. tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah--deva, śrūyate rājño māndhātuḥ
XXdivyav_u:19873: 486.021. yau raurukasāmantakanivāsibhiḥ sāmavāyikaṃ karma kṛtam, te raurukaṃ nagaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19874: 486.022. teṣu praviṣṭeṣu ṣaṣṭhe divase ratnavarṣaṃ patitam/
XXdivyav_u:19876: 486.023. tatra hirukeṇānyatamasmin pradeśe hirukaṃ nāma nagaraṃ māpitam/
XXdivyav_u:19878: 486.024. bhirukeṇānyatamasmin pradeśe bhirukaṃ nāma nagaraṃ māpitam/
XXdivyav_u:19882: 486.026. śyāmākaḥ kathayati--ārya, kimeṣa uccaśabdo mahāśabda iti/
XXdivyav_u:19883: 486.027. āyuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ kathayati--putra, vātāyanena kāśikāṃ niṣkāsayeti/
XXdivyav_u:19890: 486.030. atha yā raurukanivāsinī devatā sā yenāyuṣmān
XXdivyav_u:19899: 487.002. sa ṛddhyā uparivihāyasā śyāmākaṃ dārakamādāya saṃprasthitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19904: 487.005. āyuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ śyāmākaṃ dārakaṃ khalabhidhāne sthāpayitvā
XXdivyav_u:19907: 487.007. yastatra puruṣo 'vasthitaḥ, sa taṃ dārakaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasya sakāśamupasaṃkramya kathayati--bho dāraka, tava prabhāvātkhalābhidhāne dhānyaṃ vardhata iti/
XXdivyav_u:19908: 487.008. sa kathayati--na mama prabhāvāt khalabhidhāne dhānyaṃ vardhata iti, api tu raurukanivāsinī devatā ihāgatā amuṣmin pradeśe tiṣṭhati,
XXdivyav_u:19909: tasyāḥ prabhāvāt khalābhidhāne dhānyaṃ vardhata iti/
XXdivyav_u:19910: 487.010. sa tasyāḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā pādayor nipatya kathayati--devate,
XXdivyav_u:19911: tāḍakaṃ kuñcikāṃ ca tāvaddhāraya, yāvadgrāmam {gatvā} āgacchāmi/
XXdivyav_u:19912: 487.011. na ca tvayā māṃ muktvā anyasya kasyaciddātavyamiti/
XXdivyav_u:19913: 487.012. tenāpi karvaṭakaṃ gatvā karvaṭakanivāsī janakāyaḥ saṃnipātitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19917: 487.014. tasyā haste mayā tāḍakaṃ kuñcikā ca dattā/
XXdivyav_u:19918: 487.015. {uktam} ca--devate, tāḍakaṃ kuñcikāṃ ca tāvaddhāraya yāvad grāmaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19920: 487.016. na ca tvayā māṃ muktvā anyasya kasyaciddātavyamiti/
XXdivyav_u:19921: 487.016. tadadhiṣṭhānaṃ vijñāpayāmi--yadi mama putraṃ śreṣṭhinamabhiṣiñcatha, ahamātmānaṃ
XXdivyav_u:19925: 487.019. tataḥ sarvaṃ tadadhiṣṭhānaṃ gandhapuṣpośobhitaṃ chatradhvajapatākāśobhitaṃ ca balimādāya yena devatā tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19926: 487.021. upasaṃkramya pādayor nipatya kathayati--devate, adhiṣṭhā bhava,
XXdivyav_u:19930: 487.022. āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana iti kathayati--devate, samanvāhara asya yasya sakāśāt tāḍakaḥ kuñcikā ca gṛhīteti/
XXdivyav_u:19934: 487.025. tauryādṛśameva tasyā devatāyāḥ sthaṇḍilaṃ kāritaṃ tādṛśamevāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya/
XXdivyav_u:19935: 487.027. tasyā devatāyā yo 'dhiṣṭhāne pradīpaḥ prajñaptaḥ, tamasau gṛhītvā āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya sthaṇḍile sthāpayati/
XXdivyav_u:19936: 487.028. sā anyatamena puruṣeṇa prākārakaṇṭake sthitena pradīpaṃ gṛhītvā gacchantī dṛṣṭā/
XXdivyav_u:19952: 488.005. te kathayanti--devate kṣamakha, prativiśiṣṭataraṃ kurma iti/
XXdivyav_u:19956: 488.006. āyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastatra varṣoṣitaḥ śyāmākaṃ dārakamādāya devatāmupāmantrya
XXdivyav_u:19957: 488.007. sā kathayati--ārya, mama kiciccihnamanuprayaccha, yatrāhaṃ kārāṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:19959: 488.009. tayātra prakṣipya stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpito mahaśca prasthāpitah--kāśīmaha kāśīmaha iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
XXdivyav_u:19963: 488.011. tairlambate lambata iti uccair nādo muktaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19964: 488.011. tasmiñ janapade manuṣyāṇāṃ lambakapāla iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
XXdivyav_u:19966: 488.013. tatra śyāmākaṃ dārakaṃ vṛkṣamūle sthāpayitvā piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:19968: 488.014. paurajānapadāḥ saṃnipatya kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, kaṃ rājānamabhiṣiñcāma iti? tatraike kathayanti--yaḥ puṇyamaheśākhya iti/
XXdivyav_u:19976: 488.018. tasya vṛkṣasya cchāyā asya śyāmākasya dāraksya kāyaṃ na vijahātīti/
XXdivyav_u:19977: 488.019. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ saṃjalpitumārabdhāh--bhavantaḥ, ayaṃ puṇyamaheśākhyaḥ sattvaḥ, etamabhiṣiñcāma
XXdivyav_u:19983: 488.022. kimasya dārakasya rājñaḥ saṃvartanīyāni karmāṇi na veti/
XXdivyav_u:19985: 488.023. sa kathayati--putra, pratīccha rājyam, kiṃ tu dharmeṇa te
XXdivyav_u:19993: 488.027. sā āyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati--dṛṣṭvā cirasya bara putrakaṃ paśyāmi, cirasya bata putrakaṃ paśyāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:19997: 488.029. tasyā āyuṣmatā mahākātyāyanenāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca
XXdivyav_u:19998: jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
XXdivyav_u:19999: 488.032. sā dṛṣṭasatyā trirudānamudānayati sma--idamasmākaṃ bhadanata na mātrā <489>kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇairyadbhavatā
XXdivyav_u:20002: pihitānyapāyadvārāṇi, vivṛtāni svargamokṣadvārāṇi, pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ smo devamauṣyeṣu/
XXdivyav_u:20006: 489.006. durgatibhyaḥ samuddhṛtya svarge ca te aham/
XXdivyav_u:20007: 489.007. sthāpitā putra yatnena sādhu te duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam//68//
XXdivyav_u:20008: 489.008. athāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastāṃ bhadrakanyāṃ satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya kathayati--amba, avalokitā bhava, gacchāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:20009: 489.009. sā kathayati--putra, yadyevaṃ mama kiṃcidanuprayaccha, yatrāhaṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:20011: 489.010. tayā stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya sā tasmin pratimāropitā/
XXdivyav_u:20016: 489.012. atha yā uttarāpathanivāsinī devatā, sā āyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanamidamavocat--ārya, mamāpi kiṃciccihnamanuprayaccha, yatrāhaṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:20017: 489.014. sa saṃlakṣayati--uktaṃ bhagavatā madhyadeśe pule na dhārayitavye iti/
XXdivyav_u:20020: 489.015. tayā sthaṇḍile kārayitvā te pratiṣṭhāpite itaścarasantisaṃjñā
XXdivyav_u:20024: 489.017. kiccitkuśalacaryeti? sa kathayati--āyuṣmantaḥ, kiṃcit sukhacaryā kiṃcidduḥkhacaryeti/
XXdivyav_u:20025: 489.018. bhikṣavaḥ kathayanti--kiṃ sukhacaryā kiṃ duḥkhacaryeti? sa
XXdivyav_u:20027: 489.019. yad rājā śikhaṇḍī raurukanivāsī ca janakāya ahaṃ ca pāṃśunāvacṭabdhaḥ, hirubhirukau cāgrāmātyau kṛcchreṇa palāyitau, iyaṃ
XXdivyav_u:20034: 489.024. bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā rudrāyaṇena karma kṛtam yenāḍhye
XXdivyav_u:20035: mahādhane mahābhoge kule pratyājātah? bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajya
XXdivyav_u:20036: sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam? arhattvaprāptaśca śastreṇa praghātita iti? bhagavānāha--rudrāyaṇena bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtānyupacittāni
XXdivyav_u:20039: 489.028. ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau,
XXdivyav_u:20040: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni
XXdivyav_u:20042: 490.002. sāmagarīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//69// iti/
XXdivyav_u:20044: pratyekabuddhā lola utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktāḥ khaṅgaviṣāṇakalpā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
XXdivyav_u:20046: 490.005. tasya karvaṭakasya ca nātidūre udapānaṃ prabhūtānāṃ
XXdivyav_u:20048: 490.006. tatrāsau lubdhakaḥ pratidinaṃ prabhūtān kūṭān pāśālepāṃśca
XXdivyav_u:20049: pratikṣipati prabhūtānāṃ mṛgānāmutsādāya vināśāya anayena vyasanāya/
XXdivyav_u:20051: 490.008. yāvadanyataraḥ pratyekabuddho janapadacārikāaṃ caraṃstaṃ karvaṭakamanuprāpto devatāyatane rātiṃdivā samupāgataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:20052: 490.009. sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya taṃ karvaṭakamanuprāptaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:20054: 490.010. tataḥ piṇḍapātamaṭitvā saṃlakṣayati--idaṃ devāyatanaṃ divā ākīrṇam/
XXdivyav_u:20055: 490.011. bahiḥ karvaṭakasya śānte sthāne piṇḍapātaṃ velāṃ karomīti/
XXdivyav_u:20056: 490.011. sa karvaṭakānniṣkramyedaṃ śāntamidaṃ śāntamiti yena tadudapānaṃ
XXdivyav_u:20058: 490.012. upasaṃkramya pātrasnāvaṇamekānta upanikṣipya pādau prakṣālya hastau nirmādya pānīyaṃ parisrāvya śīrṇaparṇakāni samudānīya niṣadya bhaktaketyaṃ kṛtvā hastau nirmādya mukhaṃ pātraṃ ca pātraparisrāvaṇam
XXdivyav_u:20059: yathāsthāne sthāpya pādau prakṣālya anyatamavṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍīkṛtaṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā śānteneryāpathena
XXdivyav_u:20062: 490.016. atha sa lubdhakaḥ kālyamevotthāya yena tadudapānaṃ
XXdivyav_u:20067: 490.018. kimatra kāraṇam yenādya ekamṛgo 'pi na baddha iti?/
XXdivyav_u:20074: 490.021. yadyadyāhamasya jīvitāpacchedaṃ na karomi, niyatameṣa mama vṛttisamucchedaṃ karoti/
XXdivyav_u:20076: 490.023. tenāsau nirghṛṇahṛdayena tyaktaparalokena karākārasadṛśaṃ dhanurākarṇaṃ pūrayitvā saviṣeṇa śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:20077: 490.024. sa mahātmā pratyekabuddhaḥ saṃlakṣayati--mā ayaṃ tapasvī lubdho
XXdivyav_u:20080: 490.025. sa vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarāja uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi
XXdivyav_u:20082: 490.027. sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya
XXdivyav_u:20089: 490.030. sa saṃlakṣayati--yanmayā anena pūtikāyena prāptavyaṃ tadidānīṃ śāntaṃ nirupadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇadhātuṃ praviśāmīti/
XXdivyav_u:20090: 490.031. sa tasyaiva purastātpunargaganatalamabhyudgamya vicitrāṇi pratihāryāṇi vidarśya nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:20094: 491.001. tānyasthīni nave kumbhe prakṣipya śārīrastūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:20096: 491.002. gandhairmālyairdhūpaśca kumbhe kṛtvā pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ
XXdivyav_u:20097: kṛtam--yanmayaivaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye 'pakāro kṛtaḥ, mā ahamasya karmano bhāgī syām/
XXdivyav_u:20098: 491.004. yattu kārā kṛtā, anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam, evaṃvidhānāṃ ca guṇānāṃ lābhī syām, prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātuḥ śāstāramārāgayeyaṃ na virāgayoyamiti//
XXdivyav_u:20099: 491.007. kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena
XXdivyav_u:20101: 491.008. yadanena pratyekabuddhaḥ saviṣeṇa śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ, tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi narakeṣu paktaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:20102: tasminnapi codapāne saviṣeṇa śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ, tenaiva ca karmāvaśeṣeṇaitarhyapyarhattvaprāptaḥ śastreṇa praghātitaḥ//
XXdivyav_u:20103: 491.011. punarapi bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta śikhaṇḍinā raurukanivāsinā
XXdivyav_u:20104: janakāyenāyucmatā mahākātyāyanena ca karma kṛtam yena pāṃśunāvaṣṭabdhāḥ,
XXdivyav_u:20105: hirubhirukau tvagrāmātyau niṣpalayitāviti? bhagavānāha--ebhireva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni
XXdivyav_u:20108: 491.015. ke 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bḥkṣavaḥ karmaṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau,
XXdivyav_u:20109: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāayataneṣu karmaṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
XXdivyav_u:20111: 491.019. samagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//70//
XXdivyav_u:20114: 491.021. sa tayā saha krīḍate ramate paricārayati/
XXdivyav_u:20115: 491.021. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:20116: 491.022. punarasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato dārikā jātā/
XXdivyav_u:20119: 491.023. yā janmikā dārikāḥ, tāsām yācanakā āgacchanti/
XXdivyav_u:20121: 491.024. asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanasanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
XXdivyav_u:20124: 491.026. yāvattayā dārikayā gṛhaṃ saṃmṛjya vāṭasyopariṣṭāt saṃkāraśchoritaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:20130: 491.029. sā bhrātrā pṛṣṭā--kiṃ tvayādya kṛtam yena te yācanakā nāgatā iti/
XXdivyav_u:20135: 491.032. yasyā yasyā yācanakā āgacchanti, sā sā tasya
XXdivyav_u:20142: 492.003. tasmin karvaṭake dvau gṛhapatī samakau prativasataḥ/
XXdivyav_u:20145: 492.005. kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau dārikā yayā pratyekabuddhasyopari
XXdivyav_u:20147: 492.006. yo 'sau karvaṭakanivāsī janakāyaḥ, eṣa evāsau raurukanivāsī
XXdivyav_u:20154: 492.009. yo 'sau dārikāyā bhrātā yena vipuṣpitam, eṣa evāsau kātyāyano
XXdivyav_u:20156: 492.010. yadanena bipuṣpitaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena pāṃśunāvaṣṭabdhaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:20157: 492.011. yadi tena na vipuṣpitam (cittam) na pāṃśunāvaṣṭabdho 'bhaviṣyaditi/
XXdivyav_u:20160: 492.013. iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXdivyav_u:20162: 492.014. tasmāttarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXdivyav_u:20178: 493.015. dṛṣṭvā lokamimaṃ dhanakṣayabhayāt saṃtyaktadānotsavaṃ lokakleśapiśācikāvaśatayā saṃdūṣitādhyāśayam/
XXdivyav_u:20179: 493.017. kāruṇyāt sa dadāvanāthakṛpaṇaklībāturebhyo dhanaṃ matvā ca
XXdivyav_u:20181: 493.019. yeṣu vyāsajjacetā bhujagavaravadhūbhogabhīmeṣu labdhā gāhante pāpagartaṃ sphuṭadahanaśikhābhīmaparyantarandhram/
XXdivyav_u:20183: 493.023. tasmāt putradhanatvāt putrābhilāṣiṇo yadā manorathaśatairasakṛdunmiṣitonmiṣitāḥ putraśriyaḥ prasahya sphītataravairabhārendhanavahninaiva vigatanikhilapratīkāradāruṇaprabhāvamahatā sukṛtāntalayaīkaparāyaṇāḥ kriyante sma, yadāsau lokapravādamātrayāpi panthānaṃ samavatīrya dhanadavaruṇakuberaśaṃkarajanārdanapitāmahādīn devatāviśeṣān putrārtham
XXdivyav_u:20187: 493.029. tattattasya prabalavirasam yāti tīkṣṇāṃśumālaiḥ śoṣaṃ manye
XXdivyav_u:20192: śaraṇam yayau bahu punardānaṃ dvijebhyo dadau//6//
XXdivyav_u:20195: 494.009. evamanekaprakārakāyacetasorāyāsakāribhirapi vratopavāsamaṅgalairyadā naiva kadācit kāle 'sya putrā jīvino babhūvuḥ,
XXdivyav_u:20200: 494.015. na ca te 'dyāpi jīvanti tatra kiṃ parikhidyase//9//
XXdivyav_u:20202: 494.018. ye yairvinā nātmabhavaṃ labhante te tairvinā janma kathaṃ bhajeran//10//
XXdivyav_u:20205: 494.022. tvaṃ kenāpi viḍambase jaḍamatiḥ putrāśayonmattako yastvaṃ
XXdivyav_u:20207: 494.024. vidhimaparamahaṃ te bodhayāmi prasiddhyai tvamapi ca kuru tāvat saṃprasiddhyai
XXdivyav_u:20208: 494.026. yadi bhavati sutaste kanyakānāma tasya sakalajanapade 'smin
XXdivyav_u:20210: 494.028. atha tasya kālāntare gaganatalamaṃśumālīva svakiraṇanikarairvirājamānaṃ svavaṃśalakṣmīḥ putraṃ janayāmbabhūva/
XXdivyav_u:20214: 495.005. mūrtistasya rarāja cāruśikharāddhemam yathā bhūcyutaṃ prodgīrṇasvamayūkhajālajaṭilai
XXdivyav_u:20222: 495.017. atha tasya pitā mitraḥ sārthavāho vaṇigjanaiḥ/
XXdivyav_u:20225: 495.021. pitaryatīte jananīṃ jagāda cakāra kiṃ karma pitā mameti//20//
XXdivyav_u:20231: 495.028. yāvaccāyaṃ janapadamimaṃ tasya vṛttiṃ na bhūtāṃ pṛcchatyasmai kathayati na vā sarva evaiṣa lokaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:20232: 495.030. tāvadyuktaṃ mama sutamimaṃ mṛtyuvaktrāntarālaṃ nānāduḥkhavyasanagahanaṃ vyādhiṣaktaṃ
XXdivyav_u:20233: 496.001. <496>paro 'pi yaḥ sādhujanānujuṣṭaṃ vihāya mārgaṃ śrayate vimārgam/
XXdivyav_u:20234: 496.003. nivāraṇīyaḥ sa svamatājjanena prayatnataḥ kiṃ punareva
XXdivyav_u:20238: 496.008. atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo māturvacanaṃ kusumamālāmiva śirasā
XXdivyav_u:20242: 496.012. svagarbhasaṃdhāraṇaduḥkhitāyai dadau sa tasyai mudito jananyai/
XXdivyav_u:20244: 496.016. atha ye tasmin puravare ciraṃtanā aukarikāḥ, te tasya tāmabhivardhamānāṃ kriyavikrayalokamaviṣamavyavahāranītyā prakṛtipremapeśalatayā cāvarjitamanasastasmin mahāsattve
XXdivyav_u:20247: 496.020. sa tvaṃ tāṃ vṛttimujjhatvā śrayase 'nyāṃ kayā dhiyā//28//
XXdivyav_u:20252: 496.024. atha gāndhikāpaṇikāḥ puruṣāḥ sametyāgatya ca taṃ mahāsattvaṃ
XXdivyav_u:20254: 496.026. gāndhāpaṇaṃ klībajanābhipannaṃ pitā na vai mādya pure(?) cakāra/
XXdivyav_u:20255: 496.028. tatraiva hairaṇyikatāṃ sa kṛtvā dhanāni bhūyāṃsi samāpa
XXdivyav_u:20256: 496.030. atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastāmapi jīvikāmapahāya hairaṇyikāpaṇaṃ cakrāra/
XXdivyav_u:20258: 497.001. <497>lebhe dine sa prathame mahārhaḥ kārṣāpaṇān ṣoḍaśa tān dadau ca//31//
XXdivyav_u:20261: 497.005. atha hairaṇyikāpaṇikāḥ puruṣā sametyāgatya ca taṃ tasmātkarmaṇo
XXdivyav_u:20266: 497.010. vivartitaṃ ślāghyamatīva puṃsāṃ na tu svavṛtteścyavanaṃ
XXdivyav_u:20269: 497.016. yadāśritaṃ karma janānuvarjinā tvayā vidagdhena dhanepsunādhunā/
XXdivyav_u:20270: 497.018. kathaṃ na saṃprāpsyasi bhāgyasampadaṃ piturvyatīte 'pi viśālinīṃ
XXdivyav_u:20273: 497.022. tasyā mahendrāmalatulyakīrteḥ sūnuḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ na bibharṣi
XXdivyav_u:20274: 497.024. ye mṛtyuṃ gaṇayanti naiva vipadi grāsaṃ bhajante 'nagha gehe bandhuṣu sūnuṣu vyapagatasnehātmanodyoginaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:20275: 497.026. ye nītvā jaladhīnagādhasalilānāvartabhīmān budhāḥ prāpyārthān gajadantabhaṅgasitayāsinvanta kīrtyā jagat//38//
XXdivyav_u:20276: 497.028. atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastebhyo 'pi tathānuguṇinīṃ kathāmavadhārya samudrāvataraṇakṛtavyavasāyo
XXdivyav_u:20279: 497.030. sā pūrvameva bhartṛmaraṇaduḥkhena vigatajīvitāśā svasya tanayasya
XXdivyav_u:20282: 497.033. jīvitaṃ kasya te 'niṣṭaṃ tvayā krīḍāṃ karoti kaḥ//39//
XXdivyav_u:20285: 498.003. na yāvadevaṃ mama duḥkhaśalyaṃ prayāti nāśaṃ pravidārya śokam/
XXdivyav_u:20286: 498.005. kathaṃ nu tasyopari me dvitīyaṃ nipātyate
XXdivyav_u:20287: 498.007. yeṣāṃ ceto vividhavirasāyāsaduḥkhāprakampyam yaiḥ saṃtyaktaṃ kṛpaṇahṛdayairjīvitaṃ
XXdivyav_u:20288: 498.009. te saṃtyaktvā nayanagalitāśrupravāhārdravaktrān bandhūnajñā makaranilaye mṛtyave yānti nāśam//42//
XXdivyav_u:20290: 498.013. saṃtyajya yātuṃ kathamudyamaste mā sā kathā mā nu vaco
XXdivyav_u:20292: 498.017. saṃpattayo yena vaṇigjanasya tato 'hamevaṃ suta vārayāmi//44//
XXdivyav_u:20293: 498.019. sa tasyā hitārthaṃ madhurāṇyapi vacanakusumāni tṛṇamivāvadhūya
XXdivyav_u:20295: 498.021. varaṃ naiva tu jāyeran ye jātā nirdhanā janāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:20296: 498.022. jātasya yadi duḥkhāni varaṃ mṛtyur na jīvitam//45//
XXdivyav_u:20298: 498.024. arthino mama pāpasya yānti niḥśvasya durmanāḥ//46//
XXdivyav_u:20299: 498.025. ye śaktihīnā vibhavārjanādau te dehino duḥkhaśataṃ sahante/
XXdivyav_u:20300: 498.027. lokaṃ punarduḥkhaśatopataptaṃ draṣṭaṃ na śaknomi cirāyamāṇaḥ//47//
XXdivyav_u:20301: 498.029. tasmādvilaṅghāmi vacastvadīyam yāsyāmi taṃ tvaṃ prajahīhi śokam/
XXdivyav_u:20302: 498.031. tatraiva yāyāṃ nidhanaṃ samudre chinnaṃ mayā vā vyasanaṃ janasya//48//
XXdivyav_u:20303: 499.001. <499>atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo mātaramapramāṇīkṛtya nirgatya gṛhādvārāṇasyāṃ puryāmātmānaṃ sārthavāhamityuddhoṣayāmāsa/
XXdivyav_u:20304: 499.003. asyāmeva purā puraṃdarapurīpratispardhipuryāṃ vaṇik mitro nāma
XXdivyav_u:20306: 499.005. putrastasya mahāsamudramacirādyāsyatyamuṣmindine yātum ye vaṇijaḥ kṛtopakaraṇāste santu sajjā iti//49//
XXdivyav_u:20309: 499.008. mātā cainaṃ gacchatīti śrutvāha--mamaikaputraka, kva yāsyasīti karuṇakaruṇākranditamātraparāyāṇā komalavimalakamaladalavilāsālasābhyāṃ pāṇikamalābhyāṃ rucirakanakaghaṭitaghaṭavikaṭapayodharavarorubhāsuramuraḥ pragāḍhamabhitāḍayati/
XXdivyav_u:20312: 499.014. anartharāgagrahamūḍhabuddhayo narā hi paśyanti na kevalaṃ hitam/
XXdivyav_u:20313: 499.016. satāṃ hitādhānavidhānacetasāṃ giro 'pi śṛṇvanti na bhūtavādinām//50//
XXdivyav_u:20316: 499.021. muhurupacitaśokaḥ karmaṇā preryamāṇas tvaritamatirabhūt saṃprayātuṃ vaṇigbhiḥ//51//
XXdivyav_u:20320: 499.026. vyasanaphalamanantaṃ mā tu bhūt karmaṇo 'sya punarapi guruvākyaṃ mātigāḥ svapnato
XXdivyav_u:20336: 500.025. tadeva sa saṃlakṣya tīraparyantarekhaṃ prakaṭavikaṭārtagartodarabhramadbhramitajhaṣabhujagakulamaṇḍalaṃ naikavicitrādbhutāścaryamatiśayamambhasāmālayamatikrāmatastasya dharaṇīdharaśikharavipulātmabhāvasya makarakaripatervivartamānasya
XXdivyav_u:20337: samutthitairurvīdharākāradāruṇaiḥ pramuktakalakalārāvaraudrairmahadbhiḥ salilanivahairutpīḍyamānaṃ tadyānapātraṃ maraṇabhayaviṣādabhraśyamānagātrairdīnaruditākranditamātraparāyaṇaiḥ samyānapātrakaiḥ saha sahaiva salilanidheradhaḥ praveṣṭumārabdham/
XXdivyav_u:20347: 501.010. tato 'sau samapavanagamanajavajanitasavilāsagatibhiḥ salilaplavairitastataḥ samākṣipyamāṇo nirāhāratayā ca parimlāyamānanayanavadanakamalaścānyairbahubhirahorātrairyathākathaṃcittasya durvagāhasalilasya mahārṇavasya dakṣiṇaṃ tīradeśamāsasāda/
XXdivyav_u:20349: 501.016. saṃsmṛtya māturvacanaṃ sa pāṇā vyāsajya mūrdhānamidaṃ
XXdivyav_u:20350: 501.018. śṛṇvanti ye nātmahitaṃ gurūṇāṃ vākyaṃ hitārthodayakāryabhadram/
XXdivyav_u:20353: 501.024. prāptaṃ phalaṃ janmataroḥ sudhībhirye mānayantīha giro
XXdivyav_u:20354: 501.026. māturhitāyaiva sadodyatāyāḥ prollaṅghya vākyaṃ mama duṣkṛtasya/
XXdivyav_u:20355: 501.028. puṣpam yadīdṛgbharapāpadāruṇaṃ prāntaṃ gamiṣyāmi kadā phalasya//65//
XXdivyav_u:20359: 502.001. <502>ye santo hitavādināṃ sphuṭadhiyāṃ saṃpādayante giriḥ śreyaste samavāpnuvanti niyataṃ kravyādapuryām yathā/
XXdivyav_u:20360: 502.003. ye tūtsṛjya mahārthasāradayitāṃ vācaṃ śrayante 'nyathā dustāre vyasanodadhau nipatintāḥ śocanti te 'ham yathā//67//
XXdivyav_u:20365: 502.011. sarpān bhīmaviṣānalasphuradurujvālākarālasphuṭān hatvā pāṇitalaiḥ prayānti vivaśāḥ phūtkārabhītā nunaḥ//68//
XXdivyav_u:20383: 503.005. likhantaṃ karālair nabhaḥ śṛṅgajālaiḥ kṣipantaṃ mayūkhaistamaḥ
XXdivyav_u:20412: kanakakalaśākārapṛthutarapaodharabharāvanamitatanumadhyā divasakarakarasparśavibodhitāmlānakamalapalāśabhāsurādharakisalayā vividhavibhūṣaṇaśatā nirāmayadarśanāḥ śirasi viracitobhayakamalāñjalayo maitrakanyasya bodhisattvasya pādayorvinyasitaśirasaḥ prāhuh--
XXdivyav_u:20415: 504.025. adyaiva duḥkhāni śamaṃ gatāni adyaiva no jīvitamāttasāram/
XXdivyav_u:20420: 505.003. teṣāṃ phalaṃ vīkṣaṇameva te 'laṃ saṅgastvayā kiṃ punareva dīghyam
XXdivyav_u:20422: 505.005. adyaiva mā bandhusuhṛdviyogaśokaṃkathāḥ kasya na santyapāyāḥ/
XXdivyav_u:20423: 505.007. dāsyo vayaṃ te 'psarasaścatasrah chāyā na te laṅghayituṃ
XXdivyav_u:20424: 505.009. ratnāni vāsāṃsi samujjvalāni śayyāśrayāścārutarā vayaṃ ca/
XXdivyav_u:20429: 505.018. nitye viyoge maraṇāt puraḥsthite śocanti te deśakṛte viyoge/
XXdivyav_u:20433: 505.024. haimādriśṛṅgamiva tatpuramāviśantaṃ nemuḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭā bahavo 'pi tatra//92//
XXdivyav_u:20436: 505.029. hā kiṃ vinikṣipya kharāgravajro nāthaḥ surāṇāmiti tarkito
XXdivyav_u:20445: 506.009. krīḍan sa kālaṃ na viveda yātaṃ sarvātmanā rāgaparītacetāḥ//96//
XXdivyav_u:20446: 506.011. pratyahaṃ ca dakṣiṇena gamanaṃ vārayanti sma/
XXdivyav_u:20447: 506.011. so 'pi yathā yathā nivāryate, tathā tathā tayā diśā gamanāyautsukyamanā babhūva/
XXdivyav_u:20450: 506.015. yadi kuryādayaṃ loke suhṛdāṃ vacanaṃ hitam/
XXdivyav_u:20451: 506.016. paraiti svargaṃ pātāle śvabhre vā svapnato 'pi na//98//
XXdivyav_u:20453: padavīmāruhya vrajan sadāmattakaṃ nāma nagaraṃ dadarśa/
XXdivyav_u:20454: 506.018. tasmādapi nagarādaṣṭāpsarasaḥ sasambhramaṃ niḥsṛtya taṃ mahāsattvaṃ praveśayāmāsuḥ/
XXdivyav_u:20456: dakṣiṇena pathā gacchannandanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ dadarśa/
XXdivyav_u:20458: 506.021. tatrāpi ciraṃ krīḍāṃ sevitvā tasmādapi brahmottaraṃ nāma nagaraṃ prayayau/
XXdivyav_u:20459: 506.021. tatrāpi dvātriṃśatāpsarobhiḥ prabhūtasatkāraṃ viṣayasukhaṃ bhuktvā tāḥ prāha--
XXdivyav_u:20460: 506.023. icchāmi gantuṃ tadahaṃ bhavantyo mā matkṛte śokahrade śayīdhvam/
XXdivyav_u:20461: 506.025. saṃpātabhadrāṇi hi kasya nāma viśleṣaduḥkhāni na santi loke//99//
XXdivyav_u:20462: 506.027. sthitvāpi yenaiva ciraṃ viyogaḥ śatroḥ kṛtāntādbhavitāntakāle/
XXdivyav_u:20465: 507.001. <507>viśleṣaduḥkhāya ratiṃ prayānti teṣāṃ paro nāsti vimūḍhacetāḥ//101//
XXdivyav_u:20466: 507.003. athāpsarasastāḥ samastāstadgamanaviyogaśokaropitahṛdayāḥ sasambhramāḥ kamalakuvalayakunmalavilāsā nalinya iva śirasi viracitobhayakamalāñjalayaḥ prāhuh--
XXdivyav_u:20467: 507.005. asmāsu te kartumaniṣṭamiṣṭaṃ kathaṃ hi bhaktipraṇayārpitāsu/
XXdivyav_u:20469: 507.009. gatvā tannagaratrayam yadapi he svāminnihāpyāgataḥ saṃprāptā
XXdivyav_u:20471: 507.011. gantavyaṃ na punastvayā subahunā proktena kim yāsi cet saṃsmartāsi vipatsamudrapatito vākyaṃ hi no duḥkhitaḥ//103//
XXdivyav_u:20474: 507.015. kathaṃ teṣu nivāryerannivarteran kathaṃ nu vā//104//
XXdivyav_u:20475: 507.016. niyojanīyāḥ suhṛdo 'suhṛdbhir yasmin hite karmaṇi nityakālam/
XXdivyav_u:20476: 507.018. nivāraṇaṃ tatra tu ye prakurvate te śatravo mitratayā bhavanti//105//
XXdivyav_u:20477: 507.020. divyaṃ prāpya sukhaṃ pure ramaṇake saṃcoditaḥ karmaṇā āyāto 'smi
XXdivyav_u:20479: 507.022. saṃprāpto 'smi tataḥ svakarmakuśaleneṣṭaṃ puraṃ nandanaṃ tasmādāgatakasya yūyamadhunā pronmūlitā bhūmayaḥ//106//
XXdivyav_u:20480: 507.024. tasmādato me gamanaṃ bhavantyo mā vārayadhvaṃ na hi no
XXdivyav_u:20484: 507.028. atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastāsāmapsarasāṃ hitamapi vākyamahitamivāvajñayā tiraskṛtya tenaiva dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan dadarśa mahārgalapraghaṭitaprakaṭapuṭacaturdvāradāruṇaṃ sureśvareṇāpyabhedyottuṅgāyasaviśālaprākārapariveṣṭitamantarbhramaccakramaṇḍalālokapramuktadamadamāśabdagambhīrabhairavamāyasaṃ nagaram/
XXdivyav_u:20486: 508.001. <508>samprāptamātrasya tu tatkṣaṇena dvāraṃ ca pusphoṭa kapāṭabhāram/
XXdivyav_u:20497: 508.019. kṣaṇādabhūttannagaraṃ ca sarvaṃ bhrāntaṃ ca kṛtsnaṃ sa dadarśa bhītaḥ//111//
XXdivyav_u:20498: 508.021. tato maitrakanyako bodhisattvaḥ paśyati sma tamatidāruṇākārapramāṇaṃ krūrājvalanamālāliṅgitamudāreṇa paṭupavanavikīryamāṇadhūmapaṭalāndhakāradurdinena sphuratkphuliṅgāvalikarāladarśanenāyasena mahatā bhramatā cakreṇa dārviva
XXdivyav_u:20502: 508.025. kiṃ nāgo 'si suro 'si kinnaravaro yakṣo 'si kiṃ mānuṣaḥ kiṃ
XXdivyav_u:20503: vidyādharasainikaḥ kimasi vā daityaḥ piśāco 'si vā/
XXdivyav_u:20504: 508.027. kiṃ vākāri bhavāntareṣu bhavatā karmātiraudraṃ svayam yāsyāmi vyasanaṃ duruttaramidaṃ bhujyaṃ phalaṃ krandayat//112//
XXdivyav_u:20506: 508.030. nāhaṃ nāgo naiva yakṣo na devo daityo nāhaṃ nāpi gandharvarājaḥ/
XXdivyav_u:20507: 509.001. <509>rakṣo nāhaṃ nāpi vidyādharo 'pi jātistulyā saṃpratīhi tvayā
XXdivyav_u:20509: 509.004. kiṃ karma bhramatā tvayā kumatinā saṃsāradurge kṛtam yenedaṃ jvalitānalaṃ śirasi cakraṃ bhramatyāyasam/
XXdivyav_u:20511: 509.007. nānāduṣkarakārikā bhagavatī saṃsārasaṃdarśikā tatra śreyaḥsukhopapādanaparā matsnehabaddhāśayā//114//
XXdivyav_u:20512: 509.009. yāṃ loke pravadanti sādhumatayaḥ kṣetraṃ paraṃ prāṇināṃ daivāveśavaśādakāryagurukastasyā jananyā mahat/
XXdivyav_u:20513: 509.011. sādho prāskhalayaṃ śiraḥpraharaṇaṃ pādena pāpāśayas tenedaṃ
XXdivyav_u:20515: 509.013. atha bodhisattvastasya puruṣasya pravacanapratodena saṃcoditahṛdayastāṃ parajugupsāmātmanyanupaśyannāha--
XXdivyav_u:20517: 509.017. yeṣu svayaṃ doṣaguṇeṣu magnas taireva lokaṃ kathamaṅkayāmi//116//
XXdivyav_u:20523: 509.025. kiṃ na paśyati karmāṇi balavanti śarīriṇām/
XXdivyav_u:20525: 509.027. ye baddhā viṣayeṇa duḥkhanigaḍenāyāsakarmotkaṭe ye tyaktvā
XXdivyav_u:20527: 509.029. muktāḥ karmabhireva duḥkhanigaḍapracchedaśūraiḥ śubhair mānuṣyam yadavāpya mūḍhamatayo dūre sthitā jarmiṇah (janminah?) //119//
XXdivyav_u:20528: 509.031. atha tasya vacanānantarameva karmānilāvegotkṣiptamiva taccakraṃ ciṭiciṭāyamānadahanakaṇacayodgāraraudraṃ tasya mūrdhnaḥ samabhyudgamya maitrakanyakasya bodhisattvasya śiraḥ pravidārayad bhramitumārabdham/
XXdivyav_u:20531: 510.003. tataḥ sa puruṣo hā heti mūrdhnā pravidāhajena tīvreṇa duḥkhena
XXdivyav_u:20534: 510.007. saṃtyajya karmāda parāṇi tāni prāptastvidaṃ sthānamanantaduḥkham//121//
XXdivyav_u:20535: 510.009. devālayaṃ divyasukhopabhogaṃ ko nāma saṃprāpya śubhairatulyaiḥ/
XXdivyav_u:20539: 510.016. saṃtyajya nāgā vyasanaṃ sahante yayā tayecchālatayā gato
XXdivyav_u:20541: 510.020. yuddhe mriyante bahavo narendrā yayā tayecchālatayā gato
XXdivyav_u:20543: 510.024. mahodadhau yānti narāḥ praṇāśam yayā tayecchālatayā gato
XXdivyav_u:20546: 510.030. teṣāṃ munīnāṃ vigatavyathānāṃ deyaṃ kathaṃ pādarajena mūrdhni/
XXdivyav_u:20564: 511.018. yo mātaryapakārakartumanasaḥ kṛtvā samāyāsyati tasyedaṃ śirasi
XXdivyav_u:20566: 511.020. atha bodhisattvastena mūrdhnā pravidāhajena tīvreṇa duḥkhena
XXdivyav_u:20572: 511.026. kṛtvā duścaritaṃ svamātari jagatkṛtsnam yadi prodvahedetatprajvalitāgnirāgakapilaṃ cakraṃ bṛhanmūrdhani/
XXdivyav_u:20573: 511.028. kalpaṃ kalpasamairahobhirayutān voḍhuṃ cirāyotsahe sattvārthaṃ pratipadyamānamasya hi me cittaṃ na saṃkhidyate//134//
XXdivyav_u:20574: 511.030. atha tasya sarvasattvapriyasya maitrakanyakasya bodhisattvasya vacanānantarameva mūrdhnā samutpāṭyotkṣiptamiva taccakraṃ saptatālocchrayāccakraṃ nabhastalaṃ samutpatyāvatasthe/
XXdivyav_u:20591: 512.023. bhagavati guṇarāśau saṃprasādya svacittaṃ svagṛhamiva sa
XXdivyav_u:20598: 512.031. tatkimidamupanītam? evaṃ hi mātaryapakāriṇaḥ prāṇinah ihaiva vyasanaprapātapātālāvalambino bhavantīti satatasamupajāyamānapremaprasādabahumānasānasaiḥ satpuruṣairmātaraḥ śuśrūṣaṇīyā iti//
